analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si su śarmā asi su pratiṣṭhānaḥ bṛhadukṣāya namaḥ viśvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ   eṣa te yoniḥ viśvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si bṛhaspatisutasya deva soma ta indor  indriyāvataṃ patnīvato grahām̐ ṛdhyāsam /  ahaṃ parastād aham avastād yad antarikṣaṃ tad u me pitābhūt /  aham̐ sūryam ubhayato dadarśāhaṃ devānāṃ paramaṃ guhā yat //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si bṛhaspati sutasya deva soma te indoḥ indriyāvatam patnīvataḥ grahām ṛdhyāsam    aham parastāt aham avastāt yat antarikṣam tat u me pitā abhūt    aham sūryam ubhayatas dadarśa aham devānām paramam guhā yat

original: agnā3i patnīvant sajūr devena tvaṣṭrā somaṃ piba svāhā /  prajāpatir vṛṣāsi retodhā reto mayi dhehi prajāpates ta vṛṣṇo  retodhaso retodhām aśīya //
analyzed: patnīvan sajūs devena tvaṣṭrā somam piba svāhā prajāpatiḥ vṛṣā asi retaḥ dhāḥ retaḥ mayi dhehi prajāpateḥ te vṛṣṇaḥ retaḥ dhasaḥ retaḥ dhām aśīya

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si harir asi hāriyojano haribhyāṃ tvā /  haryor dhānā stha sahasomā indrāya //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si hariḥ asi hāriyojanaḥ haribhyām tvā haryoḥ dhānāḥ stha saha somāḥ indrāya

original: yas te aśvasanir bhakṣo yo gosanis tasya ta iṣṭayajuṣa stutasomasya  śastokthasyopahūtasyopahūto bhakṣayāmi //
analyzed: yaḥ te aśva saniḥ bhakṣaḥ yaḥ go saniḥ tasya te iṣṭa yajuṣaḥ stuta somasya śasta ukthasya upahūtasya upahūtaḥ bhakṣayāmi

original: devakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi /  manuṣyakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi /  pitṛkṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi /  ātmakṛtasyainaso 'vayajanam asi /  enasa-enaso 'vayajanam asi /  yac cāham eno vidvām̐ś cakāra yac cāvidvām̐s tasya sarvasyainaso  'vayajanam asi //
analyzed: deva kṛtasya enasaḥ vayajanam asi   manuṣya kṛtasya enasaḥ vayajanam asi   pitṛ kṛtasya enasaḥ vayajanam asi   ātma kṛtasya enasaḥ vayajanam asi    enasa enasaḥ vayajanam asi            asi        ca aham enaḥ vidvām cakāra yat ca a vidvān tasya sarvasya enasaḥ vayajanam asi

original: saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhir aganmahi manasā sam̐ śivena /  tvaṣṭā sudatro vi dadhātu rāyo 'nu mārṣṭu tanvo yad viliṣṭam //
analyzed: sam varcasā payasā sam tanūbhiḥ aganmahi manasā sam śivena    tvaṣṭā su datraḥ vi dadhātu rāyaḥ nu mārṣṭu tanvaḥ yat viliṣṭam

original: sam indra ṇo manasā neṣi gobhiḥ sam̐ sūribhir maghavant sam̐ svastyā /  saṃ brahmaṇā devakṛtaṃ yad asti saṃ devānām̐ sumatau yajñiyānām̐ svāhā //
analyzed: sam indra naḥ manasā neṣi gobhiḥ sam sūribhiḥ maghavan sam svastyā    sam brahmaṇā deva kṛtam yat asti sam devānām sumatau yajñiyānām svāhā

original: saṃ varcasā payasā saṃ tanūbhir aganmahi manasā sam̐ śivena /  tvaṣṭā sudatro vidadhātu rāyo 'nu mārṣṭu tanvo yad viliṣṭam //
analyzed: sam varcasā payasā sam tanūbhiḥ aganmahi manasā sam śivena    tvaṣṭā su datraḥ vidadhātu rāyaḥ nu mārṣṭu tanvaḥ yat viliṣṭam

original: dhātā rātiḥ savitedaṃ juṣantāṃ prajāpatir nidhipā devo agniḥ /  tvaṣṭā viṣṇuḥ prajayā sam̐rarāṇā yajamānāya draviṇaṃ dadhāta svāhā //
analyzed: dhātā rātiḥ savitā idam juṣantām prajāpatiḥ nidhi pāḥ devaḥ agniḥ    tvaṣṭā viṣṇuḥ prajayā samrarāṇāḥ yajamānāya draviṇam dadhāta svāhā

original: sugā vo devāḥ sadanā akarma ya ājagmedam̐ savanaṃ juṣāṇāḥ /  bharamāṇā vahamānā havīm̐ṣy asme dhatta vasavo vasūni svāhā //
analyzed: sugā vaḥ devāḥ sadanā akarma ye ājagma idam savanam juṣāṇāḥ   bharamāṇāḥ vahamānāḥ havīmṣi asme dhatta vasavaḥ vasūni svāhā

original: yām̐ āvaha uśato deva devām̐s tān preraya sve agne sadhasthe /  jakṣivām̐saḥ papivām̐saś ca viśve 'suṃ dharmam̐ svarātiṣṭhatānu svāhā //
analyzed: yām āvahaḥ uśataḥ deva devān tān preraya sve agne sadhasthe jakṣivāmsaḥ papivāmsaḥ ca viśve sum dharmam svarā atiṣṭhata anu svāhā

original: vayam̐ hi tvā prayati yajñe asminn agne hotāram avṛṇīmahīha /  ṛdhag ayā ṛdhag utāśamiṣṭhāḥ prajānan yajñam upa yāhi vidvānt  svāhā //
analyzed: vayam hi tvā prayati yajñe asmin agne hotāram avṛṇīmahi iha    ṛdhak ayā ṛdhak uta aśamiṣṭhāḥ prajānan yajñam upa yāhi vidvān svāhā

original: devā gātuvido gātuṃ vittvā gātum ita /  manasaspata imaṃ deva yajñam̐ svāhā vāte dhāḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ gātu vidaḥ gātum vittvā gātum ita manasaspate imam deva yajñam svāhā vāte dhāḥ

original: yajña yajñaṃ gaccha yajñapatiṃ gaccha svāṃ yoniṃ gaccha svāhā /  eṣa te yajño yajñapate sahasūktavākaḥ sarvavīras taj juṣasva svāhā //
analyzed: yajña yajñam gaccha yajñapatim gaccha svām yonim gaccha svāhā eṣa te yajñaḥ yajñapate sahasūktavākaḥ sarva vīraḥ tat juṣasva svāhā

original: māhir bhūr mā pṛdākuḥ /  urum̐ hi rājā varuṇaś cakāra sūryāya panthām anvetavā u /  apade pādā pratidhātave 'kar utāpavaktā hṛdayāvidhaś cit /  namo varuṇāyābhiṣṭhito varuṇasya pāśaḥ //
analyzed: mā ahiḥ bhūḥ mā pṛdākuḥ    urum hi rājā varuṇaḥ cakāra sūryāya panthām anvetavai u   a pade pādā pratidhātave kaḥ uta apavaktā hṛdayāvidhaḥ cit   namaḥ varuṇāya abhiṣṭhitaḥ varuṇasya pāśaḥ

original: agner anīkam apa ā viveśāpāṃ napāt pratirakṣann asuryam /  dame-dame samidhaṃ yakṣy agne prati te jihvā ghṛtam uc caraṇyat svāhā  //
analyzed: agneḥ anīkam apaḥ ā viveśa apām napāt pratirakṣan asuryam    damedame samidham yakṣi agne prati te jihvā ghṛtam ud caraṇyat svāhā

original: samudre te hṛdayam apsv antaḥ saṃ tvā viśantv oṣadhīr utāpaḥ /  yajñasya tvā yajñapate sūktoktau namovāke vidhema yat svāhā //
analyzed: samudre te hṛdayam apsu antar sam tvā viśantu oṣadhīḥ uta apaḥ   yajñasya tvā yajña pate sūkta uktau namovāke vidhema yat svāhā

original: devīr āpa eṣa vo garbhas tam̐ suprītam̐ subhṛtaṃ bibhṛta /  deva somaiṣa te lokas tasmiñ chaṃ ca vakṣva pari ca vakṣva //
analyzed: devīḥ āpaḥ eṣa vaḥ garbhaḥ tam su prītam su bhṛtam bibhṛta    deva soma eṣa te lokaḥ tasmin śam ca vakṣva pari ca vakṣva

original: avabhṛtha nicumpuṇa nicerur asi nicumpuṇaḥ /  ava devair devakṛtam eno 'yāsiṣam ava martyair martyakṛtaṃ pururāvṇo  deva riṣas pāhi //
analyzed: avabhṛtha nicumpuṇa niceruḥ asi nicumpuṇaḥ    ava devaiḥ deva kṛtam enaḥ yāsiṣam ava martyaiḥ martya kṛtam pururāvṇaḥ deva riṣaḥ pāhi

original: devānām̐ samid asi //
analyzed: devānām samidh asi

original: ejatu daśamāsyo garbho jarāyuṇā saha /  yathāyaṃ vāyur ejati yathā samudra ejati /  evāyaṃ daśamāsyo asraj jarāyuṇā saha //
analyzed: ejatu daśamāsyaḥ garbhaḥ jarāyuṇā saha    yathā ayam vāyuḥ ejati yathā samudraḥ ejati      eva ayam daśamāsyaḥ asrat jarāyuṇā saha

original: yasyai te yajñiyo garbho yasyai yonir hiraṇyī /  aṅgāny ahrutā yasya taṃ mātrā sam ajīgamam̐ svāhā //
analyzed: yasyai te yajñiyaḥ garbhaḥ yasyai yoniḥ hiraṇyī    aṅgāni ahrutā yasya tam mātrā sam ajīgamam svāhā

original: purudasmo viṣurūpa indur antar mahimānam ānañja dhīraḥ /  ekapadīṃ dvipadīṃ tripadīṃ catuṣpadīm aṣṭāpadīṃ bhuvanānu prathantām̐  svāhā //
analyzed: puru dasmaḥ viṣurūpaḥ induḥ antar mahimānam ānañja dhīraḥ  / ekapadīm dvipadīm tripadīm catuṣpadīm aṣṭāpadīm bhuvanā anu prathantām svāhā

original: maruto yasya hi kṣaye pāthā divo vimahasaḥ /  sa sugopātamo janaḥ //
analyzed: marutaḥ yasya hi kṣaye pāthāḥ divaḥ vimahasaḥ    sa sugopātamaḥ janaḥ

original: mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca na imaṃ yajñaṃ mimikṣatām /  pipṛtāṃ no bharīmabhiḥ //
analyzed: mahī dyauḥ pṛthivī ca naḥ imam yajñam mimikṣatām    pipṛtām naḥ bharīmabhiḥ

original: ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan rathaṃ yuktā te brahmaṇā harī /  arvācīnam̐ su te mano grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā //
analyzed: ā tiṣṭha vṛtrahan ratham yuktā te brahmaṇā harī   arvācīnam su te manaḥ grāvā kṛṇotu vagnunā

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine    eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine

original: yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣyaprā /  athā na indra somapā girām upaśrutiṃ cara //
analyzed: yukṣvā hi keśinā harī vṛṣaṇā kakṣya prā    athā naḥ indra soma pāḥ girām upaśrutim cara

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine    eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine

original: indram id dharī vahato 'pratidhṛṣṭaśavasam /  ṛṣīṇāṃ ca stutīr upa yajñaṃ ca mānuṣāṇām //
analyzed: indram id harī vahataḥ pratidhṛṣṭa śavasam      ṛṣīṇām ca stutīḥ upa yajñam ca mānuṣāṇām

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine    eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā ṣoḍaśine

original: yasman na jātaḥ paro anyo asti ya āviveśa bhuvanāni viśvā /  prajāpatiḥ prajayā sam̐rarāṇas trīṇi jyotīm̐ṣi sacate sa ṣolaśī //
analyzed: yasmat na jātaḥ paraḥ anyaḥ asti yaḥ āviveśa bhuvanāni viśvā    prajāpatiḥ prajayā samrarāṇaḥ trīṇi jyotīmṣi sacate sa ṣolaśī

original: indraś ca samrāḍ varuṇaś ca rājā tau te bhakṣaṃ cakratur agr etam /  tayor aham anu bhakṣaṃ bhakṣayāmi vāg devī juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu /  saha prāṇena svāhā //
analyzed: indraḥ ca samrāj varuṇaḥ ca rājā tau te bhakṣam cakratuḥ agr etam    tayoḥ aham anu bhakṣam bhakṣayāmi vāc devī juṣāṇā somasya tṛpyatu     saha prāṇena svāhā

original: agne pavasva svapā asme varcaḥ suvīryam /  dadhad rayiṃ mayi poṣam //
analyzed: agne pavasva su apāḥ asme varcaḥ su vīryam   dadhat rayim mayi poṣam

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sy agnaye tvā varcase /  eṣa te yonir agnaye tvā varcase /  agne varcasvin varcasvām̐s tvaṃ deveṣv asi varcasvān ahaṃ manuṣyeṣu  bhūyāsam //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si agnaye tvā varcase   eṣa te yoniḥ agnaye tvā varcase   agne varcasvin varcasvān tvam deveṣu asi varcasvān aham manuṣyeṣu bhūyāsam

original: uttiṣṭhann ojasā saha pītvī śipre avepayaḥ /  somam indra camū sutam /  upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvaujase /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvaujase /  indraujiṣṭhaujiṣṭhas tvaṃ deveṣv asy ojiṣṭho 'haṃ manuṣyeṣu bhūyāsam //
analyzed: uttiṣṭhan ojasā saha pītvī śipre avepayaḥ   somam indra camū sutam    upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā ojase   eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā ojase   indra ojiṣṭha ojiṣṭhaḥ tvam deveṣu asi ojiṣṭhaḥ ham manuṣyeṣu bhūyāsam

original: adṛśram asya ketavo vi raśmayo janām̐ anu /  bhrājanto agnayo yathā //
analyzed: adṛśram asya ketavaḥ vi raśmayaḥ janām anu    bhrājantaḥ agnayaḥ yathā

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si sūryāya tvā bhrājāya /  eṣa te yoniḥ sūryāya tvā bhrājāya /  sūrya bhrājiṣṭha bhrājiṣṭhas tvaṃ deveṣv asi bhrājiṣṭho 'haṃ manuṣyeṣu  bhūyāsam //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si sūryāya tvā bhrājāya   eṣa te yoniḥ sūryāya tvā bhrājāya   sūrya bhrājiṣṭha bhrājiṣṭhaḥ tvam deveṣu asi bhrājiṣṭhaḥ ham manuṣyeṣu bhūyāsam

original: ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ /  dṛśe viśvāya sūryam //
analyzed: ud u tyam jātavedasam devam vahanti ketavaḥ    dṛśe viśvāya sūryam

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si sūryāya tvā bhrājāya /  eṣa te yoniḥ sūryāya tvā bhrājāya /  sūrya bhrājiṣṭha bhrājiṣṭhas tvaṃ deveṣv asi bhrājiṣṭho 'haṃ manuṣyeṣu  bhūyāsam //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si sūryāya tvā bhrājāya   eṣa te yoniḥ sūryāya tvā bhrājāya   sūrya bhrājiṣṭha bhrājiṣṭhaḥ tvam deveṣu asi bhrājiṣṭhaḥ ham manuṣyeṣu bhūyāsam

original: sahasraṃ dhukṣvorudhārā payasvatī punar māviśatād rayiḥ //
analyzed: sahasram dhukṣva uru dhārā payasvatī punar mā āviśatāt rayiḥ

original: iḍe rante havye kāmye candre jyote 'dite sarasvati mahi viśruti /  etā te aghnye nāmāni devebhyo mā sukṛtaṃṃ brūtāt //
analyzed: iḍe rante havye kāmye candre jyote dite sarasvati mahi viśruti

original: vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ /  yo asmām̐ abhidāsaty adharaṃ gamayā tamaḥ //
analyzed: vi naḥ indra mṛdhaḥ jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ    yaḥ asmām abhidāsati adharam gamaya tamaḥ

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā vimṛdhe /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā vimṛdhe //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā vimṛdhe   eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā vimṛdhe

original: vācas patiṃ viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manojuvaṃ vāje adyā huvema /  sa no viśvāni havanāni joṣad viśvaśambhūr avase sādhukarmā //
analyzed: vācaḥ patim viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manaḥ juvam vāje adyā huvema    sa naḥ viśvāni havanāni joṣat viśva śambhūḥ avase sādhu karmā

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā viśvakarmaṇe /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā viśvakarmaṇe //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā viśva karmaṇe    eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā viśva karmaṇe

original: viśvakarman haviṣā vardhanena trātāram indram akṛṇor avadhyam /  tasmai viśaḥ samanamanta pūrvīr ayam ugro vihavyo yathāsat //
analyzed: viśvakarman haviṣā vardhanena trātāram indram akṛṇoḥ avadhyam    tasmai viśaḥ samanamanta pūrvīḥ ayam ugraḥ vihavyaḥ yathā asat

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā viśvakarmaṇe /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā viśvakarmaṇe //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā viśva karmaṇe    eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā viśva karmaṇe

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sy agnaye tvā gāyatracchandasaṃ gṛhṇāmi /  indrāya tvā triṣṭupchandasaṃ gṛhṇāmi /  viśvebhyas tvā devebhyo jagacchandasaṃ gṛhṇāmi /  anuṣṭup te 'bhigaraḥ //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si agnaye tvā gāyatra chandasam gṛhṇāmi    indrāya tvā triṣṭubh chandasam gṛhṇāmi   viśvebhyaḥ tvā devebhyaḥ jagat chandasam gṛhṇāmi    anuṣṭubh te bhigaraḥ

original: vreśīnāṃ tvā patmann ā dhūnomi kukānanānāṃ tvā patmann ā dhūnomi  bhandanānāṃ tvā patmann ā dhūnomi madintamānāṃ tvā patmann ā dhūnomi  madhuntamānāṃ tvā patmann ā dhūnomi śukraṃ tvā śukra ā dhūnomy ahno rūpe  sūryasya raśmiṣu //
analyzed: vreśīnām tvā patman ā dhūnomi kukānanānām tvā patman ā dhūnomi bhandanānām tvā patman ā dhūnomi madintamānām tvā patman ā dhūnomi madhuntamānām tvā patman ā dhūnomi śukram tvā śukre ā dhūnomi ahnaḥ rūpe sūryasya raśmiṣu

original: kakubham̐ rūpaṃ vṛṣabhasya rocate bṛhac chukraḥ śukrasya purogāḥ  somaḥ somasya purogāḥ /  yat te somādābhyaṃ nāma jāgṛvi tasmai tvā gṛhṇāmi  tasmai te soma somāya svāhā //
analyzed: kakubham rūpam vṛṣabhasya rocate bṛhat śukraḥ śukrasya purogāḥ somaḥ somasya purogāḥ   yat te soma adābhyam nāma jāgṛvi tasmai tvā gṛhṇāmi tasmai te soma somāya svāhā

original: uśik tvaṃ deva somāgneḥ priyaṃ pātho 'pīhi /  vaśī tvaṃ deva somendrasya priyaṃ pātho 'pīhi /  asmatsakhā tvaṃ deva soma viśveṣāṃ devānāṃ priyaṃ pātho 'pīhi //
analyzed: uśij tvam deva soma agneḥ priyam pāthaḥ pīhi   vaśī tvam deva soma indrasya priyam pāthaḥ pīhi   asmad sakhā tvam deva soma viśveṣām devānām priyam pāthaḥ pīhi

original: iha ratir iha ramadhvam iha dhṛtir iha svadhṛtiḥ svāhā /  upasṛjan dharuṇaṃ mātre dharuṇo mātaraṃ dhayan /  rāyaspoṣam asmāsu dīdharat svāhā //
analyzed: iha ratiḥ iha ramadhvam iha dhṛtiḥ iha sva dhṛtiḥ svāhā   upasṛjan dharuṇam mātre dharuṇaḥ mātaram dhayan    rāyaspoṣam asmāsu dīdharat svāhā

original: satrasya ṛddhir asy aganma jyotir amṛtā abhūma  divaṃ pṛthivyā adhy āruhāmāvidāma devānt svar jyotiḥ //
analyzed: satrasya ṛddhiḥ asi aganma jyotiḥ amṛtāḥ abhūma  / divam pṛthivyāḥ adhi āruhāma avidāma devān svar jyotiḥ

original: yuvaṃ tam indrāparvatā puroyudhā yo naḥ pṛtanyād apa taṃ-tam id  dhataṃ vajreṇa taṃ-tam id dhatam /  dūre cattāya chantsad gahanaṃ yad inakṣat /  asmākam̐ śatrūn pari śūra viśvato darmā darṣīṣṭa viśvataḥ //
analyzed: yuvam tam indrāparvatā puroyudhā yaḥ naḥ pṛtanyāt apa taṃtam id dhatam vajreṇa taṃtam id dhatam    dūre cattāya chantsat gahanam yat inakṣat   asmākam śatrūn pari śūra viśvatas darmā darṣīṣṭa viśvatas

original: bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ suprajāḥ prajābhiḥ syāma suvīrā vīraiḥ supoṣāḥ  poṣaiḥ //
analyzed: bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar suprajāḥ prajābhiḥ syāma su vīrāḥ vīraiḥ su poṣāḥ poṣaiḥ

original: parameṣṭhy abhidhītaḥ /  prajāpatir vāci vyāhṛtāyām /  andho acchetaḥ /  savitā sanyām /  viśvakarmā dīkṣāyām /  pūṣā somakrayaṇyām //
analyzed: parameṣṭhī abhidhītaḥ   prajāpatiḥ vāci vyāhṛtāyām   andhaḥ acchetaḥ    savitā sanyām   viśvakarmā dīkṣāyām pūṣā somakrayaṇyām

original: indraś ca marutaś ca krayāyopotthitaḥ /  asuraḥ paṇyamānaḥ /  mitraḥ krītaḥ /  viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭa ūrāv āsannaḥ /  viṣṇur narandhiṣaḥ prohyamāṇaḥ //
analyzed: indraḥ ca marutaḥ ca krayāya upotthitaḥ   asuraḥ paṇyamānaḥ   mitraḥ krītaḥ   viṣṇuḥ śipiviṣṭe ūrau āsannaḥ    viṣṇuḥ narandhiṣaḥ prohyamāṇaḥ

original: soma āgataḥ /  varuṇa āsandyām āsannaḥ /  agnir āgnīdhre /  indro havirdhāne /  atharvopāvahriyamāṇaḥ //
analyzed: somaḥ āgataḥ varuṇaḥ āsandyām āsannaḥ   agniḥ āgnīdhre indraḥ havirdhāne   atharvā upāvahriyamāṇaḥ

original: viśve devā am̐śuṣu nyuptaḥ /  viṣṇur āprītapā āpyāyyamānaḥ /  yamaḥ sūyamānaḥ /  viṣṇuḥ saṃbhriyamāṇaḥ /  vāyuḥ pūyamānaḥ /  śukraḥ pūtaḥ /  śukraṃ kṣīraśrīḥ /  manthī saktuśrīḥ //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ amśuṣu nyuptaḥ viṣṇuḥ āprīta pāḥ āpyāyyamānaḥ   yamaḥ sūyamānaḥ   viṣṇuḥ saṃbhriyamāṇaḥ   vāyuḥ pūyamānaḥ śukraḥ pūtaḥ    śukram kṣīra śrīḥ   manthī saktu śrīḥ

original: viśve devāś camaseṣūnnītaḥ /  asur homāyodyataḥ /  rudro hūyamānaḥ /  vāto 'bhyāvṛttaḥ /  nṛcakṣāḥ pratikhyātaḥ /  bhakṣo bhakṣyamāṇaḥ /  pitaro nārāśam̐sāḥ sannaḥ //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ camaseṣu unnītaḥ   asuḥ homāya udyataḥ rudraḥ hūyamānaḥ vātaḥ bhyāvṛttaḥ nṛ cakṣāḥ pratikhyātaḥ bhakṣaḥ bhakṣyamāṇaḥ pitaraḥ nārāśamsāḥ sannaḥ

original: sindhur avabhṛthāyodyataḥ /  samudro 'bhyavahriyamāṇaḥ /  salilaḥ praplutaḥ /  yayor ojasā skabhitā rajām̐si vīryebhir vīratamā śaviṣṭhā /  yā patyete apratītā sahobhir viṣṇū agan varuṇā pūrvahūtau //
analyzed: sindhuḥ avabhṛthāya udyataḥ   samudraḥ abhyavahriyamāṇaḥ salilaḥ praplutaḥ   yayoḥ ojasā skabhitā rajāmsi vīryebhiḥ vīratamā śaviṣṭhā   yā patyete apratītā sahobhiḥ viṣṇū agan varuṇā pūrva hūtau

original: devān divam agan yajñas tato mā draviṇam aṣṭu manuṣyān antarikṣam  agan yajñas tato mā draviṇam aṣṭu pitṛn pṛthivīm agan yajñas tato mā  draviṇam aṣṭu yaṃ kaṃ ca lokam agan yajñas tato me bhadraṃ abhūt //
analyzed: devān divam agan yajñaḥ tatas mā draviṇam aṣṭu manuṣyān antarikṣam agan yajñaḥ tatas mā draviṇam aṣṭu pitṛn pṛthivīm agan yajñaḥ tatas mā draviṇam aṣṭu yam kam ca lokam agan yajñaḥ tatas me bhadram abhūt

original: catustrim̐śat tantavo ye vitatnire ya imaṃ yajñam̐ svadhayā dadante /  teṣāṃ chinnam̐ sam v etad dadhāmi svāhā gharmo apy etu devān //
analyzed: catustrimśat tantavaḥ ye vitatnire ye imam yajñam svadhayā dadante    teṣām chinnam sam u etat dadhāmi svāhā gharmaḥ api etu devān

original: yajñasya doho vitataḥ purutrā so aṣṭadhā divam anvā tatāna /  sa yajña dhukṣva mahi me prajayām̐ rāyaspoṣaṃ viśvam āyur aśīya svāhā //
analyzed: yajñasya dohaḥ vitataḥ purutrā saḥ aṣṭadhā divam anvā tatāna    sa yajña dhukṣva mahi me prajayām rāyaspoṣam viśvam āyuḥ aśīya svāhā

original: ā pavasva hiraṇyavad aśvavat soma vīravat /  vājaṃ gomantam ā bhara svāhā //
analyzed: ā pavasva hiraṇyavat aśvavat soma vīravat    vājam gomantam ā bhara svāhā

original: deva savitaḥ pra suva yajñaṃ pra suva yajñapatiṃ bhagāya /  divyo gandharvaḥ ketupūḥ ketaṃ naḥ punātu vācaspatir vājaṃ naḥ svadatu  svāhā //
analyzed: deva savitar pra suva yajñam pra suva yajñapatim bhagāya     divyaḥ gandharvaḥ ketu pūḥ ketam naḥ punātu vācaspatiḥ vājam naḥ svadatu svāhā

original: dhruvasadaṃ tvā nṛṣadaṃ manaḥsadam /  upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmi /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam /  apsuṣadaṃ tvā ghṛtasadaṃ vyomasadam /  upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmi /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam /  pṛthivīsadaṃ tvāntarikṣasadaṃ divisadaṃ devasadaṃ nākasadam /  upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmi /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam //
analyzed: dhruva sadam tvā nṛṣadam manaḥ sadam    upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā juṣṭam gṛhṇāmi           tvā ghṛta sadam vyoma sadam   upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā juṣṭam gṛhṇāmi         te yoniḥ indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam    pṛthivī sadam tvā antarikṣa sadam divisadam deva sadam nāka sadam      upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā juṣṭam gṛhṇāmi            te yoniḥ indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam

original: apām̐ rasam udvayasam̐ sūrye santam̐ samāhitam /  apām̐ rasasya yo rasas taṃ vo gṛhṇāmy uttamam //
analyzed: apām rasam udvayasam sūrye santam samāhitam   apām rasasya yaḥ rasaḥ tam vaḥ gṛhṇāmi uttamam

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmi /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā juṣṭam gṛhṇāmi   / eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam

original: grahā ūrjāhutayo vyanto viprāya matim /  teṣāṃ viśipriyāṇāṃ vo 'ham iṣam ūrjam̐ sam agrabham /  upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā juṣṭaṃ gṛhṇāmi /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam /  sampṛcau sthaḥ saṃ mā bhadreṇa pṛṅktam /  vipṛcau stho vi mā pāpmanā pṛṅktam //
analyzed: grahāḥ ūrjā āhutayaḥ vyantaḥ viprāya matim   teṣām viśipriyāṇām vaḥ ham iṣam ūrjam sam agrabham    upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā juṣṭam gṛhṇāmi    eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā juṣṭatamam   sampṛcau sthaḥ sam mā bhadreṇa pṛṅktam    vipṛcau sthaḥ vi mā pāpmanā pṛṅktam

original: indrasya vajro 'si vājasās tvayāyam̐ set /  vājasya nu prasave mātaraṃ mahīm aditiṃ nāma vacasā karāmahe /  yasyām idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam āviveśa tasyāṃ no devaḥ savitā dharma  sāviṣat //
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ si vāja sāḥ tvayā ayam set      vājasya nu prasave mātaram mahīm aditim nāma vacasā karāmahe    yasyām idam viśvam bhuvanam āviveśa tasyām naḥ devaḥ savitā dharma sāviṣat

original: apsv antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta praśastiṣv aśvā bhavata  vājinaḥ /  devīr āpo yo va ūrmiḥ pratūrtiḥ kakunmān vājasās tenāyaṃ vājam̐ set //
analyzed: apsu antar amṛtam apsu bheṣajam apām uta praśastiṣu aśvāḥ bhavata vājinaḥ    devīḥ āpaḥ yaḥ vaḥ ūrmiḥ pratūrtiḥ kakunmān vāja sāḥ tena ayam vājam set

original: vāto vā mano vā gandharvāḥ saptavim̐śatiḥ /  te agre 'śvam ayuñjam̐s te asmin javam ādadhuḥ //
analyzed: vātaḥ vā manaḥ vā gandharvāḥ saptavimśatiḥ   te agre śvam ayuñjam te asmin javam ādadhuḥ

original: vātaram̐hā bhava vājin yujyamāna indrasyeva dakṣiṇaḥ śriyaidhi /  yuñjantu tvā maruto viśvavedasa ā te tvaṣṭā patsu javaṃ dadhātu //
analyzed: vāta ramhāḥ bhava vājin yujyamānaḥ indrasya iva dakṣiṇaḥ śriyā edhi    yuñjantu tvā marutaḥ viśva vedasaḥ ā te tvaṣṭā patsu javam dadhātu

original: javo yas te vājin nihito guhā yaḥ śyene parītto acarac ca vāte /  tena no vājin balavān balena vājajic ca bhava samane ca pārayiṣṇuḥ //
analyzed: javaḥ yaḥ te vājin nihitaḥ guhā yaḥ śyene parīttaḥ acarat ca vāte     tena naḥ vājin balavān balena vāja jit ca bhava samane ca pārayiṣṇuḥ

original: vājino vājajito vājam̐ sariṣyanto bṛhaspater bhāgam ava jighrata //
analyzed: vājinaḥ vāja jitaḥ vājam sariṣyantaḥ bṛhaspateḥ bhāgam ava jighrata

original: devasyāham̐ savituḥ save satyasavaso bṛhaspater uttamaṃ nākam̐  ruheyam /  devasyāham̐ savituḥ save satyasavasa indrasyottamaṃ nākam̐ ruheyam /  devasyāham̐ savituḥ save satyaprasavaso bṛhaspater uttamaṃ nākam aruham  /  devasyāham̐ savituḥ save satyaprasavasa indrasyottamaṃ nākam aruham //
analyzed: devasya aham savituḥ save satyasavasaḥ bṛhaspateḥ uttamam nākam ruheyam

original: bṛhaspate vājaṃ jaya bṛhaspataye vācaṃ vadata bṛhaspatiṃ  vājaṃ jāpayata /  indra vājaṃ jayendrāya vācaṃ vadatendraṃ vājaṃ jāpayata //
analyzed: bṛhaspate vājam jaya bṛhaspataye vācam vadata bṛhaspatim vājam jāpayata      indra vājam jaya indrāya vācam vadata indram vājam jāpayata

original: eṣā vaḥ sā satyā saṃvāg abhūd yayā bṛhaspatiṃ vājam  ajījapatājījapata bṛhaspatiṃ vājaṃ vanaspatayo vi mucyadhvam /  eṣā vaḥ sā satyā saṃvāg abhūd yayendraṃ vājam  ajījapatājījapatendraṃ vājaṃ vanaspatayo vi mucyadhvam //
analyzed: eṣā vaḥ sā satyā saṃvāc abhūt yayā bṛhaspatim vājam ajījapata ajījapata bṛhaspatim vājam vanaspatayaḥ vi mucyadhvam    eṣā vaḥ sā satyā saṃvāc abhūt yayā indram vājam ajījapata ajījapata indram vājam vanaspatayaḥ vi mucyadhvam

original: devasyāham̐ savituḥ save satyaprasavaso bṛhaspater vājajito vājaṃ  jeṣam /  vājino vājajito 'dhvana skabhnuvanto yojanā mimānāḥ kāṣṭhāṃ gacchata //
analyzed: devasya aham savituḥ save satyaprasavasaḥ bṛhaspateḥ vāja jitaḥ vājam jeṣam     vājinaḥ vāja jitaḥ dhvanaḥ skabhnuvantaḥ yojanā mimānāḥ kāṣṭhām gacchata

original: eṣa sya vājī kṣipaṇiṃ turaṇyati grīvāyāṃ baddho apikakṣa āsani /  kratuṃ dadhikrā anu sam̐saniṣyadat pathām aṅgām̐sy anv āpanīphaṇat svāhā  //
analyzed: eṣa sya vājī kṣipaṇim turaṇyati grīvāyām baddhaḥ apikakṣe āsani    kratum dadhikrāḥ anu samsaniṣyadat pathām aṅgāmsi anu āpanīphaṇat svāhā

original: uta smāsya druvatas turaṇayataḥ parṇaṃ na ver anu vāti pragardhinaḥ /  śyenasyeva dhrajato aṅkasaṃ pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ sahorjā taritraḥ svāhā //
analyzed: uta sma asya druvataḥ turaṇayataḥ parṇam na veḥ anu vāti pragardhinaḥ    śyenasya iva dhrajataḥ aṅkasam pari dadhikrāvṇaḥ saha ūrjā taritraḥ svāhā

original: śaṃ no bhavantu vājino haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ svarkāḥ /  jambhayanto 'hiṃ vṛkam̐ rakṣām̐si sanemy asmad yuyavann amīvāḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ bhavantu vājinaḥ haveṣu devatātā mitadravaḥ su arkāḥ jambhayantaḥ him vṛkam rakṣāmsi sanemi asmat yuyavan amīvāḥ

original: te no arvanto havanaśruto havaṃ viśve śṛṇvantu vājino mitadravaḥ /  sahasrasā medhasātā saniṣyavo maho ye dhanam̐ samitheṣu jabhrire //
analyzed: te naḥ arvantaḥ havana śrutaḥ havam viśve śṛṇvantu vājinaḥ mitadravaḥ    sahasra sāḥ medha sātā saniṣyavaḥ mahaḥ ye dhanam samitheṣu jabhrire

original: vāje-vāje 'vata vājino no dhaneṣu viprā amṛtā ṛtajñāḥ /  asya madhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvaṃ tṛptā yāta pathibhir devayānaiḥ //
analyzed: vājevāje vata vājinaḥ naḥ dhaneṣu viprāḥ amṛtāḥ ṛta jñāḥ   asya madhvaḥ pibata mādayadhvam tṛptāḥ yāta pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ

original: ā mā vājasya prasavo jagamyād eme dyāvāpṛthivī viśvarūpe /  ā mā gantāṃ pitarā mātarā cā mā somo amṛtatvena gamyāt //
analyzed: ā mā vājasya prasavaḥ jagamyāt ā ime dyāvāpṛthivī viśva rūpe    ā mā gantām pitarā mātarā ca ā mā somaḥ amṛta tvena gamyāt

original: vājino vājajito vājam̐ sasṛvām̐so bṛhaspater bhāgam ava jighrata  nimṛjānāḥ //
analyzed: vājinaḥ vāja jitaḥ vājam sasṛvāmsaḥ bṛhaspateḥ bhāgam ava jighrata nimṛjānāḥ

original: āpaye svāhā /  svāpaye svāhā /  āpijāya svāhā /  kratave svāhā /  vasave svāhā /  aharpataye svāhā /  ahne mugdhāya svāhā /  mugdhāya vainam̐śināya svāhā /  vinam̐śina āntyāyanāya svāhā /  antyāya bhauvanāya svāhā /  bhuvanasya pataye svāhā /  adhipataye svāhā //
analyzed: āpaye svāhā  su āpaye svāhā   āpijāya svāhā kratave svāhā vasave svāhā aharpataye svāhā   ahne mugdhāya svāhā    mugdhāya vainamśināya svāhā   vinamśine āntyāyanāya svāhā   antyāya bhauvanāya svāhā   bhuvanasya pataye svāhā   adhipataye svāhā

original: āyur yajñena kalpatām /  prāṇo yajñena kalpatām /  cakṣur yajñena kalpatām /  śrotraṃ yajñena kalpatām /  pṛṣṭhaṃ yajñena kalpatām /  yajño yajñena kalpatām /  prajāpateḥ prajā abhūma /  svardevā aganma /  amṛtā abhūma //
analyzed: āyuḥ yajñena kalpatām   prāṇaḥ yajñena kalpatām   cakṣuḥ yajñena kalpatām  śrotram yajñena kalpatām pṛṣṭham yajñena kalpatām   yajñaḥ yajñena kalpatām   prajāpateḥ prajāḥ abhūma   svar devāḥ aganma    amṛtāḥ abhūma

original: asme vo astv indriyam asme nṛmṇam uta kratur asme varcām̐si santu  vaḥ /  namo mātre pṛthivyai namo mātre pṛthivyai /  iyaṃ te rāṭ /  yantāsi yamano dhruvo 'si dharuṇaḥ kṛṣyai tvā kṣemāya tvā rayyai tvā  poṣāya tvā //
analyzed: asme vaḥ astu indriyam asme nṛmṇam uta kratuḥ asme varcāmsi santu vaḥ    namaḥ mātre pṛthivyai namaḥ mātre pṛthivyai    iyam te rāj    yantāsi yamanaḥ dhruvaḥ si dharuṇaḥ kṛṣyai tvā kṣemāya tvā rayyai tvā poṣāya tvā

original: vājasyemaṃ prasavaḥ suṣuve 'gre somam̐ rājānam oṣadhīṣv apsu /  tā asmabhyaṃ madhumatīr bhavantu vayam̐ rāṣṭṛe jāgṛyāma purohitāḥ  svāhā //
analyzed: vājasya imam prasavaḥ suṣuve gre somam rājānam oṣadhīṣu apsu   tāḥ asmabhyam madhumatīḥ bhavantu vayam rāṣṭṛe jāgṛyāma purohitāḥ svāhā

original: vājasyemāṃ prasavaḥ śiśriye divam imā ca viśvā bhuvanāni samrāṭ /  aditsantaṃ dāpayati prajānan sa no rayim̐ sarvavīraṃ ni yacchatu svāhā //
analyzed: vājasya imām prasavaḥ śiśriye divam imā ca viśvā bhuvanāni samrāj    a ditsantam dāpayati prajānan sa naḥ rayim sarva vīram ni yacchatu svāhā

original: vājasya nu prasava ābabhūvemā ca viśvā bhuvanāni sarvataḥ /  sanemi rājā pariyāti vidvān prajāṃ puṣṭiṃ vardhayamāno asme svāhā //
analyzed: vājasya nu prasavaḥ ābabhūva imā ca viśvā bhuvanāni sarvatas     sanemi rājā pariyāti vidvān prajām puṣṭim vardhayamānaḥ asme svāhā

original: ādityān viṣṇum̐ sūryaṃ brahmāṇaṃ ca bṛhaspatim̐ svāhā //
analyzed: ādityān viṣṇum sūryam brahmāṇam ca bṛhaspatim svāhā

original: aryamaṇaṃ bṛhaspatim indraṃ dānāya codaya /  vācaṃ viṣṇum̐ sarasvatīm̐ savitāraṃ ca vājinam̐ svāhā //
analyzed: aryamaṇam bṛhaspatim indram dānāya codaya vācam viṣṇum sarasvatīm savitāram ca vājinam svāhā

original: agne acchāvadeha naḥ prati naḥ sumanā bhava /  pra no yaccha sahasrajittvam̐ hi dhanadā asi svāhā //
analyzed: agne acchāvada iha naḥ prati naḥ sumanāḥ bhava   pra naḥ yaccha sahasra jit tvam hi dhana dāḥ asi svāhā

original: pra no yacchatv aryamā pra pūṣā pra bṛhaspatiḥ /  pra vāg devī dadātu naḥ svāhā //
analyzed: pra naḥ yacchatu aryamā pra pūṣā pra bṛhaspatiḥ   pra vāc devī dadātu naḥ svāhā

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām /  sarasvatyai vāco yantur yantriye dadhāmi bṛhaspateṣ ṭvā sāmrājyenābhi  ṣiñcāmy asau //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām    sarasvatyai vācaḥ yantuḥ yantriye dadhāmi bṛhaspateḥ tvā sāmrājyena abhi siñcāmi asau

original: agnir ekākṣareṇa prāṇam ud ajayat tam uj jeṣam /  aśvinau dvyakṣareṇa dvipado manuṣyān ud ajayatāṃ tān uj jeṣam /  viṣṇus tryakṣareṇa trīm̐l lokān ud ajayat tān uj jeṣam /  somaś caturakṣareṇa catuṣpadaḥ paśūn ud ajayat tān uj jeṣam //
analyzed: agniḥ eka akṣareṇa prāṇam ud ajayat tam ud jeṣam    aśvinau dvi akṣareṇa dvipadaḥ manuṣyān ud ajayatām tān ud jeṣam    viṣṇuḥ tri akṣareṇa trīn lokān ud ajayat tān ud jeṣam    somaḥ catur akṣareṇa catuṣpadaḥ paśūn ud ajayat tān ud jeṣam

original: pūṣā pañcākṣareṇa pañca diśa ud ajayat tā uj jeṣam /  savitā ṣaḍakṣareṇa ṣaḍ ṛtūn ud ajayat tān uj jeṣam /  marutaḥ saptākṣareṇa sapta grāmyān paśūn ud ajayam̐s tān uj jeṣam /  bṛhaspatir aṣṭākṣareṇa gāyatrīm ud ajayat tām uj jeṣam //
analyzed: pūṣā pañca akṣareṇa pañca diśaḥ ud ajayat tāḥ ud jeṣam    savitā ṣaṣ akṣareṇa ṣaṭ ṛtūn ud ajayat tān ud jeṣam    marutaḥ sapta akṣareṇa sapta grāmyān paśūn ud ajayam tān ud jeṣam    bṛhaspatiḥ aṣṭa akṣareṇa gāyatrīm ud ajayat tām ud jeṣam

original: mitro navākṣareṇa trivṛtam̐ stomam ud ajayat tam uj jeṣam /  varuṇo daśākṣareṇa virājam ud ajayat tām uj jeṣam /  indra ekādaśākṣareṇa triṣṭubham ud ajayat tām uj jeṣam /  viśve devā dvādaśākṣareṇa jagatīm ud ajayam̐s tām uj jeṣam //
analyzed: mitraḥ nava akṣareṇa trivṛtam stomam ud ajayat tam ud jeṣam    varuṇaḥ daśa akṣareṇa virājam ud ajayat tām ud jeṣam   indraḥ ekādaśa akṣareṇa triṣṭubham ud ajayat tām ud jeṣam    viśve devāḥ dvādaśa akṣareṇa jagatīm ud ajayam tām ud jeṣam

original: vasavas trayodaśākṣareṇa trayodaśam̐ stomam ud ajayam̐s tam uj jeṣam /  rudrāś caturdaśākṣareṇa caturdaśam̐ stomam ud ajayam̐s tam uj jeṣam /  ādityāḥ pañcadaśākṣareṇa pañcadaśam̐ stomam ud ajayam̐s tam uj jeṣam /  aditiḥ ṣoḍaśākṣareṇa ṣoḍaśam̐ stomam ud ajayat tam uj jeṣam /  prajāpatiḥ saptadaśākṣareṇa saptadaśam̐ stomam ud ajayat tam uj jeṣam //
analyzed: vasavaḥ trayodaśa akṣareṇa trayodaśam stomam ud ajayam tam ud jeṣam    rudrāḥ caturdaśa akṣareṇa caturdaśam stomam ud ajayam tam ud jeṣam    ādityāḥ pañcadaśa akṣareṇa pañcadaśam stomam ud ajayam tam ud jeṣam    aditiḥ ṣoḍaśa akṣareṇa ṣoḍaśam stomam ud ajayat tam ud jeṣam    prajāpatiḥ saptadaśa akṣareṇa saptadaśam stomam ud ajayat tam ud jeṣam

original: eṣa te nirṛte bhāgas taṃ juṣasva svāhā /  agninetrebhyo devebhyaḥ puraḥsadbhyaḥ svāhā /  yamanetrebhyo devebhyo dakṣiṇāsadbhyaḥ svāhā /  viśvadevanetrebhyo devebhyaḥ paścātsadbhyaḥ svāhā /  mitrāvaruṇanetrebhyo vā marunnetrebhyo vā devebhya uttārasadbhyaḥ svāhā  /  somanetrebhyo devebhya uparisadbhyo duvasvadbhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: eṣa te nirṛte bhāgaḥ tam juṣasva svāhā agni netrebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ puraḥsadbhyaḥ svāhā   yama netrebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ dakṣiṇā sadbhyaḥ svāhā    viśvadeva netrebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ paścātsadbhyaḥ svāhā   mitrāvaruṇa netrebhyaḥ vā marut netrebhyaḥ vā devebhyaḥ uttāra sadbhyaḥ svāhā

original: ye devā agninetrāḥ puraḥsadas tebhyaḥ svāhā /  ye devā yamanetrā dakṣiṇāsadas tebhyaḥ svāhā /  ye devā viśvadevanetrāḥ paścātsadas tebhyaḥ svāhā /  ye devā mitrāvaruṇanetrā vā marunnetrā vottarāsadas tebhyaḥ svāhā /  ye devāḥ somanetrā uparisado duvasvantas tebhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: ye devāḥ agni netrāḥ puraḥsadaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā   ye devāḥ yama netrāḥ dakṣiṇā sadaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā    ye devāḥ viśvadeva netrāḥ paścātsadaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā    ye devāḥ mitrāvaruṇa netrāḥ vā marut netrāḥ vā uttarāsadaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā    ye devāḥ soma netrāḥ upari sadaḥ duvasvantaḥ tebhyaḥ svāhā  /

original: agne sahasva pṛtanā abhimātīr apāsya /  dusṭaras tarann arātīr varco dhā yajñavāhasi //
analyzed: agne sahasva pṛtanāḥ abhimātīḥ apāsya    dusṭaraḥ taran arātīḥ varcaḥ dhāḥ yajña vāhasi

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām /  upām̐śor vīryeṇa juhomi hatam̐ rakṣaḥ svāhā /  rakṣasāṃ tvā badhāya /  abadhiṣma rakṣo 'badhiṣmāmum asau hataḥ //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām   upāmśoḥ vīryeṇa juhomi hatam rakṣaḥ svāhā rakṣasām tvā badhāya   abadhiṣma rakṣaḥ badhiṣma amum asau hataḥ

original: savitā tvā savānām̐ suvatām agnir gṛhapatīnām̐ somo vanaspatīnām /  bṛhaspatir vāca indro jyaiṣṭhyāya rudraḥ paśubhyo mitraḥ satyo varuṇo  dharmapatīnām //
analyzed: savitā tvā savānām suvatām agniḥ gṛhapatīnām somaḥ vanaspatīnām    bṛhaspatiḥ vāce indraḥ jyaiṣṭhyāya rudraḥ paśubhyaḥ mitraḥ satyaḥ varuṇaḥ dharma patīnām

original: imaṃ devā asupatnam̐ suvadhvaṃ mahate kṣatrāya mahate jyaiṣṭhyāya  mahate jānarājyāyendrasyendriyāya /  imam amuṣya putram amuṣyai putram asyai viśa eṣa vo 'mī rājā somo  'smākaṃ brāhmaṇānām̐ rājā //
analyzed: imam devāḥ asu patnam suvadhvam mahate kṣatrāya mahate jyaiṣṭhyāya mahate jānarājyāya indrasya indriyāya    imam amuṣya putram amuṣyai putram asyai viśe eṣa vaḥ mī rājā somaḥ smākam brāhmaṇānām rājā

original: apo devā madhumatīr agṛbhṇann ūrjasvatī rājasvaś citānāḥ /  yābhir mitrāvaruṇāv abhyaṣiñcan yābhir indram anayann aty arātīḥ //
analyzed: apaḥ devāḥ madhumatīḥ agṛbhṇan ūrjasvatīḥ rājasvaḥ citānāḥ    yābhiḥ mitrāvaruṇau abhyaṣiñcan yābhiḥ indram anayan ati arātīḥ

original: vṛṣṇa ūrmir asi rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me dehi svāhā /  vṛṣṇa ūrmir asi rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai dehi /  vṛṣaseno si rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me dehi svāhā /  vṛṣaseno si rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai dehi //
analyzed: vṛṣṇaḥ ūrmiḥ asi rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me dehi svāhā    vṛṣṇaḥ ūrmiḥ asi rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram amuṣmai dehi   vṛṣa senā u si rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me dehi svāhā      vṛṣa senā u si rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram amuṣmai dehi

original: artheta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  artheta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  ojasvatī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  ojasvatī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  āpaḥ parivāhiṇī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  āpaḥ parivāhiṇī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  apāṃ patir asi rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me dehi svāhā /  apāṃ patir asi rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai dehi /  apāṃ garbho 'si rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me dehi svāhā /  apāṃ garbho 'si rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai dehi //
analyzed: arthetaḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me datta svāhā   arthetaḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta   ojasvatīḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me datta svāhā    ojasvatīḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta    āpaḥ parivāhiṇīḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me datta svāhā            / apām patiḥ asi rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me dehi svāhā     apām patiḥ asi rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me dehi svāhā     /

original: sūryatvacasa stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  sūryatvacasa stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  sūryavarcasa stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  sūryavarcasa stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  māndā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  māndā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  vrajakṣita stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  vrajakṣita stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  vāśā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  vāśā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  śaviṣṭhā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  śaviṣṭhā stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  śakvarī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  śakvarī stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  janabhṛta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  janabhṛta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  viśvabhṛta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭraṃ me datta svāhā /  viśvabhṛta stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta /  āpaḥ svarāja stha rāṣṭradā rāṣṭram amuṃai datta /  madhumatīr madhumatībhiḥ pṛcyantāṃ mahi kṣatraṃ kṣatriyāya vanvānāḥ /  anādhṛṣṭāḥ sīdata sahaujaso mahi kṣatraṃ kṣatriyāya dadhatīḥ //
analyzed: sūrya tvacasaḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me datta svāhā    sūrya tvacasaḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta   sūrya varcasaḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me datta svāhā    sūrya varcasaḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta    māndāḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me datta svāhā            stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram amuṣmai datta   vraja kṣitaḥ stha rāṣṭra dāḥ rāṣṭram me datta svāhā          sth

original: somasya tviṣir asi taveva me tviṣir bhūyāt /  agnaye svāhā /  somāya svāhā /  savitre svāhā /  sarasvatyai svāhā /  pūṣṇe svāhā /  bṛhaspataye svāhā /  indrāya svāhā /  ghoṣāya svāhā /  ślokāya svāhā /  am̐śāya svāhā /  bhagāya svāhā /  aryamṇe svāhā //
analyzed: somasya tviṣiḥ asi tava iva me tviṣiḥ bhūyāt agnaye svāhā somāya svāhā savitre svāhā sarasvatyai svāhā pūṣṇe svāhā bṛhaspataye svāhā indrāya svāhā  ghoṣāya svāhā   ślokāya svāhā amśāya svāhā bhagāya svāhā  aryamṇe svāhā

original: pavitre stho vaiṣṇavyau /  savitur vaḥ prasava ut punāmy acchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ /  anibhṛṣṭam asi vāco bandhus tapojāḥ somasya dātram asi svāhā rājasvaḥ  //
analyzed: pavitre sthaḥ vaiṣṇavyau   savituḥ vaḥ prasave ud punāmi acchidreṇa pavitreṇa sūryasya raśmibhiḥ   a nibhṛṣṭam asi vācaḥ bandhuḥ tapaḥ jāḥ somasya dātram asi svāhā rājasvaḥ  /

original: sadhamādo dyumninīr āpa etā anādhṛṣṭā apasyo vasānāḥ /  pastyāsu cakre varuṇaḥ sadhastham apām̐ śiśur mātṛtamāsv antaḥ //
analyzed: sadhamādaḥ dyumninīḥ āpaḥ etāḥ anādhṛṣṭāḥ apasyaḥ vasānāḥ   pastyāsu cakre varuṇaḥ sadhastham apām śiśuḥ mātṛtamāsu antar

original: kṣatrasyolvam asi /  kṣatrasya jarāyv asi /  kṣatrasya yonir asi /  kṣatrasya nābhir asi /  indrasya vātraghnam /  mitrasyāsi varuṇasyāsi /  tvayāyaṃ vṛtraṃ badhet /  dṛvāsi /  rujāsi /  kṣumāsi /  pātainaṃ prāñcam /  pātainaṃ pratyañcam /  pātainaṃ tiryañcaṃ digbhyaḥ pāta //
analyzed: kṣatrasya ulvam asi   kṣatrasya jarāyu asi    kṣatrasya yoniḥ asi     kṣatrasya nābhiḥ asi    indrasya vātraghnam   mitrasya asi varuṇasya asi   tvayā ayam vṛtram badhet    dṛvā asi

original: āvirmayāḥ /  āvitto agnir gṛhapatiḥ /  āvitta indro vṛddhaśravāḥ /  āvittau mitrāvaruṇau dhṛtavratau /  āvittaḥ pūṣā viśvavedāḥ /  āvitte dyāvāpṛthivī viśvaśambhuvau /  āvittāditir uruśarmā //
analyzed: āvis mayāḥ    āvittaḥ agniḥ gṛhapatiḥ    āvittaḥ indraḥ vṛddha śravāḥ    āvittau mitrāvaruṇau dhṛta vratau

original: aveṣṭā dandaśūkāḥ /  prācīm ā roha gāyatrī tvāvatu rathantaram̐ sāma trivṛt stomo vasanta  ṛtur brahma draviṇam //
analyzed: aveṣṭāḥ dandaśūkāḥ   prācīm ā roha gāyatrī tvā avatu rathantaram sāma trivṛt stomaḥ vasantaḥ ṛtuḥ brahma draviṇam

original: dakṣiṇām ā roha triṣṭup tvāvatu bṛhat sāma pañcadaśa stomo  grīṣma ṛtuḥ kṣatraṃ draviṇam //
analyzed: dakṣiṇām ā roha triṣṭubh tvā avatu bṛhat sāma pañcadaśaḥ stomaḥ grīṣmaḥ ṛtuḥ kṣatram draviṇam

original: pratīcīm ā roha jagatī tvāvatu vairūpam̐ sāma saptadaśa stomo  varṣā ṛtuḥ viḍ draviṇam //
analyzed: pratīcīm ā roha jagatī tvā avatu vairūpam sāma saptadaśaḥ stomaḥ varṣā ṛtuḥ viś draviṇam

original: udīcīm ā rohānuṣṭup tvāvatu vairājam̐ sāmaikavim̐śa stomaḥ śarad  ṛtuḥ phalaṃ draviṇam //
analyzed: udīcīm ā roha anuṣṭubh tvā avatu vairājam sāma ekavimśaḥ stomaḥ śarad ṛtuḥ phalam draviṇam

original: ūrdhvām ā roha paṅktis tvāvatu śākvararaivate sāmanī  triṇavatrayastrim̐śau stomau hemantaśiśirāv ṛtū varco draviṇam /  pratyastaṃ namuceḥ śiraḥ //
analyzed: ūrdhvām ā roha paṅktiḥ tvā avatu śākvara raivate sāmanī triṇava trayastrimśau stomau hemanta śiśirau ṛtū varcaḥ draviṇam    pratyastam namuceḥ śiraḥ

original: somasya tviṣir asi taveva me tviṣir bhūyāt /  mṛtyoḥ pāhi /  ojo 'si saho 'sy amṛtam asi //
analyzed: somasya tviṣiḥ asi tava iva me tviṣiḥ bhūyāt   mṛtyoḥ pāhi   ojaḥ si sahaḥ si amṛtam asi

original: hiraṇyarūpā uṣaso viroka ubhāv indrā udithaḥ sūryaś ca /  ā rohataṃ varuṇa mitra gartaṃ tataś cakṣāthām aditiṃ ditiṃ ca //
analyzed: hiraṇya rūpau uṣasaḥ viroke ubhau indrau udithaḥ sūryaḥ ca  / ā rohatam varuṇa mitra gartam tatas cakṣāthām aditim ditim ca

original: mitro 'si varuṇo 'si //
analyzed: mitraḥ si varuṇaḥ si

original: somasya tvā dyumnenābhiṣiñcāmy agner bhrājasā sūryasya  varcasendrasyendriyeṇa /  kṣatrāṇāṃ kṣatrapatir edhy ati didyūn pāhi //
analyzed: somasya tvā dyumnena abhiṣiñcāmi agneḥ bhrājasā sūryasya varcasā indrasya indriyeṇa    kṣatrāṇām kṣatra patiḥ edhi ati didyūn pāhi

original: imaṃ devā asupatnam̐ suvadhvaṃ mahate kṣatrāya mahate jyaiṣṭhyāya  mahate jānarājyāyendrasyendriyāya /  imam amuṣya putram amuṣyai putram asyai viśa eṣa vo 'mī rājā somo  'smākaṃ brāhmaṇānām̐ rājā //
analyzed: imam devāḥ asu patnam suvadhvam mahate kṣatrāya mahate jyaiṣṭhyāya mahate jānarājyāya indrasya indriyāya    imam amuṣya putram amuṣyai putram asyai viśe eṣa vaḥ mī rājā somaḥ smākam brāhmaṇānām rājā

original: pra parvatasya vṛṣabhasya pṛṣṭhān nāvaś caranti svasica iyānāḥ  /  tā āvavṛtrann adharāg udaktā ahiṃ budhnyam anu rīyamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: pra parvatasya vṛṣabhasya pṛṣṭhāt nāvaḥ caranti svasicaḥ iyānāḥ    tāḥ āvavṛtran adharāk udaktāḥ ahim budhnyam anu rīyamāṇāḥ

original: viṣṇor vikarmaṇam asi /  viṣṇor vikrāntam asi /  viṣṇoḥ krāntam asi //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ vikarmaṇam asi    viṣṇoḥ vikrāntam asi          asi

original: prajāpate na tvad etāny anyo viśvā rūpāṇi pari tā babhūva /  yatkāmās te juhumas tan no astu /  ayam amuṣya pitāsāv asya pitā /  vayam̐ syāma patayo rayīṇām̐ svāhā /  rudra yat te krivi paraṃ nāma tasmin hutam asy ameṣṭam asi svāhā //
analyzed: prajāpate na tvat etāni anyaḥ viśvā rūpāṇi pari tā babhūva    yad kāmāḥ te juhumaḥ tat naḥ astu   ayam amuṣya pitā asau asya pitā    vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām svāhā   rudra yat te krivi param nāma tasmin hutam asi amā iṣṭam asi svāhā

original: indrasya vajro 'si /  mitrāvaruṇayos tvā praśāstroḥ praśiṣā yunajmi /  avyathāyai tvā svadhāyai tvāriṣṭo arjunaḥ /  marutāṃ prasavena jaya /  āpāma manasā /  sam indriyeṇa //
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ si    mitrāvaruṇayoḥ tvā praśāstroḥ praśiṣā yunajmi    avyathāyai tvā svadhāyai tvā ariṣṭaḥ arjunaḥ   marutām prasavena jaya    āpāma manasā    sam indriyeṇa

original: mā ta indra te vayaṃ turāṣāḍ ayuktāso abrahmatā vidasāma /  tiṣṭhā ratham adhi yaṃ vajrahastā raśmīn deva yuvase svaśvān //
analyzed: mā te indra te vayam turāṣāh a yuktāsaḥ a brahma tā vidasāma    tiṣṭha ratham adhi yam vajrahasta raśmīn deva yuvase su aśvān

original: agnaye gṛhapataye svāhā /  somāya vanaspataye svāhā /  marutām ojase svāhā /  indrasyendriyāya svāhā /  pṛthivi mātar mā mā him̐sīr mo ahaṃ tvām //
analyzed: agnaye gṛhapataye svāhā   somāya vanaspataye svāhā   marutām ojase svāhā   indrasya indriyāya svāhā pṛthivi mātar mā mā himsīḥ mā u aham tvām

original: ham̐saḥ śuciṣad vasur antarikṣasad dhotā vediṣad atithir duroṇasat /  nṛṣad varasad ṛtasad vyomasad abjā gojā ṛtajā adrijā ṛtaṃ bṛhat  //
analyzed: hamsaḥ śuciṣad vasuḥ antarikṣa sad hotā vediṣad atithiḥ duroṇa sad    nṛṣad vara sad ṛta sad vyoma sad ap jāḥ go jāḥ ṛta jāḥ adri jāḥ ṛtam bṛhat  /

original: iyad asyāyur asyāyur mayi dhehi yuṅṅ asi varco 'si varco mayi  dhehi /  ūrg asy ūrjaṃ mayi dhehi /  indrasya vāṃ vīryakṛto bāhū abhyupāva harāmi //
analyzed: iyat asya āyuḥ asya āyuḥ mayi dhehi yuj asi varcaḥ si varcaḥ mayi dhehi    ūrj asi ūrjam mayi dhehi    indrasya vām vīrya kṛtaḥ bāhū abhyupa ava harāmi

original: syonāsi suṣadāsi /  kṣatrasya yonir asi /  syonām ā sīda suṣadām ā sīda kṣatrasya yonim ā sīda //
analyzed: syonā asi suṣadā asi kṣatrasya yoniḥ asi   syonām ā sīda suṣadām ā sīda kṣatrasya yonim ā sīda

original: ni ṣasāda ghṛtavrato varuṇaḥ pastyāsv ā /  sāmrājyāya sukratuḥ //
analyzed: ni ṣasāda ghṛta vrataḥ varuṇaḥ pastyāsu ā sāmrājyāya su kratuḥ

original: abhibhūr asy etās te pañca diśaḥ kalpantām /  brahmam̐s tvaṃ brahmāsi savitāsi satyaprasavaḥ /  varuṇo 'si satyaujāḥ /  indro 'si viśaujāḥ /  rudro 'si suśevaḥ /  bahukāra śreyaskara bhūyaskara /  indrasya vajro 'si tena me radhya //
analyzed: abhibhūḥ asi etāḥ te pañca diśaḥ kalpantām    brahman tvam brahmā asi savitā asi satya prasavaḥ   varuṇaḥ si satya ojāḥ indraḥ si viśaujāḥ    indrasya vajraḥ si tena me radhya

original: agniḥ pṛthur dharmaṇas patir juṣāṇo agniḥ pṛthur dharmaṇas patir  ājyasya vetu svāhā /  svāhākṛtāḥ sūryasya raśmibir yatadhvam̐ sajātānāṃ madhyameṣṭhyāya //
analyzed: agniḥ pṛthuḥ dharmaṇaḥ patiḥ juṣāṇaḥ agniḥ pṛthuḥ dharmaṇaḥ patiḥ ājyasya vetu svāhā    svāhākṛtāḥ sūryasya raśmibiḥ yatadhvam sajātānām madhyameṣṭhyāya

original: savitrā prasavitrā sarasvatyā vācā tvaṣṭrā rūpaiḥ pūṣṇā  paśubhir indreṇāsme bṛhaspatinā brahmaṇā varuṇenaujasāgninā tejasā  somena rājñā viṣṇunā daśamyā devatayā prasūtaḥ pra sarpāmi //
analyzed: savitrā prasavitrā sarasvatyā vācā tvaṣṭrā rūpaiḥ pūṣṇā paśubhiḥ indreṇa asme bṛhaspatinā brahmaṇā varuṇena ojasā agninā tejasā somena rājñā viṣṇunā daśamyā devatayā prasūtaḥ pra sarpāmi

original: aśvibhyāṃ pacyasva /  sarasvatyai pacyasva /  indrāya sutrāmṇe pacyasva /  vāyuḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅk somo atisrutaḥ /  indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā //
analyzed: aśvibhyām pacyasva   sarasvatyai pacyasva   indrāya sutrāmṇe pacyasva   vāyuḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somaḥ atisrutaḥ    indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā

original: kuvid aṅga yavamanto vayaṃ cid yathā dānty anupūrvaṃ viyūya /  ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣo namaktiṃ yajanti //
analyzed: kuvid aṅga yavamantaḥ vayam cit yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya    iha iha eṣām kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣaḥ namaktim yajanti

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sy aśvibhyāṃ tvā sarasvatyai tvendrāya tvā sutrāmṇe //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si aśvibhyām tvā sarasvatyai tvā indrāya tvā su trāmṇe

original: vayam̐ surāmam aśvinā namucāv āsure sacā /  vipipānā śubhas patī indraṃ karmasv āvatam //
analyzed: vayam su rāmam aśvinā namucau āsure sacā    vipipānā śubhaḥ patī indram karmasu āvatam

original: putram iva pitarāv aśvinobhendrāvathuḥ kāvyair dam̐sanābhiḥ /  yat surāmaṃ vyapibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavann abhiṣṇak //
analyzed: putram iva pitarau aśvinā ubhā indra āvathuḥ kāvyaiḥ damsanābhiḥ    yat su rāmam vyapibaḥ śacībhiḥ sarasvatī tvā maghavan abhiṣṇak

original: yuñjānaḥ prathamaṃ manas tatvāya savitā dhiyam /  agner jyotir nicāyya pṛthivyā adhy ābharat //
analyzed: yuñjānaḥ prathamam manaḥ tatvāya savitā dhiyam    agneḥ jyotiḥ nicāyya pṛthivyāḥ adhi ābharat

original: yuktena manasā vayaṃ devasya savituḥ save /  svargyāya śaktyā //
analyzed: yuktena manasā vayam devasya savituḥ save

original: yuktvāya savitā devānt svaryato dhiyā divam /  bṛhaj jyotiḥ kariṣyataḥ savitā pra suvāti tān //
analyzed: yuktvāya savitā devān svar yataḥ dhiyā divam    bṛhat jyotiḥ kariṣyataḥ savitā pra suvāti tān

original: yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo viprā viprasya bṛhato vipaścitaḥ /  vi hotrā dadhe vayunāvid eka in mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ //
analyzed: yuñjate manaḥ uta yuñjate dhiyaḥ viprāḥ viprasya bṛhataḥ vipaścitaḥ    vi hotrā dadhe vayunā vid ekaḥ id mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ

original: yuje vāṃ brahma pūrvyaṃ namobhir vi śloka etu pathyeva sūreḥ /  śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrā ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuḥ //
analyzed: yuje vām brahma pūrvyam namobhiḥ vi ślokaḥ etu pathyā iva sūreḥ    śṛṇvantu viśve amṛtasya putrāḥ ā ye dhāmāni divyāni tasthuḥ

original: yasya prayāṇam anv anya id yayur devā devasya mahimānam ojasā /  yaḥ pārthivāni vimame sa etaśo rajām̐si devaḥ savitā mahitvanā //
analyzed: yasya prayāṇam anu anye id yayuḥ devāḥ devasya mahimānam ojasā    yaḥ pārthivāni vimame saḥ etaśaḥ rajāmsi devaḥ savitā mahitvanā

original: deva savitaḥ pra suva yajñaṃ pra suva yajñapatiṃ bhagāya /  divyo gandharvaḥ ketapūḥ ketaṃ naḥ punātu vācas patir vācaṃ naḥ svadatu  //
analyzed: deva savitar pra suva yajñam pra suva yajñapatim bhagāya     divyaḥ gandharvaḥ keta pūḥ ketam naḥ punātu vācaḥ patiḥ vācam naḥ svadatu  /

original: imaṃ no deva savitar yajñaṃ pra ṇaya devāvyam̐ sakhividam̐ satrājitaṃ  dhanajitam̐ svarjitam /  ṛcā stomam̐ samardhaya gāyatreṇa rathantaraṃ bṛhad gāyatravartani  svāhā //
analyzed: imam naḥ deva savitar yajñam pra naya devāvyam sakhi vidam satrājitam dhana jitam svar jitam    ṛcā stomam samardhaya gāyatreṇa rathantaram bṛhat gāyatra vartani svāhā

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām /  ā dade gāyatreṇa chandasāṅgirasvat pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthād agniṃ purīṣyam  aṅgirasvad ā bhara traiṣṭubhena chandasāṅgirasvat //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām    ā dade gāyatreṇa chandasā aṅgirasvat pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthāt agnim purīṣyam aṅgirasvat ā bhara traiṣṭubhena chandasā aṅgirasvat

original: abhrir asi nāry asi tvayā vayam agnim̐ śakema khanitum̐ sadhastha ā  jāgatena chandasāṅgirasvat //
analyzed: abhriḥ asi nārī asi tvayā vayam agnim śakema khanitum sadhasthe ā jāgatena chandasā aṅgirasvat

original: hasta ādhāya savitā bibhrad abhrim̐ hiraṇyayīm /  agner jyotir nicāyya pṛthivyā adhy ā bhara //
analyzed: haste ādhāya savitā bibhrat abhrim hiraṇyayīm   agneḥ jyotiḥ nicāyya pṛthivyāḥ adhi ā bhara

original: ānuṣṭubhena chandasāṅgirasvat //
analyzed: ānuṣṭubhena chandasā aṅgirasvat

original: pratūrtaṃ vājinn ā drava variṣṭhām anu samvatam /  divi te janma paramam antarikṣe tava nābhiḥ pṛthivyām adhi yonir it //
analyzed: pratūrtam vājin ā drava variṣṭhām anu samvatam      divi te janma paramam antarikṣe tava nābhiḥ pṛthivyām adhi yoniḥ id

original: yuñjāthām̐ rāsabhaṃ yuvam asmin yāme vṛṣaṇvasū /  agniṃ bharantam asmayum //
analyzed: yuñjāthām rāsabham yuvam asmin yāme vṛṣaṇvasū    agnim bharantam asmayum

original: yoge-yoge tavastaraṃ vāje-vāje havāmahe /  sakhāya indram ūtaye //
analyzed: yoge yoge tavastaram vāje vāje havāmahe      sakhāyaḥ indram ūtaye

original: pratūrvann ehy avakrāmann aśasto rudrasya gāṇapatyaṃ mayobhūr  ehi /  urv antarikṣaṃ v`īhi /  svastigavyūtir abhayāni kṛṇvan pūṣṇā sayujā saha //
analyzed: pratūrvan ehi avakrāman aśastaḥ rudrasya gāṇapatyam mayobhūḥ ehi    uru antarikṣam vīhi   svasti gavyūtiḥ abhayāni kṛṇvan pūṣṇā sayujā saha

original: pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthād agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad ā bhara /  agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad acchemaḥ /   agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad bhariṣyāmaḥ //
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthāt agnim purīṣyam aṅgirasvat ā bhara   agnim purīṣyam aṅgirasvat acchemaḥ     agnim purīṣyam aṅgirasvat bhariṣyāmaḥ

original: anv agnir uṣasām agram akhyad anv ahāni prathamo jātavedāḥ /  anu sūryasya purutrā ca raśmīn anu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha //
analyzed: anu agniḥ uṣasām agram akhyat anu ahāni prathamaḥ jātavedāḥ    anu sūryasya purutrā ca raśmīn anu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha

original: āgatya vājy adhvānam̐ sarvā mṛdho vidhūnute /  agnim̐ sadhasthe mahati cakṣuṣā ni cikīṣate //
analyzed: āgatya vājī adhvānam sarvāḥ mṛdhaḥ vidhūnute    agnim sadhasthe mahati cakṣuṣā ni cikīṣate

original: ākramya vājin pṛthivīm agnim iccha rucā tvam /  bhūmyā vṛktvāya no brūhi yataḥ khanema taṃ vayam //
analyzed: ākramya vājin pṛthivīm agnim iccha rucā tvam    bhūmyā vṛktvāya naḥ brūhi yatas khanema tam vayam

original: dyaus te pṛṣṭhaṃ pṛthivī sadhastham ātmāntarikṣam̐ samudro yoniḥ  /  vikhyāya cakṣuṣā tvam abhi tiṣṭha pṛtanyataḥ //
analyzed: dyauḥ te pṛṣṭham pṛthivī sadhastham ātmā antarikṣam samudraḥ yoniḥ      vikhyāya cakṣuṣā tvam abhi tiṣṭha pṛtanyataḥ

original: ut krāma mahate saubhagāyāsmād āsthānād draviṇodā vājin /  vayam̐ syāma sumatau pṛthivyā agniṃ khananta upasthe asyāḥ //
analyzed: ud krāma mahate saubhagāya asmāt āsthānāt draviṇaḥ dāḥ vājin    vayam syāma sumatau pṛthivyāḥ agnim khanantaḥ upasthe asyāḥ

original: ud akramīd draviṇodā vājy arvākaḥ su lokam̐ sukṛtaṃ pṛthivyām /  tataḥ khanema supratīkam agnim̐ svo ruhāṇā adhi nākam uttamam //
analyzed: ud akramīt draviṇaḥ dāḥ vājī arvā akaḥ su lokam su kṛtam pṛthivyām    tatas khanema su pratīkam agnim svar ruhāṇāḥ adhi nākam uttamam

original: ā tvā jigharmi manasā ghṛtena pratikṣiyantaṃ bhuvanāni viśvā /  pṛthuṃ tiraścā vayasā bṛhantaṃ vyaciṣṭham annai rabhasaṃ dṛśānam //
analyzed: ā tvā jigharmi manasā ghṛtena pratikṣiyantam bhuvanāni viśvā    pṛthum tiraścā vayasā bṛhantam vyaciṣṭham annaiḥ rabhasam dṛśānam

original: ā viśvataḥ pratyañcaṃ jigharmy arakṣasā manasā taj juṣeta /  maryaśrī spṛhayadvarṇo agnir nābhimṛśe tanvā jarbhurāṇaḥ //
analyzed: ā viśvatas pratyañcam jigharmi arakṣasā manasā tat juṣeta    marya śrī spṛhayat varṇaḥ agniḥ na abhimṛśe tanvā jarbhurāṇaḥ

original: pari vājapatiḥ kavir agnir havyāny akramīt /  dadhad ratnāni dāśuṣe //
analyzed: pari vāja patiḥ kaviḥ agniḥ havyāni akramīt    dadhat ratnāni dāśuṣe

original: pari tvāgne puraṃ vayaṃ vipram̐ sahasya dhīmahi /  dhṛṣadvarṇaṃ dive-dive hantāraṃ bhaṅgurāvatām //
analyzed: pari tvā agne puram vayam vipram sahasya dhīmahi      dhṛṣat varṇam dive dive hantāram bhaṅgurāvatām

original: tvam agne dyubhis tvam āśuśukṣaṇis tvam adbhyas tvam aśmanas pari /  tvaṃ vanebhyas tvam oṣadhībhyas tvaṃ nṛṇāṃ nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ //
analyzed: tvam agne dyubhiḥ tvam āśuśukṣaṇiḥ tvam adbhyaḥ tvam aśmanaḥ pari tvam vanebhyaḥ tvam oṣadhībhyaḥ tvam nṛṇām nṛpate jāyase śuciḥ

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām /  pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthād agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvat khanāmi /  jyotiṣmantaṃ tvāgne supratīkam ajasreṇa bhānunā dīdyatam /  śivaṃ prajābhyo 'him̐santaṃ pṛthivyā sadhasthād agniṃ purīṣyam  aṅgirasvat khanāmaḥ //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām   pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthāt agnim purīṣyam aṅgirasvat khanāmi    jyotiṣmantam tvā agne su pratīkam ajasreṇa bhānunā dīdyatam    śivam prajābhyaḥ himsantam pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthāt agnim purīṣyam aṅgirasvat khanāmaḥ  /

original: apāṃ pṛṣṭham asi yonir agneḥ samudram abhitaḥ pinvamānam /  vardhamāno mahām̐ ā ca puṣkare divo mātrayā varimṇā prathasva //
analyzed: apām pṛṣṭham asi yoniḥ agneḥ samudram abhitas pinvamānam   vardhamānaḥ mahām ā ca puṣkare divaḥ mātrayā varimṇā prathasva

original: śarma ca stho varma ca stho 'cchidre bahule ubhe /  vyacasvatī saṃ vasāthāṃ bhṛtam agniṃ purīṣyam //
analyzed: śarma ca sthaḥ varma ca sthaḥ chidre bahule ubhe      sam vasāthām bhṛtam agnim purīṣyam

original: saṃvasāthām̐ svarvidā samīcī urasā tmanā /  agnim antar bhariṣyantī jyotiṣmantam ajasram it //
analyzed: saṃvasāthām svarvidā samīcī urasā tmanā    agnim antar bhariṣyantī jyotiṣmantam ajasram id

original: purīṣyo 'si viśvabharā atharvā tvā prathamo nir amanthad agne /  tvām agne puṣkarād adhy atharvā nir amanthata /  mūrdhno viśvasya vāghataḥ //
analyzed: purīṣyaḥ si viśva bharāḥ atharvā tvā prathamaḥ niḥ amanthat agne   tvām agne puṣkarāt adhi atharvā niḥ amanthata     mūrdhnaḥ viśvasya vāghataḥ

original: tam u tvā dadhyaṅṅ ṛṣiḥ putra īdhe atharvaṇaḥ /  vṛtrahaṇaṃ puraṃdaram //
analyzed: tam u tvā dadhyaṅ ṛṣiḥ putraḥ īdhe atharvaṇaḥ    vṛtra haṇam puraṃdaram

original: tam u tvā pāthyo vṛṣā samīdhe dasyuhantamam /  dhanaṃjayam̐ raṇe-raṇe //
analyzed: tam u tvā pāthyaḥ vṛṣā samīdhe dasyu hantamam dhanaṃjayam raṇeraṇe

original: sīda hotaḥ sva u loke cikitvān sādayā yajñam̐ sukṛtasya yonau /  devāvīr devān haviṣā yajāsy agne bṛhad yajamāne vayo dhāḥ //
analyzed: sīda hotar sve u loke cikitvān sādaya yajñam sukṛtasya yonau    devāvīḥ devān haviṣā yajāsi agne bṛhat yajamāne vayaḥ dhāḥ

original: ni hotā hotṛṣadane vidānas tveṣo dīdivām̐ asadat sudakṣaḥ /  adabdhavratapramatir vasiṣṭhaḥ sahasrambharaḥ śucijihvo agniḥ //
analyzed: ni hotā hotṛṣadane vidānaḥ tveṣaḥ dīdivām asadat su dakṣaḥ    adabdha vrata pramatiḥ vasiṣṭhaḥ sahasrambharaḥ śuci jihvaḥ agniḥ

original: sam̐ sīdasva mahām̐ asi śocasva devavītamaḥ /  vi dhūmam agne aruṣaṃ miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam //
analyzed: sam sīdasva mahām asi śocasva deva vītamaḥ    vi dhūmam agne aruṣam miyedhya sṛja praśasta darśatam

original: apo devīr upasṛja madhumatīr ayakṣmāya prajābhyaḥ /  tāsām āsthānād uj jihatām oṣadhayaḥ supippalāḥ //
analyzed: apaḥ devīḥ upasṛja madhumatīḥ ayakṣmāya prajābhyaḥ   tāsām āsthānāt ud jihatām oṣadhayaḥ su pippalāḥ

original: saṃ te vāyur mātariśvā dadhātūttānāyā hṛdayaṃ yad vikastam /  yo devānāṃ carasi prāṇathena kasmai deva vaṣaḍ astu tubhyam //
analyzed: sam te vāyuḥ mātariśvā dadhātu uttānāyāḥ hṛdayam yat vikastam   yaḥ devānām carasi prāṇathena kasmai deva vaṣaṭ astu tubhyam

original: sujāto jyotiṣā saha śarma varūtham āsadat svaḥ /  vāso agne viśvarūpam̐ saṃvyayasva vibhāvaso //
analyzed: su jātaḥ jyotiṣā saha śarma varūtham āsadat svar   vāsaḥ agne viśva rūpam saṃvyayasva vibhāvaso

original: ud u tiṣṭha svadhvarāvā no devyā dhiyā /  dṛśe ca bhāsā bṛhatā śuśukvanir āgne yāhi suśastibhiḥ //
analyzed: ud u tiṣṭha su adhvarāvā naḥ devyā dhiyā     dṛśe ca bhāsā bṛhatā śuśukvaniḥ ā agne yāhi su śastibhiḥ

original: ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇa ūtaye tiṣṭhā devo na savitā /  ūrdhvo vājasya sanitā yad añjibhir vāghadbhir vihvayāmahe //
analyzed: ūrdhvaḥ u su naḥ ūtaye tiṣṭha devaḥ na savitā   ūrdhvaḥ vājasya sanitā yat añjibhiḥ vāghadbhiḥ vihvayāmahe

original: sa jāto garbho asi rodasyor agne cārur vibhṛta oṣadhīṣu /  citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamām̐sy aktūn pra mātṛbhyo adhi kanikradad gāḥ //
analyzed: sa jātaḥ garbhaḥ asi rodasyoḥ agne cāruḥ vibhṛtaḥ oṣadhīṣu    citraḥ śiśuḥ pari tamāmsi aktūn pra mātṛbhyaḥ adhi kanikradat gāḥ

original: sthiro bhava vīḍv aṅga āśur bhava vājy arvan /  pṛthur bhava suṣadas tvam agneḥ purīṣavāhaṇaḥ //
analyzed: sthiraḥ bhava vīḍu aṅgaḥ āśuḥ bhava vājī arvan    pṛthuḥ bhava suṣadaḥ tvam agneḥ purīṣavāhaṇaḥ

original: śivo bhava prajābhyo mānuṣībhyas tvam aṅgiraḥ /  mā dyāvāpṛthivī abhi śocīr māntarikṣaṃ mā vanaspatīn //
analyzed: śivaḥ bhava prajābhyaḥ mānuṣībhyaḥ tvam aṅgiraḥ   mā dyāvāpṛthivī abhi śocīḥ mā antarikṣam mā vanaspatīn

original: praitu vājī kanikradan nānadad rāsabhaḥ patvā /  bharann agniṃ purīṣyaṃ mā pādy āyuṣaḥ purā /  vṛṣāgniṃ vṛṣaṇaṃ bharann apāṃ garbham̐ samudriyam //
analyzed: praitu vājī kanikradat nānadat rāsabhaḥ patvā    bharan agnim purīṣyam mā pādi āyuṣaḥ purā   vṛṣā agnim vṛṣaṇam bharan apām garbham samudriyam

original: agna āyāhi vītaye //
analyzed: agne āyāhi vītaye

original: ṛtam̐ satyam ṛtam̐ satyam /  agniṃ purīṣyam aṅgirasvad bharāmaḥ /  oṣadhayaḥ prati modadhvam agnim etam̐ śivam āyantam abhy atra yuṣmāḥ /  vyasyan viśvā anirā amīvā niṣīdan no apa durmatiṃ jahi //
analyzed: ṛtam satyam ṛtam satyam   agnim purīṣyam aṅgirasvat bharāmaḥ   oṣadhayaḥ prati modadhvam agnim etam śivam āyantam abhi atra yuṣmāḥ   vyasyan viśvāḥ anirāḥ amīvāḥ niṣīdan naḥ apa durmatim jahi

original: oṣadhayaḥ prati gṛbhṇīta puṣpavatīḥ supippalāḥ /  ayaṃ vo garbha ṛtviyaḥ pratnam̐ sadhastham āsadat //
analyzed: oṣadhayaḥ prati gṛbhṇīta puṣpavatīḥ su pippalāḥ   ayam vaḥ garbhaḥ ṛtviyaḥ pratnam sadhastham āsadat

original: vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucāno bādhasva dviṣo rakṣaso amīvāḥ /  suśarmaṇo bṛhataḥ śarmaṇi syām agner aham̐ suhavasya praṇītau //
analyzed: vi pājasā pṛthunā śośucānaḥ bādhasva dviṣaḥ rakṣasaḥ amīvāḥ    su śarmaṇaḥ bṛhataḥ śarmaṇi syām agneḥ aham su havasya praṇītau

original: āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvas tā na ūrje dadhātana /  mahe raṇāya cakṣase //
analyzed: āpaḥ hi stha mayobhuvaḥ tāḥ naḥ ūrje dadhātana mahe raṇāya cakṣase

original: yo vaḥ śivatamo rasas tasya bhājayateha naḥ /  uśatīr iva mātaraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śivatamaḥ rasaḥ tasya bhājayata iha naḥ    uśatīḥ iva mātaraḥ

original: tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /  āpo janayathā ca naḥ //
analyzed: tasmai aram gamāma vaḥ yasya kṣayāya jinvatha    āpaḥ janayatha ca naḥ

original: mitraḥ sam̐sṛjya pṛthivīṃ bhūmiṃ ca jyotiṣā saha /  sujātaṃ jātavedasam ayakṣmāya tvā sam̐ sṛjāmi prajābhyaḥ //
analyzed: mitraḥ samsṛjya pṛthivīm bhūmim ca jyotiṣā saha     su jātam jātavedasam ayakṣmāya tvā sam sṛjāmi prajābhyaḥ

original: rudrāḥ sam̐sṛjya pṛthivīṃ bṛhaj jyotiḥ sam īdhire /  teṣāṃ bhānur ajasra ic chukro deveṣu rocate //
analyzed: rudrāḥ samsṛjya pṛthivīm bṛhat jyotiḥ sam īdhire    teṣām bhānuḥ ajasraḥ id śukraḥ deveṣu rocate

original: sam̐sṛṣṭā vasubhī rudrair dhīraiḥ karmaṇyāṃ mṛdam /  hastābhyāṃ mṛdvīṃ kṛtvā sinīvālī kṛṇotu tām //
analyzed: samsṛṣṭā vasubhiḥ rudraiḥ dhīraiḥ karmaṇyām mṛdam   hastābhyām mṛdvīm kṛtvā sinīvālī kṛṇotu tām

original: sinīvālī sukapardā sukurīrā svaupaśā /  sā tubhyam adite mahyokhāṃ dadhātu hastayoḥ //
analyzed: sinīvālī su kapardā su kurīrā su aupaśā     sā tubhyam adite mahyā ukhām dadhātu hastayoḥ

original: ukhāṃ kṛṇotu śaktyā bāhubhyām aditir dhiyā /  mātā putraṃ yathopasthe sāgniṃ bibhartu garbha ā //
analyzed: ukhām kṛṇotu śaktyā bāhubhyām aditiḥ dhiyā    mātā putram yathā upasthe sā agnim bibhartu garbhe ā

original: makhasya śiro 'si //
analyzed: makhasya śiraḥ si

original: vasavas tvā kṛṇvantu gāyatreṇa chandasāṅgirasvad dhruvāsi  pṛthivy asi /  dhārayā mayi prajām̐ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyam̐ suvīryam̐ sajātān yajamānāya //
analyzed: vasavaḥ tvā kṛṇvantu gāyatreṇa chandasā aṅgirasvat dhruvā asi pṛthivī asi  / dhāraya mayi prajām rāyaspoṣam gaupatyam su vīryam sajātān yajamānāya

original: rudrās tvā kṛṇvantu traiṣṭubhena chandasāṅgirasvad dhruvāsy antarikṣam  asi /  dhārayā mayi prajām̐ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyam̐ suvīryam̐ sajātān yajamānāya //
analyzed: rudrāḥ tvā kṛṇvantu traiṣṭubhena chandasā aṅgirasvat dhruvā asi antarikṣam asi  / dhāraya mayi prajām rāyaspoṣam gaupatyam su vīryam sajātān yajamānāya

original: ādityās tvā kṛṇvantu jāgatena chandasāṅgirasvad dhruvāsi dyaur asi /  dhārayā mayi prajām̐ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyam̐ suvīryam̐ sajātān yajamānāya //
analyzed: ādityāḥ tvā kṛṇvantu jāgatena chandasā aṅgirasvat dhruvā asi dyauḥ asi  / dhāraya mayi prajām rāyaspoṣam gaupatyam su vīryam sajātān yajamānāya

original: viśve tvā devā vaiśvānarāḥ kṛṇvantv ānuṣṭubhena chandasāṅgirasvad  dhruvāsi diśo 'si /  dhārayā mayi prajām̐ rāyaspoṣaṃ gaupatyam̐ suvīryam̐ sajātān yajamānāya //
analyzed: viśve tvā devāḥ vaiśvānarāḥ kṛṇvantu ānuṣṭubhena chandasā aṅgirasvat  dhruvā asi diśaḥ si   / dhāraya mayi prajām rāyaspoṣam gaupatyam su vīryam sajātān yajamānāya

original: adityai rāmnāsi /  aditiṣ ṭe bilaṃ gṛbhṇātu /  kṛtvāya sā mahīm ukhāṃ mṛnmayīṃ yonim agnaye /  putrebhyaḥ prāyacchad aditiḥ śrapayān iti //
analyzed: adityai rāmnā asi   aditiḥ te bilam gṛbhṇātu   kṛtvāya sā mahīm ukhām mṛd mayīm yonim agnaye   putrebhyaḥ prāyacchat aditiḥ śrapayān iti

original: vasavas tvā dhūpayantu gāyatreṇa chandasāṅgirasvat /  rudrās tvā dhūpayantu traiṣṭubhena chandasāṅgirasvat /  ādityās tvā dhūpayantu jāgatena chandasāṅgirasvat /  viśve tvā devā vaiśvānarā dhūpayantv ānuṣṭubhena chandasāṅgirasvat /  indras tvā dhūpayatu /  varuṇas tvā dhūpayatu /  viṣṇu tvā dhūpayatu //
analyzed: vasavaḥ tvā dhūpayantu gāyatreṇa chandasā aṅgirasvat    rudrāḥ tvā dhūpayantu traiṣṭubhena chandasā aṅgirasvat    ādityāḥ tvā dhūpayantu jāgatena chandasā aṅgirasvat   viśve tvā devāḥ vaiśvānarāḥ dhūpayantu ānuṣṭubhena chandasā aṅgirasvat                        tvā dhūpayatu

original: aditiṣ ṭvā devī viśvadevyāvatī pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvat  khanatv avaṭa /  devānām tvā patnīr devīr viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe  aṅgirasvad dadhatūkhe /  dhiṣaṇās tvā devīr viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvad  abh`īndhatām ukhe /  varūtrīṣ ṭvā devīr viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvac  chrapayantūkhe /  gnās tvā devīr viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvat  pacantūkhe /  janayas tvācchinnapatrā devīr viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe  aṅgirasvat pacantūkhe //
analyzed: aditiḥ tvā devī viśvadevyāvatī pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvat khanatu avaṭa    devānām tvā patnīḥ devīḥ viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvat dadhatu ukhe   dhiṣaṇāḥ tvā devīḥ viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvat abhīndhatām ukhe    varūtrīḥ tvā devīḥ viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvat śrapayantu ukhe    gnāḥ tvā devīḥ viśvadevyāvatīḥ pṛthivyāḥ sadhasthe aṅgirasvat pacantu uk

original: mitrasya carṣaṇīdhṛto 'vo devasya sānasi /  dyumnaṃ citraśravastamam //
analyzed: mitrasya carṣaṇī dhṛtaḥ vaḥ devasya sānasi

original: devas tvā savitodvapatu supāṇiḥ svaṅguriḥ subāhur uta śaktyā /  avyathamānā pṛthivyām āśā diśa ā pṛṇa //
analyzed: devaḥ tvā savitā udvapatu su pāṇiḥ su aṅguriḥ su bāhuḥ uta śaktyā    a vyathamānā pṛthivyām āśāḥ diśaḥ ā pṛṇa

original: utthāya bṛhatī bhavod u tiṣṭha dhrutvā tvam /  mitraitāṃ ta ukhāṃ pari dadāmy abhittyā eṣā mā bhedi //
analyzed: utthāya bṛhatī bhava ud u tiṣṭha dhrutvā tvam mitra etām te ukhām pari dadāmi a bhittyai eṣā mā bhedi

original: vasavas tvā chṛndantu gāyatreṇa chandasāṅgirasvat /  rudrās tvā chṛndantu traiṣṭubhena chandasāṅgirasvat /  ādityās tvā chṛndantu jāgatena chandasāṅgirasvat /  viśve tvā devā vaiśvānarā ā chṛndantv ānuṣṭubhena chandasāṅgirasvat  //
analyzed: vasavaḥ tvā chṛndantu gāyatreṇa chandasā aṅgirasvat    rudrāḥ tvā chṛndantu traiṣṭubhena chandasā aṅgirasvat    ādityāḥ tvā chṛndantu jāgatena chandasā aṅgirasvat   viśve tvā devāḥ vaiśvānarāḥ ā chṛndantu ānuṣṭubhena chandasā aṅgirasvat  /

original: ākūtim agniṃ prayujam̐ svāhā /  mano medhām agniṃ prayujam̐ svāhā /  cittaṃ vijñātam agniṃ prayujam̐ svāhā /  vāco vidhṛtim agniṃ prayujam̐ svāhā /  prajāpataye manave svāhā /  agnaye vaiśvānarāya svāhā //
analyzed: ākūtim agnim prayujam svāhā   manaḥ medhām agnim prayujam svāhā   cittam vijñātam agnim prayujam svāhā   vācaḥ vidhṛtim agnim prayujam svāhā    prajāpataye manave svāhā   agnaye vaiśvānarāya svāhā

original: viśvo devasya netur marto vurīta sakhyam /  viśvo rāya iṣudhyati dyumnaṃ vṛṇīta puṣyase svāhā //
analyzed: viśvaḥ devasya netuḥ martaḥ vurīta sakhyam   viśvaḥ rāyaḥ iṣudhyati dyumnam vṛṇīta puṣyase svāhā

original: mā su bhitthā mā su riṣo 'mba dhṛṣṇu vīrayasva su /  agniś cedaṃ kariṣyathaḥ //
analyzed: mā su bhitthāḥ mā su riṣaḥ mba dhṛṣṇu vīrayasva su    agniḥ ca idam kariṣyathaḥ

original: dṛm̐hasva devi pṛthivi svastaya āsurī māyā svadhayā kṛtāsi /  juṣṭaṃ devebhya idam astu havyam ariṣṭā tvam ud ihi yajñe asmin //
analyzed: dṛmhasva devi pṛthivi svastaye āsurī māyā svadhayā kṛtā asi   / juṣṭam devebhyaḥ idam astu havyam ariṣṭā tvam ud ihi yajñe asmin

original: drvanna sarpirāsutiḥ pratno hotā vareṇyaḥ /  sahasas putro adbhutaḥ //
analyzed: dru anna sarpiḥ āsutiḥ pratnaḥ hotā vareṇyaḥ sahasaḥ putraḥ adbhutaḥ

original: parasyā adhi saṃvato 'varām̐ abhy ātara /  yatrāham asmi tām̐ ava //
analyzed: parasyāḥ adhi saṃvataḥ varām abhī ātara   yatra aham asmi tām ava

original: paramasyāḥ parāvato rohid aśva ihā gahi /  purīṣyaḥ purupriyo 'gne tvaṃ tarā mṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: paramasyāḥ parāvataḥ rohit aśvaḥ iha ā gahi    purīṣyaḥ puru priyaḥ gne tvam tara mṛdhaḥ

original: yad agne kāni kāni cid ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi /  sarvaṃ tad astu te ghṛtaṃ taj juṣasva yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: yat agne kāni kāni cit ā te dārūṇi dadhmasi    sarvam tat astu te ghṛtam tat juṣasva yaviṣṭhya

original: yad atty upajihvikā yad vamro atisarpati /  sarvaṃ tad astu te ghṛtaṃ taj juṣasva yaviṣṭhya //
analyzed: yat atti upajihvikā yat vamraḥ atisarpati  / sarvam tat astu te ghṛtam tat juṣasva yaviṣṭhya

original: ahar-ahar aprayāvaṃ bharanto 'śvāyeva tiṣṭhate ghāsam asmai /  rāyaspoṣeṇa sam iṣā madanto 'gne mā te prativeśā riṣāma //
analyzed: ahar ahar a prayāvam bharantaḥ śvāyā iva tiṣṭhate ghāsam asmai    rāyaspoṣeṇa sam iṣā madantaḥ gne mā te prativeśāḥ riṣāma

original: nābhā pṛthivyāḥ samidhāne agnau rāyaspoṣāya bṛhate havāmahe /  iraṃmadaṃ bṛhadukthyaṃ yajatraṃ jetāram agniṃ pṛtanāsu sāsahim //
analyzed: nābhā pṛthivyāḥ samidhāne agnau rāyaspoṣāya bṛhate havāmahe    iraṃmadam bṛhat ukthyam yajatram jetāram agnim pṛtanāsu sāsahim

original: yāḥ senā abhītvarīr āvyādhinīr ugaṇā uta /  ye stenā ye ca taskarās tām̐s te agne 'pi dadhāmy āsye //
analyzed: yāḥ senāḥ abhītvarīḥ āvyādhinīḥ ugaṇāḥ uta    ye stenāḥ ye ca taskarāḥ tām te agne pi dadhāmi āsye

original: dam̐ṣṭrābhyāṃ malimlūn jambhyais taskarām̐ uta /  hanubhyām̐ stenān bhagavas tām̐s tvaṃ khāda sukhāditān //
analyzed: damṣṭrābhyām malimlūn jambhyaiḥ taskarām uta hanubhyām stenān bhagavaḥ tān tvam khāda su khāditān

original: ye janeṣu malimlava stenāsas taskarā vane /  ye kakṣeṣv aghāyavas tām̐s te dadhāmi jambhayoḥ //
analyzed: ye janeṣu malimlavaḥ stenāsaḥ taskarāḥ vane   ye kakṣeṣu aghāyavaḥ tām te dadhāmi jambhayoḥ

original: yo asmabhyam arātīyād yaś ca no dveṣate janaḥ /  nindād yo asmān dhipsāc ca sarvaṃ taṃ bhasmasā kuru //
analyzed: yaḥ asmabhyam arātīyāt yaḥ ca naḥ dveṣate janaḥ    nindāt yaḥ asmān dhipsāt ca sarvam tam bhasmasā kuru

original: sam̐śitaṃ me brahma sam̐śitaṃ vīryaṃ balam /  sam̐śitaṃ kṣatraṃ jiṣṇu yasyāham asmi purohitaḥ //
analyzed: samśitam me brahma samśitam vīryam balam    samśitam kṣatram jiṣṇu yasya aham asmi purohitaḥ

original: ud eṣāṃ bāhū atiram ud varco atho balam /  kṣiṇomi brahmaṇāmitrān un nayāmi svām̐ aham //
analyzed: ud eṣām bāhū atiram ud varcaḥ atha u balam   kṣiṇomi brahmaṇā amitrān ud nayāmi svām aham

original: annapate 'nnasya no dehy anamīvasya śuṣmiṇaḥ /  pra-pra dātāraṃ tāriṣa ūrjaṃ no dhehi dvipade catuṣpade //
analyzed: anna pate nnasya naḥ dehi anamīvasya śuṣmiṇaḥ   pra pra dātāram tāriṣaḥ ūrjam naḥ dhehi dvipade catuṣpade

original: dṛśāno rukma urvyā vy adyaud durmarṣam āyuḥ śriye rucānaḥ /  agnir amṛto abhavad vayobhir yad enaṃ dyaur janayat suretāḥ //
analyzed: dṛśānaḥ rukmaḥ urvyā vi adyaut durmarṣam āyuḥ śriye rucānaḥ    agniḥ amṛtaḥ abhavat vayobhiḥ yat enam dyauḥ janayat su retāḥ

original: naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe dhāpayete śiśum ekam̐ samīcī /  dyāvākṣāmā rukmo antar vi bhāti devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodāḥ //
analyzed: nakta uṣāsā samanasā virūpe dhāpayete śiśum ekam samīcī     dyāvākṣāmā rukmaḥ antar vi bhāti devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dāḥ

original: viśvā rūpāṇi prati muñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīd bhadraṃ dvipade  catuṣpade /  vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyo 'nu prayāṇam uṣaso vi rājati //
analyzed: viśvā rūpāṇi prati muñcate kaviḥ prāsāvīt bhadram dvipade catuṣpade    vi nākam akhyat savitā vareṇyaḥ nu prayāṇam uṣasaḥ vi rājati

original: suparṇo 'si garutmām̐s trivṛt te śiro gāyatraṃ cakṣur  bṛhadrathantare pakṣau /  stoma ātmā chandām̐sy aṅgāni yajūm̐ṣi nāma /  sāma te tanūr vāmadevyaṃ yajñāyajñiyaṃ pucchaṃ dhiṣṇyāḥ śaphāḥ /  suparṇo 'si garutmān divaṃ gaccha svaḥ pata //
analyzed: suparṇaḥ si garutmān trivṛt te śiraḥ gāyatram cakṣuḥ bṛhat rathantare pakṣau   stomaḥ ātmā chandāmsi aṅgāni yajūmṣi nāma    sāma te tanūḥ vāmadevyam yajñāyajñiyam puccham dhiṣṇyāḥ śaphāḥ    suparṇaḥ si garutmān divam gaccha svar pata

original: viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si sapatnahā gāyatraṃ chanda ā roha pṛthivīm anu  vi kramasva /  viṣṇoḥ kramo 'sy abhimātihā traiṣṭubhaṃ chanda ā rohāntarikṣam anu vi  kramasva /  viṣṇoḥ kramo 'sy arātīyato hantā jāgataṃ chanda ā roha divam anu vi  kramasva /  viṣṇoḥ kramo 'si śatrūyato hantānuṣṭubhaṃ chanda ā roha diśo 'nu vi  kramasva //
analyzed: viṣṇoḥ kramaḥ u si sapatna hā gāyatram chandaḥ ā roha pṛthivīm anu vi kramasva    viṣṇoḥ kramaḥ u si abhimāti hā traiṣṭubham chandaḥ ā roha antarikṣam anu vi kramasva    viṣṇoḥ kramaḥ u si arātīyataḥ hantā jāgatam chandaḥ ā roha divam anu vi kramasva    viṣṇoḥ kramaḥ u si śatrūyataḥ hantā anuṣṭubham chandaḥ ā roha diśaḥ nu vi kramasva

original: akrandad agni stanayann iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihad vīrudhaḥ samañjan /  sadyo jajñāno vi hīm iddho akhyad ā rodasī bhānunā bhāty antaḥ //
analyzed: akrandat agniḥ stanayan iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihat vīrudhaḥ samañjan    sadyas jajñānaḥ vi hi īm iddhaḥ akhyat ā rodasī bhānunā bhāti antar

original: agne 'bhyāvartinn abhi mā ni vartasvāyuṣā varcasā prajayā dhanena /  sanyā medhayā rayyā poṣeṇa //
analyzed: agne bhyāvartin abhi mā ni vartasva āyuṣā varcasā prajayā dhanena     sanyā medhayā rayyā poṣeṇa

original: agne aṅgiraḥ śataṃ te santv āvṛtaḥ sahasraṃ ta upāvṛtaḥ /  adhā poṣasya poṣeṇa punar no naṣṭam ā kṛdhi punar no rayim ā kṛdhi //
analyzed: agne aṅgiraḥ śatam te santu āvṛtaḥ sahasram te upāvṛtaḥ    adha poṣasya poṣeṇa punar naḥ naṣṭam ā kṛdhi punar naḥ rayim ā kṛdhi

original: punar ūrjā ni vartasva punar agna iṣāyuṣā /  punar naḥ pāhy am̐hasaḥ //
analyzed: punar ūrjā ni vartasva punar agne iṣā āyuṣā   punar naḥ pāhi amhasaḥ

original: saha rayyā ni vartasvāgne pinvasva dhārayā /  viśvapsnyā viśvatas pari //
analyzed: saha rayyā ni vartasva agne pinvasva dhārayā   / viśvapsnyā viśvatas pari

original: ā tvāhārṣam antar abhūr dhruvas tiṣṭhāvicācaliḥ /  viśas tvā sarvā vāñchantu mā tvad rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat //
analyzed: ā tvā ahārṣam antar abhūḥ dhruvaḥ tiṣṭha avicācaliḥ    viśaḥ tvā sarvāḥ vāñchantu mā tvat rāṣṭram adhi bhraśat

original: ud uttamaṃ varuṇa pāśam asmad avādhamaṃ vi madhyamam̐ śrathāya /  athā vayam āditya vrate tavānāgaso aditaye syāma //
analyzed: ud uttamam varuṇa pāśam asmat ava adhamam vi madhyamam śrathāya    athā vayam āditya vrate tava anāgasaḥ aditaye syāma

original: agre bṛhann uṣasām ūrdhvo asthān nirjaganvān tamaso jyotiṣāgāt /  agnir bhānunā ruśatā svaṅga ā jāto viśvā sadmāny aprāḥ //
analyzed: agre bṛhan uṣasām ūrdhvaḥ asthāt nirjaganvān tamasaḥ jyotiṣā āgāt    agniḥ bhānunā ruśatā su aṅgaḥ ā jātaḥ viśvā sadmāni aprāḥ

original: ham̐saḥ śuciṣad vasur antarikṣasad dhotā vediṣad atithir dūroṇasat /  nṛṣad varasad ṛtasad vyomasad abjā gojā ṛtajā adrijā ṛtam //
analyzed: hamsaḥ śuciṣad vasuḥ antarikṣa sad hotā vediṣad atithiḥ duroṇa sad nṛṣad vara sad ṛta sad vyoma sad ap jāḥ go jāḥ ṛta jāḥ adri jāḥ ṛtam

original: bṛhat //
analyzed: bṛhat

original: sīda tvaṃ mātur asyā upasthe viśvāny agne vayunāni vidvān /  maināṃ tapasā mārciṣābhiśocīr antar asyām̐ śukrajyotir vi bhāhi //
analyzed: sīda tvam mātuḥ asyāḥ upasthe viśvāni agne vayunāni vidvān    mā enām tapasā mā arciṣā abhiśocīḥ antar asyām śukra jyotiḥ vi bhāhi

original: antar agne rucā tvam ukhāyāḥ sadane sve /  tasyās tvam̐ harasā tapan jātavedaḥ śivo bhava //
analyzed: antar agne rucā tvam ukhāyāḥ sadane sve   tasyāḥ tvam harasā tapan jātavedaḥ śivaḥ bhava

original: śivo bhūtvā mahyam agne atho sīda śivas tvam /  śivaḥ kṛtvā diśaḥ sarvāḥ svaṃ yonim ihāsadaḥ //
analyzed: śivaḥ bhūtvā mahyam agne atha u sīda śivaḥ tvam    śivaḥ kṛtvā diśaḥ sarvāḥ svam yonim iha āsadaḥ

original: divas pari prathamaṃ jajñe agnir asmād dvitīyaṃ pari jātavedāḥ /  tṛtīyam apsu nṛmaṇā ajasram indhāna enaṃ jarate svādhīḥ //
analyzed: divaḥ pari prathamam jajñe agniḥ asmāt dvitīyam pari jātavedāḥ    tṛtīyam apsu nṛmaṇāḥ ajasram indhānaḥ enam jarate svādhīḥ

original: vidmā te agne tredhā trayāṇi vidmā te dhāma vibhṛtā purutrā /  vidmā te nāma paramaṃ guhā yad vidmā tam utsaṃ yata ājagantha //
analyzed: vidma te agne tredhā trayāṇi vidma te dhāma vibhṛtā purutrā    vidma te nāma paramam guhā yat vidma tam utsam yatas ājagantha

original: samudre tvā nṛmaṇā apsv antar nṛcakṣā īdhe divo agna ūdhan /  tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivām̐sam apām upasthe mahiṣā avardhan //
analyzed: samudre tvā nṛmaṇāḥ apsu antar nṛ cakṣāḥ īdhe divaḥ agne ūdhan    tṛtīye tvā rajasi tasthivāmsam apām upasthe mahiṣāḥ avardhan

original: akrandad agni stanayann iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihad vīrudhaḥ samañjan /  sadyo jajñāno vi hīm iddho akhyad ā rodasī bhānunā bhāty antaḥ //
analyzed: akrandat agniḥ stanayan iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihat vīrudhaḥ samañjan    sadyas jajñānaḥ vi hi īm iddhaḥ akhyat ā rodasī bhānunā bhāti antar

original: śrīṇām udāro dharuṇo rayīṇāṃ manīṣāṇāṃ prārpaṇaḥ somagopāḥ /  vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahaso apsu rājā vi bhāty agra uṣasām idhānaḥ //
analyzed: śrīṇām udāraḥ dharuṇaḥ rayīṇām manīṣāṇām prārpaṇaḥ soma gopāḥ    vasuḥ sūnuḥ sahasaḥ apsu rājā vi bhāti agre uṣasām idhānaḥ

original: viśvasya ketur bhuvanasya garbha ā rodasī apṛṇāj jāyamānaḥ /  vīḍuṃ cid adrim abhinat parāyañ janā yad agnim ayajanta pañca //
analyzed: viśvasya ketuḥ bhuvanasya garbhaḥ ā rodasī apṛṇāt jāyamānaḥ    vīḍum cit adrim abhinat parāyam janāḥ yat agnim ayajanta pañca

original: uśik pāvako aratiḥ sumedhā martyeṣv agnir amṛto ni dhāyi /  iyarti dhūmam aruṣaṃ bharibhrad uc chukreṇa śociṣā dyām inakṣan //
analyzed: uśij pāvakaḥ aratiḥ sumedhāḥ martyeṣu agniḥ amṛtaḥ ni dhāyi    iyarti dhūmam aruṣam bharibhrat ud śukreṇa śociṣā dyām inakṣan

original: dṛśāno rukma urvyā vy adyaud durmarṣam āyuḥ śriye rucānaḥ /  agnir amṛto abhavad vayobhir yad enaṃ dyaur janayat suretāḥ //
analyzed: dṛśānaḥ rukmaḥ urvyā vi adyaut durmarṣam āyuḥ śriye rucānaḥ    agniḥ amṛtaḥ abhavat vayobhiḥ yat enam dyauḥ janayat su retāḥ

original: yas te adya kṛṇavad bhadraśoce 'pūpaṃ deva ghṛtavantam agne /  pra taṃ naya prataraṃ vasyo acchābhi sumnaṃ devabhaktaṃ yaviṣṭha //
analyzed: yaḥ te adya kṛṇavat bhadra śoce pūpam deva ghṛtavantam agne    pra tam naya prataram vasyaḥ accha abhi sumnam deva bhaktam yaviṣṭha

original: ā taṃ bhaja sauśravaseṣv agna uktha-uktha ā bhaja śasyamāne /  priyaḥ sūrye priyo agnā bhavāty uj jātena bhinadad uj janitvaiḥ //
analyzed: ā tam bhaja sauśravaseṣu agne ukthaukthe ā bhaja śasyamāne    priyaḥ sūrye priyaḥ agnā bhavāti ud jātena bhinadat ud janitvaiḥ

original: tvām agne yajamānā anu dyūn viśvā vasu dadhire vāryāṇi /  tvayā saha draviṇam icchamānā vrajaṃ gomantam uśijo vi vavruḥ //
analyzed: tvām agne yajamānāḥ anu dyūn viśvā vasu dadhire vāryāṇi   tvayā saha draviṇam icchamānāḥ vrajam gomantam uśijaḥ vi vavruḥ

original: astāvy agnir narām̐ suśevo vaiśvānara ṛṣibhiḥ somagopāḥ /  adveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devā dhatta rayim asme suvīram //
analyzed: astāvi agniḥ narām su śevaḥ vaiśvānaraḥ ṛṣibhiḥ soma gopāḥ   a dveṣe dyāvāpṛthivī huvema devāḥ dhatta rayim asme su vīram

original: samidhāgniṃ duvasyata ghṛtair bodhayatātithim /  āsmin havyā juhotana //
analyzed: samidhā agnim duvasyata ghṛtaiḥ bodhayata atithim    ā asmin havyā juhotana

original: ud u tvā viśve devā agne bharantu cittibhiḥ /  sa no bhava śivas tvam̐ supratīko vibhāvasuḥ //
analyzed: ud u tvā viśve devāḥ agne bharantu cittibhiḥ   sa naḥ bhava śivaḥ tvam su pratīkaḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: pred agne jyotiṣmān yāhi śivebhir arcibhiṣ ṭvam /  bṛhadbhir bhānubhir bhāsan mā him̐sīs tanvā prajāḥ //
analyzed: pra id agne jyotiṣmān yāhi śivebhiḥ arcibhiḥ tvam    bṛhadbhiḥ bhānubhiḥ bhāsan mā himsīḥ tanvā prajāḥ

original: akrandad agni stanayann iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihad vīrudhaḥ samañjan /  sadyo jajñāno vi hīm iddho akhyad ā rodasī bhānunā bhāty antaḥ //
analyzed: akrandat agniḥ stanayan iva dyauḥ kṣāmā rerihat vīrudhaḥ samañjan    sadyas jajñānaḥ vi hi īm iddhaḥ akhyat ā rodasī bhānunā bhāti antar

original: pra-prāyam agnir bharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryo na rocate bṛhad  bhāḥ /  abhi yaḥ pūruṃ pṛtanāsu tasthau dīdāya daivyo atithiḥ śivo naḥ //
analyzed: pra pra ayam agniḥ bharatasya śṛṇve vi yat sūryaḥ na rocate bṛhat bhās    abhi yaḥ pūrum pṛtanāsu tasthau dīdāya daivyaḥ atithiḥ śivaḥ naḥ

original: āpo devīḥ prati gṛbhṇīta bhasmaitat syone kṛṇudhvam̐ surabhā  loke /  tasmai namantāṃ janayaḥ supatnīr māteva putraṃ bibhṛtāpsv enat //
analyzed: āpaḥ devīḥ prati gṛbhṇīta bhasma etat syone kṛṇudhvam surabhā loke   tasmai namantām janayaḥ su patnīḥ mātā iva putram bibhṛta apsu enat

original: apsv agne sadhiṣ ṭava sauṣadhīr anu rudhyase /  garbhe san jāyase punaḥ //
analyzed: apsu agne sadhiḥ tava sa oṣadhīḥ anu rudhyase   garbhe san jāyase punar

original: garbho asy oṣadhīnāṃ garbho vanaspatīnām /  garbho viśvasya bhūtasyāgne garbho apām asi //
analyzed: garbhaḥ asi oṣadhīnām garbhaḥ vanaspatīnām   garbhaḥ viśvasya bhūtasya agne garbhaḥ apām asi

original: prasadya bhasmanā yonim apaś ca pṛthivīm agne /  sam̐sṛjya mātṛbhiṣ ṭvaṃ jyotiṣmān punar āsadaḥ //
analyzed: prasadya bhasmanā yonim apaḥ ca pṛthivīm agne    samsṛjya mātṛbhiḥ tvam jyotiṣmān punar āsadaḥ

original: punar āsadya sadanam apaś ca pṛthivīm agne /  śeṣe mātur yathopasthe 'ntar asyām̐ śivatamaḥ //
analyzed: punar āsadya sadanam apaḥ ca pṛthivīm agne    śeṣe mātuḥ yathā upasthe ntar asyām śivatamaḥ

original: punar ūrjā nivartasva punar agna iṣāyuṣā /  punar naḥ pāhy am̐hasaḥ //
analyzed: punar ūrjā nivartasva punar agne iṣā āyuṣā   punar naḥ pāhi amhasaḥ

original: saha rayyā ni vartasvāgne pinvasva dhārayā /  viśvapsnyā viśvatas pari //
analyzed: saha rayyā ni vartasva agne pinvasva dhārayā   / viśvapsnyā viśvatas pari

original: bodhā me asya vacaso yaviṣṭha mam̐hiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvaḥ /  pīyati tvo anu tvo gṛṇāti vandāruṣ ṭe tanvaṃ vande agne //
analyzed: bodha me asya vacasaḥ yaviṣṭha mamhiṣṭhasya prabhṛtasya svadhāvas    pīyati tvaḥ anu tvaḥ gṛṇāti vandāruḥ te tanvam vande agne
