analyzed: namaḥ babhluśāya vyādhine nnānām pataye namaḥ namaḥ bhavasya hetyai jagatām pataye namaḥ namaḥ rudrāya ātatāyine kṣetrāṇām pataye namaḥ namaḥ sūtāya ahantyai vanānām pataye namaḥ

original: namo rohitāya sthapataye vṛkṣāṇāṃ pataye namo namo bhuvantaye  vārivaskṛtāyauṣadhīnāṃ pataye namo namo mantriṇe vāṇijāya kakṣāṇāṃ  pataye namo nama uccairghoṣāyākrandayate pattīnāṃ pataye namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ rohitāya sthapataye vṛkṣāṇām pataye namaḥ namaḥ bhuvantaye vārivaskṛtāya oṣadhīnām pataye namaḥ namaḥ mantriṇe vāṇijāya kakṣāṇām pataye namaḥ namaḥ uccairghoṣāya ākrandayate pattīnām pataye namaḥ

original: namaḥ kṛtsnāyatayā dhāvate satvanāṃ pataye namo namaḥ sahamānāya  nivyādhina āvyādhinīnāṃ pataye namo namo niṣaṅgiṇe kakubhāya stenānāṃ  pataye namo nam nicerave paricarāyāraṇyānāṃ pataye namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ kṛtsna āyatayā dhāvate satvanām pataye namaḥ namaḥ sahamānāya nivyādhine āvyādhinīnām pataye namaḥ namaḥ niṣaṅgiṇe kakubhāya stenānām pataye namaḥ nam nicerave paricarāya araṇyānām pataye namaḥ

original: namo vañcate parivañcate stāyūnāṃ pataye namo namo niṣaṅgiṇa  iṣudhimate taskarāṇāṃ pataye namo namaḥ sṛkāyibhyo jighām̐sadbhyo  muṣṇatāṃ pataye namo namo 'simadbhyo naktaṃ caradbhyo vikṛntānāṃ pataye  namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ vañcate parivañcate stāyūnām pataye namaḥ namaḥ niṣaṅgiṇe iṣudhimate taskarāṇām pataye namaḥ namaḥ sṛkāyibhyaḥ jighāmsadbhyaḥ muṣṇatām pataye namaḥ namaḥ simadbhyaḥ naktam caradbhyaḥ vikṛntānām pataye namaḥ

original: nama uṣṇīṣiṇe giricarāya kuluñcānāṃ pataye namo nama iṣumadhbyo  dhanvāyibhyaś ca vo namo nama ātanvānebhyaḥ pratidadhānebhyaś ca vo namo  nama āyacchadbhyo 'syadbhyaś ca vo namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ uṣṇīṣiṇe giri carāya kuluñcānām pataye namaḥ namaḥ iṣumadhbyaḥ dhanvāyibhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ ātanvānebhyaḥ pratidadhānebhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ āyacchadbhyaḥ syadbhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ

original: namo visṛjadbhyo vidhyadbhyaś ca vo namo namaḥ svapadbhyo  jāgradbhyaś ca vo namo namaḥ śayānebhya āsīnebhyaś ca vo namo namas  tiṣṭhadbhyo dhāvadbhyaś ca vo namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ visṛjadbhyaḥ vidhyadbhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ svapadbhyaḥ jāgradbhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ śayānebhyaḥ āsīnebhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ tiṣṭhadbhyaḥ dhāvadbhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ

original: namaḥ sabhābhyaḥ sabhāpatibhyaś ca vo namo namo 'śvebhyo  'śvapatibhyaś ca vo namo nama āvyādhinībhyo vividhyantībhyaś ca vo namo  nama ugaṇābhyas tṛm̐hatībhyaś ca vo namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ sabhābhyaḥ sabhā patibhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ śvebhyaḥ śva patibhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ āvyādhinībhyaḥ vividhyantībhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ ugaṇābhyaḥ tṛmhatībhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ

original: namo gaṇebhyo gaṇapatibhyaś ca vo namo namo vrātebhyo  vrātapatibhyaś ca vo namo namgṛtsebhyo gṛtsapatibhyaś ca vo namo namo  virūpebhyo viśvarūpebhyaś ca vo namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ gaṇebhyaḥ gaṇa patibhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ vrātebhyaḥ vrāta patibhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ nam gṛtsebhyaḥ gṛtsa patibhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ virūpebhyaḥ viśvarūpebhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ

original: namaḥ senābhyaḥ senānibhyaś ca vo namo namo rathibhyo aratebhyaś ca  vo namo namaḥ kṣattṛbhyaḥ saṃgrahītṛbhyaś ca vo namo namo mahadbhyo  arbhakebhyaś ca vo namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ senābhyaḥ senānibhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ rathibhyaḥ a ratebhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ kṣattṛbhyaḥ saṃgrahītṛbhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ mahadbhyaḥ arbhakebhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ

original: namas takṣabhyo rathakārebhyaś ca vo namo namaḥ kulālebhyaḥ  kurmārebhyaś ca vo namo namo niṣādebhyaḥ puñjiṣṭebhyaś ca vo namo namaḥ  śvanibhyo mṛgayubhyaś ca vo namaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ takṣabhyaḥ rathakārebhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ kulālebhyaḥ kurmārebhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ niṣādebhyaḥ puñjiṣṭebhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ śvanibhyaḥ mṛgayubhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ

original: namaḥ śvabhyaḥ śvapatibhyaś ca vo namo namo bhavāya ca rudrāya ca  namaḥ śarvāya ca paśupataye ca namo nīlagrīvāya ca śitikaṇṭhāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ śvabhyaḥ śva patibhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ bhavāya ca rudrāya ca  namaḥ śarvāya ca paśupataye ca namaḥ nīlagrīvāya ca śitikaṇṭhāya ca

original: namaḥ kapardine ca vyuptakeśāya ca namaḥ sahasrākṣāya ca  śatadhanvane ca namo giriśayāya ca śipiviṣṭāya ca namo mīḍhuṣṭamāya  ceṣumate ca //
analyzed: namaḥ kapardine ca vyupta keśāya ca namaḥ sahasrākṣāya ca śatadhanvane ca namaḥ giriśayāya ca śipiviṣṭāya ca namaḥ mīḍhuṣṭamāya ca iṣumate ca

original: namo hrasvāya ca vāmanāya ca namo bṛhate ca varṣīyase ca namo  vṛddhāya ca savṛdhe ca namo 'gryāya ca prathamāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ hrasvāya ca vāmanāya ca namaḥ bṛhate ca varṣīyase ca namaḥ vṛddhāya ca savṛdhe ca namaḥ gryāya ca prathamāya ca

original: nama āśave cājirāya ca namaḥ śīghryāya ca śībhyāya ca nama  ūrmyāya cāvasvanyāya ca namo nādeyāya ca dvīpyāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ āśave ca ajirāya ca namaḥ śīghryāya ca śībhyāya ca namaḥ ūrmyāya ca avasvanyāya ca namaḥ nādeyāya ca dvīpyāya ca

original: namo jyeṣṭhāya ca kaniṣṭhāya ca namaḥ pūrvajāya cāparajāya ca  namo madhyamāya cāpagalbhāya ca namo jaghanyāya ca budhnyāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ jyeṣṭhāya ca kaniṣṭhāya ca namaḥ pūrva jāya ca apara jāya ca namaḥ madhyamāya ca apagalbhāya ca namaḥ jaghanyāya ca budhnyāya ca

original: namaḥ somyāya ca pratisaryāya ca namo yāmyāya ca kṣemyāya ca  namaḥ ślokyāya cāvasānyāya ca nama urvaryāya ca khalyāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ somyāya ca pratisaryāya ca namaḥ yāmyāya ca kṣemyāya ca  namaḥ ślokyāya ca avasānyāya ca namaḥ urvaryāya ca khalyāya ca

original: namo vanyāya ca kakṣṇyāya ca namaḥ śravāya ca pratiśravāya ca  nama āśuṣeṇāya cāśurathāya ca namaḥ śūrāya cāvabhedine ca //
analyzed: namaḥ vanyāya ca kakṣṇyāya ca namaḥ śravāya ca pratiśravāya ca  namaḥ āśuṣeṇāya ca āśu rathāya ca namaḥ śūrāya ca avabhedine ca

original: namo bilmine ca kavacine ca namo varmiṇe ca varūthine ca namaḥ  śrutāya ca śrutasenāya ca namo dundubhyāya cāhananyāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ bilmine ca kavacine ca namaḥ varmiṇe ca varūthine ca namaḥ śrutāya ca śruta senāya ca namaḥ dundubhyāya ca āhananyāya ca

original: namo dhṛṣṇave ca pramṛśāya ca namo niṣaṅgiṇe ceṣudhimate ca  namas tīkṣṇeṣave cāyudhine ca namaḥ svāyudhāya ca sudhanvane ca //
analyzed: namaḥ dhṛṣṇave ca pramṛśāya ca namaḥ niṣaṅgiṇe ca iṣudhimate ca  namaḥ tīkṣṇa iṣave ca āyudhine ca namaḥ su āyudhāya ca su dhanvane ca

original: namaḥ srutyāya ca pathyāya ca namaḥ kāṭyāya ca nīpyāya ca namaḥ  kulyāya ca sarasyāya ca namo nādeyāya ca vaiśantāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ srutyāya ca pathyāya ca namaḥ kāṭyāya ca nīpyāya ca namaḥ kulyāya ca sarasyāya ca namaḥ nādeyāya ca vaiśantāya ca

original: namaḥ kūpyāya cāvaṭyāya ca namo vīdhryāya cātapyāya ca namo  meghyāya ca ca vidyutyāya namo varṣyāya cāvarṣyāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ kūpyāya ca avaṭyāya ca namaḥ vīdhryāya ca ātapyāya ca namaḥ meghyāya ca ca vidyutyāya namaḥ varṣyāya ca a varṣyāya ca

original: namo vātyāya ca reṣmyāya ca namo vāstavyāya ca vāstupāya ca  namaḥ somāya ca rudrāya ca namas tāmrāya cāruṇāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ vātyāya ca reṣmyāya ca namaḥ vāstavyāya ca vāstupāya ca  / namaḥ somāya ca rudrāya ca namaḥ tāmrāya ca aruṇāya ca

original: namaḥ śaṃgave ca paśupataye ca nama ugrāya ca bhīmāya ca namo  agrevadhāya ca dūrevadhāya ca namo hantre ca hanīyase ca namo vṛkṣebhyo  harikeśebhyo namas tārāya //
analyzed: namaḥ śaṃgave ca paśupataye ca namaḥ ugrāya ca bhīmāya ca namaḥ agrevadhāya ca dūrevadhāya ca namaḥ hantre ca hanīyase ca namaḥ vṛkṣebhyaḥ hari keśebhyaḥ namaḥ tārāya

original: namaḥ śambhavāya ca mayobhavāya ca namaḥ śaṃkarāya ca  mayaskarāya ca namaḥ śivāya ca śivatarāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ śambhavāya ca mayobhavāya ca namaḥ śaṃkarāya ca mayaskarāya ca namaḥ śivāya ca śivatarāya ca

original: namaḥ pāryāya cāvāryāya ca namaḥ prataraṇāya cottaraṇāya ca namas  tīrthyāya ca kūlyāya ca namaḥ śaṣpyāya ca phenyāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ pāryāya ca avāryāya ca namaḥ prataraṇāya ca uttaraṇāya ca namaḥ tīrthyāya ca kūlyāya ca namaḥ śaṣpyāya ca phenyāya ca

original: namaḥ sikatyāya ca pravāhyāya ca namaḥ kim̐śilāya ca kṣayaṇāya  ca namaḥ kapardine ca pulastaye ca nama iriṇyāya ca prapathyāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ sikatyāya ca pravāhyāya ca namaḥ kimśilāya ca kṣayaṇāya ca namaḥ kapardine ca pulastaye ca namaḥ iriṇyāya ca prapathyāya ca

original: namo vrajyāya ca goṣṭhyāya ca namas talpyāya ca gehyāya ca namo  hṛdayyāya ca niveṣyāya ca namaḥ kāṭyāya ca gahvareṣṭhāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ vrajyāya ca goṣṭhyāya ca namaḥ talpyāya ca gehyāya ca namaḥ hṛdayyāya ca niveṣyāya ca namaḥ kāṭyāya ca gahvareṣṭhāya ca

original: namaḥ śuṣkyāya ca harityāya ca namaḥ pām̐savyāya ca rajasyāya ca  namo lopyāya colapyāya ca nama ūrvyāya ca sūrvyāya ca //
analyzed: namaḥ śuṣkyāya ca harityāya ca namaḥ pāmsavyāya ca rajasyāya ca  namaḥ lopyāya ca ulapyāya ca namaḥ ūrvyāya ca sūrvyāya ca

original: namaḥ parṇāya ca parṇaśadāya ca nama udguramāṇāya cābhighnate ca  nama ākhidate ca prakhidate ca nama iṣukṛdbhyo dhanuṣkṛdbhyas ca vo  namo namo vaḥ kirikebhyo devānām̐ hṛdayebhyo namo vicinvatkebhyo namo  vikṣiṇatkebhyo nama ānirhatebhyaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ parṇāya ca parṇa śadāya ca namaḥ udguramāṇāya ca abhighnate ca  / namaḥ ākhidate ca prakhidate ca namaḥ iṣu kṛdbhyaḥ dhanuṣkṛdbhyaḥ ca vaḥ namaḥ namaḥ vaḥ kirikebhyaḥ devānām hṛdayebhyaḥ namaḥ vicinvatkebhyaḥ namaḥ vikṣiṇatkebhyaḥ namaḥ ā nirhatebhyaḥ

original: drāpe andhasas pate daridra nīlalohita /  āsāṃ prajānām eṣāṃ paśūnāṃ mā bher mā roṅ mo ca naḥ kiṃ canāmamat  //
analyzed: drāpe andhasaḥ pate daridra nīlalohita    āsām prajānām eṣām paśūnām mā bheḥ mā roṣ mā u ca naḥ kim cana amamat  /

original: imā rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ /  yathā śam asad dvipade catuṣpade viśvaṃ puṣṭaṃ grāme asminn anāturam //
analyzed: imāḥ rudrāya tavase kapardine kṣayadvīrāya pra bharāmahe matīḥ    yathā śam asat dvipade catuṣpade viśvam puṣṭam grāme asmin anāturam

original: yā te rudra śivā tanūḥ śivā viśvāhā bheṣajī /  śivā rutasya bheṣajī tayā no mṛḍa jīvase //
analyzed: yā te rudra śivā tanūḥ śivā viśvāhā bheṣajī   śivā rutasya bheṣajī tayā naḥ mṛḍa jīvase

original: pari no rudrasya hetir vṛṇaktu pari tveṣasya durmatir aghāyoḥ /  ava sthirā maghavadbhyas tanuṣva mīḍhvas tokāya tanayāya mṛḍa //
analyzed: pari naḥ rudrasya hetiḥ vṛṇaktu pari tveṣasya durmatiḥ aghāyoḥ    ava sthirā maghavadbhyaḥ tanuṣva mīḍhvaḥ tokāya tanayāya mṛḍa

original: mīḍhuṣṭama śivatama śivo naḥ sumanā bhava /  parame vṛkṣa āyudhaṃ nidhāya kṛttiṃ vasāna ā cara pinākaṃ bibhrad  ā gahi //
analyzed: mīḍhuṣṭama śivatama śivaḥ naḥ su manāḥ bhava    parame vṛkṣe āyudham nidhāya kṛttim vasānaḥ ā cara pinākam bibhrat ā gahi

original: vikiridra vilohita namas te astu bhagavaḥ /  yās te sahasram̐ hetayo 'nyam asman ni vapantu tāḥ //
analyzed: vikiridra vilohita namaḥ te astu bhagavaḥ   yāḥ te sahasram hetayaḥ asmat ni vapantu tāḥ

original: sahasrāṇi sahasraśo bāhvos tava hetayaḥ /  tāsām īśāno bhagavaḥ parācīnā mukhā kṛdhi //
analyzed: sahasrāṇi sahasraśas bāhvoḥ tava hetayaḥ   tāsām īśānaḥ bhagavaḥ parācīnā mukhā kṛdhi

original: asaṃkhyātā sahasrāṇi ye rudrā adhi bhūmyām /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: asaṃkhyātā sahasrāṇi ye rudrāḥ adhi bhūmyām   teṣām sahasra yojane va dhanvāni tanmasi

original: asmin mahaty arṇave 'ntarikṣe bhavā adhi /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: asmin mahati arṇave ntarikṣe bhavāḥ adhi  / teṣām sahasra yojane va dhanvāni tanmasi

original: nīlagrīvāḥ śitikaṇṭhā divam̐ rudrā upāśritāḥ /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: nīlagrīvāḥ śitikaṇṭhāḥ divam rudrāḥ upāśritāḥ   teṣām sahasrayojane va dhanvāni tanmasi

original: nīlagrīvāḥ śitikaṇṭhāḥ śarvā adhaḥ kṣamācarāḥ /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: nīlagrīvāḥ śitikaṇṭhāḥ śarvāḥ adhas kṣamā carāḥ   teṣām sahasra yojane va dhanvāni tanmasi

original: ye vṛkṣeṣu śaṣpiñjarā nīlagrīvā vilohitāḥ /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: ye vṛkṣeṣu śaṣpiñjarāḥ nīlagrīvāḥ vilohitāḥ   teṣām sahasra yojane va dhanvāni tanmasi

original: ye bhūtānām adhipatayo viśikhāsaḥ kapardinaḥ /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: ye bhūtānām adhipatayaḥ viśikhāsaḥ kapardinaḥ    teṣām sahasra yojane va dhanvāni tanmasi

original: ye pathāṃ pathirakṣasa ailabṛdā āyuryudhaḥ /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: ye pathām pathirakṣasaḥ ailabṛdāḥ āyuḥ yudhaḥ    teṣām sahasra yojane vaḥ dhanvāni tanmasi

original: ye tīrthāni pracaranti sṛkāhastā niṣaṅgiṇaḥ /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: ye tīrthāni pracaranti sṛkā hastāḥ niṣaṅgiṇaḥ   teṣām sahasra yojane va dhanvāni tanmasi

original: ye 'nneṣu vividhyanti pātreṣu pibato janān /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: ye nneṣu vividhyanti pātreṣu pibataḥ janān   teṣām sahasra yojane va dhanvāni tanmasi

original: ye etāvantaś ca bhūyām̐saś ca diśo rudrā vitasthire /  teṣām̐ sahasrayojane 'va dhanvāni tanmasi //
analyzed: ye etāvantaḥ ca bhūyāmsaḥ ca diśaḥ rudrāḥ vitasthire   teṣām sahasra yojane vaḥ dhanvāni tanmasi

original: namo 'stu rudrebhyo ye divi yeṣāṃ varṣam iṣavaḥ /  tebhyo daśa prācīr daśa dakṣiṇā daśa pratīcīr daśodīcīr daśordhvāḥ /  tebhyo namo astu te no 'vantu te no mṛḍayantu te yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no  dveṣṭi tam eṣāṃ jambhe dadhmaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ stu rudrebhyaḥ ye divi yeṣām varṣam iṣavaḥ  / tebhyaḥ daśa prācīḥ daśa dakṣiṇāḥ daśa pratīcīḥ daśa udīcīḥ daśa ūrdhvāḥ    tebhyaḥ namaḥ astu te naḥ vantu te naḥ mṛḍayantu te yam dviṣmaḥ yaḥ ca naḥ dveṣṭi tam eṣām jambhe dadhmaḥ

original: namo 'stu rudrebhyo ye 'ntarikṣe yeṣāṃ vāta iṣavaḥ /  tebhyo daśa prācīr daśa dakṣiṇā daśa pratīcīr daśodīcīr daśordhvāḥ /  tebhyo namo astu te no 'vantu te no mṛḍayantu te yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no  dveṣṭi tam eṣāṃ jambhe dadhmaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ stu rudrebhyaḥ ye ntarikṣe yeṣām vātaḥ iṣavaḥ    tebhyaḥ daśa prācīḥ daśa dakṣiṇāḥ daśa pratīcīḥ daśa udīcīḥ daśa ūrdhvāḥ    tebhyaḥ namaḥ astu te naḥ vantu te naḥ mṛḍayantu te yam dviṣmaḥ yaḥ ca naḥ dveṣṭi tam eṣām jambhe dadhmaḥ

original: namo 'stu rudrebhyo ye pṛthivyāṃ yeṣām annam iṣavaḥ /  tebhyo daśa prācīr daśa dakṣiṇā daśa pratīcīr daśodīcīr daśordhvāḥ /  tebhyo namo astu te no 'vantu te no mṛḍayantu te yaṃ dviṣmo yaś ca no  dveṣṭi tam eṣāṃ jambhe dadhmaḥ //
analyzed: namaḥ stu rudrebhyaḥ ye pṛthivyām yeṣām annam iṣavaḥ  / tebhyaḥ daśa prācīḥ daśa dakṣiṇāḥ daśa pratīcīḥ daśa udīcīḥ daśa ūrdhvāḥ    tebhyaḥ namaḥ astu te naḥ vantu te naḥ mṛḍayantu te yam dviṣmaḥ yaḥ ca naḥ dveṣṭi tam eṣām jambhe dadhmaḥ

original: aśmann ūrjaṃ parvate śiśriyāṇām adbhya oṣadhībhyo vanaspatibhyo  'dhi sambhṛtaṃ payaḥ /  tāṃ na iṣam ūrjaṃ dhatta marutaḥ sam̐rarāṇāḥ //
analyzed: aśman ūrjam parvate śiśriyāṇām adbhyaḥ oṣadhībhyaḥ vanaspatibhyaḥ dhi sambhṛtam payaḥ   tām naḥ iṣam ūrjam dhatta marutaḥ samrarāṇāḥ

original: aśmam̐s te kṣut /  mayi ta ūrk /  yaṃ dviṣmas taṃ te śug ṛcchatu //
analyzed: aśmam te kṣudh   mayi te ūrj   yam dviṣmaḥ tam te śuc ṛcchatu

original: imā me agna iṣṭakā dhenavaḥ santv ekā ca daśa ca daśa ca śataṃ ca  śataṃ ca sahasraṃ ca sahasraṃ cāyutaṃ cāyutaṃ ca niyutaṃ ca niyutaṃ ca  prayutaṃ cārbudaṃ ca nyarbudam̐ samudraś ca madhyaṃ cāntaś ca parārdhaś  caitā me agna iṣṭakā dhenavaḥ santv amutrāmuṣmiṃl loke //
analyzed: imāḥ me agne iṣṭakāḥ dhenavaḥ santu ekā ca daśa ca daśa ca śatam ca śatam ca sahasram ca sahasram ca ayutam ca ayutam ca niyutam ca niyutam ca prayutam ca arbudam ca nyarbudam samudraḥ ca madhyam ca antaḥ ca parārdhaḥ ca etāḥ me agne iṣṭakāḥ dhenavaḥ santu amutra amuṣmin loke

original: ṛtava stha ṛtāvṛdha ṛtuṣṭhā stha ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /  ghṛtaścyuto madhuścyuto virājo nāma kāmadughā akṣīyamāṇāḥ //
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ stha ṛtāvṛdhaḥ ṛtuṣṭhāḥ stha ṛtāvṛdhaḥ    ghṛtaścyutaḥ madhuścyutaḥ virājaḥ nāma kāmadughāḥ a kṣīyamāṇāḥ

original: samudrasya tvāvakayāgne pari vyayāmasi /  pāvako asmabhyam̐ śivo bhava //
analyzed: samudrasya tvā avakayā agne pari vyayāmasi    pāvakaḥ asmabhyam śivaḥ bhava

original: himasya tvā jarāyuṇāgne pari vyayāmasi /  pāvako asmabhyam̐ śivo bhava //
analyzed: himasya tvā jarāyuṇā agne pari vyayāmasi   pāvakaḥ asmabhyam śivaḥ bhava

original: upa jmann upa vetase 'va tara nadīṣv ā /  agne pittam apām asi /  maṇḍūki tābhir ā gahi semaṃ no yajñaṃ pāvakavarṇam̐ śivaṃ kṛdhi //
analyzed: upa jman upa vetase va tara nadīṣu ā  / agne pittam apām asi   / maṇḍūki tābhiḥ ā gahi sā imam naḥ yajñam pāvaka varṇam śivam kṛdhi

original: apām idaṃ nyayanam̐ samudrasya niveśanam /  anyām̐s te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvako asmabhyam̐ śivo bhava //
analyzed: apām idam nyayanam samudrasya niveśanam   anyān te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvakaḥ asmabhyam śivaḥ bhava

original: agne pāvaka rociṣā mandrayā deva jihvayā /  ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca //
analyzed: agne pāvaka rociṣā mandrayā deva jihvayā    ā devān vakṣi yakṣi ca

original: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivo 'gne devām̐ ihā vaha /  upa yajñam̐ haviś ca naḥ //
analyzed: sa naḥ pāvaka dīdivas gne devām iha ā vaha    upa yajñam haviḥ ca naḥ

original: pāvakayā yaś citayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruca uṣaso na bhānunā /  tūrvan na yāmann etaśasya nū raṇa ā yo ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇo ajaraḥ //
analyzed: pāvakayā yaḥ citayantyā kṛpā kṣāman ruruce uṣasaḥ na bhānunā   tūrvan na yāman etaśasya nu raṇe ā yaḥ ghṛṇe na tatṛṣāṇaḥ ajaraḥ

original: namas te harase śociṣe namas te astv arciṣe /  anyām̐s te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvako asmabhyam̐ śivo bhava //
analyzed: namaḥ te harase śociṣe namaḥ te astu arciṣe   anyān te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvakaḥ asmabhyam śivaḥ bhava

original: nṛṣade veṭ /  apsuṣade veṭ /  barhiṣade veṭ /  vanasade veṭ /  svarvide veṭ //
analyzed: nṛṣade veṭ   apsuṣade veṭ   barhiṣade veṭ   vana sade veṭ    svar vide veṭ

original: ye devā devānāṃ yajñiyā yajñiyānām̐ saṃvatsarīṇam upa bhāgam  āsate /  ahutādo haviṣo yajñe asmint svayaṃ pibantu madhuno ghṛtasya //
analyzed: ye devāḥ devānām yajñiyāḥ yajñiyānām saṃvatsarīṇam upa bhāgam āsate     a huta adaḥ haviṣaḥ yajñe asmin svayam pibantu madhunaḥ ghṛtasya

original: ye devā deveṣv adhi devatvam āyan ye brahmaṇaḥ puraetāro asya /  yebhyo na ṛte pavate dhāma kiṃ cana na te divo na pṛthivyā adhi snuṣu  //
analyzed: ye devāḥ deveṣu adhi deva tvam āyan ye brahmaṇaḥ puraetāraḥ asya    yebhyaḥ na ṛte pavate dhāma kim cana na te divaḥ na pṛthivyāḥ adhi snuṣu  /

original: prāṇadā apānadā vyānadā varcodā varivodāḥ /  anyām̐s te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvako asmabhyam̐ śivo bhava //
analyzed: prāṇa dāḥ apāna dāḥ vyāna dāḥ varcaḥ dāḥ varivaḥ dāḥ    anyān te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvakaḥ asmabhyam śivaḥ bhava

original: agnis tigmena śociṣā yāsad viśvaṃ ny atriṇam /  agnir no vanate rayim //
analyzed: agniḥ tigmena śociṣā yāsat viśvam ni atriṇam   agniḥ naḥ vanate rayim

original: ya imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvad ṛṣir hotā ny asīdat pitā naḥ /  sa āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ prathamacchad avarām̐ ā viveśa //
analyzed: yaḥ imā viśvā bhuvanāni juhvat ṛṣiḥ hotā ni asīdat pitā naḥ    saḥ āśiṣā draviṇam icchamānaḥ prathamacchad avarām ā viveśa

original: kim̐ svid āsīd adhiṣṭhānam ārambhaṇaṃ katamat svit kathāsīt /  yato bhūmiṃ janayan viśvakarmā vi dyām aurṇon mahinā viśvacakṣāḥ //
analyzed: kim svid āsīt adhiṣṭhānam ārambhaṇam katamat svid kathā āsīt    yatas bhūmim janayan viśvakarmā vi dyām aurṇot mahinā viśva cakṣāḥ

original: viśvataścakṣur uta viśvatomukho viśvatobāhur uta viśvataspāt /  saṃ bāhubhyāṃ dhamati saṃ patatrair dyāvābhūmī janayan deva ekaḥ //
analyzed: viśvatas cakṣuḥ uta viśvatomukhaḥ viśvatobāhuḥ uta viśvataspād     sam bāhubhyām dhamati sam patatraiḥ dyāvābhūmī janayan devaḥ ekaḥ

original: kim̐ svid vanaṃ ka u sa vṛkṣa āsa yato dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ /  manīṣiṇo manasā pṛcchated u tad yad adhyatiṣṭhad bhuvanāni dhārayan //
analyzed: kim svid vanam kaḥ u sa vṛkṣaḥ āsa yatas dyāvāpṛthivī niṣṭatakṣuḥ    manīṣiṇaḥ manasā pṛcchata id u tat yat adhyatiṣṭhat bhuvanāni dhārayan

original: yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yāvamā yā madhyamā viśvakarmann  utemā /  śikṣā sakhibhyo haviṣi svadhāvaḥ svayaṃ yajasva tanvaṃ vṛdhānaḥ //
analyzed: yā te dhāmāni paramāṇi yā avamā yā madhyamā viśvakarman  uta imā śikṣa sakhibhyaḥ haviṣi svadhāvas svayam yajasva tanvam vṛdhānaḥ

original: viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayaṃ yajasva pṛthivīm uta dyām /  muhyantv anye abhito sapatnā ihāsmākaṃ maghavā sūrir astu //
analyzed: viśvakarman haviṣā vāvṛdhānaḥ svayam yajasva pṛthivīm uta dyām    muhyantu anye abhitas sapatnāḥ iha asmākam maghavā sūriḥ astu

original: vācas patiṃ viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manojuvaṃ vāje adyā huvema /  sa no viśvāni havanāni joṣad viśvaśambhūr avase sādhukarmā //
analyzed: vācaḥ patim viśvakarmāṇam ūtaye manaḥ juvam vāje adyā huvema    sa naḥ viśvāni havanāni joṣat viśva śambhūḥ avase sādhu karmā

original: viśvakarman haviṣā vardhanena trātāram indram akṛṇor avadhyam /  tasmai viśaḥ samanamanta pūrvīr ayam ugro vihavyo yathāsat //
analyzed: viśvakarman haviṣā vardhanena trātāram indram akṛṇoḥ avadhyam    tasmai viśaḥ samanamanta pūrvīḥ ayam ugraḥ vihavyaḥ yathā asat

original: cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīro ghṛtam ene ajanan namnamāne /  yaded antā adadṛhanta pūrva ād id dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām //
analyzed: cakṣuṣaḥ pitā manasā hi dhīraḥ ghṛtam ene ajanat namnamāne    yadā id antāḥ adadṛhanta pūrve āt id dyāvāpṛthivī aprathetām

original: viśvakarmā vimanā ād vihāyā dhātā vidhātā paramota saṃdṛk /  teṣām iṣṭāni sam iṣā madanti yatrā saptaṛṣīn para ekam āhuḥ //
analyzed: viśvakarmā vimanāḥ āt vihāyāḥ dhātā vidhātā paramā uta saṃdṛś    teṣām iṣṭāni sam iṣā madanti yatrā sapta ṛṣīn paras ekam āhuḥ

original: yo naḥ pitā janitā yo vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā /  yo devānāṃ nāmadhā eka eva tam̐ saṃpraśnaṃ bhuvanā yanty anyā //
analyzed: yaḥ naḥ pitā janitā yaḥ vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā   yaḥ devānām nāmadhāḥ ekaḥ eva tam saṃpraśnam bhuvanā yanti anyā

original: ta āyajanta draviṇam̐ sam asmā ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāro na bhūnā /  asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye bhūtāni samakṛṇvann imāni //
analyzed: te āyajanta draviṇam sam asmai ṛṣayaḥ pūrve jaritāraḥ na bhūnā    asūrte sūrte rajasi niṣatte ye bhūtāni samakṛṇvan imāni

original: paro divā para enā pṛthivyā paro devebhir asurair yad asti /  kam̐ svid garbhaṃ prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥ samapaśyanta pūrve //
analyzed: paras divā paras enā pṛthivyā paras devebhiḥ asuraiḥ yat asti    kam svid garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ yatra devāḥ samapaśyanta pūrve

original: tam id garbhaṃ prathamaṃ dadhra āpo yatra devāḥ samagacchanta  viśve /  ajasya nābhāv adhy ekam arpitaṃ yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ //
analyzed: tam id garbham prathamam dadhre āpaḥ yatra devāḥ samagacchanta viśve    ajasya nābhau adhi ekam arpitam yasmin viśvāni bhuvanāni tasthuḥ

original: na taṃ vidātha ya imā jajānānyad yuṣmākam antaraṃ babhūva /  nīhāreṇa prāvṛtā jalpyā cāsutṛpa ukthaśāsaś caranti //
analyzed: na tam vidātha yaḥ imā jajāna anyat yuṣmākam antaram babhūva    nīhāreṇa prāvṛtāḥ jalpyā ca asutṛpaḥ uktha śāsaḥ caranti

original: viśvakarmā hy ajaniṣṭa deva ād id gandharvo abhavad dvitīyaḥ /  tṛtīyaḥ pitā janitauṣadhīnām apāṃ garbhaṃ vy adadhāt purutrā //
analyzed: viśvakarmā hi ajaniṣṭa devaḥ āt id gandharvaḥ abhavat dvitīyaḥ    tṛtīyaḥ pitā janitā oṣadhīnām apām garbham vi adadhāt purutrā

original: āśuḥ śiśāno vṛṣabho na bhīmo ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaś carṣaṇīnām /  saṃkrandano 'nimiṣa ekavīraḥ śatam̐ senā ajayat sākam indraḥ //
analyzed: āśuḥ śiśānaḥ vṛṣabhaḥ na bhīmaḥ ghanāghanaḥ kṣobhaṇaḥ carṣaṇīnām    saṃkrandanaḥ nimiṣaḥ eka vīraḥ śatam senāḥ ajayat sākam indraḥ

original: saṃkrandanenānimiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā yutkāreṇa duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā /  tad indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvaṃ yudho nara iṣuhastena vṛṣṇā //
analyzed: saṃkrandanena animiṣeṇa jiṣṇunā yutkāreṇa duścyavanena dhṛṣṇunā      tat indreṇa jayata tat sahadhvam yudhaḥ naraḥ iṣu hastena vṛṣṇā

original: sa iṣuhastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhir vaśī sam̐sraṣṭā sa yudha indro gaṇena /  sam̐sṛṣṭajit somapā bāhuśardhy ugradhanvā pratihitābhir astā //
analyzed: saḥ iṣu hastaiḥ sa niṣaṅgibhiḥ vaśī samsraṣṭā sa yudhaḥ indraḥ gaṇena samsṛṣṭa jit soma pāḥ bāhuśardhī ugra dhanvā pratihitābhiḥ astā

original: bṛhaspate pari dīyā rathena rakṣohāmitrān apabādhamānaḥ /  prabhañjant senāḥ pramṛṇo yudhā jayann asmākam edhy avitā rathānām //
analyzed: bṛhaspate pari dīya rathena rakṣaḥ hā amitrān apabādhamānaḥ   prabhañjan senāḥ pramṛṇaḥ yudhā jayan asmākam edhi avitā rathānām

original: balavijñāya sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamāna ugraḥ /  abhivīro abhisatvā sahojā jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha govit //
analyzed: balavijñāya sthaviraḥ pravīraḥ sahasvān vājī sahamānaḥ ugraḥ    abhivīraḥ abhisatvā sahaḥ jāḥ jaitram indra ratham ā tiṣṭha go vid

original: gotrabhidaṃ govidaṃ vajrabāhuṃ jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā /  imam̐ sajātā anu vīrayadhvam indram̐ sakhāyo anu sam̐ rabhadhvam //
analyzed: gotrabhidam go vidam vajra bāhum jayantam ajma pramṛṇantam ojasā    imam sajātāḥ anu vīrayadhvam indram sakhāyaḥ anu sam rabhadhvam

original: abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamāno 'dayo vīraḥ śatamanyur indraḥ /  duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāḍ ayudhyo 'smākam̐ senā avatu pra yutsu //
analyzed: abhi gotrāṇi sahasā gāhamānaḥ dayaḥ vīraḥ śatamanyuḥ indraḥ    duścyavanaḥ pṛtanāṣāh ayudhyaḥ smākam senāḥ avatu pra yutsu

original: indra āsāṃ netā bṛhaspatir dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ pura etu somaḥ /  devasenānām abhibhañjatīnāṃ jayantīnāṃ maruto yantv agram //
analyzed: indraḥ āsām netā bṛhaspatiḥ dakṣiṇā yajñaḥ puras etu somaḥ    deva senānām abhibhañjatīnām jayantīnām marutaḥ yantu agram

original: indrasya vṛṣṇo varuṇasya rājña ādityānāṃ marutām̐ śardha ugram /  mahāmanasāṃ bhuvanacyavānāṃ ghoṣo devānāṃ jayatām ud asthāt //
analyzed: indrasya vṛṣṇaḥ varuṇasya rājñaḥ ādityānām marutām śardhaḥ ugram mahāmanasām bhuvanacyavānām ghoṣaḥ devānām jayatām ud asthāt

original: ud dharṣaya maghavann āyudhāny ut satvanāṃ māmakānāṃ manām̐si /  ud vṛtrahan vājināṃ vājināny ud rathānāṃ jayatāṃ yantu ghoṣāḥ //
analyzed: ud dharṣaya maghavan āyudhāni ud satvanām māmakānām    ud vṛtrahan vājinām vājināni ud rathānām jayatām yantu ghoṣāḥ

original: asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣv asmākaṃ yā iṣavas tā jayantu /  asmākaṃ vīrā uttare bhavantv asmām̐ u devā avatā haveṣu //
analyzed: asmākam indraḥ samṛteṣu dhvajeṣu asmākam yāḥ iṣavaḥ tāḥ jayantu    asmākam vīrāḥ uttare bhavantu asmām u devāḥ avata haveṣu

original: amīṣāṃ cittaṃ pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇāṅgāny apve parehi /  abhi prehi nir daha hṛtsu śokair andhenāmitrās tamasā sacantām //
analyzed: amīṣām cittam pratilobhayantī gṛhāṇa aṅgāni apve parehi abhi prehi niḥ daha hṛtsu śokaiḥ andhena amitrāḥ tamasā sacantām

original: avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahmasam̐śite /  gacchāmitrān pra padyasva māmīṣāṃ kaṃ canoc chiṣaḥ //
analyzed: avasṛṣṭā parā pata śaravye brahma samśite     gaccha amitrān pra padyasva mā amīṣām kam cana ud śiṣaḥ

original: pretā jayatā nara indro vaḥ śarma yacchatu /  ugrā vaḥ santu bāhavo 'nādhṛṣyā yathāsatha //
analyzed: pra ita jayata naraḥ indraḥ vaḥ śarma yacchatu    ugrāḥ vaḥ santu bāhavaḥ na adhṛṣyāḥ yathā asatha

original: asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām abhyaiti na ojasā spardhamānā /  tāṃ gūhata tamasāpavratena yathāmī anyo anyaṃ na jānan //
analyzed: asau yā senā marutaḥ pareṣām abhyaiti naḥ ojasā spardhamānā     tām gūhata tamasā apavratena yathā amī anyaḥ anyam na jānan

original: yatra vāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārā viśikhā iva /  tatra indro bṛhaspatir aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu //
analyzed: yatra vāṇāḥ sampatanti kumārāḥ viśikhāḥ iva    tatra indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ aditiḥ śarma yacchatu viśvāhā śarma yacchatu

original: marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somas tvā rājāmṛtenānu vastām /  uror varīyo varuṇas te kṛṇotu jayantaṃ tvānu devā madantu //
analyzed: marmāṇi te varmaṇā chādayāmi somaḥ tvā rājā amṛtena anu vastām    uroḥ varīyaḥ varuṇaḥ te kṛṇotu jayantam tvā anu devāḥ madantu

original: ud enam uttarāṃ nayāgne ghṛtenāhuta /  rāyaspoṣeṇa ram̐ sṛja prajayā ca bahuṃ kṛdhi //
analyzed: ud enam uttarām naya agne ghṛtena āhuta rāyaspoṣeṇa ram sṛja prajayā ca bahum kṛdhi

original: indremaṃ pratarāṃ naya sajātānām asadvaśī /  sam enaṃ varcasā sṛja devānāṃ bhāgadā asat //
analyzed: indra imam pratarām naya sajātānām asat vaśī    sam enam varcasā sṛja devānām bhāga dāḥ asat

original: yasaya kurmo gṛhe havis tam agne vardhayā tvam /  tasmai devā adhi bravann ayaṃ ca brahmaṇaspatiḥ //
analyzed: yasaya kurmaḥ gṛhe haviḥ tam agne vardhaya tvam    tasmai devāḥ adhi bravan ayam ca brahmaṇaspatiḥ

original: ud u tvā viśve devā agne bharantu cittibhiḥ /  sa no bahva śivas tvam̐ supratīko vibhāvasuḥ //
analyzed: ud u tvā viśve devāḥ agne bharantu cittibhiḥ   sa naḥ bahva śivaḥ tvam su pratīkaḥ vibhāvasuḥ

original: pañca diśo daivīr yajñam avantu devīr apāmatiṃ durmatiṃ  bādhamānāḥ /  rāyaspoṣe yajñapatim ābhajantī rāyaspoṣe adhi yajño asthāt //
analyzed: pañca diśaḥ daivīḥ yajñam avantu devīḥ apa amatim durmatim bādhamānāḥ    rāyaspoṣe yajñapatim ābhajantīḥ rāyaspoṣe adhi yajñaḥ asthāt

original: samiddhe agnāv adhi māmahāna ukthapatra īḍyo gṛbhītaḥ /  taptaṃ gharmaṃ parigṛhyāyajantorjā yad yajñam ayajanta devāḥ //
analyzed: samiddhe agnau adhi māmahānaḥ uktha patraḥ īḍyaḥ gṛbhītaḥ    taptam gharmam parigṛhya ayajanta ūrjā yat yajñam ayajanta devāḥ

original: daivyāya dhartre joṣṭre devaśrīḥ śrīmanāḥ śatapayāḥ /  parigṛhya devā yajñam āyan devā devebhyo adhvaryanto asthuḥ //
analyzed: daivyāya dhartre joṣṭre deva śrīḥ śrī manāḥ śata payāḥ parigṛhya devāḥ yajñam āyan devāḥ devebhyaḥ adhvaryantaḥ asthuḥ

original: vītam̐ haviḥ śamitam̐ śamitā yajadhyai turīyo yajño yatra havyam  eti /  tato vākā āśiṣo no juṣantām //
analyzed: vītam haviḥ śamitam śamitā yajadhyai turīyaḥ yajñaḥ yatra havyam eti    tatas vākāḥ āśiṣaḥ naḥ juṣantām

original: sūryaraśmir harikeśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotir ud ayām̐ ajasram /  tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvānt sampaśyan viśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ //
analyzed: sūrya raśmiḥ hari keśaḥ purastāt savitā jyotiḥ ud ayām ajasram    tasya pūṣā prasave yāti vidvān sampaśyan viśvā bhuvanāni gopāḥ

original: vimāna eṣa divo madhya āsta āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam /  sa viśvācīr abhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīr antarā pūrvam aparaṃ ca ketum //
analyzed: vimānaḥ eṣa divaḥ madhye āste āpaprivān rodasī antarikṣam     sa viśvācīḥ abhi caṣṭe ghṛtācīḥ antarā pūrvam aparam ca ketum

original: ukṣā samudro aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ pūrvasya yoniṃ pitur ā viveśa /  madhye divo nihitaḥ pṛśnir aśmā vi cakrame rajasas pāty antau //
analyzed: ukṣā samudraḥ aruṇaḥ suparṇaḥ pūrvasya yonim pituḥ ā viveśa    madhye divaḥ nihitaḥ pṛśniḥ aśmā vi cakrame rajasaḥ pāti antau

original: indraṃ viśvā avīvṛdhant samudravyacasaṃ giraḥ /  rathītamam̐ rathīnāṃ vājānām̐ satpatiṃ patim //
analyzed: indram viśvāḥ avīvṛdhan samudra vyacasam giraḥ rathītamam rathīnām vājānām satpatim patim

original: devahūr yajña ā ca vakṣat sumnahūr yajña ā ca vakṣat /  yakṣad agnir devo devām̐ ā ca vakṣat //
analyzed: deva hūḥ yajñaḥ ā ca vakṣat sumna hūḥ yajñaḥ ā ca vakṣat    yakṣat agniḥ devaḥ devām ā ca vakṣat

original: vajasya mā prasave udgrābheṇod agrabhīt /  adha sapatnān indro me nigrābheṇādharām̐ akaḥ //
analyzed: vajasya mā prasave udgrābheṇa ud agrabhīt    adha sapatnān indraḥ me nigrābheṇa adharām akaḥ

original: udgrābhaṃ ca nigrābhaṃ ca brahma devā avīvṛdhan /  adhā sapatnān indrāgnī me viṣūcīnān vy asyatām //
analyzed: udgrābham ca nigrābham ca brahma devāḥ avīvṛdhan    adha sapatnān indra agnī me viṣūcīnān vi asyatām

original: kramadhvam agninā nākam ukhyam̐ hasteṣu bibhrataḥ /  divas pṛṣṭham̐ svar gatvā miśrā devebhir ādhvam //
analyzed: kramadhvam agninā nākam ukhyam hasteṣu bibhrataḥ   divas pṛṣṭham svar gatvā miśrā devebhiḥ ādhvam

original: prācīm anu pradiśaṃ prehi vidvān agner agne puroagnir bhaveha /  viśvā āśā dīdyāno vi bhāhy ūrjaṃ no dhehi dvipade catuṣpade //
analyzed: prācīm anu pradiśam prehi vidvān agneḥ agne puras agniḥ bhava iha  / viśvāḥ āśāḥ dīdyānaḥ vi bhāhi ūrjam naḥ dhehi dvipade catuṣpade

original: pṛthivyā aham ud antarikṣam āruham antarikṣād divam āruham /  divo nākasya pṛṣṭhāt svar jyotir agām aham //
analyzed: pṛthivyāḥ aham ud antarikṣam āruham antarikṣāt divam āruham    divaḥ nākasya pṛṣṭhāt svar jyotiḥ agām aham

original: svar yanto nāpekṣanta ā dyām̐ rohanti rodasī /  yajñaṃ ye viśvatodhāram̐ suvidvām̐so vitenire //
analyzed: svar yantaḥ na apekṣante ā dyām rohanti rodasī    yajñam ye viśvatas dhāram su vidvāmsaḥ vitenire

original: agne prehi prathamo devayatāṃ cakṣur devānām uta martyānām /  iyakṣamāṇā bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ svar yantu yajamānāḥ svasti //
analyzed: agne prehi prathamaḥ devayatām cakṣuḥ devānām uta martyānām   iyakṣamāṇāḥ bhṛgubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ svar yantu yajamānāḥ svasti

original: naktoṣāsā samanasā virūpe dhāpayete śiśum ekam̐ samīcī /  dyāvākṣāmā rukmo antar vi bhāti devā agniṃ dhārayan draviṇodāḥ //
analyzed: nakta uṣāsā samanasā virūpe dhāpayete śiśum ekam samīcī     dyāvākṣāmā rukmaḥ antar vi bhāti devāḥ agnim dhārayan draviṇaḥ dāḥ

original: agne sahasrākṣa śatamūrdhañ chataṃ te prāṇāḥ sahasraṃ vyānāḥ /  tvam̐ sāhasrasya rāya īśiṣe tasmai te vidhema vājāya svāhā //
analyzed: agne sahasra akṣa śata mūrdham śatam te prāṇāḥ sahasram vyānāḥ   tvam sāhasrasya rāyaḥ īśiṣe tasmai te vidhema vājāya svāhā

original: suparṇo 'si garunmān pṛṣṭhe pṛthivyāḥ sīda /  bhāsāntarikṣam ā pṛṇa jyotiṣā divam ut tabhāna tejasā diśa ud dṛm̐ha //
analyzed: suparṇaḥ si garunmān pṛṣṭhe pṛthivyāḥ sīda  / bhāsā antarikṣam ā pṛṇa jyotiṣā divam ud tabhāna tejasā diśaḥ ud dṛmha

original: ājuhvānaḥ supratīkaḥ purastād agne yonim ā sīda sādhuyā /  asmint sashasthe adhy uttarasmin viśve devā yajamānaś ca sīdata //
analyzed: ājuhvānaḥ su pratīkaḥ purastāt agne yonim ā sīda sādhuyā   asmin sashasthe adhi uttarasmin viśve devāḥ yajamānaḥ ca sīdata

original: tam̐ savitur vareṇyasya citrām āhaṃ vṛṇe sumatiṃ viśvajanyām /  yām asya kaṇvo aduhat prapīnām̐ sahasradhārāṃ payasā mahīṃ gām //
analyzed: tam savituḥ vareṇyasya citrām ā aham vṛṇe sumatim viśvajanyām    yām asya kaṇvaḥ aduhat prapīnām sahasra dhārām payasā mahīm gām

original: vidhema te parame janmann agne vidhema stomair avare sadhasthe /  yasmād yoner udārithā yaje taṃ pra tve havīm̐ṣi juhure samiddhe //
analyzed: vidhema te parame janman agne vidhema stomaiḥ avare sadhasthe    yasmāt yoneḥ udāritha yaje tam pra tve havīmṣi juhure samiddhe

original: preddho agne dīdihi puro no 'jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha /  tvām̐ śaśvanta upa yanti vājāḥ //
analyzed: preddhaḥ agne dīdihi puras naḥ jasrayā sūrmyā yaviṣṭha   tvām śaśvantaḥ upa yanti vājāḥ

original: agne tam adyāśvaṃ na stomaiḥ kratuṃ na bhadram̐ hṛdispṛśam /  ṛdhyāmā ta ohaiḥ //
analyzed: agne tam adya aśvam na stomaiḥ kratum na bhadram hṛdispṛśam   ṛdhyāma te ohaiḥ

original: cittiṃ juhomi manasā ghṛtena yathā devā ihāgaman vītihotrā  ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /  patye viśvasya bhūmano juhomi viśvakarmaṇe viśvāhādābhyam̐ havi //
analyzed: cittim juhomi manasā ghṛtena yathā devāḥ iha agaman vītihotrāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ   patye viśvasya bhūmanaḥ juhomi viśvakarmaṇe viśvāhā adābhyam havi

original: sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvāḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ sapta dhāma  priyāṇi /  sapta hotrāḥ saptadhā tvā yajanti sapta yonīr ā pṛṇasva ghṛtena  svāhā //
analyzed: sapta te agne samidhaḥ sapta jihvāḥ sapta ṛṣayaḥ sapta dhāma priyāṇi   / sapta hotrāḥ saptadhā tvā yajanti sapta yonīḥ ā pṛṇasva ghṛtena svāhā

original: śukrajyotiś ca citrajyotiś ca satyajyotiś ca jyotiṣmām̐ś ca /  śukraś ca ṛtapāś cātyam̐hāḥ //
analyzed: śukra jyotiḥ ca citra jyotiḥ ca satya jyotiḥ ca jyotiṣmāmś ca śukraḥ ca ṛta pāḥ ca atyamhāḥ

original: īdṛṅ cānyadṛṅ ca sadṛṅ ca pratisadṛṅ ca /  mitaś ca saṃmitaś ca sabharāḥ //
analyzed: īdṛś ca anyadṛś ca sadṛś ca pratisadṛś ca    mitaḥ ca saṃmitaḥ ca sabharāḥ

original: ṛtaś ca satyaś ca dhruvaś ca dharuṇaś ca /  dhartā ca vidhartā ca vidhārayaḥ //
analyzed: ṛtaḥ ca satyaḥ ca dhruvaḥ ca dharuṇaḥ ca    dhartā ca vidhartā ca vidhārayaḥ

original: ṛtajic ca satyajic ca senajic ca suṣeṇaś ca /  antimitraś ca dūreamitraś ca gaṇaḥ //
analyzed: ṛta jit ca satya jit ca senajit ca suṣeṇaḥ ca antimitraḥ ca dūreamitraḥ ca gaṇaḥ

original: īdṛkṣāsa etādṛkṣāsa ū ṣu ṇaḥ sadṛkṣāsaḥ pratisadṛkṣāsa etana  /  mitāsaś ca saṃmitāso no adya sabharaso maruto yajñe asmin //

analyzed: tryaviḥ ca me tryavī ca me dityavāṭ ca me dityauhī ca me pañcāviḥ ca me pañcāvī ca me trivatsaḥ ca me trivatsā ca me turyavāh ca me turyauhī ca me yajñena kalpantām

original: paṣṭhavāṭ ca me paṣṭhauhī ca ma ukṣā ca me vaśā ca ma ṛṣabhaś  ca me vehac ca me 'naḍvām̐ś ca me dhenuś ca me yajñena kalpantām //
analyzed: paṣṭhavāh ca me paṣṭhauhī ca me ukṣā ca me vaśā ca me ṛṣabhaḥ ca me vehat ca me naḍvāmū ca me dhenuḥ ca me yajñena kalpantām

original: vājāya svāhā prasavāya svāhāpijāya svāhā kratave svāhā  vasave svāhāharpataye svāhāhne svāhā mugdhāya svāhā mugdhāya  vainam̐śināya svāhāvinam̐śina āntyāyanāya svāhāntyāya bhauvanāya  svāhā bhuvanasya pataye svāhādhipataye svāhā prajāpataye svāhā /  iyaṃ te rāṇ mitrāya yantāsi yamana ūrje tvā vṛṣṭyai tvā prajānāṃ  tvādhipatyāya //
analyzed: vājāya svāhā prasavāya svāhā apijāya svāhā kratave svāhā vasave svāhā aharpataye svāhā ahne svāhā mugdhāya svāhā mugdhāya vainamśināya svāhā avinamśine āntyāyanāya svāhā antyāya bhauvanāya svāhā bhuvanasya pataye svāhā adhipataye svāhā prajāpataye svāhā  / iyam te rāj mitrāya yantā asi yamane ūrje tvā vṛṣṭyai tvā prajānām tvā ādhipatyāya  /

original: āyur yajñena kalpatāṃ prāṇo yajñena kalpatāṃ cakṣur yajñena  kalpatām̐ śrotraṃ yajñena kalpatāṃ vāg yajñena kalpatāṃ mano yajñena  kalpatām ātmā yajñena kalpatāṃ brahmā yajñena kalpatāṃ jyotir yajñena  kalpatām̐ svar yajñena kalpatāṃ pṛṣṭhaṃ yajñena kalpatāṃ yajño yajñena  kalpatām /  stomaś ca yajuś ca ṛk ca sāma ca bṛhac ca rathantaraṃ ca /  svar devā aganmāmṛtā abhūma prajāpateḥ prajā abhūma veṭ svāhā //
analyzed: āyuḥ yajñena kalpatām prāṇaḥ yajñena kalpatām cakṣuḥ yajñena kalpatām śrotram yajñena kalpatām vāc yajñena kalpatām manaḥ yajñena kalpatām ātmā yajñena kalpatām brahmā yajñena kalpatām jyotiḥ yajñena kalpatām svar yajñena kalpatām pṛṣṭham yajñena kalpatām yajñaḥ yajñena kalpatām  / stomaḥ ca yajuḥ ca ṛc ca sāma ca bṛhat ca rathantaram ca    svar devāḥ aganma amṛtāḥ abhūma prajāpateḥ prajāḥ abhūma veṭ svāhā

original: vājasya nu prasave mātaraṃ mahīm aditiṃ nāma vacasā karāmahe /  yasyām idaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanam āviveśa tasyāṃ no devaḥ savitā dharma  sāviṣat //
analyzed: vājasya nu prasave mātaram mahīm aditim nāma vacasā karāmahe    yasyām idam viśvam bhuvanam āviveśa tasyām naḥ devaḥ savitā dharma sāviṣat

original: viśve adya maruto viśva ūtī viśve bhavantv agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ /  viśve no devā avasā gamantu viśvam astu draviṇaṃ vājo asme //
analyzed: viśve adya marutaḥ viśve ūtī viśve bhavantu agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ   viśve naḥ devāḥ avasā gamantu viśvam astu draviṇam vājaḥ asme

original: vājo naḥ sapta pradiśaś catasro vā parāvataḥ /  vājo no viśvair devair dhanasātāv ihāvatu //
analyzed: vājaḥ naḥ sapta pradiśaḥ catasraḥ vā parāvataḥ   vājaḥ naḥ viśvaiḥ devaiḥ dhana sātau iha avatu

original: vājo no adya pra suvāti dānaṃ vājo devām̐ ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti /  vājo hi mā sarvavīraṃ jajāna viśvā āśā vājapatir jayeyam //
analyzed: vājaḥ naḥ adya pra suvāti dānam vājaḥ devām ṛtubhiḥ kalpayāti    vājaḥ hi mā sarva vīram jajāna viśvāḥ āśāḥ vāja patiḥ jayeyam

original: vajaḥ purastād uta madhyato no vājo devān haviṣā vardhayāti /  vājo hi mā sarvavīraṃ cakāra sarvā āśā vājapatir bhaveyam //
analyzed: vajaḥ purastāt uta madhyatas naḥ vājaḥ devān haviṣā vardhayāti   vājaḥ hi mā sarva vīram cakāra sarvāḥ āśāḥ vāja patiḥ bhaveyam

original: saṃ mā sṛjāmi payasā pṛthivyāḥ saṃ mā sṛjāmy adbhir oṣadhībhiḥ /  so 'haṃ vājam̐ saneyam agne //
analyzed: sam mā sṛjāmi payasā pṛthivyāḥ sam mā sṛjāmi adbhiḥ oṣadhībhiḥ    saḥ ham vājam saneyam agne

original: payaḥ pṛthivyāṃ paya oṣadhīṣu payo divy antarikṣe payo dhāḥ /  payasvatīḥ pradiśaḥ santu mahyam //
analyzed: payaḥ pṛthivyām payaḥ oṣadhīṣu payaḥ divi antarikṣe payaḥ dhāḥ   / payasvatīḥ pradiśaḥ santu mahyam

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām /  sarasvatyai vāco yantur yantreṇāgneḥ sāmrājyenābhi ṣiñcāmi //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām      sarasvatyai vācaḥ yantuḥ yantreṇa agneḥ sāmrājyena abhi siñcāmi

original: ṛtāṣāḍ ṛtadhāmāgnir gandharvas tasyauṣadhayo 'psaraso mudo nāma  /  sa na idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: ṛtāṣāh ṛta dhāmā agniḥ gandharvaḥ tasya oṣadhayaḥ psarasaḥ mudaḥ nāma     sa naḥ idam brahma kṣatram pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā

original: sam̐hito viśvasāmā sūryo gandharvas tasya marīcayo 'psarasa āyuvo  nāma /  sa na idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: samhitaḥ viśvasāmā sūryaḥ gandharvaḥ tasya marīcayaḥ psarasaḥ āyuvaḥ nāma    sa naḥ idam brahma kṣatram pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā

original: suṣumṇaḥ sūryaraśmiś candramā gandharvas tasya nakṣatrāṇy apsaraso  bhekurayo nāma /  sa na idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: suṣumṇaḥ sūrya raśmiḥ candramāḥ gandharvaḥ tasya nakṣatrāṇi apsarasaḥ bhekurayaḥ nāma    sa naḥ idam brahma kṣatram pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā

original: iṣiro viśvavyacā vāto gandharvas tasyapo apsarasa ūrjo nāma /  sa na idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: iṣiraḥ viśva vyacāḥ vātaḥ gandharvaḥ tasya apaḥ apsarasaḥ ūrjaḥ nāma    sa naḥ idam brahma kṣatram pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā

original: bhujyuḥ suparṇo yajño gandharvas tasya dakṣiṇā apsarasa stāvā  nāma /  sa na idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: bhujyuḥ suparṇaḥ yajñaḥ gandharvaḥ tasya dakṣiṇāḥ apsarasaḥ stāvāḥ nāma   sa naḥ idam brahma kṣatram pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā

original: prajāpatir viśvakarmā mano gandharvas tasya ṛksāmāny apsarasa  eṣṭayo nāma /  sa na idaṃ brahma kṣatraṃ pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ viśvakarmā manaḥ gandharvaḥ tasya ṛk sāmāni apsarasaḥ eṣṭayaḥ nāma    sa naḥ idam brahma kṣatram pātu tasmai svāhā vāṭ tābhyaḥ svāhā

original: sa no bhuvanasya pate prajāpate yasya ta upari gṛhā yasya veha /  asmai brahmaṇe 'smai kṣatrāya mahi śarma yaccha svāhā //
analyzed: sa naḥ bhuvanasya pate prajāpate yasya te upari gṛhāḥ yasya vā iha    asmai brahmaṇe smai kṣatrāya mahi śarma yaccha svāhā

original: samudro 'si nabhasvān ārdradānuḥ śambhūr mayobhūr abhi mā vāhi  svāhā /  māruto 'si marutāṃ gaṇaḥ śambhūr mayobhūr abhi mā vāhi svāhā /  avasyūr asi duvasvāñ chambhūr mayobhūr abhi mā vāhi svāhā //
analyzed: samudraḥ si nabhasvān ārdra dānuḥ śambhūḥ mayobhūḥ abhi mā vāhi svāhā   mārutaḥ si marutām gaṇaḥ śambhūḥ mayobhūḥ abhi mā vāhi svāhā   avasyuḥ asi duvasvān śambhūḥ mayobhūḥ abhi mā vāhi svāhā

original: yās te agne sūrye ruco divam ātanvanti raśmibhiḥ /  tābhir no adya sarvābhī ruce janāya nas kṛdhi //
analyzed: yāḥ te agne sūrye rucaḥ divam ātanvanti raśmibhiḥ   tābhiḥ naḥ adya sarvābhiḥ ruce janāya naḥ kṛdhi

original: yā vo devāḥ sūrye ruco goṣv aśveṣu yā rucaḥ /  indrāgnī tābhiḥ sarvābhī rucaṃ no dhatta bṛhaspate //
analyzed: yāḥ vaḥ devāḥ sūrye rucaḥ goṣu aśveṣu yāḥ rucaḥ  / indra agnī tābhiḥ sarvābhiḥ rucam naḥ dhatta bṛhaspate

original: rucaṃ no dhehi brāhmaṇeṣu rucam̐ rājasu nas kṛdhi /  rucaṃ viśyeṣu śūdreṣu mayi dhehi rucā rucam //
analyzed: rucam naḥ dhehi brāhmaṇeṣu rucam rājasu naḥ kṛdhi   rucam viśyeṣu śūdreṣu mayi dhehi rucā rucam

original: tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānas tad ā śāste yajamāno havirbhiḥ /  aheḍamāno varuṇeha bodhy uruśam̐sa mā na āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ //
analyzed: tat tvā yāmi brahmaṇā vandamānaḥ tat ā śāste yajamānaḥ havirbhiḥ    a heḍamānaḥ varuṇa iha bodhi uru śamsa mā naḥ āyuḥ pra moṣīḥ

original: svar ṇa gharmaḥ svāhā /  svar ṇārkaḥ svāhā /  svar ṇa śukraḥ svāhā /  svar ṇa jyotiḥ svāhā /  svar ṇa sūryaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: svar na gharmaḥ svāhā svar na arkaḥ svāhā   svar na śukraḥ svāhā svar na jyotiḥ svāhā svar na sūryaḥ svāhā

original: agniṃ yunajmi śavasā ghṛtena divyam̐ suparṇaṃ vayasā bṛhantam /  tena vayaṃ gamema bradhnasya viṣṭapam̐ svo ruhāṇā adhi nakam uttamam //
analyzed: agnim yunajmi śavasā ghṛtena divyam suparṇam vayasā bṛhantam    tena vayam gamema bradhnasya viṣṭapam svar ruhāṇāḥ adhi nakam uttamam

original: imau te pakṣāv ajarau patatriṇau yābhyām̐ rakṣām̐sy apaham̐sy agne /  tābhyāṃ patema sukṛtām u lokaṃ yatra ṛṣayo jagmuḥ prathamajāḥ  purāṇāḥ //
analyzed: imau te pakṣau ajarau patatriṇau yābhyām rakṣāmsi apahamsi agne    tābhyām patema su kṛtām u lokam yatra ṛṣayaḥ jagmuḥ prathama jāḥ purāṇāḥ

original: indur dakṣaḥ śyena ṛtāvā hiraṇyapakṣaḥ śakuno bhuraṇyuḥ /  mahānt sadhasthe dhruva ā niṣatto namas te astu mā mā him̐sīḥ //
analyzed: induḥ dakṣaḥ śyenaḥ ṛtāvā hiraṇya pakṣaḥ śakunaḥ bhuraṇyuḥ    mahān sadhasthe dhruve ā niṣattaḥ namaḥ te astu mā mā himsīḥ

original: divo mūrdhāsi pṛthivyā nābhir ūrg apām oṣadhīnām /  viśvāyuḥ śarma saprathā namas pathe //
analyzed: divaḥ mūrdhā asi pṛthivyāḥ nābhiḥ ūrj apām oṣadhīnām    viśvāyuḥ śarma saprathāḥ namaḥ pathe

original: viśvasya mūrdhann adhi tiṣṭhasi śritaḥ samudre te hṛdayam apsv  āyur apo dattodadhiṃ bhintta /  divas parjanyād antarikṣāt pṛthivyās tato no vṛṣṭyāva //
analyzed: viśvasya mūrdhan adhi tiṣṭhasi śritaḥ samudre te hṛdayam apsu āyuḥ apaḥ datta udadhim bhintta        parjanyāt antarikṣāt pṛthivyāḥ tatas naḥ vṛṣṭī ava

original: iṣṭo yajño bhṛgubhir āśīrdā vasubhiḥ /  tasya na iṣṭasya prītasya draviṇehā gameḥ //
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ yajñaḥ bhṛgubhiḥ āśīḥ dāḥ vasubhiḥ   tasya naḥ iṣṭasya prītasya draviṇā īhāḥ gameḥ

original: iṣṭo agnir āhutaḥ pipartu na iṣṭam̐ haviḥ /  svagedaṃ devebhyo namaḥ //
analyzed: iṣṭaḥ agniḥ āhutaḥ pipartu naḥ iṣṭam haviḥ    svagā idam devebhyaḥ namaḥ

original: yad ākūtāt samasusrod dhṛdo vā manaso vā sambhṛtaṃ cakṣuṣo vā /  tad anu preta sukṛtām u olkaṃ yatra ṛṣayo jagmuḥ prathamajāḥ  purāṇāḥ //
analyzed: yat ākūtāt samasusrot dhṛdaḥ vā manasaḥ vā sambhṛtam cakṣuṣaḥ vā    tat anu preta su kṛtām u ā ulkam yatra ṛṣayaḥ jagmuḥ prathama jāḥ purāṇāḥ

original: etam̐ sadhastha pari te dadāmi yam āvahāc chevadhiṃ jātavedāḥ /  anvāgantā yajñapatir vo atra tam̐ sma jānīta parame vyoman //
analyzed: etam sadhastha pari te dadāmi yam āvahāt śevadhim jātavedāḥ    anvāgantā yajñapatiḥ vaḥ atra tam sma jānīta parame vyoman

original: etaṃ jānātha parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthā vida rūpam asya /  yad āgacchāt pathibhir devayānair iṣṭāpūrte kṛṇavāthāvir asmai //
analyzed: etam jānātha parame vyoman devāḥ sadhasthāḥ vida rūpam asya    yat āgacchāt pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ iṣṭāpūrte kṛṇavātha āvis asmai

original: ud budhyasvāgne prati jāgṛhi tvam iṣṭāpūrte sam̐ sṛjethām ayaṃ ca /  asmint sadhasthe adhy uttarasmin visve devā yajamānāś ca sīdata //
analyzed: ud budhyasva agne prati jāgṛhi tvam iṣṭāpūrte sam sṛjethām ayam ca    asmin sadhasthe adhi uttarasmin visve devāḥ yajamānāḥ ca sīdata

original: yena vahasi sahasraṃ yenāgne sarvavedasam /  tenemaṃ yajñaṃ no naya svar deveṣu gantave //
analyzed: yena vahasi sahasram yena agne sarvavedasam     tena imam yajñam naḥ naya svar deveṣu gantave

original: prastareṇa paridhinā srucā vedyā ca barhiṣā /  ṛcemaṃ yajñaṃ no naya svar deveṣu gantave //
analyzed: prastareṇa paridhinā srucā vedyā ca barhiṣā    ṛcā imam yajñam naḥ naya svar deveṣu gantave

original: yad dattaṃ yat parādānaṃ yat pūrtaṃ yāś ca dakṣiṇāḥ /  tad agnir vaiśvakarmaṇaḥ svar deveṣu no dadhat //
analyzed: yat dattam yat parādānam yat pūrtam yāḥ ca dakṣiṇāḥ   tat agniḥ vaiśvakarmaṇaḥ svar deveṣu naḥ dadhat

original: yatra dhārā anapetā madhor ghṛtasya ca yāḥ /  tad agnir vaiśvakarmaṇaḥ svar deveṣu no dadhat //
analyzed: yatra dhārāḥ an apetāḥ madhoḥ ghṛtasya ca yāḥ      tat agniḥ vaiśvakarmaṇaḥ svar deveṣu naḥ dadhat

original: agnir asmi janmanā jātavedā ghṛtaṃ me cakṣur amṛtaṃ ma āsan /  arkas tridhātū rajaso vimāno 'jasro gharmo havir asmi nāma //
analyzed: agniḥ asmi janmanā jātavedāḥ ghṛtam me cakṣuḥ amṛtam me āsan   arkaḥ tri dhātuḥ rajasaḥ vimānaḥ jasraḥ gharmaḥ haviḥ asmi nāma

original: ṛco nāmāsmi yajūm̐ṣi nāmāsmi sāmāni nāmāsmi /  ye agnayaḥ prāñcajanyā asyāṃ pṛthivyām adhi /  teṣām asi tvam uttamaḥ pra no jīvatave suva //
analyzed: ṛcaḥ nāma asmi yajūmṣi nāma asmi sāmāni nāma asmi    ye agnayaḥ prāñcajanyāḥ asyām pṛthivyām adhi    teṣām asi tvam uttamaḥ pra naḥ jīvatave suva

original: vārtrahatyāya śavase pṛtanāṣāhyāya ca /  indra tvā vartayāmasi //
analyzed: vārtrahatyāya śavase pṛtanāṣāhyāya ca    indra tvā vartayāmasi

original: sahadānuṃ puruhūta kṣiyantam ahastam indra saṃ piṇak kuṇārum /  abhi vṛtraṃ vardhamānaṃ piyārum apādam indra tavasā jaghantha //
analyzed: saha dānum puruhūta kṣiyantam ahastam indra sam piṇak kuṇārum    abhi vṛtram vardhamānam piyārum a pādam indra tavasā jaghantha

original: vi na indra mṛdho jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ /  yo asmām̐ abhidāsaty adharaṃ gamayā tamaḥ //
analyzed: vi naḥ indra mṛdhaḥ jahi nīcā yaccha pṛtanyataḥ    yaḥ asmām abhidāsati adharam gamaya tamaḥ

original: mṛgo na bhīmaḥ kucaro giriṣṭhāḥ parāvata ā jaganthā parasyāḥ /  sṛkam̐ sam̐śāya pavim indra tigmaṃ vi śatrūn tāḍhi vi mṛdho nudasva //
analyzed: mṛgaḥ na bhīmaḥ kucaraḥ giriṣṭhāḥ parāvataḥ ā jagantha parasyāḥ  / sṛkam samśāya pavim indra tigmam vi śatrūn tāḍhi vi mṛdhaḥ nudasva

original: vaiśvānaro na ūtaya ā pra yātu parāvataḥ /  agnir naḥ suṣṭutīr upa //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ ūtaye ā pra yātu parāvataḥ   agniḥ naḥ suṣṭutīḥ upa

original: pṛṣṭo divi pṛṣṭo agniḥ pṛthivyāṃ pṛṣṭo viśvā oṣadhīr ā viveśa  /  vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭo agniḥ sa no divā sa riṣas pātu naktam //
analyzed: pṛṣṭaḥ divi pṛṣṭaḥ agniḥ pṛthivyām pṛṣṭaḥ viśvāḥ oṣadhīḥ ā viveśa     vaiśvānaraḥ sahasā pṛṣṭaḥ agniḥ sa naḥ divā sa riṣaḥ pātu naktam

original: aśyāma te kāmam agne tavotī aśyāma rayim̐ rayivaḥ suvīram /  aśyāma vājam abhi vājayanto 'śyāma dyumnam ajarājaraṃ te //
analyzed: aśyāma te kāmam agne tava ūtī aśyāma rayim rayivas su vīram   aśyāma vājam abhi vājayantaḥ śyāma dyumnam ajara ajaram te

original: vayaṃ te adya rarimā hi kāmam uttānahastā namasopasadya /  yajiṣṭhena manasā yakṣi devān asredhatā manmanā vipro agne //
analyzed: vayam te adya rarimā hi kāmam uttāna hastāḥ namasā upasadya   yajiṣṭhena manasā yakṣi devān a sredhatā manmanā vipraḥ agne

original: dhāmacchad agnir indro brahmā devo bṛhaspatiḥ /  sacetaso viśve devāyajñaṃ prāvantu naḥ śubhe //
analyzed: dhāmacchad agniḥ indraḥ brahmā devaḥ bṛhaspatiḥ    sacetasaḥ viśve devāyajñam prāvantu naḥ śubhe

original: tvaṃ yaviṣṭha dāśuṣo nṛm̐ḥ pāhi śṛṇudhī giraḥ /  rakṣā tokam uta tmanā //
analyzed: tvam yaviṣṭha dāśuṣaḥ pāhi śṛṇudhi giraḥ    rakṣa tokam uta tmanā

original: svādvīṃ tvā svādunā tīvrāṃ tīvreṇāmṛtām amṛtena /  madhumatīṃ madhumatā sṛjāmi sam̐ somena //
analyzed: svādvīm tvā svādunā tīvrām tīvreṇa amṛtām amṛtena    madhumatīm madhumatā sṛjāmi sam somena

original: somo 'si /  aśvibhyāṃ pacyasva /  sarasvatyai pacyasva /  indrāya sutrāmṇe pacyasva //
analyzed: somaḥ si  aśvibhyām pacyasva   sarasvatyai pacyasva   indrāya sutrāmṇe pacyasva

original: parīto ṣiñcatā sutam̐ somo ya uttamam̐ haviḥ /  dadhanvā yo naryo apsv antar ā suṣāva somam adribhiḥ //
analyzed: pari itas siñcata sutam somaḥ yaḥ uttamam haviḥ   dadhanvā yaḥ naryaḥ apsu antar ā suṣāva somam adribhiḥ

original: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅk somo atidrutaḥ /  indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā //
analyzed: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somaḥ atidrutaḥ indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā

original: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅk somo atidrutaḥ /  indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā //
analyzed: vāyoḥ pūtaḥ pavitreṇa pratyaṅ somaḥ atidrutaḥ indrasya yujyaḥ sakhā

original: punāti te parisrutam̐ somam̐ sūryasya duhitā /  vāreṇa śaśvatā tanā //
analyzed: punāti te parisrutam somam sūryasya duhitā    vāreṇa śaśvatā tanā

original: brahma kṣatraṃ pavate teja indriyam̐ surayā somaḥ suta āsuto madāya /  śukreṇa deva devatāḥ pipṛgdhi rasenānnaṃ yajamānāya dhehi //
analyzed: brahma kṣatram pavate tejaḥ indriyam surayā somaḥ sutaḥ āsutaḥ madāya    śukreṇa deva devatāḥ pipṛgdhi rasena annam yajamānāya dhehi

original: kuvid aṅga yavamanto vayaṃ cid yathā dānty anupūrvaṃ viyūya /  ihehaiṣāṃ kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣo namaktiṃ yajanti //
analyzed: kuvid aṅga yavamantaḥ vayam cit yathā dānti anupūrvam viyūya    iha iha eṣām kṛṇuhi bhojanāni ye barhiṣaḥ namaktim yajanti

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sy aśvibhyāṃ tvā sarasvatyai tvendrāya tvā sutrāmṇe //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si aśvibhyām tvā sarasvatyai tvā indrāya tvā su trāmṇe

original: eṣa te yonis tejase tvā vīryāya tvā balāya tvā //
analyzed: eṣa te yoniḥ tejase tvā vīryāya tvā balāya tvā

original: nānā hi vāṃ devahitam̐ sadas kṛtaṃ mā sam̐ sṛkṣāthāṃ parame vyoman  /  surā tvam asi śuṣmiṇī soma eṣa mā mā him̐sīḥ svāṃ yonim āviśantī //
analyzed: nānā hi vām deva hitam sadaḥ kṛtam mā sam sṛkṣāthām parame vyoman      surā tvam asi śuṣmiṇī somaḥ eṣa mā mā himsīḥ svām yonim āviśantī

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sy āśvinaṃ tejaḥ sārasvataṃ vīryam aindraṃ balam /  eṣa te yonir modāya tvānandāya tvā mahase tvā //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si āśvinam tejaḥ sārasvatam vīryam aindram balam     eṣa te yoniḥ modāya tvā ānandāya tvā mahase tvā

original: tejo 'si tejo mayi dhehi /  vīryam asi vīryaṃ mayi dhehi /  balam asi balaṃ mayi dhehi /  ojo 'sy ojo mayi dhehi /  manyur asi manyuṃ mayi dhehi /  saho 'si saho mayi dhehi //
analyzed: tejaḥ si tejaḥ mayi dhehi    vīryam asi vīryam mayi dhehi    balam asi balam mayi dhehi   ojaḥ si ojaḥ mayi dhehi    manyuḥ asi manyum mayi dhehi    sahaḥ si sahaḥ mayi dhehi

original: yā vyāghraṃ viṣūcikobhau vṛkaṃ ca rakṣati /  śyenaṃ patatriṇam̐ sim̐ham̐ semaṃ pātv am̐hasaḥ //
analyzed: yā vyāghram viṣūcikā ubhau vṛkam ca rakṣati śyenam patatriṇam simham sā imam pātu amhasaḥ

original: yad āpipeṣa mātaraṃ putraḥ pramudito dhayan /  etat tad agne anṛṇo bhavāmy ahatau pitarau mayā //
analyzed: yat āpipeṣa mātaram putraḥ pramuditaḥ dhayan    etat tat agne anṛṇaḥ bhavāmi a hatau pitarau mayā

original: sampṛca stha saṃ mā bhadreṇa pṛṅkta /  vipṛca stha vi mā pāpmanā pṛṅkta //
analyzed: sampṛcaḥ stha sam mā bhadreṇa pṛṅkta   vipṛcaḥ stha vi mā pāpmanā pṛṅkta

original: devā yajñam atanvata bheṣajaṃ bhiṣajāśvinā /  vācā sarasvatī bhiṣag indrāyendriyāṇi dadhataḥ //
analyzed: devāḥ yajñam atanvata bheṣajam bhiṣajā aśvinā    vācā sarasvatī bhiṣaj indrāya indriyāṇi dadhataḥ

original: dīkṣāyai rūpam̐ śaṣpāṇi prāyaṇīyasya tokmāni /  krayasya rūpam̐ somasya lājāḥ somām̐śavo madhu //
analyzed: dīkṣāyai rūpam śaṣpāṇi prāyaṇīyasya tokmāni   krayasya rūpam somasya lājāḥ madhu

original: ātithyarūpaṃ māsaraṃ mahāvīrasya nagnahuḥ /  rūpam upasadām etat tisro rātrīḥ surāsutā //
analyzed: ātithya rūpam māsaram mahāvīrasya nagnahuḥ   rūpam upasadām etat tisraḥ rātrīḥ surā sutā

original: somasya rūpa krītasya parisrut pari ṣicyate /  aśvibhyāṃ dudgdhaṃ bheṣajam indrāyaindram̐ sarasvatyā //
analyzed: somasya rūpa krītasya parisrut pari sicyate   aśvibhyām dudgdham bheṣajam indrāya aindram sarasvatyā

original: āsandī rūpam̐ rājāsandyai vedyai kumbhī surādhānī /  antara uttaravedyā rūpaṃ kārotaro bhiṣak //
analyzed: āsandī rūpam rāja āsandyai vedyai kumbhī surādhānī    antare uttaravedyāḥ rūpam kārotaraḥ bhiṣaj

original: vedyā vediḥ sam āpyate barhiṣā barhir indriyam /  yūpena yūpa āpyate praṇīto agnir agninā //
analyzed: vedyāḥ vediḥ sam āpyate barhiṣā barhiḥ indriyam    yūpena yūpaḥ āpyate praṇītaḥ agniḥ agninā

original: havirdhānaṃ yad aśvināgnīdhraṃ yat sarasvatī /  indrāyaindram̐ sadas kṛtaṃ patnīśālaṃ gārhapatyaḥ //
analyzed: havirdhānam yat aśvinā āgnīdhram yat sarasvatī indrāya aindram sadaḥ kṛtam patnīśālam gārhapatyaḥ

original: praiṣebhiḥ praiṣān āpnoty āprībhir āprīr yajñasya /  prayājebhir anuyājān vaṣaṭkārebhir āhutīḥ //
analyzed: praiṣebhiḥ praiṣān āpnoti āprībhiḥ āprīḥ yajñasya     prayājebhiḥ anuyājān vaṣaṭkārebhiḥ āhutīḥ

original: paśubhiḥ paśūn āpnoti puroḍāśair havīm̐ṣy ā /  chandobhiḥ sāmidhenīr yājyābhir vaṣaṭkārān //
analyzed: paśubhiḥ paśūn āpnoti puroḍāśaiḥ havīmṣi ā chandobhiḥ sāmidhenīḥ yājyābhiḥ vaṣaṭkārān

original: dhānāḥ karambhaḥ saktavaḥ parīvāpaḥ payo dadhi /  somasya rūpam̐ haviṣa āmikṣā vājinaṃ madhu //
analyzed: dhānāḥ karambhaḥ saktavaḥ parīvāpaḥ payaḥ dadhi      somasya rūpam haviṣaḥ āmikṣā vājinam madhu

original: dhānānām̐ rūpaṃ kuvalaṃ parīvāpasya godhūmāḥ /  saktūnām̐ rūpaṃ badaram upavākāḥ karambhasya //
analyzed: dhānānām rūpam kuvalam parīvāpasya godhūmāḥ    saktūnām rūpam badaram upavākāḥ karambhasya

original: payaso rūpaṃ yad yavā dadhno rūpaṃ karkandhūni /  saomasya rūpaṃ vājinam̐ saumyasya rūpam āmikṣā //
analyzed: payasaḥ rūpam yat yavāḥ dadhnaḥ rūpam karkandhūni saomasya rūpam vājinam saumyasya rūpam āmikṣā

original: ā śrāvayeti stotriyāḥ pratyāśrāvo anurūpaḥ /  yajeti dhayyārūpaṃ pragāthā yeyajāmahāḥ //
analyzed: ā śrāvaya iti stotriyāḥ pratyāśrāvaḥ anurūpaḥ   yaja iti dhayyā rūpam pragāthāḥ yeyajāmahāḥ

original: ardhaṛcair ukthānām̐ rūpaṃ padair āpnoti nividaḥ /  praṇavaiḥ śastrāṇām̐ rūpaṃ payasā soma āpyate //
analyzed: ardhaṛcaiḥ ukthānām rūpam padaiḥ āpnoti nividaḥ   praṇavaiḥ śastrāṇām rūpam payasā somaḥ āpyate

original: aśvibhyāṃ prātaḥsavanam indreṇaindraṃ mādhyandinam /  vaiśvadevam̐ sarasvatyā tṛtīyam āptam̐ savanam //
analyzed: aśvibhyām prātaḥsavanam indreṇa aindram mādhyandinam      vaiśvadevam sarasvatyā tṛtīyam āptam savanam

original: vāyavyair vāyavyān āpnoti satena droṇakalaśam /  kumbhībhyām ambhṛṇau sute sthālībhi sthālīr āpnoti //
analyzed: vāyavyaiḥ vāyavyān āpnoti satena droṇakalaśam kumbhībhyām ambhṛṇau sute sthālībhiḥ sthālīḥ āpnoti

original: yajurvhir āpyante grahā grahai stomāś ca viṣṭutīḥ /  chandobhir ukthāśastrāṇi sāmnāvabhṛtha āpyate //
analyzed: yajurvhiḥ āpyante grahāḥ grahaiḥ stomāḥ ca viṣṭutīḥ chandobhiḥ ukthā śastrāṇi sāmnā avabhṛthaḥ āpyate

original: iḍābhir bhakṣān āpnoti sūktavākenāśiṣaḥ /  śamyunā patnīsaṃyājānt samiṣṭayajuṣā sam̐sthām //
analyzed: iḍābhiḥ bhakṣān āpnoti sūktavākena āśiṣaḥ    śamyunā patnīsaṃyājān samiṣṭa yajuṣā samsthām

original: vratena dīkṣām āpnoti dīkṣayāpnoti dakṣiṇām /  dakṣiṇā śraddhām āpnoti śraddhayā satyam āpyate //
analyzed: vratena dīkṣām āpnoti dīkṣayā āpnoti dakṣiṇām    dakṣiṇā śraddhām āpnoti śraddhayā satyam āpyate

original: etāvad rūpaṃ yajñasya yad devair brahmaṇā kṛtam /  tad etat sarvam āpnoti yajñe sautrāmaṇī sute //
analyzed: etāvat rūpam yajñasya yat devaiḥ brahmaṇā kṛtam   tat etat sarvam āpnoti yajñe sautrāmaṇī sute

original: surāvantaṃ barhiṣadam̐ suvīraṃ yajñam̐ hinvanti mahiṣā namobhiḥ /  dadhānāḥ somaṃ divi devatāsu mademendraṃ yajamānāḥ svarkāḥ //
analyzed: surāvantam barhiṣadam su vīram yajñam hinvanti mahiṣāḥ namobhiḥ    dadhānāḥ somam divi devatāsu madema indram yajamānāḥ su arkāḥ

original: yas te rasaḥ sambhṛta oṣadhīṣu somasya śuṣmaḥ surayā sutasya /  tena jinva yajamānaṃ madena sarasvatīm aśvināv indram agnim //
analyzed: yaḥ te rasaḥ sambhṛtaḥ oṣadhīṣu somasya śuṣmaḥ surayā sutasya    tena jinva yajamānam madena sarasvatīm aśvinau indram agnim

original: yam aśvinā namucer āsurād adhi sarasvaty asunod indriyāya /  imaṃ tam̐ śukraṃ madhumantam indum̐ somam̐ rājānam iha bhakṣayāmi //
analyzed: yam aśvinā namuceḥ āsurāt adhi sarasvatī asunot indriyāya    imam tam śukram madhumantam indum somam rājānam iha bhakṣayāmi

original: yad atra riptam̐ rasinaḥ sutasya yad indro apibac chacībhiḥ /  ahaṃ tad asya manasā śivena somam̐ rājānam iha bhakṣayāmi //
analyzed: yat atra riptam rasinaḥ sutasya yat indraḥ apibat śacībhiḥ    aham tat asya manasā śivena somam rājānam iha bhakṣayāmi

original: pitṛbhyaḥ svadhāyibhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ /  pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhāyibhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ /  prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhāyibhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ /  akṣan pitaraḥ /  amīmadanta pitaraḥ /  atītṛpanta pitaraḥ /  pitaraḥ śundhadhvam //
analyzed: pitṛbhyaḥ svadhāyibhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ   pitāmahebhyaḥ svadhāyibhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ   prapitāmahebhyaḥ svadhāyibhyaḥ svadhā namaḥ   akṣan pitaraḥ   amīmadanta pitaraḥ    atītṛpanta pitaraḥ    pitaraḥ śundhadhvam

original: punantu mā pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ punantu mā pitāmahāḥ /  punantu prapitāmahāḥ pavitreṇa śatāyuṣā //
analyzed: punantu mā pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ punantu mā pitāmahāḥ   punantu prapitāmahāḥ pavitreṇa śata āyuṣā

original: punantu mā pitāmahāḥ somyāsaḥ punantu prapitāmahāḥ /  pavitreṇa śatāyuṣā viśvam āyur vy aśnavai //
analyzed: punantu mā pitāmahāḥ somyāsaḥ punantu prapitāmahāḥ   pavitreṇa śata āyuṣā viśvam āyuḥ vi aśnavai

original: agna āyūm̐ṣi pavasva ā suvorjam iṣaṃ ca naḥ /  āre bādhasva ducchunām //
analyzed: agne āyūmṣi pavasva ā suva ūrjam iṣam ca naḥ        bādhasva ducchunām

original: punantu mā devajanāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ /  punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ punīhi mā //
analyzed: punantu mā deva janāḥ punantu manasā dhiyaḥ   punantu viśvā bhūtāni jātavedaḥ punīhi mā

original: pavitreṇa punīhi mā śukreṇa deva dīdyat /  agne kratvā kratūm̐r anu //
analyzed: pavitreṇa punīhi mā śukreṇa deva dīdyat     agne kratvā kratūmr anu

original: yat te pavitram arciṣy agne vitatam antarā /  brahma tena punātu mā //
analyzed: yat te pavitram arciṣi agne vitatam antarā    brahma tena punātu mā

original: pavamānaḥ so adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ /  yaḥ potā sa punātu mā //
analyzed: pavamānaḥ saḥ adya naḥ pavitreṇa vicarṣaṇiḥ   yaḥ potā sa punātu mā

original: ubhābhyāṃ deva savitaḥ pavitreṇa savena ca /  māṃ punīhi viśvataḥ //
analyzed: ubhābhyām deva savitar pavitreṇa savena ca    mām punīhi viśvatas

original: vaiśvadevī punatī devy āgād yasyām imā bahvyas tanvo  vītapṛṣṭhāḥ /  tayā madantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayam̐ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: vaiśvadevī punatī devī āgāt yasyām imāḥ bahvyaḥ tanvaḥ vīta pṛṣṭhāḥ   tayā madantaḥ sadhamādeṣu vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaro yamarājye /  teṣāṃ lokaḥ svadhā namo yajño deveṣu kalpatām //
analyzed: ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ pitaraḥ yama rājye   teṣām lokaḥ svadhā namaḥ yajñaḥ deveṣu kalpatām

original: ye samānāḥ samanaso jīvā jīveṣu māmakāḥ /  teṣām̐ śrīr mayi kalpatām asmiṃ loke satam̐ samāḥ //
analyzed: ye samānāḥ samanasaḥ jīvāḥ jīveṣu māmakāḥ    teṣām śrīḥ mayi kalpatām asmin loke satam samāḥ

original: dve sṛtī aśṛnavaṃ pitṝṇām ahaṃ devānām uta martyānām /  tābhyām idaṃ viśvam ejat sam eti yad antarā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca //
analyzed: dve sṛtī aśṛnavam pitṝṇām aham devānām uta martyānām    tābhyām idam viśvam ejat sam eti yat antarā pitaram mātaram ca

original: idam̐ haviḥ prajananaṃ me astu daśavīram̐ sarvagaṇam̐ svastaye /  ātmasani prajāsani paśusani lokasany abhayasani /  agniḥ prajāṃ bahulāṃ me karotv annaṃ payo reto asmāsu dhatta //
analyzed: idam haviḥ prajananam me astu daśa vīram sarva gaṇam svastaye    ātma sani prajā sani paśu sani loka sani abhaya sani    agniḥ prajām bahulām me karotu annam payaḥ retaḥ asmāsu dhatta

original: ud īratām avara ut parāsa un madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ /  asuṃ ya īyur avṛkā ṛtajñās te no 'vantu pitaro haveṣu //
analyzed: ud īratām avare ud parāsaḥ ud madhyamāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ   asum ye īyuḥ avṛkāḥ ṛta jñāḥ te naḥ vantu pitaraḥ haveṣu

original: aṅgiraso naḥ pitaro navagvā atharvāṇo bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ /  teṣāṃ vayam̐ sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma //
analyzed: aṅgirasaḥ naḥ pitaraḥ navagvāḥ atharvāṇaḥ bhṛgavaḥ somyāsaḥ    teṣām vayam sumatau yajñiyānām api bhadre saumanase syāma

original: ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāso 'nūhire somapīthaṃ vasiṣṭhāḥ /  tebhir yamaḥ sam̐rarāṇo havīm̐ṣy uśann uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu //
analyzed: ye naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ nūhire soma pītham vasiṣṭhāḥ    tebhiḥ yamaḥ samrarāṇaḥ havīmṣī uśan uśadbhiḥ pratikāmam attu

original: tvam̐ soma pra cikito manīṣā tvam̐ rajiṣṭham anu neṣi panthām /  tava praṇītī pitaro na indo deveṣu ratnam abhajanta dhīrāḥ //
analyzed: tvam soma pra cikitaḥ manīṣā tvam rajiṣṭham anu neṣi panthām     tava praṇītī pitaraḥ naḥ indo deveṣu ratnam abhajanta dhīrāḥ

original: tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ /  vanvann avātaḥ paridhīm̐r aporṇu vīrebhir aśvair maghavā bhavā naḥ //
analyzed: tvayā hi naḥ pitaraḥ soma pūrve karmāṇi cakruḥ pavamāna dhīrāḥ   vanvan a vātaḥ paridhīmr aporṇu vīrebhiḥ aśvaiḥ maghavā bhava naḥ

original: tvam̐ soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidāno 'nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha /  tasmai ta indo haviṣā vidhema vayam̐ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: tvam soma pitṛbhiḥ saṃvidānaḥ nu dyāvāpṛthivī ā tatantha  / tasmai te indo haviṣā vidhema vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: barhiṣadaḥ pitara ūty arvāg imā vo havyā cakṛmā juṣadhvam /  ta ā gatāvasā śaṃtamenāthā naḥ śaṃ yor arapo dadhāta //
analyzed: barhiṣadaḥ pitaraḥ ūtī arvāk imā vaḥ havyā cakṛma juṣadhvam    te ā gata avasā śaṃtamena athā naḥ śam yos arapaḥ dadhāta

original: āhaṃ pitṛn suvidatrām̐ avitsi napātaṃ ca vikramaṇaṃ ca viṣṇoḥ /  barhiṣado ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvas ta ihāgamiṣṭhāḥ //
analyzed: ā aham pitṛn suvidatrām avitsi napātam ca vikramaṇam ca viṣṇoḥ      barhiṣadaḥ ye svadhayā sutasya bhajanta pitvaḥ te iha āgamiṣṭhāḥ

original: upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāso barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu /  ta ā gamantu ta iha śruvantv adhi bruvantu te 'vantv asmān //
analyzed: upahūtāḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ barhiṣyeṣu nidhiṣu priyeṣu   te ā gamantu te iha śruvantu adhi bruvantu te vantu asmān

original: ā yantu naḥ pitaraḥ somyāso 'gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhir devayānaiḥ /  asmin yajñe svadhayā madanto 'dhi bruvantu te 'vantv asmān //
analyzed: ā yantu naḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ gniṣvāttāḥ pathibhiḥ deva yānaiḥ    asmin yajñe svadhayā madantaḥ dhi bruvantu te vantu asmān

original: agniṣvāttāḥ pitara eha gacchata sadaḥ-sadaḥ sadata supraṇītayaḥ /  attā havīm̐ṣi prayatāni barhiṣy athā rayim̐ sarvavīraṃ dadhātana //
analyzed: agniṣvāttāḥ pitaraḥ ā iha gacchata sadaḥ sadaḥ sadata su praṇītayaḥ   attā havīmṣi prayatāni barhiṣi athā rayim sarva vīram dadhātana

original: ye agniṣvāttā ye anagniṣvāttā madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante /  tebhyaḥ svarāḍ asunītim etāṃ yathāvaśaṃ tanvaṃ kalpayāti //
analyzed: ye agniṣvāttāḥ ye an agniṣvāttāḥ madhye divaḥ svadhayā mādayante     tebhyaḥ svarāj asu nītim etām yathāvaśam tanvam kalpayāti

original: agniṣvāttām̐ ṛtumato havāmahe nārāśam̐se somapīthaṃ ya āśuḥ /  te no viprāsaḥ suhavā bhavantu vayam̐ syāma patayo rayīṇām //
analyzed: agniṣvāttām ṛtumataḥ havāmahe nārāśamse soma pītham ye āśuḥ   te naḥ viprāsaḥ su havāḥ bhavantu vayam syāma patayaḥ rayīṇām

original: ācyā jānu dakṣiṇato niṣadyemaṃ yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve /  mā him̐siṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cin no yad va āgaḥ puruṣatā karāma //
analyzed: ācya jānu dakṣiṇatas niṣadya imam yajñam abhi gṛṇīta viśve   mā himsiṣṭa pitaraḥ kena cit naḥ yat vaḥ āgaḥ puruṣa tā karāma

original: āsīnāso aruṇīnām upasthe rayiṃ dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya /  putrebhyaḥ pitaras tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata ta ihorjaṃ dadhāta //
analyzed: āsīnāsaḥ aruṇīnām upasthe rayim dhatta dāśuṣe martyāya    putrebhyaḥ pitaraḥ tasya vasvaḥ pra yacchata te iha ūrjam dadhāta

original: yam agne kavyavāhana tvaṃ cin manyase rayim /  taṃ no gīrbhiḥ śravāyyaṃ devatrā panayā yujam //
analyzed: yam agne kavya vāhana tvam cit manyase rayim   tam naḥ gīrbhiḥ śravāyyam devatrā panaya yujam

original: yo agniḥ kavyavāhanaḥ pitṛn yakṣad ṛtāvṛdhaḥ /  pred u havyāni vocati devebhyaś ca pitṛbhya ā //
analyzed: yaḥ agniḥ kavya vāhanaḥ pitṛn yakṣat ṛtāvṛdhaḥ   pra id u havyāni vocati devebhyaḥ ca pitṛbhyaḥ ā

original: tvam agna īḍitaḥ kavyavāhanāvāḍ ḍhavyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvī /  prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣann addhi tvaṃ deva prayatā havīm̐ṣi //
analyzed: tvam agne īḍitaḥ kavya vāha nāvāṭ havyāni surabhīṇi kṛtvī prādāḥ pitṛbhyaḥ svadhayā te akṣan addhi tvam deva prayatā

original: ye ceha pitaro ye ca neha yām̐ś ca vidma yām̐ u ca na pravidma /  tvaṃ vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhir yajñam̐ sukṛtaṃ juṣasva //
analyzed: ye ca iha pitaraḥ ye ca na iha yām ca vidma yām u ca na pravidma    tvam vettha yati te jātavedaḥ svadhābhiḥ yajñam su kṛtam juṣasva

original: idaṃ pitṛbhyo namo astv adya ye pūrvāso ya uparāsa īyuḥ /  ye pārthive rajasy ā niṣattā ye vā nūnam̐ suvṛjanāsu vikṣu //
analyzed: idam pitṛbhyaḥ namaḥ astu adya ye pūrvāsaḥ ye uparāsaḥ īyuḥ   ye pārthive rajasi ā niṣattāḥ ye vā nūnam su vṛjanāsu vikṣu

original: adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāso agna ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ /  śucīd ayan dīdhitim ukthaśāsaḥ kṣāmā bhindanto aruṇīr apa vran //
analyzed: adhā yathā naḥ pitaraḥ parāsaḥ pratnāsaḥ agne ṛtam āśuṣāṇāḥ   śucī id ayan dīdhitim uktha śāsaḥ kṣāmā bhindantaḥ aruṇīḥ apa vran

original: uśantas tvā ni dhīmahy uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi /  uśann uśata ā vaha pitṛn haviṣe attave //
analyzed: uśantaḥ tvā ni dhīmahi uśantaḥ sam idhīmahi    uśan uśataḥ ā vaha pitṛn haviṣe attave

original: apāṃ phenena namuceḥ śira indrod avartayaḥ /  viśvā yad ajaya spṛdhaḥ //
analyzed: apām phenena namuceḥ śiraḥ indra ud avartayaḥ    viśvāḥ yat ajayaḥ spṛdhaḥ

original: somo rājāmṛtam̐ suta ṛjīṣeṇājahān mṛtyum /  ṛtena satyam indriyaṃ vipānam̐ śukram andhasa indrasyendriyam idaṃ payo  'mṛtaṃ madhu //
analyzed: somaḥ rājā amṛtam sutaḥ ṛjīṣeṇa ajahāt mṛtyum   ṛtena satyam indriyam vipānam śukram andhasaḥ indrasya indriyam idam payaḥ mṛtam madhu

original: adbhyaḥ kṣīraṃ vy apibat kruṅṅ āṅgiraso dhiyā /  ṛtena satyam indriyaṃ vipānam̐ śukram andhasa indrasyendriyam idaṃ payo  'mṛtaṃ madhu //
analyzed: adbhyaḥ kṣīram vi apibat kruñc āṅgirasaḥ dhiyā     ṛtena satyam indriyam vipānam śukram andhasaḥ indrasya indriyam idam payaḥ mṛtam madhu

original: somam adbhyo vy apibac chandasā ham̐saḥ śuciṣat /  ṛtena satyam indriyaṃ vipānam̐ śukram andhasa indrasyendriyam idaṃ payo  'mṛtaṃ madhu //
analyzed: somam adbhyaḥ vi apibat chandasā hamsaḥ śuciṣad     ṛtena satyam indriyam vipānam śukram andhasaḥ indrasya indriyam idam payaḥ mṛtam madhu

original: annāt parisruto rasaṃ brahmaṇā vy apibat kṣatraṃ payaḥ somaṃ  prajāpatiḥ /  ṛtena satyam indriyaṃ vipānam̐ śukram andhasa indrasyendriyam idaṃ payo  'mṛtaṃ madhu //
analyzed: annāt parisrutaḥ rasam brahmaṇā vi apibat kṣatram payaḥ somam prajāpatiḥ    ṛtena satyam indriyam vipānam śukram andhasaḥ indrasya indriyam idam payaḥ mṛtam madhu

original: reto mūtraṃ vi jahāti yoniṃ praviśad rayim /  garbho jarāyuṇāvṛta ulvaṃ jahāti janmanā //
analyzed: retaḥ mūtram vi jahāti yonim praviśat rayim   garbhaḥ jarāyuṇā āvṛtaḥ ulvam jahāti janmanā

original: ṛtena satyam indriyaṃ vipānam̐ śukram andhasa indrasyendriyam idaṃ payo  'mṛtaṃ madhu //
analyzed: ṛtena satyam indriyam vipānam śukram andhasaḥ indrasya indriyam idam payaḥ mṛtam madhu

original: dṛṣṭvā rūpe vyākarot satyānṛte prajāpatiḥ /  aśraddhām anṛte 'dadhāc chraddhām̐ satye prajāpatiḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā rūpe vyākarot satya anṛte prajāpatiḥ   aśraddhām anṛte dadhāt śraddhām satye prajāpatiḥ

original: ṛtena satyam indriyaṃ vipānam̐ śukram andhasa indrasyendriyam idaṃ payo  'mṛtaṃ madhu //
analyzed: ṛtena satyam indriyam vipānam śukram andhasaḥ indrasya indriyam idam payaḥ mṛtam madhu

original: vedena rūpe vy apibat sutāsutau prajāpatiḥ //
analyzed: vedena rūpe vi apibat suta a sutau prajāpatiḥ

original: ṛtena satyam indriyaṃ vipānam̐ śukram andhasa indrasyendriyam idaṃ payo  'mṛtaṃ madhu //
analyzed: ṛtena satyam indriyam vipānam śukram andhasaḥ indrasya indriyam idam payaḥ mṛtam madhu

original: dṛṣṭvā parisruto rasam̐ śukreṇa śukraṃ vy apibat /  payaḥ somaṃ prajāpatiḥ //
analyzed: dṛṣṭvā parisrutaḥ rasam śukreṇa śukram vi apibat    payaḥ somam prajāpatiḥ

original: ṛtena satyam indriyaṃ vipānam̐ śukram andhasa indrasyendriyam idaṃ payo  'mṛtaṃ madhu //
analyzed: ṛtena satyam indriyam vipānam śukram andhasaḥ indrasya indriyam idam payaḥ mṛtam madhu

original: sīsena tantraṃ manasā manīṣiṇā ūrṇāsūtreṇa kavayo vayanti /  aśvinā yajñam̐ savitā sarasvatīndrasya rūpaṃ varuṇo bhiṣajyan //
analyzed: sīsena tantram manasā manīṣiṇaḥ ūrṇā sūtreṇa kavayaḥ vayanti    aśvinā yajñam savitā sarasvatī indrasya rūpam varuṇaḥ bhiṣajyan

original: tad asya rūpam amṛtam̐ śacībhis tasro dadhur devatāḥ sam̐rarāṇāḥ /  lomāni śaṣpair bahudhā na tokmabhis tvag asya mām̐sam abhavan na lājāḥ //
analyzed: tat asya rūpam amṛtam śacībhiḥ tasraḥ dadhuḥ devatāḥ samrarāṇāḥ    lomāni śaṣpaiḥ bahudhā na tokmabhiḥ tvac asya māmsam abhavat na lājāḥ

original: tad aśvinā bhiṣajā rudravartanī sarasvatī vayati peśo antaram /  asthi majjānaṃ māsaraiḥ kārotareṇa dadhato gavāṃ tvaci //
analyzed: tat aśvinā bhiṣajā rudravartanī sarasvatī vayati peśaḥ antaram   asthi majjānam māsaraiḥ kārotareṇa dadhataḥ gavām tvaci

original: sarasvatī manasā peśalaṃ vasu nāsatyābhyāṃ vayati darśataṃ vapuḥ /  rasaṃ parisrutā na rohitaṃ nagnahur dhīras tasaraṃ na vema //
analyzed: sarasvatī manasā peśalam vasu nāsatyābhyām vayati darśatam vapuḥ    rasam parisrutā na rohitam nagnahuḥ dhīraḥ tasaram na vema

original: payasā śukram amṛtaṃ janitram̐ surayā mūtrāj janayanta retaḥ /  apāmatiṃ durmatiṃ bādhamānā ūvadhyaṃ vātam̐ sabvaṃ tad ārāt //
analyzed: payasā śukram amṛtam janitram surayā mūtrāt janayanta retaḥ    apa amatim durmatim bādhamānāḥ ūvadhyam vātam sabvam tat ārāt

original: indraḥ sutrāmā hṛdayeṇa satyaṃ puroḍāśena savitā jajāna /  yakṛt klomānaṃ varuṇo bhiṣajyan matasne vāyavyair na mināti pittam //
analyzed: indraḥ sutrāmā hṛdayeṇa satyam puroḍāśena savitā jajāna   yakṛt klomānam varuṇaḥ bhiṣajyat matasne vāyavyaiḥ na mināti pittam

original: āntrāṇi sthālīr madhu pinvamānā gudāḥ pātrāṇi sudughā na dhenuḥ /  śyenasya patraṃ na plīhā śacībhir āsandī nābhir udaraṃ na mātā //
analyzed: āntrāṇi sthālīḥ madhu pinvamānāḥ gudāḥ pātrāṇi sudughā na dhenuḥ    śyenasya patram na plīhā śacībhiḥ āsandī nābhiḥ udaram na mātā

original: kumbho vaniṣṭhur janitā śacībhie yasminn agre yonyāṃ garbho antaḥ /  plāśir vyaktaḥ śatadhāra utso duhe na kumbhī svadhāṃ pitṛbhyaḥ //
analyzed: kumbhaḥ vaniṣṭhuḥ janitā śacībhiḥ yasmin agre yonyām garbhaḥ antar   plāśiḥ vyaktaḥ śata dhāraḥ utsaḥ duhe na kumbhī svadhām pitṛbhyaḥ

original: mukham̐ sad asya śira it satena jihvā pavitram aśvināsant sarasvatī  /  capyaṃ na pāyur bhiṣag asya vālo vastir na śepo harasā tarasvī //
analyzed: mukham sat asya śiraḥ id satena jihvā pavitram aśvinā āsan sarasvatī      capyam na pāyuḥ bhiṣaj asya vālaḥ vastiḥ na śepaḥ harasā tarasvī

original: aśvibhyāṃ cakṣur amṛtaṃ grahābhyāṃ chāgena tejo haviṣā śṛtena /  pakṣmāṇi godhūmaiḥ kuvalair utāni peśo na śukram asitaṃ vasāte //
analyzed: aśvibhyām cakṣuḥ amṛtam grahābhyām chāgena tejaḥ haviṣā śṛtena    pakṣmāṇi godhūmaiḥ kuvalaiḥ utāni peśaḥ na śukram asitam vasāte

original: avir na meṣo nasi vīryāya prāṇasya panth amṛto grahābhyām /  sarasvaty upavākair vyānaṃ nasyāni barhir badarair jajāna //
analyzed: aviḥ na meṣaḥ nasi vīryāya prāṇasya panth amṛtaḥ grahābhyām     sarasvatī upavākaiḥ vyānam nasyāni barhiḥ badaraiḥ jajāna

original: indrasya rūpaṃ vṛṣabho balāya karṇābhyām̐ śrotram amṛtaṃ  grahābhyāṃ /  yavā na barir bhruvi kesarāṇi karkandhu jajñe madhu sāraghaṃ mukhāt //
analyzed: indrasya rūpam vṛṣabhaḥ balāya karṇābhyām śrotram amṛtam grahābhyām    yavāḥ na bariḥ bhruvi kesarāṇi karkandhu jajñe madhu sāragham mukhāt

original: ātmann upasthe na vṛkasya loma mukhe śmaśrūṇi na vyāghraloma /  keśā na śīrṣan yaśase śriyai śikhā sim̐hasya loma tviṣir indriyāṇi //
analyzed: ātman upasthe na vṛkasya loma mukhe śmaśrūṇi na vyāghra loma    keśāḥ na śīrṣan yaśase śriyai śikhā simhasya loma tviṣiḥ indriyāṇi

original: aṅgāny ātman bhiṣajā tad aśvinātmānam aṅgaiḥ sam adhāt sarasvatī /  indrasya rūpam̐ śatamānam āyuś candreṇa jyotir amṛtaṃ dadhānāḥ //
analyzed: aṅgāni ātman bhiṣajā tat aśvinā ātmānam aṅgaiḥ sam adhāt sarasvatī    indrasya rūpam śata mānam āyuḥ candreṇa jyotiḥ amṛtam dadhānāḥ

original: sarasvatī yonyāṃ garbham antar aśvibhyāṃ patnī sukṛtaṃ bibharti /  apām̐ rasena varuṇo na sāmnendram̐ śriyai janayann apsu rājā //
analyzed: sarasvatī yonyām garbham antar aśvibhyām patnī su kṛtam bibharti    apām rasena varuṇaḥ na sāmnā indram śriyai janayan apsu rājā

original: tejaḥ paśūnām̐ havir indriyāvat parisrutā payasā sāraghaṃ madhu /  aśvibhyāṃ dugdhaṃ bhiṣajā sarasvatyā sutāsutābhyām amṛtaḥ soma induḥ //
analyzed: tejaḥ paśūnām haviḥ indriyāvat parisrutā payasā sāragham madhu    aśvibhyām dugdham bhiṣajā sarasvatyā sutā sutābhyām amṛtaḥ somaḥ induḥ

original: kṣatrasya yonir asi kṣatrasya nābhir asi /  mā tvā him̐sīn mā mā him̐sīḥ //
analyzed: kṣatrasya yoniḥ asi kṣatrasya nābhiḥ asi    mā tvā himsīt mā mā himsīḥ

original: ni ṣasāda ghṛtavrato varuṇaḥ pastyāsv ā /  sāmrājyāya sukratuḥ //
analyzed: ni ṣasāda ghṛta vrataḥ varuṇaḥ pastyāsu ā sāmrājyāya su kratuḥ

original: mṛtyoḥ pāhi /  vidyot pāhi //
analyzed: mṛtyoḥ pāhi vidyoḥ pāhi

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām /  aśvinor bhaiṣajyena tejase brahmavarcasāyābhi ṣiñcāmi /  sarasvatyai bhaiṣajyena vīryāyānnādyāyābhi ṣiñcāmi /  indrasyendriyeṇa balāya śriyai yaśase 'bhi ṣiñcāmi //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām    aśvinoḥ bhaiṣajyena tejase brahmavarcasāya abhi siñcāmi    sarasvatyai bhaiṣajyena vīryāya annādyāya abhi siñcāmi     indrasya indriyeṇa balāya śriyai yaśase bhi siñcāmi

original: ko 'si katamo 'si kasmai tvā kāya tvā /  suśloka sumaṅgala satyarājan //
analyzed: kaḥ si katamaḥ si kasmai tvā kāya tvā su śloka su maṅgala satya rājan

original: śiro me śrīr yaśo mukhaṃ tviṣiḥ keśāś ca śmaśrūṇi /  rājā me prāṇo amṛtam̐ samrāṭ cakṣur virāṭ śrotram //
analyzed: śiraḥ me śrīḥ yaśaḥ mukham tviṣiḥ keśāḥ ca śmaśrūṇi    rājā me prāṇaḥ amṛtam samrāj cakṣuḥ virāj śrotram

original: jihvā me bhadraṃ vāṅ maho mano manyuḥ svarāḍ bhāmaḥ /  modāḥ pramodā aṅgulīr aṅgāni mitraṃ me sahaḥ //
analyzed: jihvā me bhadram vāc mahaḥ manaḥ manyuḥ svarāj bhāmaḥ    modāḥ pramodāḥ aṅgulīḥ aṅgāni mitram me sahaḥ

original: bāhū me balam indriyam̐ hastau me karma vīryam /  ātmā kṣatram uro mama //
analyzed: bāhū me balam indriyam hastau me karma vīryam   ātmā kṣatram uraḥ mama

original: pṛṣṭīr me rāṣṭram udaram am̐sau grīvāś ca śroṇī /  ūrū aratnī jānunī viśo me 'ṅgāni sarvataḥ //
analyzed: pṛṣṭīḥ me rāṣṭram udaram amsau grīvāḥ ca śroṇī   ūrū aratnī jānunī viśaḥ me ṅgāni sarvatas

original: nābhir me cittaṃ vijñānaṃ pāyur me 'pacitir bhasat /  ānandanandāv āṇḍau me bhagaḥ saubhāgyaṃ pasaḥ /  jaṅghābhyāṃ pādbhyāṃ dharmo 'smi viśi rājā pratiṣṭhitaḥ //
analyzed: nābhiḥ me cittam vijñānam pāyuḥ me pacitiḥ bhasad     ānanda nandau āṇḍau me bhagaḥ saubhāgyam pasaḥ   jaṅghābhyām pādbhyām smi viśi rājā pratiṣṭhitaḥ

original: prati kṣatre prati tiṣṭhāmi rāṣṭre praty aśveṣu prati tiṣṭhāmi goṣu  /  praty aṅgeṣu prati tiṣṭhāmy ātman prati prāṇeṣu kṣatre prati tiṣṭhāmi  puṣṭe prati dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ prati tiṣṭhāmi //
analyzed: prati kṣatre prati tiṣṭhāmi rāṣṭre prati aśveṣu prati tiṣṭhāmi goṣu    prati aṅgeṣu prati tiṣṭhāmi ātman prati prāṇeṣu kṣatre prati tiṣṭhāmi puṣṭe prati dyāvāpṛthivyoḥ prati tiṣṭhāmi

original: trayā devā ekādaśa trayastrim̐śāḥ surādhasaḥ /  bṛhaspatipurohitā devasya savituḥ save /  devā devair avantu mā //
analyzed: trayāḥ devāḥ ekādaśa trayastrimśāḥ su rādhasaḥ    bṛhaspati purohitāḥ devasya savituḥ save    devāḥ devaiḥ avantu mā

original: prathamā dvitīyair dvitīyās tṛtīyais tṛtīyāḥ satyena satyaṃ  yajñena yajño yajurbhir yajūm̐ṣi sāmabhiḥ sāmāny ṛgbhir ṛcaḥ  puro'nuvākyābhiḥ puro'nuvākyā yājyābhir yājyā vaṣaṭkārair vaṣaṭkārā  āhutibhir ahutayo me kāmānt sam ardhayantu bhūḥ svāhā //
analyzed: prathamāḥ dvitīyaiḥ dvitīyāḥ tṛtīyaiḥ tṛtīyāḥ satyena satyam yajñena yajñaḥ yajurbhiḥ yajūmṣi sāmabhiḥ sāmāni ṛgbhiḥ ṛcaḥ puronuvākyābhiḥ puronuvākyāḥ yājyābhiḥ yājyāḥ vaṣaṭkāraiḥ vaṣaṭkārāḥ āhutibhiḥ ahutayaḥ me kāmān sam ardhayantu bhūḥ svāhā

original: lomāni prayatir mama tvaṅ ma ānatir āgatiḥ /  mām̐saṃ ma upanatir vasv asthi majjā ma ānatiḥ //
analyzed: lomāni prayatiḥ mama tvac me ānatiḥ āgatiḥ   māmsam me upanatiḥ vasu asthi majjā me ānatiḥ

original: yad devā devaheḍanaṃ devāsaś cakṛmā vayam /  agnir mā tasmād enaso viśvān muñcatv am̐hasaḥ //
analyzed: yat devāḥ deva heḍanam devāsaḥ cakṛma vayam   agniḥ mā tasmāt enasaḥ viśvāt muñcatu amhasaḥ

original: yadi divā yadi naktam enām̐si cakṛmā vayam /  vāyur mā tasmād enaso viśvān muñcatv am̐hasaḥ //
analyzed: yadi divā yadi naktam enāmsi cakṛma vayam     vāyuḥ mā tasmāt enasaḥ viśvāt muñcatu amhasaḥ

original: yadi jāgrad yadi svapna enām̐si cakṛmā vayam /  sūryo mā tasmād enaso viśvān muñcatv am̐hasaḥ //
analyzed: yadi jāgrat yadi svapne enāmsi cakṛma vayam         mā tasmāt enasaḥ viśvāt muñcatu amhasaḥ

original: yad grāme yad araṇye yat sabhāyāṃ yad indriye /  yac chūdre yad arye yad enaś cakṛmā vayaṃ yad ekasyādhi dharmaṇi  tasyāvayajanam asi //
analyzed: yat grāme yat araṇye yat sabhāyām yat indriye   yat śūdre yat arye yat enaḥ cakṛma vayam yat ekasya adhi dharmaṇi tasya avayajanam asi

original: yad āpo aghnyā iti varuṇeti śapāmahe tato varuṇa no muñca  /  avabhṛtha nicumpuṇa nicerur asi nicumpuṇaḥ /  ava devair devakṛtam eno 'yakṣy ava martyair martyakṛtam /  pururāvṇo deva riṣas pāhi //
