analyzed: nikramaṇam niṣadanam vivartanam yat ca paḍvīśam arvataḥ   yat ca papau yat ca ghāsim jaghāsa sarvā tā te api deveṣu astu

original: yad aśvāya vāsa upastṛṇanty adhīvāsaṃ yā hiraṇyāny asmai /  saṃdānam arvantaṃ paḍvīśaṃ priyā deveṣv ā yāmayanti //
analyzed: yat aśvāya vāsaḥ upastṛṇanti adhīvāsam yā hiraṇyāni asmai saṃdānam arvantam paḍvīśam priyā deveṣu ā yāmayanti

original: yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda /  sruceva tā haviṣo adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi //
analyzed: yat te sāde mahasā śūkṛtasya pārṣṇyā vā kaśayā vā tutoda   srucā iva tā haviṣaḥ adhvareṣu sarvā tā te brahmaṇā sūdayāmi

original: catustrim̐śad vājino devabandhor vaṅkrīr aśvasya svadhitiḥ sam eti /  acchidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruṣ-parur anughuṣyā vi śasta //
analyzed: catustrimśat vājinaḥ deva bandhoḥ vaṅkrīḥ aśvasya svadhitiḥ sam eti     acchidrā gātrā vayunā kṛṇota paruḥ paruḥ anughuṣya vi śasta

original: ekas tvaṣṭur aśvasyā viśastā dvā yantārā bhavatas tatha ṛtuḥ /  yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tā-tā piṇḍānāṃ pra juhomy agnau //
analyzed: ekaḥ tvaṣṭuḥ aśvasya viśastā dvā yantārā bhavataḥ tathā ṛtuḥ   yā te gātrāṇām ṛtuthā kṛṇomi tātā piṇḍānām pra juhomi agnau

original: mā tvā tapat priya ātmāpiyantaṃ mā svadhitis tanva ā tiṣṭhipat  te /  mā te gṛdhnur aviśastātihāya chidrā gātrāṇy asinā mithū kaḥ //
analyzed: mā tvā tapat priyaḥ ātmā apiyantam mā svadhitiḥ tanve ā tiṣṭhipat te    mā te gṛdhnuḥ aviśastā atihāya chidrā gātrāṇi asinā mithū kaḥ

original: na vā u etan mriyase na riṣyasi devām̐ id eṣi pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ /  harī te yuñjā pṛṣatī abhūtām upāsthād vājī dhuri rāsabhasya //
analyzed: na vai u etat mriyase na riṣyasi devām id eṣi pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ    harī te pṛṣatī abhūtām upāsthāt vājī dhuri rāsabhasya

original: sugavyaṃ no vājī svaśvyaṃ pum̐saḥ putrām̐ uta viśvāpuṣam̐ rayim /  anāgāstvaṃ no aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatraṃ no aśvo vanatām̐ haviṣmān //
analyzed: su gavyam naḥ vājī su aśvyam pumsaḥ putrām uta viśvāpuṣam rayim    anāgāstvam naḥ aditiḥ kṛṇotu kṣatram naḥ aśvaḥ vanatām haviṣmān

original: imā nu kaṃ bhuvanā sīṣadhāmendraś ca viśve ca devāḥ /  ādityair indraḥ sagaṇo marudbhir asmabhyaṃ bheṣajā karat /  yajñaṃ ca nas tanvaṃ ca prajāṃ cādityair indraḥ saha sīṣadhāti //
analyzed: imā nu kam bhuvanā sīṣadhāma indraḥ ca viśve ca devāḥ    ādityaiḥ indraḥ sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ asmabhyam bheṣajā karat    yajñam ca naḥ tanvam ca prajām ca ādityaiḥ indraḥ saha sīṣadhāti

original: agne tvaṃ no antama uta trātā śivo bhava varūthyaḥ //
analyzed: agne tvam naḥ antamaḥ uta trātā śivaḥ bhava varūthyaḥ

original: vasur agnir vasuśravā acchā nakṣi dyumattamam̐ rayiṃ dāḥ //
analyzed: vasuḥ agniḥ vasu śravāḥ acchā nakṣi dyumattamam rayim dāḥ

original: taṃ tvā śociṣṭha dīdivaḥ sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ //
analyzed: tam tvā śociṣṭha dīdivas sumnāya nūnam īmahe sakhibhyaḥ

original: agniś ca pṛthivī ca saṃnate te me saṃ namatām adaḥ /  vāyuś cāntarikṣaṃ ca saṃnate te me saṃ namatām adaḥ /  ādityaś ca dyauś ca saṃnate te me saṃ namatām adaḥ /  āpaś ca varuṇaś ca saṃnate te me saṃ namatām adaḥ /  sapta sam̐sado aṣṭamī bhūtasādhanī /  sakāmām̐ adhvanas kuru saṃjñānam astu me 'munā //
analyzed: agniḥ ca pṛthivī ca saṃnate te me sam namatām adaḥ   vāyuḥ ca antarikṣam ca saṃnate te me sam namatām adaḥ   ādityaḥ ca dyauḥ ca saṃnate te me sam namatām adaḥ    āpaḥ ca varuṇaḥ ca saṃnate te me sam namatām adaḥ    sapta samsadaḥ aṣṭamī bhūta sādhanī    sa kāmām adhvanaḥ kuru saṃjñānam astu me munā  /

original: yathemāṃ vācaṃ kalyāṇīm āvadāni janebhyaḥ /  brahmarājanyābhyām̐ śūdrāya cāryāya ca svāya cāraṇāya //
analyzed: yathā imām vācam kalyāṇīm āvadāni janebhyaḥ brahma rājanyābhyām śūdrāya ca āryāya ca svāya cāraṇāya

original: priyo devānāṃ dakṣiṇāyai dātur iha bhūyāsam ayaṃ me kāmaḥ sam ṛdhyatām  upa mādo namatu //
analyzed: priyaḥ devānām dakṣiṇāyai dātuḥ iha bhūyāsam ayam me kāmaḥ sam ṛdhyatām upa mā adaḥ namatu

original: bṛhaspate ati yad aryo arhād dyumad vibhāti kratumaj janeṣu /  yad dīdayac chavasa ṛtaprajāta tad asmāsu draviṇaṃ dhehi citram //
analyzed: bṛhaspate ati yat aryaḥ arhāt dyumat vibhāti kratumat janeṣu   yat dīdayat śavase ṛta prajāta tat asmāsu draviṇam dhehi citram

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si bṛhaspataye tvā /  eṣa te yonir bṛhaspataye tvā //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si bṛhaspataye tvā   eṣa te yoniḥ bṛhaspataye tvā

original: indra gomann ihā yāhi pibā somam̐ śatakrato /  vidyadbhir grāvabhiḥ sutam //
analyzed: indra goman iha ā yāhi piba somam śatakrato    vidyadbhiḥ grāvabhiḥ sutam

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā gomate /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā gomate //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā gomate    eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā gomate

original: indrā yāhi vṛtrahan pibā somam̐ śatakrato /  gomadbhir grāvabhiḥ sutam //
analyzed: indra ā yāhi vṛtrahan pibā somam śatakrato    gomadbhiḥ grāvabhiḥ sutam

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sīndrāya tvā gomate /  eṣa te yonir indrāya tvā gomate //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si indrāya tvā gomate    eṣa te yoniḥ indrāya tvā gomate

original: ṛtāvānaṃ vaiśvānaram ṛtasya jyotiṣas patim /  ajasraṃ gharmam īmahe //
analyzed: ṛtāvānam vaiśvānaram ṛtasya jyotiṣaḥ patim    ajasram gharmam īmahe

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si vaiśvānarāya tvā /  eṣa te yonir vaiśvānarāya tvā //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si vaiśvānarāya tvā   eṣa te yoniḥ vaiśvānarāya tvā

original: vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kaṃ bhuvanānām abhiśrīḥ /  ito jāto viśvam idaṃ vi caṣṭe vaiśvānaro yatate sūryeṇa //
analyzed: vaiśvānarasya sumatau syāma rājā hi kam bhuvanānām abhiśrīḥ   itas jātaḥ viśvam idam vi caṣṭe vaiśvānaraḥ yatate sūryeṇa

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si vaiśvānarāya tvā /  eṣa te yonir vaiśvānarāya tvā //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si vaiśvānarāya tvā   eṣa te yoniḥ vaiśvānarāya tvā

original: vaiśvānaro na ūtaya ā pra yātu parāvataḥ /  agnir ukthena vāhasā //
analyzed: vaiśvānaraḥ naḥ ūtaye ā pra yātu parāvataḥ   agniḥ ukthena vāhasā

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si vaiśvānarāya tvā /  eṣa te yonir vaiśvānarāya tvā //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si vaiśvānarāya tvā   eṣa te yoniḥ vaiśvānarāya tvā

original: agnir ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ /  tam īmahe mahāgayam //
analyzed: agniḥ ṛṣiḥ pavamānaḥ pāñcajanyaḥ purohitaḥ   tam īmahe mahā gayam

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'sy agnaye tvā varcase /  eṣa te yonir agnaye tvā varcase //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si agnaye tvā varcase   eṣa te yoniḥ agnaye tvā varcase

original: mahām̐ indro vajrahastaḥ ṣoḍaśī śarma yacchatu /  hantu pāpmānaṃ yo 'smān dveṣṭi //
analyzed: mahān indraḥ vajra hastaḥ ṣoḍaśī śarma yacchatu hantu pāpmānam yaḥ smān dveṣṭi

original: upayāmagṛhīto 'si mahendrāya tvā /  eṣa te yonir mahendrāya tvā //
analyzed: upayāma gṛhītaḥ u si mahā indrāya tvā    eṣa te yoniḥ mahā indrāya tvā

original: taṃ vo dasmam ṛtīṣahaṃ vasor mandānam andhasaḥ /  abhi vatsaṃ na svasareṣu dhenava indraṃ gīrbhir navāmahe //
analyzed: tam vaḥ dasmam ṛtīṣaham vasoḥ mandānam andhasaḥ    abhi vatsam na svasareṣu dhenavaḥ indram gīrbhiḥ navāmahe

original: yad vāhiṣṭhaṃ tad agnaye bṛhad arca vibhāvaso /  mahiṣīva tvad rayis tvad vājā ud īrate //
analyzed: yat vāhiṣṭham tat agnaye bṛhat arca vibhāvaso mahiṣī iva tvat rayiḥ tvat vājāḥ ud īrate

original: ehy ū ṣu bravāṇi te 'gna itthetarā giraḥ /  ebhir vardhāsa indubhiḥ //
analyzed: ehi u su bravāṇi te gne itthā itarāḥ giraḥ   ebhiḥ vardhāse indubhiḥ

original: ṛtavas te yajñaṃ vi tanvantu māsā rakṣantu te haviḥ /  saṃvatsaras te yajñaṃ dadhātu naḥ prajāṃ ca pari pātu naḥ //
analyzed: ṛtavaḥ te yajñam vi tanvantu māsāḥ rakṣantu te haviḥ    saṃvatsaraḥ te yajñam dadhātu naḥ prajām ca pari pātu naḥ

original: upahvare girīṇām̐ saṃgame ca nadīnām /  dhiyā vipro ajāyata //
analyzed: upahvare girīṇām saṃgame ca nadīnām    dhiyā vipraḥ ajāyata

original: uccā te jātam andhaso divi sad bhūmy ā dade /  ugram̐ śarma mahi śravaḥ //
analyzed: uccā te jātam andhasaḥ divi sat bhūmī ā dade  / ugram śarma mahi śravaḥ

original: sa na indrāya yajyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ /  varivovit pari srava //
analyzed: sa naḥ indrāya yajyave varuṇāya marudbhyaḥ   varivaḥ vid pari srava

original: enā viśvāny arya ā dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām /  siṣāsanto vanāmahe //
analyzed: enā viśvāni aryaḥ ā dyumnāni mānuṣāṇām    siṣāsantaḥ vanāmahe

original: anu vīrair anu puṣyāsma gobhir anv aśvair anu sarveṇa puṣṭaiḥ /  anu dvipadānu catuṣpadā vayaṃ devā no yajñam ṛtuthā nayantu //
analyzed: anu vīraiḥ anu puṣyāsma gobhiḥ anu aśvaiḥ anu sarveṇa puṣṭaiḥ    anu dvipadā anu catuṣpadā vayam devāḥ naḥ yajñam ṛtuthā nayantu

original: agne patnīr ihā vaha devānām uśatīr upa /  tvaṣṭāram̐ somapītaye //
analyzed: agne patnīḥ iha ā vaha devānām uśatīḥ upa    tvaṣṭāram soma pītaye

original: abhi yajñaṃ gṛṇīhi no gnāvo neṣṭaḥ piba ṛtunā /  tvam̐ hi ratnadhā asi //
analyzed: abhi yajñam gṛṇīhi naḥ gnāvaḥ neṣṭar piba ṛtunā   tvam hi ratna dhāḥ asi

original: draviṇodāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata /  neṣṭrād ṛtubhir iṣyata //
analyzed: draviṇaḥ dāḥ pipīṣati juhota pra ca tiṣṭhata   neṣṭrāt ṛtubhiḥ iṣyata

original: tavāyam̐ somas tvam ehy arvāṅ chaśvattamam̐ sumanā asya pāhi /  asmin yajñe barhiṣy ā niṣadyā dadhiṣvemaṃ jaṭhara indum indra //
analyzed: tava ayam somaḥ tvam ehi arvāṅ śaśvattamam sumanāḥ asya pāhi    asmin yajñe barhiṣi ā niṣadya ā dadhiṣva imam jaṭhare indum indra

original: ameva naḥ suhavā ā hi gantana ni barhiṣi sadatanā raṇiṣṭana /  athā mandasva jujuṣāṇo andhasas tvaṣṭar devebhir janibhiḥ sumadgaṇaḥ //
analyzed: amā iva naḥ su havāḥ ā hi gantana ni barhiṣi sadatana raṇiṣṭana    athā mandasva jujuṣāṇaḥ andhasaḥ tvaṣṭar devebhiḥ janibhiḥ sumat gaṇaḥ

original: svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā /  indrāya pātave sutaḥ //
analyzed: svādiṣṭhayā madiṣṭhayā pavasva soma dhārayā indrāya pātave sutaḥ

original: rakṣohā viśvacarṣaṇir abhi yonim ayohatam /  druṇā sadhastham āsadat //
analyzed: rakṣaḥ hā viśvacarṣaṇiḥ abhi yonim ayaḥ hatam      druṇā sadhastham āsadat

original: sās tvāgna ṛtavo vardhayantu saṃvatsarā ṛṣayo yāni satyā /  saṃ divyena dīdihi rocanena viśvā ā bhāhi pradiśaś catasraḥ //
analyzed: sāḥ tvā agne ṛtavaḥ vardhayantu saṃvatsarāḥ ṛṣayaḥ yāni satyā    sam divyena dīdihi rocanena viśvāḥ ā bhāhi pradiśaḥ catasraḥ

original: saṃ cedhyasvāgne pra ca bodhayainam uc ca tiṣṭha mahate saubhagāya /  mā ca riṣad upasattā te agne brahmāṇas te yaśasaḥ santu mānye //
analyzed: sam ca idhyasva agne pra ca bodhaya enam ud ca tiṣṭha mahate saubhagāya    mā ca riṣat upasattā te agne brahmāṇaḥ te yaśasaḥ santu mā anye

original: tvām agne vṛṇate brāhmaṇā ime śivo agne saṃvaraṇe bhavā naḥ /  sapatnahā no abhimātijic ca sve gaye gāgṛhy aprayucchan //
analyzed: tvām agne vṛṇate brāhmaṇāḥ ime śivaḥ agne saṃvaraṇe bhava naḥ    sapatna hā naḥ abhimāti jit ca sve gaye gāgṛhi aprayucchan

original: ihaivāgne adhi dhārayā rayiṃ mā tvā ni kran pūrvacito nikāriṇaḥ /  kṣatram agne suyamam astu tubhyam upasattā vardhatāṃ te aniṣṭṛtaḥ //
analyzed: iha eva agne adhi dhāraya rayim mā tvā ni kran pūrva citaḥ nikāriṇaḥ   kṣatram agne suyamam astu tubhyam upasattā vardhatām te a niṣṭṛtaḥ

original: kṣatreṇāgne svāyuḥ sam̐ rabhasva mitreṇāgne mitradheye yatasva /  sajātānāṃ madhyamasthā edhi rājñām agne vihavyo dīdihīha //
analyzed: kṣatreṇa agne su āyuḥ sam rabhasva mitreṇa agne mitradheye yatasva      sajātānām madhyama sthāḥ edhi rājñām agne vihavyaḥ dīdihi iha

original: ati niho ati sridho 'ty acittim aty arātim agne /  viśvā hy agne duritā sahasvāthāsmabhyam̐ sahavīrām̐ rayiṃ dāḥ //
analyzed: ati nihaḥ ati sridhaḥ ti acittim ati arātim agne    viśvā hi agne duritā sahasva atha asmabhyam saha vīrām rayim dāḥ

original: anādhṛṣyo jātavedā anādhṛṣṭo virāḍ agne kṣatrabhṛd dīdihīha /  viśvā āśāḥ pramuñcan mānuṣīr bhayaḥ śivebhir adya pari pāhi no vṛdhe //
analyzed: anādhṛṣyaḥ jātavedāḥ anādhṛṣṭaḥ virāj agne kṣatra bhṛt dīdihi iha   / viśvāḥ āśāḥ pramuñcan mānuṣīḥ bhayaḥ śivebhiḥ adya pari pāhi naḥ vṛdhe

original: bṛhaspate savitar bodhayainam̐ sam̐śitaṃ cit saṃtarām̐ sam̐ śiśādhi /  vardhayainaṃ mahate saubhagāya viśva enam anu madantu devāḥ //
analyzed: bṛhaspate savitar bodhaya enam saṃśitam cit saṃtarām sam śiśādhi    vardhaya enam mahate saubhagāya viśve enam anu madantu devāḥ

original: amutrabhūyādadha yad yamasya bṛhaspate abhisaster amuñcaḥ /  praty auhatām aśvinā mṛtyum asmād devānām agne bhiṣajā śacībhiḥ //
analyzed: amutrabhūyā adadha yat yamasya bṛhaspate abhisasteḥ amuñcaḥ    prati auhatām aśvinā mṛtyum asmāt devānām agne bhiṣajā śacībhiḥ

original: ud vayaṃ tamasas pari svaḥ paśyanta uttaram /  devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam //
analyzed: ud vayam tamasaḥ pari svar paśyantaḥ uttaram    devam devatrā sūryam aganma jyotiḥ uttamam

original: ūrdhvā asya samidho bhavanty ūrdhvā śukrā śocīm̐ṣy agneḥ /  dyumattamā supratīkasya sūnoḥ //
analyzed: ūrdhvāḥ asya samidhaḥ bhavanti ūrdhvā śukrā śocīmṣī agneḥ    dyumattamā su pratīkasya sūnoḥ

original: tanūnapād asuro viśvavedā devo deveṣu devaḥ /  patho anaktu madhvā ghṛtena //
analyzed: tanūnapāt asuraḥ viśva vedāḥ devaḥ deveṣu devaḥ pathaḥ anaktu madhvā ghṛtena

original: madhvā yajñaṃ nakṣase prīṇāno narāśam̐so agne /  sukṛd devaḥ savitā viśvavāraḥ //
analyzed: madhvā yajñam nakṣase prīṇānaḥ narāśamsaḥ agne su kṛt devaḥ savitā viśva vāraḥ

original: acchāyam eti śavasā ghṛteneḍāno vahnir namasā /  agnim̐ sruco adhvareṣu prayatsu //
analyzed: acchā ayam eti śavasā ghṛtena īḍānaḥ vahniḥ namasā    agnim srucaḥ adhvareṣu prayatsu

original: sa yakṣad asya mahimānam agneḥ sa īṃ mandrā suprayasaḥ /  vasuś vetiṣṭho vasudhātamaś ca //
analyzed: sa yakṣat asya mahimānam agneḥ saḥ īm mandrā su prayasaḥ    vasuḥ vetiṣṭhaḥ vasu dhātamaḥ ca

original: dvāro devīr anv asya viśve vratā dadante agneḥ /  uruvyacaso dhāmnā patyamānāḥ //
analyzed: dvāraḥ devīḥ anu asya viśve vratā dadante agneḥ    uru vyacasaḥ dhāmnā patyamānāḥ

original: te asya yoṣaṇe divye na yonā uṣāsānaktā /  imaṃ yajñam avatām adhvaraṃ naḥ //
analyzed: te asya yoṣaṇe divye na yonau uṣāsānaktā      imam yajñam avatām adhvaram naḥ

original: daivyā hotārā ūrdhvam adhvaraṃ no 'gner juhvām abhi gṛṇītam /  kṛṇutam naḥ sv"ṣṭam //
analyzed: daivyā hotārau ūrdhvam adhvaram naḥ gneḥ juhvām abhi gṛṇītam   kṛṇutam naḥ svṣṭam

original: tisro devīr barhir idam̐ sadantv iḍā sarasvatī bhāratī /  mahī gṛṇānā //
analyzed: tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ idam sadantu iḍā sarasvatī bhāratī mahī gṛṇānā

original: tan nas turīpam adbhutaṃ purukṣu tvaṣṭā suvīryam /  rāyaspoṣaṃ vi ṣyatu nābhim asme //
analyzed: tat naḥ turīpam adbhutam purukṣu tvaṣṭā su vīryam    rāyaspoṣam vi syatu nābhim asme

original: vanaspate 'va sṛjā rarāṇas tmanā deveṣu /  agnir havyam̐ śamitā sūdayāti //
analyzed: vanaspate vaḥ sṛja rarāṇaḥ tmanā deveṣu    agniḥ havyam śamitā sūdayāti

original: agne svāhā kṛṇuhi jātavedo indrāya havyam /  viśve devā havir idaṃ juṣantām //
analyzed: agne svāhā kṛṇuhi jātavedaḥ indrāya havyam   viśve devāḥ haviḥ idam juṣantām

original: pīvoannā rayiṃvṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ śvetaḥ siṣakti niyutām abhiśrīḥ /  te vāyave samanaso vi tasthur viśven naraḥ svapatyāni cakruḥ //
analyzed: pīvaḥ annāḥ rayiṃvṛdhaḥ sumedhāḥ śvetaḥ siṣakti niyutām abhiśrīḥ   te vāyave samanasaḥ vi tasthuḥ viśvā id naraḥ su apatyāni cakruḥ

original: rāye nu yaṃ jajñatū rodasīme rāye devī dhiṣaṇā dhāti devam /  adha vāyuṃ niyutaḥ saścata svā uta śvetaṃ vasudhitiṃ nireke //
analyzed: rāye nu yam jajñatuḥ rodasī ime rāye devī dhiṣaṇā dhāti devam     adha vāyum niyutaḥ saścata svāḥ uta śvetam vasu dhitim nireke

original: āpo ha yad bṛhatīr viśvam āyan garbhaṃ dadhānā janayantīr agnim  /  tato devānām̐ sam avartatāsur ekaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: āpaḥ ha yat bṛhatīḥ viśvam āyan garbham dadhānāḥ janayantīḥ agnim      tatas devānām sam avartata asuḥ ekaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: yaś cid āpo mahinā paryapaśyad dakṣaṃ dadhānā janayantīr yajñam /  yo deveṣv adhi deva eka āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yaḥ cit āpaḥ mahinā paryapaśyat dakṣam dadhānāḥ janayantīḥ yajñam    yaḥ deveṣu adhi devaḥ ekaḥ āsīt kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: pra yābhir yāsi dāśvām̐sam acchā niyudbhir vāyav iṣṭaye duroṇe /  ni no rayim̐ subhojasaṃ yuvasva ni vīraṃ gavyam aśvyaṃ ca rādhaḥ //
analyzed: pra yābhiḥ yāsi dāśvāmsam acchā niyudbhiḥ vāyo iṣṭaye duroṇe    ni naḥ rayim su bhojasam yuvasva ni vīram gavyam aśvyam ca rādhaḥ

original: ā no niyudbhiḥ śatinībhir adhvaram̐ sahasriṇībhir upa yāhi yajñam /  vāyo asmin savane mādayasva yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: ā naḥ niyudbhiḥ śatinībhiḥ adhvaram sahasriṇībhiḥ upa yāhi yajñam    vāyo asmin savane mādayasva yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: niyutvān vāyav ā gahy ayam̐ śukro ayāmi te /  gantāsi sunvato gṛham //
analyzed: niyutvān vāyo ā gahi ayam śukraḥ ayāmi te   gantāsi sunvataḥ gṛham

original: vāyo śukro ayāmi te madhvo agraṃ diviṣṭiṣu /  ā yāhi somapītaye spārho deva niyutvatā //
analyzed: vāyo śukraḥ ayāmi te madhvaḥ agram diviṣṭiṣu   ā yāhi soma pītaye spārhaḥ deva niyutvatā

original: vāyur agregā yajñaprīḥ sākaṃ gan manasā yajñam /  śivo niyudbhiḥ śivābhiḥ //
analyzed: vāyuḥ agregāḥ yajña prīḥ sākam gat manasā yajñam  / śivaḥ niyudbhiḥ śivābhiḥ

original: vāyo ye te sahasriṇo rathāsas tebhir ā gahi /  niyutvānt somapītaye //
analyzed: vāyo ye te sahasriṇaḥ rathāsaḥ tebhiḥ ā gahi niyutvān soma pītaye

original: ekayā ca daśabhiś ca svabhūte dvābhyām iṣṭaye vim̐śatī ca /  tisṛbhiś ca vahase trim̐śatā ca niyudbhir vāyav iha tā vi muñca //
analyzed: ekayā ca daśabhiḥ ca sva bhūte dvābhyām iṣṭaye vimśatī ca    tisṛbhiḥ ca vahase trimśatā ca niyudbhiḥ vāyo iha tāḥ vi muñca

original: tava vāyav ṛtaspate tvaṣṭur jāmātar adbhuta /  avām̐sy ā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: tava vāyo ṛtaspate tvaṣṭuḥ jāmātar adbhuta   avāmsi ā vṛṇīmahe

original: abhi tvā śūra nonumo 'dugdhā iva dhenavaḥ /  īśānam asya jagataḥ svardṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ //
analyzed: abhi tvā śūra nonumaḥ dugdhāḥ iva dhenavaḥ    īśānam asya jagataḥ svar dṛśam īśānam indra tasthuṣaḥ

original: na tvāvām̐ anyo divyo na pārthivo na jāto na janiṣyate /  aśvāyanto maghavann indra vājino gavyantas tvā havāmahe //
analyzed: na tvāvām anyaḥ divyaḥ na pārthivaḥ na jātaḥ na janiṣyate    aśvāyantaḥ maghavan indra vājinaḥ gavyantaḥ tvā havāmahe

original: tvām id dhi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ /  tvāṃ vṛtreṣv indra satpatiṃ naras tvāṃ kāṣṭhāsv arvataḥ //
analyzed: tvām id hi havāmahe sātā vājasya kāravaḥ   tvām vṛtreṣu indra satpatim naraḥ tvām kāṣṭhāsu arvataḥ

original: sa tvaṃ naś citra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyā maha stavāno adrivaḥ /  gām aśvam̐ rathyam indra saṃ kira satrā vājaṃ na jigyuṣe //
analyzed: sa tvam naḥ citra vajrahasta dhṛṣṇuyā mahaḥ stavānaḥ adrivas    gām aśvam rathyam indra sam kira satrā vājam na jigyuṣe

original: kayā naś citra ā bhuvad ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā /  kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā //
analyzed: kayā naḥ citraḥ ā bhuvat ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā   kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā

original: kas tvā satyo madānāṃ mam̐hiṣṭho matsad andhasaḥ /  dṛḍhā cid āruje vasu //
analyzed: kaḥ tvā satyaḥ madānām mamhiṣṭhaḥ matsat andhasaḥ    dṛḍhā cit āruje vasu

original: abhī ṣu ṇaḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām /  śataṃ bhavāsy ūtaye //
analyzed: abhi su naḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām    śatam bhavāsi ūtaye

original: yajñā-yajñā vo agnaye girā-girā ca dakṣase /  pra-pra vayam amṛtaṃ jātavedasaṃ priyaṃ mitraṃ na śam̐siṣam //
analyzed: yajñāyajñāḥ vaḥ agnaye girā girā ca dakṣase pra pra vayam amṛtam jātavedasam priyam mitram na śamsiṣam

original: pāhi no agna ekayā pāhy uta dvitīyayā /  pāhi gīrbhis tisṛbhir ūrjāṃ pate pāhi catasṛbhir vaso //
analyzed: pāhi naḥ agne ekayā pāhi uta dvitīyayā pāhi gīrbhiḥ tisṛbhiḥ ūrjām pate pāhi catasṛbhiḥ vaso

original: ūrjo napātam̐ sa hināyam asmayur dāśema havyadātaye /  bhuvad vājeṣv avitā bhuvad vṛdha uta trātā tanūnām //
analyzed: ūrjaḥ napātam sa hina ayam asmayuḥ dāśema havya dātaye    bhuvat vājeṣu avitā bhuvat vṛdhaḥ uta trātā tanūnām

original: saṃvatsaro 'si parivatsaro 'sīdāvatsaro 'sīdvatsaro 'si vatsaro 'si  /  uṣasas te kalpantām ahorātrās te kalpantām ardhamāsās te kalpantāṃ  māsās te kalpantām ṛtavas te kalpantām̐ saṃvatsaras te kalpatām /  pretyā etyai saṃ cāñca pra ca sāraya /  suparṇacid asi tayā devatayāṅgirasvad dhruvaḥ sīda //
analyzed: saṃvatsaraḥ si parivatsaraḥ sīdāvatsaraḥ sīdvatsaraḥ si vatsaraḥ si  / uṣasaḥ te kalpantām ahar rātrāḥ te kalpantām ardha māsāḥ te kalpantām māsāḥ te kalpantām ṛtavaḥ te kalpantām saṃvatsaraḥ te kalpatām      pretyai etyai sam ca añca pra ca sāraya    suparṇa cit asi tayā devatayā aṅgirasvat dhruvaḥ sīda  /

original: hotā yakṣad samidhendram iḍas pade nābhā pṛthivyā adhi /  divo varṣmant sam idhyata ojiṣṭhaś carṣaṇīsahāṃ vetv ājyasya hotar yaja  //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat samidhā indram iḍaḥ pade nābhā pṛthivyāḥ adhi      divaḥ varṣman sam idhyate ojiṣṭhaḥ carṣaṇī sahām vetu ājyasya hotar yaja  /

original: hotā yakṣat tanūnapātam ūtibhir jetāram aparājitam /  indraṃ devam̐ svarvidaṃ pathibhir madhumattamair narāśam̐sena tejasā vetv  ājyasya hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat tanū napātam ūtibhiḥ jetāram aparājitam    indram devam svar vidam pathibhiḥ madhumattamaiḥ narāśamsena tejasā vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad iḍābhir indram īḍitam ājuhvānam amartyam /  devo devaiḥ savīryo vajrahastaḥ puraṃdaro vetv ājyasya hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat iḍābhiḥ indram īḍitam ājuhvānam amartyam    devaḥ devaiḥ sa vīryaḥ vajra hastaḥ puraṃdaraḥ vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad bariṣīndraṃ niṣadvaraṃ vṛṣabhaṃ naryāpasam /  vasubhī rudrair ādityaiḥ suyugbhir barhir āsadad vetv ājyasya hotar  yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat bariṣī indram niṣad varam vṛṣabham narya apasam    vasubhiḥ rudraiḥ ādityaiḥ su yugbhiḥ barhiḥ āsadat vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad ojo na vīryam̐ saho dvāra indram avardhayan /  suprāyaṇā asmin yajñe vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdho svāra indrāya mīḍhuṣe  vyantv ājyasya hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat ojaḥ na vīryam sahaḥ dvāraḥ indram avardhayan    su prāyaṇāḥ asmin yajñe vi śrayantām ṛtāvṛdhaḥ svāraḥ indrāya mīḍhuṣe vyantu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad uṣe indrasya dhenū sudughe mātarā mahī /  savātarau na tejasā vatsam indram avardhatāṃ vītām ājyasya hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat uṣe indrasya dhenū sudughe mātarā mahī    sa vātarau na tejasā vatsam indram avardhatām vītām ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad daivyā hotārā bhiṣajā sakhāyā haviṣendraṃ bhiṣajyataḥ /  kavī devau pracetasāv indrāya dhatta indriyaṃ vītām ājyasya hotar yaja  //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat daivyā hotārā bhiṣajā sakhāyā haviṣā indram bhiṣajyataḥ    kavī devau pracetasau indrāya dhattaḥ indriyam vītām ājyasya hotar yaja  /

original: hotā yakṣat tisro devīr na bheṣajaṃ trayas tridhātavo 'pasa iḍā  sarasvat bhāratī mahīḥ /  indrapatnīr haviṣmatīr vyantv ājyasya hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat tisraḥ devīḥ na bheṣajam trayaḥ tri dhātavaḥ pasaḥ iḍā sarasvat bhāratī mahīḥ    indra patnīḥ haviṣmatīḥ vyantu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣat tvaṣṭāram indraṃ devaṃ bhiṣajam̐ suyajaṃ ghṛtaśriyam /  pururūpam̐ suretasaṃ maghonam indrāya tvaṣṭā dadhad indriyāṇi vetv  ājyasya hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat tvaṣṭāram indram devam bhiṣajam suyajam ghṛta śriyam    puru rūpam su retasam maghonam indrāya tvaṣṭā dadhat indriyāṇi vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad vanaspatim̐ śamitāram̐ śatakratuṃ dhiyo joṣṭāram  indriyam /  madhvā samañjan pathibhiḥ sugebhiḥ svadāti yajñaṃ madhunā ghṛtena vetv  ājyasya hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat vanaspatim śamitāram śatakratum dhiyaḥ joṣṭāram indriyam    madhvā samañjan pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ svadāti yajñam madhunā ghṛtena vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad indram̐ svāhājyasya svāhā medasaḥ svāhā stokānām̐  svāhā svāhākṛtīnām̐ svāhā havyasūktīnām /  svāhā devā ājyapā juṣāṇā indra ājyasya vyantu hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat indram svāhā ājyasya svāhā medasaḥ svāhā stokānām svāhā svāhākṛtīnām svāhā havyasūktīnām    svāhā devāḥ ājya pāḥ juṣāṇāḥ indraḥ ājyasya vyantu hotar yaja

original: devaṃ barhir indram̐ sudevaṃ devair vīravat stīrṇaṃ vedyām  avardhayat /  vastor vṛtaṃ prāktor bhṛtam̐ rāyā barhiṣmato 'ty agād vasuvane  vasudheyasya vetu yaja //
analyzed: devam barhiḥ indram su devam devaiḥ vīravat stīrṇam vedyām avardhayat    vastoḥ vṛtam prāktoḥ bhṛtam rāyā barhiṣmataḥ ti agāt vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: devīr dvāra indram̐ saṃghāte vīḍvīr yāmann avardhayan /  ā vatsena taruṇena kumāreṇa ca mīvatāpārvāṇam̐ reṇukakāṭaṃ nudantāṃ  vasuvane vasudheyasya vyantu yaja //
analyzed: devīḥ dvāraḥ indram saṃghāte vīḍvīḥ yāman avardhayan    ā vatsena taruṇena kumāreṇa ca reṇu kakāṭam nudantām vasuvane vasudheyasya vyantu yaja

original: devī uṣāsānaktendraṃ yajñe prayaty ahvetām /  daivīr viśaḥ prāyāsiṣṭām̐ suprīte sudhite vasuvane vasudheyasya vītāṃ  yaja //
analyzed: devī uṣāsānaktā indram yajñe prayatī ahvetām     daivīḥ viśaḥ prāyāsiṣṭām su prīte sudhite vasu vane vasudheyasya vītām yaja

original: devī joṣṭrī vasudhitī devam indram avardhatām /  ayāvy anyāghā dveṣām̐sy ānyā vakṣad vasu vāryāṇi yajamānāya śikṣite  vasuvane vasudheyasya vītāṃ yaja //
analyzed: devī joṣṭrī vasu dhitī devam indram avardhatām   ayāvi anyā aghā dveṣāmsi ā anyā vakṣat vasu vāryāṇi yajamānāya śikṣite vasuvane vasudheyasya vītām yaja

original: devī ūrjāhutī dughe payasendram avardhatām /  iṣam ūrjam anyā vakṣat sagdhim̐ sapītim anyā navena pūrvaṃ dayamāne  purāṇena navam adhātām ūrjam ūrjāhutī ūrjayamāne vasu vṛyāṇi  yajamānāya śikṣite vasuvane vasudheyasya vītāṃ yaja //
analyzed: devī ūrjā āhutī dughe payasā indram avardhatām    iṣam ūrjam anyā vakṣat sagdhim sapītim anyā navena pūrvam dayamāne purāṇena navam adhātām ūrjam ūrjā āhutī ūrjayamāne vasu vṛyāṇi yajamānāya śikṣite vasuvane vasudheyasya vītām yaja

original: devā devyā hotārā devam indram avardhatām /  hatāghaśam̐sāv ābhārṣṭāṃ vasu vāryāṇi yajamānāya śikṣitau vasuvane  vasudheyasya vītāṃ yaja //
analyzed: devā devyāḥ hotārā devam indram avardhatām    hata agha śamsau ābhārṣṭām vasu vāryāṇi yajamānāya śikṣitau vasuvane vasudheyasya vītām yaja

original: devīs tisras tisro devīḥ patim indram avardhayan /  aspṛkṣad bhāratī divam̐ rudrair yajñam̐ sarasvatīḍā vasumatī gṛhān  vasuvane vasudheyasya vyantu yaja //
analyzed: devīḥ tisraḥ tisraḥ devīḥ patim indram avardhayan   aspṛkṣat bhāratī divam rudraiḥ yajñam sarasvatī iḍā vasumatī gṛhān vasuvane vasudheyasya vyantu yaja

original: deva indro narāśam̐sas trivarūthas tribandhuro devam indram  avardhayat /  śatena śitipṛṣṭhānām āhitaḥ sahasreṇa pra vartate mitrāvaruṇed asya  hotram arhato bṛhaspati stotram aśvinādhvaryavaṃ vasuvane vasudheyasya  vetu yaja //
analyzed: devaḥ indraḥ narāśamsaḥ tri varūthaḥ tri bandhuraḥ devam indram avardhayat    śatena śiti pṛṣṭhānām āhitaḥ sahasreṇa pra vartate mitrāvaruṇā id asya hotram arhataḥ bṛhaspatiḥ stotram aśvinā ādhvaryavam vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: devo devair vanaspatir hiraṇyaparṇo madhuśākhaḥ supippalo devam  indram avardhayat /  divam agreṇāspṛkṣad āntariksaṃ pṛthivīm adṛmhīd vasuvane  vasudheyasya vetu yaja //
analyzed: devaḥ devaiḥ vanaspatiḥ hiraṇya parṇaḥ madhu śākhaḥ su pippalaḥ devam indram avardhayat    divam agreṇa aspṛkṣat āntariksam pṛthivīm adṛmhīt vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: devaṃ barhir vāritīnāṃ devam indram avardhayat /  svāsastham indreṇāsannam anyā barhīm̐ṣy abhy abhūd vasuvane  vasudheyasya vetu yaja //
analyzed: devam barhiḥ vāritīnām devam indram avardhayat   svāsastham indreṇa āsannam anyā barhiḥ īmṣī abhī abhūt vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: devo agniḥ sviṣṭakṛd devam indram avardhayat /  sv"ṣṭaṃ kurvant sviṣṭakṛt sv"ṣṭam adya karotu no vasuvane vasudheyasya  vetu yaja //
analyzed: devaḥ agniḥ sviṣṭakṛt devam indram avardhayat   svṣṭam kurvan sviṣṭakṛt svṣṭam adya karotu naḥ vasuvane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: agnim adya hotāram avṛṇītāyaṃ yajamānaḥ pacan paktīḥ pacan  puroḍāśaṃ badhnann indrāya chāgam /  sūpasthā adya devo vanaspatir abhavad indrāya chāgena /  aghat taṃ medastaḥ prati pacatāgrabhīd avīvṛdhat puroḍāśena //
analyzed: agnim adya hotāram avṛṇīta ayam yajamānaḥ pacan paktīḥ pacan puroḍāśam badhnan indrāya chāgam   su upasthāḥ adya devaḥ vanaspatiḥ abhavat indrāya chāgena   aghat tam medastaḥ prati pacata agrabhīt avīvṛdhat puroḍāśena

original: tvām adya ṛṣa ārṣeya ṛṣīṇāṃ napād avṛṇītāyṃ yajamāno bahubhya ā  saṃgatebhya eṣa me deveṣu vasu vāryāyakṣyata iti tā yā devā deva  dānāny adus tāny asmā ā ca śāssvā ca gurasveṣitaś ca hotar asi  bhadravācyāya preṣito mānuṣaḥ sūktavākāya sūktā brūhi //
analyzed: tvām adya ṛṣaḥ ārṣeyaḥ ṛṣīṇām napāt avṛṇīta ayam yajamānaḥ bahubhyaḥ ā saṃgatebhyaḥ eṣa me deveṣu vasu vārya ayakṣyata iti tāḥ yāḥ devāḥ deva dānāni aduḥ tāni asmai ā ca śāssva ā ca gurasva iṣitaḥ ca hotar asi bhadra vācyāya preṣitaḥ mānuṣaḥ sūktavākāya sūktāḥ brūhi

original: hotā yakṣat samidhānaṃ mahad yaśaḥ susamiddhaṃ vareṇyam agnim  indraṃ vayodhasam /  gāyatrīṃ chanda indriyaṃ tryaviṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vetv ājyasya hotar  yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat samidhānam mahat yaśaḥ su samiddham vareṇyam agnim indram vayodhasam    gāyatrīm chandaḥ indriyam tryavim gām vayaḥ dadhat vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣat tanūnapātam udbhidaṃ yaṃ garbham aditir dadhe śucim  indraṃ vayodhasam /  uṣṇihaṃ chanda indriyaṃ dityavāhaṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vetv ājyasya hotar  yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat tanūnapātam udbhidam yam garbham aditiḥ dadhe śucim indram vayodhasam   uṣṇiham chandaḥ indriyam dityavāham gām vayaḥ dadhat vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad īḍenyam īḍitaṃ vṛtrahantamam iḍābhir īḍyam̐ sahaḥ  somam indram̐ vayodhasam /  anuṣṭubhaṃ chanda indriyaṃ pañcāviṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vetv ājyasya hotar  yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat īḍenyam īḍitam vṛtra hantamam iḍābhiḥ īḍyam sahaḥ somam indram vayodhasam    anuṣṭubham chandaḥ indriyam pañcāvim gām vayaḥ dadhat vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣat subarhiṣaṃ pūṣaṇvantam amartyam̐ sīdantaṃ barhiṣi priye  'mṛtendraṃ vayodhasam /  bṛhatīṃ chanda indriyaṃ trivatsaṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vetv ājyasya hotar  yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat su barhiṣam pūṣaṇvantam amartyam sīdantam barhiṣi priye mṛta indram vayodhasam    bṛhatīm chandaḥ indriyam trivatsam gām vayaḥ dadhat vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad vyacasvatīḥ suprāyaṇā ṛtāvṛdho dvāro devīr  hiraṇyayīr brahmāṇam indraṃ vayodhasam /  paṅktiṃ chanda ihendriyaṃ turyavāhaṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vyantv ājyasya  hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat vyacasvatīḥ su prāyaṇāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ dvāraḥ devīḥ hiraṇyayīḥ brahmāṇam indram vayodhasam    paṅktim chandaḥ iha indriyam turyavāham gām vayaḥ dadhat vyantu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣat supeśasā suśilpe bṛhatī ubhe naktoṣāsā na darśate  viśvam indraṃ vayodhasam /  triṣṭubhaṃ chanda ihendriyaṃ paṣṭhavahaṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vītām ājyasya  hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat supeśasā su śilpe bṛhatī ubhe naktoṣāsā na darśate viśvam indram vayodhasam     triṣṭubham chandaḥ iha indriyam paṣṭhavaham gām vayaḥ dadhat vītām ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣat pracetasā devānām uttamaṃ yaśo hotārā daivyā kavī  sayujendraṃ vayodhasam /  jagatīṃ chanda indriyam anaḍvāhaṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vītām ājyasya hotar  yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat pracetasā devānām uttamam yaśaḥ hotārā daivyā kavī sayujā indram vayodhasam    jagatīm chandaḥ indriyam anaḍvāham gām vayaḥ dadhat vītām ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣat peśasvatīs tisro devīr hiraṇyayīr bhāratīr bṛhatīr  mahīḥ patim indraṃ vayodhasam /  virājaṃ chanda ihendriyaṃ dhenuṃ gāṃ na vayo dadhad vyantv ājyasya  hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat peśasvatīḥ tisraḥ devīḥ hiraṇyayīḥ bhāratīḥ bṛhatīḥ mahīḥ patim indram vayodhasam    virājam chandaḥ iha indriyam dhenum gām na vayaḥ dadhat vyantu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣat suretasaṃ tvaṣṭāraṃ puṣṭivardhanam̐ rūpāṇi bibhrataṃ  pṛthak puṣṭim indraṃ vayodhasam /  dvipadaṃ chanda indriyam ukṣāṇaṃ gāṃ na vayo dadhad vetv ājyasya hotar  yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat su retasam tvaṣṭāram puṣṭi vardhanam rūpāṇi bibhratam pṛthak puṣṭim indram vayodhasam     dvipadam chandaḥ indriyam ukṣāṇam gām na vayaḥ dadhat vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣad vanaspatim̐ śamitāram̐ śatakratum̐ hiraṇyaparṇam ukthinam̐  raśanāṃ bibhrataṃ vaśiṃ bhagam indraṃ vayodhasam /  kakubhaṃ chanda ihendriyaṃ vaśāṃ vehataṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vetv ājyasya  hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat vanaspatim śamitāram śatakratum hiraṇya parṇam ukthinam raśanām bibhratam vaśim bhagam indram vayodhasam    kakubham chandaḥ iha indriyam vaśām vehatam gām vayaḥ dadhat vetu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: hotā yakṣat svāhākṛtīr agniṃ gṛhapatiṃ pṛthag varuṇaṃ bheṣajaṃ  kaviṃ kṣatram indraṃ vayodhasam /  aticchandasaṃ chanda indriyaṃ bṛhad ṛṣabhaṃ gāṃ vayo dadhad vyantv  ājyasya hotar yaja //
analyzed: hotā yakṣat svāhākṛtīḥ agnim gṛhapatim pṛthak varuṇam bheṣajam kavim kṣatram indram vayodhasam    aticchandasam chandaḥ indriyam bṛhat ṛṣabham gām vayaḥ dadhat vyantu ājyasya hotar yaja

original: devaṃ barhir vayodhasaṃ devam indram avardhayat /  gāyatryā chandasendriyaṃ cakṣur indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vetu yaja //
analyzed: devam barhiḥ vayodhasam devam indram avardhayat    gāyatryā chandasā indriyam cakṣuḥ indre vayaḥ dadhat vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: devīr dvāro vayodhasam̐ śucim indram avardhayan /  uṣṇihā chandasendriyaṃ prāṇam indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vyantu yaja //
analyzed: devīḥ dvāraḥ vayodhasam śucim indram avardhayan    uṣṇihā chandasā indriyam prāṇam indre vayaḥ dadhat vasuvane vasudheyasya vyantu yaja

original: devī uṣāsānaktā devam indraṃ vayodhasaṃ devī devam avardhatām /  anuṣṭubhā chandasendriyaṃ balam indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vītāṃ yaja //
analyzed: devī uṣāsānaktā devam indram vayodhasam devī devam avardhatām    anuṣṭubhā chandasā indriyam balam indre vayaḥ dadhat vasu vane vasudheyasya vītām yaja

original: devī joṣṭrī vasudhitī devam indraṃ vayodhasaṃ devī devam  avardhatām /  bṛhatyā chandasendriyam̐ śrotram indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vītāṃ yaja //
analyzed: devī joṣṭrī vasu dhitī devam indram vayodhasam devī devam avardhatām     bṛhatyā chandasā indriyam śrotram indre vayaḥ dadhat vasu vane vasudheyasya vītām yaja

original: devī ūrjāhutī dughe sudughe payasendraṃ vayodhasaṃ devī devam  avardhatām /  paṅktyā chandasendriyam̐ śukram indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vītāṃ yaja //
analyzed: devī ūrjā āhutī dughe sudughe payasā indram vayodhasam devī devam avardhatām    paṅktyā chandasā indriyam śukram indre vayaḥ dadhat vasu vane vasudheyasya vītām yaja

original: devā daivyā hotārā devam indraṃ vayodhasaṃ devau devam avardhatām /  triṣṭubhā chandasendriyaṃ tviṣim indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vītāṃ yaja //
analyzed: devā daivyā hotārā devam indram vayodhasam devau devam avardhatām    triṣṭubhā chandasā indriyam tviṣim indre vayaḥ dadhat vasuvane vasudheyasya vītām yaja

original: devīs tisras tisro devīr vayodhasaṃ patim indram avardhayan /  jagatyā chandasendriyam̐ śūṣam indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vyantu yaja //
analyzed: devīḥ tisraḥ tisraḥ devīḥ vayodhasam patim indram avardhayan jagatyā chandasā indriyam śūṣam indre vayaḥ dadhat vasuvane vasudheyasya vyantu yaja

original: devo narāśam̐so devam indraṃ vayodhasaṃ devo devam avardhayat /  virājā chandasendriyam̐ rupam indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vetu yaja //
analyzed: devaḥ narāśamsaḥ devam indram vayodhasam devaḥ devam avardhayat    virājā chandasā indriyam rupam indre vayaḥ dadhat vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: devo vanaspatir devam indraṃ vayodhasaṃ devo devam avardhayat /  dvipadā chandasendriyaṃ bhagam indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya  vetu yaja //
analyzed: devaḥ vanaspatiḥ devam indram vayodhasam devaḥ devam avardhayat     dvipadā chandasā indriyam bhagam indre vayaḥ dadhat vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: devaṃ barhir vāritīnāṃ devam indraṃ vayodhasaṃ devaṃ devam  avardhayat /  kakubhā chandasendriyaṃ yaśa indre vayo dadhad vasuvane vasudheyasya vetu  yaja //
analyzed: devam barhiḥ vāritīnām devam indram vayaḥ dhasam devam devam avardhayat    kakubhā chandasā indriyam yaśaḥ indre vayaḥ dadhat vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: devo agniḥ sviṣṭakṛd devam indraṃ vayodhasaṃ devo devam  avardhayat /  aticchandasā chandasendriyaṃ kṣatram indre vayo dadhad vasuvane  vasudheyasya vetu yaja //
analyzed: devaḥ agniḥ sviṣṭakṛt devam indram vayodhasam devaḥ devam avardhayat    aticchandasā chandasā indriyam kṣatram indre vayaḥ dadhat vasu vane vasudheyasya vetu yaja

original: agnim adya hotāram avṛṇītāyaṃ yajamānaḥ pacan paktīḥ pacan  puroḍāśaṃ badhnann indrāya vayodhase chāgam /  sūpasthā adya devo vanaspatir abhavad indrāya vayodhase chāgena /  aghat taṃ medastaḥ prati pacatāgrabhīd avīvṛdhat puroḍāśena //
analyzed: agnim adya hotāram avṛṇīta ayam yajamānaḥ pacan paktīḥ pacan puroḍāśam badhnan indrāya vayodhase chāgam   su upasthāḥ adya devaḥ vanaspatiḥ abhavat indrāya vayodhase chāgena    aghat tam medastaḥ prati pacata agrabhīt avīvṛdhat puroḍāśena

original: tvām adya ṛṣa ārṣeya ṛṣīṇāṃ napād avṛṇītāyṃ yajamāno bahubhya ā  saṃgatebhya eṣa me deveṣu vasu vāryāyakṣyata iti tā yā devā deva  dānāny adus tāny asmā ā ca śāssvā ca gurasveṣitaś ca hotar asi  bhadravācyāya preṣito mānuṣaḥ sūktavākāya sūktā brūhi //
analyzed: tvām adya ṛṣaḥ ārṣeyaḥ ṛṣīṇām napāt avṛṇīta ayam yajamānaḥ bahubhyaḥ ā saṃgatebhyaḥ eṣa me deveṣu vasu vārya ayakṣyata iti tāḥ yāḥ devāḥ deva dānāni aduḥ tāni asmai ā ca śāssva ā ca gurasva iṣitaḥ ca hotar asi bhadra vācyāya preṣitaḥ mānuṣaḥ sūktavākāya sūktāḥ brūhi

original: samiddho añjan kṛdaraṃmatīnāṃ ghṛtam agne madhumat pinvamānaḥ /  vājī vahan vājinaṃ jātavedo devānāṃ vakṣi priyam ā sadhastham //
analyzed: samiddhaḥ añjan kṛdaraṃmatīnām ghṛtam agne madhumat pinvamānaḥ   vājī vahan vājinam jātavedaḥ devānām vakṣi priyam ā sadhastham

original: ghṛtenāñjant saṃ patho devayānān prajānan vājy apy etu devān /  anu tvā sapte pradiśaḥ sacantām̐ svadhām asmai yajamānāya dhehi //
analyzed: ghṛtena añjan sam pathaḥ deva yānān prajānan vājī api etu devān      anu tvā sapte pradiśaḥ sacantām svadhām asmai yajamānāya dhehi

original: īḍyaś cāsi vandyaś ca vājinn āśuś cāsi medhyaś ca sapte /  agniṣ ṭvā devair vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ prītaṃ vahniṃ vahatu jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: īḍyaḥ ca asi vandyaḥ ca vājin āśuḥ ca asi medhyaḥ ca sapte    agniḥ tvā devaiḥ vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ prītam vahnim vahatu jātavedāḥ

original: stīrṇaṃ barhiḥ suṣṭarīmā juṣāṃoru pṛthu prathamānaṃ pṛthivyām /  devebhir yuktam aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ syonaṃ kṛṇvāna suvite dadhātu //
analyzed: stīrṇam barhiḥ suṣṭarīmā juṣāṃā uru pṛthu prathamānam pṛthivyām     devebhiḥ yuktam aditiḥ sajoṣāḥ syonam kṛṇvāna suvite dadhātu

original: etā u vaḥ subhagā viśvarūpā vi pakṣobhiḥ śrayamāṇā ud ātaiḥ /  ṛṣvāḥ satīḥ kavaṣaḥ śumbhamānā dvāro devīḥ suprāyaṇā bhavantu //
analyzed: etāḥ u vaḥ subhagāḥ viśva rūpāḥ vi pakṣobhiḥ śrayamāṇāḥ ud ātaiḥ    ṛṣvāḥ satīḥ kavaṣaḥ śumbhamānāḥ dvāraḥ devīḥ su prāyaṇāḥ bhavantu

original: antarā mitrāvaruṇā carantī mukhaṃ yajñānām abhi saṃvidāne /  uṣāsā vām̐ suhiraṇye suśilpe ṛtasya yonāv iha sādayāmi //
analyzed: antarā mitrāvaruṇā carantī mukham yajñānām abhi saṃvidāne    uṣāsā vām su hiraṇye su śilpe ṛtasya yonau iha sādayāmi

original: prathamā vām̐ sarathinā suvarṇā devau paśyantau bhuvanāni viśvā /  apiprayaṃ codanā vāṃ mimānā hotārā jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā //
analyzed: prathamā vām sa rathinā suvarṇā devau paśyantau bhuvanāni viśvā   apiprayam codanā vām mimānā hotārā jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā

original: ādityair no bhāratī vaṣṭu yajñam̐ sarasvatī saha rudrair na āvīt /  iḍopahūtā vasubhiḥ sajoṣā yajñaṃ no devīr amṛteṣu dhatta //
analyzed: ādityaiḥ naḥ bhāratī vaṣṭu yajñam sarasvatī saha rudraiḥ naḥ āvīt    iḍā upahūtā vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ yajñam naḥ devīḥ amṛteṣu dhatta

original: tvaṣṭā vīraṃ devakāmaṃ jajāna tvaṣṭur arvā jāyata āśur aśvaḥ /  tvaṣṭedaṃ viśvaṃ bhuvanaṃ jajāna bahoḥ kartāram iha yakṣi hotaḥ //
analyzed: tvaṣṭā vīram deva kāmam jajāna tvaṣṭuḥ arvā jāyate āśuḥ aśvaḥ    tvaṣṭā idam viśvam bhuvanam jajāna bahoḥ kartāram iha yakṣi hotar

original: aśvo ghṛtena tmanyā samakta upa devām̐ ṛtuśaḥ pātha etu /  vanaspatir devalokaṃ prajānann agninā havyā svaditāni vakṣat //
analyzed: aśvaḥ ghṛtena tmanyā samaktaḥ upa devām ṛtuśas pāthaḥ etu  / vanaspatiḥ deva lokam prajānan agninā havyā svaditāni vakṣat

original: prajāpates tapasā vāvṛdhānaḥ sadyo jāto dadhiṣe yajñam agne /  svāhākṛtena haviṣā purogā yāhi sādhyā havir adantu devāḥ //
analyzed: prajāpateḥ tapasā vāvṛdhānaḥ sadyas jātaḥ dadhiṣe yajñam agne    svāhākṛtena haviṣā purogāḥ yāhi sādhyāḥ haviḥ adantu devāḥ

original: yad akrandaḥ prathamaṃ jāyamāna udyant samudrād uta vā purīṣāt /  śyenasya pakṣā hariṇasya bāhū upastutyaṃ mahi jātaṃ te arvan //
analyzed: yat akrandaḥ prathamam jāyamānaḥ udyan samudrāt uta vā purīṣāt    śyenasya pakṣāḥ hariṇasya bāhū upastutyam mahi jātam te arvan

original: yamena dattaṃ trita enam āyunag indra eṇaṃ prathamo adhy atiṣṭhat /  gandharvo asya raśanām agṛbhṇāt sūrād aśvaṃ vasavo nir ataṣṭa //
analyzed: yamena dattam tritaḥ enam āyunak indraḥ eṇam prathamaḥ adhi atiṣṭhat    gandharvaḥ asya raśanām agṛbhṇāt sūrāt aśvam vasavaḥ niḥ ataṣṭa

original: asi yamo asy ādityo arvann asi trito guhyena vratena /  asi somena samayā vipṛkta āhus te trīṇi divi bandhanāni //
analyzed: asi yamaḥ asi ādityaḥ arvan asi tritaḥ guhyena vratena   asi somena samayā vipṛktaḥ āhuḥ te trīṇi divi bandhanāni

original: trīṇi ta āhur divi bandhanāni trīṇy apsu trīṇy antaḥ samudre /  uteva me varuṇaś chantsy arvan yatrā ta āhuḥ paramaṃ janitram //
analyzed: trīṇi te āhuḥ divi bandhanāni trīṇi apsu trīṇi antar samudre    uta iva me varuṇaḥ chantsi arvan yatrā te āhuḥ paramam janitram

original: imā te vājinn avamārjanānīmā śaphānām̐ sanitur nidhānā /  atrā te bhadrā raśanā apaśyam ṛtasya yā abhirakṣanti gopāḥ //
analyzed: imā te vājin avamārjanāni imā śaphānām sanituḥ nidhānā     atrā te bhadrāḥ raśanāḥ apaśyam ṛtasya yāḥ abhirakṣanti gopāḥ

original: ātmānaṃ te manasārād ajānām avo divā patayantaṃ pataṃgam /  śiro apaśyaṃ pathibhiḥ sugebhir areṇubhir jehamānaṃ patatri //
analyzed: ātmānam te manasā ārāt ajānām avas divā patayantam pataṃgam    śiraḥ apaśyam pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ areṇubhiḥ jehamānam patatri

original: atrā te rūpam uttamam apaśyaṃ jigīṣamāṇam iṣa ā pade goḥ /  yadā te marto anu bhogam ānaḍ ād id grasiṣṭha oṣadhīr ajīgaḥ //
analyzed: atrā te rūpam uttamam apaśyam jigīṣamāṇam iṣaḥ ā pade goḥ    yadā te martaḥ anu bhogam ānaṭ āt id grasiṣṭhaḥ oṣadhīḥ ajīgaḥ

original: anu tvā ratho anu maryo arvann anu gāvo 'nu bhagaḥ kanīnām /  anu vrātāsas tava sakhyam īyur anu devā mamire vīryaṃ te //
analyzed: anu tvā rathaḥ anu maryaḥ arvan anu gāvaḥ nu bhagaḥ kanīnām     anu vrātāsaḥ tava sakhyam īyuḥ anu devāḥ mamire vīryam te

original: hiraṇyaśṛṅgo 'yo asya pādā manojavā avara indra āsīt /  devā id asya haviradyam āyan yo arvantaṃ prathamo adhyatiṣṭhat //
analyzed: hiraṇya śṛṅgaḥ yaḥ asya pādā manaḥ javāḥ avaraḥ indraḥ āsīt    devāḥ id asya haviḥ adyam āyan yaḥ arvantam prathamaḥ adhyatiṣṭhat

original: īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ sam̐ śūraṇāso divyāso atyāḥ /  ham̐sā iva śreṇiśo yatante yad ākṣiṣur divyam ajmam aśvāḥ //
analyzed: īrmāntāsaḥ silikamadhyamāsaḥ sam śūraṇāsaḥ divyāsaḥ atyāḥ   hamsāḥ iva śreṇiśas yatante yat ākṣiṣuḥ divyam ajmam aśvāḥ

original: tava śarīraṃ patayiṣṇv arvan tava cittaṃ vāta iva dhrajīmān /  tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrāraṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti //
analyzed: tava śarīram patayiṣṇu arvan tava cittam vātaḥ iva dhrajīmān    tava śṛṅgāṇi viṣṭhitā purutrā araṇyeṣu jarbhurāṇā caranti

original: upa prāgāc chasanaṃ vājy arvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ /  ajaḥ puro nīyate nābhir asyānu paścāt kavayo yanti rebhāḥ //
analyzed: upa prāgāt śasanam vājī arvā devadrīcā manasā dīdhyānaḥ    ajaḥ puras nīyate nābhiḥ asya anu paścāt kavayaḥ yanti rebhāḥ

original: upa prāgāt paramaṃ yat sadhastham arvām̐ acchā pitaraṃ mātaraṃ ca /  adyā devān juṣṭatamo hi gamyā athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
analyzed: upa prāgāt paramam yat sadhastham arvām acchā pitaram mātaram ca          hi gamyāḥ athā śāste dāśuṣe vāryāṇi

original: samiddho adya manuṣo duroṇe devo devān yajasi jātavedaḥ /  ā ca vaha mitramahaś cikitvān tvaṃ dūtaḥ kavir asi pracetāḥ //
analyzed: samiddhaḥ adya manuṣaḥ duroṇe devaḥ devān yajasi jātavedaḥ    ā ca vaha mitra mahas cikitvān tvam dūtaḥ kaviḥ asi pracetāḥ

original: tanūnapāt patha ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjant svadayā sujihva /  manmāni dhībhir uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhy adhvaraṃ naḥ //
analyzed: tanūnapāt pathaḥ ṛtasya yānān madhvā samañjan svadaya sujihva     manmāni dhībhiḥ uta yajñam ṛndhan devatrā ca kṛṇuhi adhvaram naḥ

original: narāśam̐sasya mahimānam eṣām upa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ /  ye sukratavaḥ śucayo dhiyaṃdhāḥ svadanti devā ubhayāni havyā //
analyzed: narāśamsasya mahimānam eṣām upa stoṣāma yajatasya yajñaiḥ    ye su kratavaḥ śucayaḥ dhiyaṃdhāḥ svadanti devāḥ ubhayāni havyā

original: ājuhvāna īḍyo vandyaś cā yāhy agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ /  tvaṃ devānām asi yahva hotā sa enān yakṣīṣito yajīyān //
analyzed: ājuhvānaḥ īḍyaḥ vandyaḥ ca ā yāhi agne vasubhiḥ sajoṣāḥ   tvam devānām asi yahva hotā saḥ enān yakṣi iṣitaḥ yajīyān

original: prācīnaṃ barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyā vastor asyā vṛjyate agre  ahnām /  vy u prathate vitaraṃ varīyo devebhyo aditaye syonam //
analyzed: prācīnam barhiḥ pradiśā pṛthivyāḥ vastoḥ asyāḥ vṛjyate agre ahnām    vi u prathate vitaram varīyaḥ devebhyaḥ aditaye syonam

original: vyacasvatīr urviyā vi śrayantāṃ patibhyo na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ /  devīr dvāro bṛhatīr viśvaminvā devebhyo bhavata suprāyaṇāḥ //
analyzed: vyacasvatīḥ urviyā vi śrayantām patibhyaḥ na janayaḥ śumbhamānāḥ    devīḥ dvāraḥ bṛhatīḥ viśvaminvāḥ devebhyaḥ bhavata su prāyaṇāḥ

original: ā suṣvayantī yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatāṃ ni yonau /  divye yoṣaṇe bṛhatī surukme adhi śriyam̐ śukrapiśaṃ dadhāne //
analyzed: ā yajate upāke uṣāsānaktā sadatām ni yonau

original: daivyā hotārā prathamā suvācā mimānā yajñaṃ manuṣo yajadhyai /  pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnaṃ jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā //
analyzed: daivyā hotārā prathamā su vācā mimānā yajñam manuṣaḥ yajadhyai      pracodayantā vidatheṣu kārū prācīnam jyotiḥ pradiśā diśantā

original: ā no yajñaṃ bhāratī tūyam etv iḍā manuṣvad iha cetayantī /  tisro devīr barhir edam̐ syonam̐ sarasvatī svapasaḥ sadantu //
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam bhāratī tūyam etu iḍā manuṣvat iha cetayantī    tisraḥ devīḥ barhiḥ ā idam syonam sarasvatī su apasaḥ sadantu

original: ya ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpair apim̐śad bhuvanāni viśvā /  tam adya hotar iṣito yajīyān devaṃ tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān //
analyzed: yaḥ ime dyāvāpṛthivī janitrī rūpaiḥ apimśat bhuvanāni viśvā    tam adya hotar iṣitaḥ yajīyān devam tvaṣṭāram iha yakṣi vidvān

original: upāva sṛja tmanyā samañjan devānāṃ pātha ṛtuthā havīm̐ṣi /  vanaspatiḥ śamitā devo agniḥ svadantu havyaṃ madhunā ghṛtena //
analyzed: upa ava sṛja tmanyā samañjan devānām pāthaḥ ṛtuthā havīmṣi    vanaspatiḥ śamitā devaḥ agniḥ svadantu havyam madhunā ghṛtena

original: sadyo jāto vy amimīta yajñam agnir devānām abhavat purogāḥ /  asya hotuḥ pradiśy ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtam̐ havir adantu devāḥ //
analyzed: sadyas jātaḥ vi amimīta yajñam agniḥ devānām abhavat purogāḥ    asya hotuḥ pradiśi ṛtasya vāci svāhākṛtam haviḥ adantu devāḥ

original: ketuṃ kṛṇvann aketave peśo maryā apeśase /  sam uṣadbhir ajāyathāḥ //
analyzed: ketum kṛṇvan a ketave peśaḥ maryāḥ a peśase     sam uṣadbhiḥ ajāyathāḥ

original: jīmūtasyeva bhavati pratīkaṃ yad varmī yāti samadām upasthe /  anāviddhayā tanvā jaya tvam̐ sa tvā varmaṇo mahimā pipartu //
analyzed: jīmūtasya iva bhavati pratīkam yat varmī yāti samadām upasthe   an āviddhayā tanvā jaya tvam sa tvā varmaṇaḥ mahimā pipartu

original: dhanvanā gā dhanvanājiṃ jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samado jayema /  dhanuḥ śatror apakāmaṃ kṛṇoti dhanvanā sarvāḥ pradiśo jayema //
analyzed: dhanvanā gāḥ dhanvanā ājim jayema dhanvanā tīvrāḥ samadaḥ jayema  / dhanuḥ śatroḥ apakāmam kṛṇoti dhanvanā sarvāḥ pradiśaḥ jayema

original: vakṣyantīved ā ganīganti karṇaṃ priyam̐ sakhāyaṃ pariṣasvajānā /  yoṣeva śiṅkte vitatādhi dhanvan jyā iyam̐ samane pārayantī //
analyzed: vakṣyantī iva id ā ganīganti karṇam priyam sakhāyam pariṣasvajānā    yoṣā iva śiṅkte vitatā adhi dhanvan jyā iyam samane pārayantī

original: te ācarantī samaneva yoṣā māteva putraṃ bibhṛtām upasthe /  apa śatrūn vidhyatām̐ saṃvidāne ārtnī ime viṣphurantī amitrān //
analyzed: te ācarantī samanā iva yoṣā mātā iva putram bibhṛtām upasthe    apa śatrūn vidhyatām saṃvidāne ārtnī ime viṣphurantī amitrān

original: bahvīnāṃ pitā bahur asya putraś ciścā kṛṇoti samanāvagatya /  iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāś ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddho jayati prasūtaḥ //
analyzed: bahvīnām pitā bahuḥ asya putraḥ kṛṇoti samanā avagatya    iṣudhiḥ saṅkāḥ pṛtanāḥ ca sarvāḥ pṛṣṭhe ninaddhaḥ jayati prasūtaḥ

original: rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puro yatra-yatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ /  abhīśūnāṃ mahimānaṃ panāyata manaḥ paścād anu yacchanti raśmayaḥ //
analyzed: rathe tiṣṭhan nayati vājinaḥ puras yatra yatra kāmayate suṣārathiḥ    abhīśūnām mahimānam panāyata manaḥ paścāt anu yacchanti raśmayaḥ

original: tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvate vṛṣapāṇayo 'śvā rathebhiḥ saha vājayantaḥ  /  avakrāmantaḥ prapadair amitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūm̐r anapavyayantaḥ //
analyzed: tīvrān ghoṣān kṛṇvate vṛṣa pāṇayaḥ śvā rathebhiḥ saha vājayantaḥ     avakrāmantaḥ prapadaiḥ amitrān kṣiṇanti śatrūm an apavyayantaḥ

original: rathavāhanam̐ havir asya nāma yatrāyudhaṃ nihitam asya varma /  tatrā ratham upa śagmam̐ sadema viśvāhā vayam̐ sumanasyamānāḥ //
analyzed: rathavāhanam haviḥ asya nāma yatra āyudham nihitam asya varma    tatra ratham upa śagmam sadema viśvāhā vayam sumanasyamānāḥ

original: svāduṣam̐sadaḥ pitaro vayodhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvanto gabhīrāḥ /  citrasenā iṣubalā amṛdhrāḥ satovīrā uravo vrātasāhāḥ //
analyzed: svāduṣamsadaḥ pitaraḥ vayaḥ dhāḥ kṛcchreśritaḥ śaktīvantaḥ gabhīrāḥ citra senāḥ iṣu balāḥ amṛdhrāḥ satovīrāḥ uravaḥ vrāta sāhāḥ

original: brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive no dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā /  pūṣā naḥ pātu duritād ṛtāvṛdho rakṣā mākir no aghaśam̐sa īśata //
analyzed: brāhmaṇāsaḥ pitaraḥ somyāsaḥ śive naḥ dyāvāpṛthivī anehasā   pūṣā naḥ pātu duritāt ṛtāvṛdhaḥ rakṣā mākir naḥ agha śamsaḥ īśata

original: suparṇaṃ vaste mṛgo asyā danto gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā /  yatrā naraḥ saṃ ca vi ca dravanti tatrāsmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma yam̐san //
analyzed: suparṇam vaste mṛgaḥ asyāḥ dantaḥ gobhiḥ saṃnaddhā patati prasūtā    yatrā naraḥ sam ca vi ca dravanti tatra asmabhyam iṣavaḥ śarma yamsan

original: ṛjīte pari vṛṅdhi no 'śmā bhavatu nas tanūḥ /  somo adhi bravītu no 'ditiḥ śarma yacchatu //
analyzed: ṛjīte pari vṛṅdhi naḥ śmā bhavatu naḥ tanūḥ   somaḥ adhi bravītu naḥ ditiḥ śarma yacchatu

original: ā jaṅghanti sānv eṣāṃ jaghanām̐ upa jighnate /  aśvājani pracetaso 'śvānt samatsu codaya //
analyzed: ā jaṅghanti sānū eṣām jaghanām upa jighnate     aśvājani pracetasaḥ śvān samatsu codaya

original: ahir iva bhogaiḥ pary eti bāhuṃ jyāyā hetiṃ paribādhamānaḥ /  hastaghno viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumām̐saṃ pari pātu viśvataḥ //
analyzed: ahiḥ iva bhogaiḥ pari eti bāhum jyāyāḥ hetim paribādhamānaḥ    hastaghnaḥ viśvā vayunāni vidvān pumān pumāmsam pari pātu viśvatas

original: vanaspate vīḍvaṅgo hi bhūyā asmatsakhā prataraṇaḥ suvīraḥ /  gobhiḥ saṃnaddho asi vīḍayasvāsthātā te jayatu jetvāni //
analyzed: vanaspate vīḍu aṅgaḥ hi bhūyāḥ asmad sakhā prataraṇaḥ su vīraḥ   gobhiḥ saṃnaddhaḥ asi vīḍayasva āsthātā te jayatu jetvāni

original: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pary oja udbhṛtaṃ vanaspatibhyaḥ pary ābhṛtam̐  sahaḥ /  apām ojmānaṃ pari gobhir āvṛtam indrasya vajram̐ haviṣā rathaṃ yaja //
analyzed: divaḥ pṛthivyāḥ pari ojaḥ udbhṛtam vanaspatibhyaḥ pari ābhṛtam sahaḥ    apām ojmānam pari gobhiḥ āvṛtam indrasya vajram haviṣā ratham yaja

original: indrasya vajro marutām anīkaṃ mitrasya garbho varuṇasya nābhiḥ /  semāṃ no havyadātiṃ juṣāṇo deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya //
analyzed: indrasya vajraḥ marutām anīkam mitrasya garbhaḥ varuṇasya nābhiḥ    sa imām naḥ havya dātim juṣāṇaḥ deva ratha prati havyā gṛbhāya

original: upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyāṃ purutrā te manutāṃ viṣṭhitaṃ  jagat /  sa dundubhe sajūr indreṇa devair dūrād davīyo apa sedha śatrūn //
analyzed: upa śvāsaya pṛthivīm uta dyām purutrā te manutām viṣṭhitam jagat    sa dundubhe sajūs indreṇa devaiḥ dūrāt davīyaḥ apa sedha śatrūn

original: ā krandaya balam ojo na ā dhā ni ṣṭanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ /  apa protha dundubhe ducchunā ita indrasya muṣṭir asi vīḍayasva //
analyzed: ā krandaya balam ojaḥ naḥ ā dhāḥ ni stanihi duritā bādhamānaḥ   apa protha dundubhe ducchunāḥ itas indrasya muṣṭiḥ asi vīḍayasva

original: āmūr aja pratyā vartayemāḥ ketumad dundubhir vāvadīti /  sam aśvaparṇāś caranti no naro 'smākam indra rathino jayantu //
analyzed: ā amūḥ aja pratyā vartaya imāḥ ketumat dundubhiḥ vāvadīti   / sam aśva parṇāḥ caranti naḥ naraḥ smākam indra rathinaḥ jayantu

original: āgneyaḥ kṛṣṇagrīvaḥ sārasvatī meṣī babhruḥ saumyaḥ pauṣṇaḥ  śyāmaḥ śitipṛṣṭho bārhaspatyaḥ śilpo vaiśvadeva aindro 'ruṇo mārutaḥ  kalmāṣa aindrāgnaḥ sam̐hito 'dhorāmaḥ sāvitro vāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇa ekaśitipāt  petvaḥ //
analyzed: āgneyaḥ kṛṣṇa grīvaḥ sārasvatī meṣī babhruḥ saumyaḥ pauṣṇaḥ śyāmaḥ śiti pṛṣṭhaḥ bārhaspatyaḥ śilpaḥ vaiśvadevaḥ aindraḥ ruṇaḥ mārutaḥ kalmāṣaḥ aindrāgnaḥ samhitaḥ dhorāmaḥ sāvitraḥ vāruṇaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ eka śiti pād petvaḥ

original: agnaye 'nīkavate rohitāñjir anaḍvān adhorāmau sāvitrau pauṣṇau  rajatanābhī vaiśvadevau piśaṃgau tūparau mārutaḥ kalmāṣa āgneyaḥ kṛṣṇo  'jaḥ sārasvatī meṣī vāruṇaḥ petvaḥ //
analyzed: agnaye nīkavate rohita añjiḥ anaḍvān adhorāmau sāvitrau pauṣṇau rajata nābhī vaiśvadevau piśaṃgau tūparau mārutaḥ kalmāṣaḥ āgneyaḥ kṛṣṇaḥ jaḥ sārasvatī meṣī vāruṇaḥ petvaḥ

original: agnaye gāyatrāya trivṛte rāthantarāyāṣṭākapāla indrāya  traiṣṭubhāya pañcadaśāya barhatāyaikādaśakapālo viśvebhyo devebhyo  jāgatebhyaḥ saptadaśebhyo vairūpebhyo dvādaśakapālo mitrāvaruṇābhyām  ānuṣṭubhābhyām ekavim̐śābhyāṃ vairājābhyāṃ payasyā bṛhaspataye  pāṅktāya triṇavāya śākvarāya caruḥ savitra auṣṇihāya trayastrim̐śāya  raivatāya dvādaśakapālaḥ prājāpatyaś carur adityai viṣṇupatnyai carur  agnaye vaiśvānarāya dvādaśakapālo 'numatyā aṣṭākapālaḥ //
analyzed: agnaye gāyatrāya trivṛte rāthantarāya aṣṭākapālaḥ indrāya traiṣṭubhāya pañcadaśāya barhatāya ekādaśa kapālaḥ viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ jāgatebhyaḥ saptadaśebhyaḥ vairūpebhyaḥ dvādaśa kapālaḥ mitrāvaruṇābhyām ānuṣṭubhābhyām ekavimśābhyām vairājābhyām payasyā bṛhaspataye pāṅktāya triṇavāya śākvarāya caruḥ savitre auṣṇihāya trayastrimśāya raivatāya dvādaśa kapālaḥ prājāpatyaḥ caruḥ adityai viṣṇu patnyai caruḥ

original: deva savitaḥ pra suva yajñaṃ pra suva yajñapatiṃ bhagāya /  divyo gandharvaḥ ketupūḥ ketaṃ naḥ punātu vācaspatir vājaṃ naḥ svadatu  //
analyzed: deva savitar pra suva yajñam pra suva yajñapatim bhagāya     divyaḥ gandharvaḥ ketu pūḥ ketam naḥ punātu vācaspatiḥ vājam naḥ svadatu  /

original: tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi /  dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayat //
analyzed: tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi dhiyaḥ yaḥ naḥ pracodayat

original: viśvāni deva savitar duritāni parā suva /  yad bhadraṃ tan na ā suva //
analyzed: viśvāni deva savitar duritāni parā suva   yat bhadram tat naḥ ā suva

original: vibhaktāram̐ havāmahe vasoś citrasya rādhasaḥ /  savitāraṃ nṛcakṣasam //
analyzed: vibhaktāram havāmahe vasoḥ citrasya rādhasaḥ    savitāram nṛ cakṣasam

original: brahmaṇe brāhmaṇaṃ kṣatrāya rājanyaṃ marudbhyo vaiśyaṃ tapase  śūdraṃ tamase taskaraṃ nārakāya vīrahaṇaṃ pāpmane klībam ākrayāyā  ayogūṃ kāmāya pum̐ścalūm atikruṣṭāya māgadham //
analyzed: brahmaṇe brāhmaṇam kṣatrāya rājanyam marudbhyaḥ vaiśyam tapase śūdram tamase taskaram nārakāya vīra haṇam pāpmane klībam ākrayāya ayogūm kāmāya pumścalūm atikruṣṭāya māgadham

original: nṛttāya sūtaṃ gītāya śailūṣaṃ dharmāya sabhācaraṃ nariṣṭhāyai  bhīmalaṃ narmāya rebham̐ hasāya kārim ānandāya strīṣukhaṃ pramade  kumārīputraṃ medhāyai rathakāraṃ dhairyāya takṣāṇam //
analyzed: nṛttāya sūtam gītāya śailūṣam dharmāya sabhācaram nariṣṭhāyai bhīmalam narmāya rebham hasāya kārim ānandāya strīṣukham pramade kumārīputram medhāyai rathakāram dhairyāya takṣāṇam

original: tapase kaulālaṃ māyāyai karmāram̐ rūpāya maṇikāram̐ śubhe vapam̐  śaravyāyā iṣukāram̐ hetyai dhanuṣkāraṃ karmaṇe jyākāraṃ diṣṭāya  rajjusarjaṃ mṛtyave mṛgayum antakāya śvaninam //
analyzed: tapase kaulālam māyāyai karmāram rūpāya maṇikāram śubhe vapam śaravyāyai iṣukāram hetyai dhanuṣkāram karmaṇe jyākāram diṣṭāya  / rajju sarjam mṛtyave mṛgayum antakāya śvaninam

original: nadībhyaḥ pauñjiṣṭham ṛkṣīkābhyo naiṣādaṃ puruṣavyāghrāya  durmadaṃ gandharvāpsarobhyo vrātyaṃ prayugbhya unmattam̐ sarpadevajanebhyo  'pratipadamayebhyaḥ kitavam īryatāyā akitavaṃ piśācebhyo bidalakārīṃ  yātudhānebhyaḥ kaṇṭakīkārīm //
analyzed: nadībhyaḥ pauñjiṣṭham ṛkṣīkābhyaḥ naiṣādam puruṣa vyāghrāya durmadam gandharva apsarobhyaḥ vrātyam prayugbhyaḥ unmattam sarpa deva janebhyaḥ pratipad a mayebhyaḥ kitavam akitavam piśācebhyaḥ bidalakārīm yātudhānebhyaḥ kaṇṭakīkārīm

original: saṃdhaye jāraṃ gehāyopapatim ārtyai parivittaṃ nirṛtyai  parivividānam arāddhyā edidhiṣuḥpatiṃ niṣkṛtyai peśaskārīm̐ saṃjñānāya  smarakārīṃ prakāmodyāyopasadaṃ varṇāyānurudhaṃ balāyopadām //
analyzed: saṃdhaye jāram gehāya upapatim ārtyai parivittam nirṛtyai parivividānam arāddhyai edidhiṣuḥ patim niṣkṛtyai peśaskārīm saṃjñānāya smarakārīm prakāmodyāya upasadam varṇāya anurudham balāya upadām

original: utsādebhyaḥ kubjaṃ pramude vāmanaṃ dvārbhyaḥ srāmam̐ svapnāyāndham  ardhamāya badhiraṃ pavitrāya bhiṣajaṃ prajñānāya nakṣatradarśam  āśikṣāyai praśninam upaśikṣāyā abhipraśninaṃ maryādāyai praśnavivākam //
analyzed: utsādebhyaḥ kubjam pramude vāmanam dvārbhyaḥ srāmam svapnāya andham ardhamāya badhiram pavitrāya bhiṣajam prajñānāya nakṣatra darśam āśikṣāyai praśninam upaśikṣāyai abhipraśninam maryādāyai praśna vivākam

original: armebhyo hastipaṃ javāyāśvapaṃ puṣṭyai gopālaṃ vīryāyāvipālaṃ  tejase 'japālam irāyai kīnāśaṃ kīlālāya surākāraṃ bhadrāya gṛhapam̐  śreyase vittadham ādhyakṣyāyānukṣattāram //
analyzed: armebhyaḥ hastipam javāya aśvapam puṣṭyai gopālam vīryāya avipālam tejase japālam irāyai kīnāśam kīlālāya surā kāram bhadrāya gṛhapam śreyase vitta dham ādhyakṣyāya anukṣattāram

original: bhāyai dārvāhāraṃ prabhāyā agnyedhaṃ bradhnasya  viṣṭapāyābhiṣektāraṃ varṣiṣṭhāya nākāya pariveṣṭāraṃ devalokāya  peśitāraṃ manuṣyalokāya prakaritāram̐ sarvebhyo lokebhya upasektāram  avaṛtyai badhāyopamanthitāraṃ medhāya vāsaḥpalpūlīṃ prakāmāya  rajayitrīm //
analyzed: bhāyai dārva āhāram prabhāyai agnyedham bradhnasya viṣṭapāya abhiṣektāram varṣiṣṭhāya nākāya pariveṣṭāram deva lokāya peśitāram manuṣya lokāya prakaritāram sarvebhyaḥ lokebhyaḥ upasektāram avaṛtyai badhāya upamanthitāram medhāya vāsaḥ palpūlīm prakāmāya rajayitrīm

original: ṛtaye stenahṛdayaṃ vairahatyāya piśunaṃ viviktyai kṣattāram  aupadraṣṭryāyānukṣattāraṃ bālāyānucaraṃ bhūmne pariṣkandaṃ priyāya  priyavādinam ariṣṭyā aśvasādam̐ svargāya lokāya bhāgadughaṃ varṣiṣṭhāya  nākāya pariveṣṭāram //
analyzed: ṛtaye stena hṛdayam vaira hatyāya piśunam viviktyai kṣattāram aupadraṣṭryāya anukṣattāram bālāya anucaram bhūmne pariṣkandam priyāya priya vādinam ariṣṭyai aśvasādam svargāya lokāya bhāgadugham varṣiṣṭhāya nākāya pariveṣṭāram

original: manyave 'yastāpaṃ krodhāya nisaraṃ yogāya yoktāram̐  śokāyābhisartāraṃ kṣemāya vimoktāram utkūlebhyas triṣṭhinaṃ vapuṣe  mānaskṛtam̐ śīlāyāñjanīkārīṃ nirṛtyai kośakārīṃ yamāyāsūm //
analyzed: manyave yaḥ tāpam krodhāya nisaram yogāya yoktāram śokāya abhisartāram kṣemāya vimoktāram utkūlebhyaḥ triṣṭhinam vapuṣe mānaskṛtam śīlāya añjanīkārīm nirṛtyai kośa kārīm yamāya asūm

original: yamāya yamasūm atharvabhyo 'vatokām̐ saṃvatsarāya paryāyiṇīṃ  parivatsarāyāvijātām idāvatsarāyātītvarīm idvatsarāyātiṣkadvarīṃ  vatsarāya vijarjarām̐ saṃvatsarāya paliknīm ṛbhubhyo 'jinasaṃdham̐  sādhyebhyaś carmamnam //
analyzed: yamāya yamasūm atharvabhyaḥ vatokām saṃvatsarāya paryāyiṇīm parivatsarāya avijātām idāvatsarāya atītvarīm idvatsarāya atiṣkadvarīm vatsarāya vijarjarām saṃvatsarāya paliknīm ṛbhubhyaḥ jina saṃdham sādhyebhyaḥ carmamnam

original: sarebhyo dhaivaram upasthāvarābhyo dāśaṃ vaiśantābhyo baindaṃ  naḍvalābhyaḥ śauṣkalaṃ pārāya mārgāram avarāya kevartaṃ tīrthebhya  āndaṃ viṣamebhyo mainālam̐ svanebhyaḥ parṇakaṃ guhābhyaḥ kirātam̐ sānubhyo  jambhakaṃ parvatebhyaḥ kimpūruṣam //
analyzed: sarebhyaḥ dhaivaram upasthāvarābhyaḥ dāśam vaiśantābhyaḥ baindam naḍvalābhyaḥ śauṣkalam pārāya mārgāram avarāya kevartam tīrthebhyaḥ āndam viṣamebhyaḥ mainālam svanebhyaḥ parṇakam guhābhyaḥ kirātam sānubhyaḥ jambhakam parvatebhyaḥ kimpūruṣam

original: bībhatsāyai paulkasaṃ varṇāya hiraṇyakāraṃ tulāyai vāṇijaṃ  paścādoṣāya glāvinaṃ viśvebhyo bhūtebhyaḥ sidhmalaṃ bhūtyai jāgaraṇam  abhūtyai svapanam ārtyai janavādinaṃ vy`ṛddhyā apagalbham̐ sam̐śarāya  pracchidam //
analyzed: bībhatsāyai paulkasam varṇāya hiraṇyakāram tulāyai vāṇijam paścādoṣāya glāvinam viśvebhyaḥ bhūtebhyaḥ sidhmalam bhūtyai jāgaraṇam abhūtyai svapanam ārtyai janavādinam vyṛddhyai apagalbham samśarāya pracchidam

original: akṣarājāya kitavaṃ kṛtāyādinavadarśaṃ tretāyai kalpinaṃ  dvāparāyādhikalpinam āskandāya sabhāsthāṇuṃ mṛtyave govyaccham antakāya  goghātaṃ kṣudhe yo gāṃ vikṛntantaṃ bhikṣamāṇa upatiṣṭhati duṣkṛtāya  carakācāryaṃ pāpmane sailagam //
analyzed: akṣa rājāya kitavam kṛtāya ādi nava darśam tretāyai kalpinam dvāparāya adhikalpinam āskandāya sabhāsthāṇum mṛtyave govyaccham antakāya go ghātam kṣudhe yaḥ gām vikṛntantam bhikṣamāṇaḥ upatiṣṭhati duṣkṛtāya caraka ācāryam pāpmane sailagam

original: pratiśrutkāyā artanaṃ ghoṣāya bhaṣam antāya bahuvādinam anantāya  mūkam̐ śabdāyāḍambarāghātaṃ mahase vīṇāvādaṃ krośāya tūṇavadhmam  avarasparāya śaṅkhadhmaṃ vanāya vatapam anyato'raṇyāya dāvapam //
analyzed: pratiśrutkāyāḥ artanam ghoṣāya bhaṣam antāya bahu vādinam anantāya mūkam śabdāya āḍambara āghātam mahase vīṇā vādam krośāya tūṇa vadhmam avarasparāya śaṅkha dhmam vanāya vatapam anya toraṇyāya dāvapam

original: narmāya pum̐ścalūm̐ hasāya kāriṃ yādase śābalyāṃ grāmaṇyaṃ  gaṇakam abhikrośakaṃ tān mahase vīṇāvādaṃ pāṇighnaṃ tūṇavadhmaṃ tān  nṛtāyānandāya talavam //
analyzed: narmāya pumścalūm hasāya kārim yādase śābalyām grāmaṇyam gaṇakam abhikrośakam tān mahase vīṇā vādam pāṇi ghnam tūṇa vadhmam tān nṛtāya ānandāya talavam

original: agnaye pīvānaṃ pṛthivyai pīṭhasarpiṇaṃ vāyave cāṇḍālam  antarikṣāya vam̐śanartinaṃ dive khalatim̐ sūryāya haryakṣaṃ nakṣatrebhyaḥ  kirmiraṃ candramase kilāsam ahne śuklaṃ piṅgākṣam̐ rātryai kṛṣṇaṃ  piṅgākṣam //
analyzed: agnaye pīvānam pṛthivyai pīṭha sarpiṇam vāyave cāṇḍālam antarikṣāya vamśa nartinam dive khalatim sūryāya hari akṣam nakṣatrebhyaḥ kirmiram candramase kilāsam ahne śuklam piṅga akṣam rātryai kṛṣṇam piṅga akṣam

original: ataitān aṣṭau virūpān ā labhate 'tidīrghaṃ cātihrasvaṃ  cātisthūlaṃ cātikṛśaṃ cātiśuklaṃ cātikṛṣṇaṃ cātikulvaṃ cātilomaśaṃ  ca /  aśūdrā abrāhmaṇās te prājāpatyāḥ /  māgadhaḥ pum̐ścalī kitavaḥ klībo 'śūdrā abrāhmaṇās te prājāpatyāḥ //
analyzed: atas etān aṣṭau virūpān ā labhate ti dīrgham ca ati hrasvam ca ati sthūlam ca ati kṛśam ca ati śuklam ca ati kṛṣṇam ca ati kulvam ca ati lomaśam ca

original: sahasraśīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasrākṣaḥ sahasrapāt /  sa bhūmim̐ sarvata spṛtvāty atiṣṭhad daśāṅgulam //
analyzed: sahasra śīrṣā puruṣaḥ sahasra akṣaḥ sahasra pād    sa bhūmim sarvatas spṛtvā ati atiṣṭhat daśa aṅgulam

original: puruṣa evedam̐ sarvaṃ yad bhūtaṃ yac ca bhāvyam /  utāmṛtatvasyeśāno yad annenātirohati //
analyzed: puruṣaḥ eva idam sarvam yat bhūtam yat ca bhāvyam   uta amṛta tvasya īśānaḥ yat annena atirohati

original: etāvān asya mahimāto jyāyām̐ś ca pūruṣaḥ /  pādo 'sya viśvā bhūtāni tripād asyāmṛtaṃ divi //
analyzed: etāvān asya mahimā atas jyāyān ca pūruṣaḥ   pādaḥ u sya viśvā bhūtāni tri pād asya amṛtam divi

original: tripād ūrdhva ud ait puruṣaḥ pādo 'syehābhavat punaḥ /  tato viṣvaṅ vy akrāmat sāśanānaśane abhi //
analyzed: tri pād ūrdhvaḥ ud ait puruṣaḥ pādaḥ u sya iha abhavat punar   tatas viṣvaṅ vi akrāmat sa aśana anaśane abhi

original: tasmād virāḍ ajāyata virājo adhi pūruṣaḥ /  sa jāto aty aricyata paścād bhūmim atho puraḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt virāj ajāyata virājaḥ adhi pūruṣaḥ   sa jātaḥ ati aricyata paścāt bhūmim atha u puras

original: tasmād yajñāt sarvahutaḥ sambhṛtaṃ pṛṣadājyam /  paśūm̐s tām̐ś cakre vāyavyān āraṇyā grāmyāś ca ye //
analyzed: tasmāt yajñāt sarva hutaḥ sambhṛtam pṛṣadājyam   paśūm tām cakre vāyavyān āraṇyāḥ grāmyāḥ ca ye

original: tasmād yajñāt sarvahuta ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire /  chandām̐si jajñire tasmād yajus tasmād ajāyata //
analyzed: tasmāt yajñāt sarva hutaḥ ṛcaḥ sāmāni jajñire chandāmsi jajñire tasmāt yajuḥ tasmāt ajāyata

original: tasmād aśvā ajāyanta ye ke cobhayādataḥ /  gāvo ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāj jātā ajāvayaḥ //
analyzed: tasmāt aśvāḥ ajāyanta ye ke ca ubhaya adataḥ    gāvaḥ ha jajñire tasmāt tasmāt jātāḥ aja avayaḥ

original: taṃ yajñaṃ barhiṣi praukṣan puruṣaṃ jātam agrataḥ /  tena devā ayajanta sādhyā ṛṣayaś ca ye //
analyzed: tam yajñam barhiṣi praukṣan puruṣam jātam agratas    tena devāḥ ayajanta sādhyāḥ ṛṣayaḥ ca ye

original: yat puruṣaṃ vy adadhuḥ katidhā vy akalpayan /  mukhaṃ kim asya kau bāhū kā ūrū pādā ucyete //
analyzed: yat puruṣam vi adadhuḥ katidhā vi akalpayan mukham kim asya kau bāhū kau ūrū pādau ucyete

original: brāhmaṇo 'sya mukham āsīd bāhū rājanyaḥ kṛtaḥ /  ūrū tad asya yad vaiśyaḥ padbhyām̐ śūdro ajāyata //
analyzed: brāhmaṇaḥ sya mukham āsīt bāhū rājanyaḥ kṛtaḥ   ūrū tat asya yat vaiśyaḥ padbhyām śūdraḥ ajāyata

original: candramā manaso jātaś cakṣoḥ sūryo ajāyata /  śrotrād vāyuś ca prāṇaś ca mukhād agnir ajāyata //
analyzed: candramāḥ manasaḥ jātaḥ cakṣoḥ sūryaḥ ajāyata    śrotrāt vāyuḥ ca prāṇaḥ ca mukhāt agniḥ ajāyata

original: nābhyā āsīd antarikṣam̐ śīrṣṇo dyauḥ sam avartata /  padbhyāṃ bhūmir diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā lokām̐ akalpayan //
analyzed: nābhyāḥ āsīt antarikṣam śīrṣṇaḥ dyauḥ sam avartata   padbhyām bhūmiḥ diśaḥ śrotrāt tathā akalpayan

original: yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devā yajñam atanvata /  vasanto 'syāsīd ājyaṃ grīṣma idhmaḥ śarad dhaviḥ //
analyzed: yat puruṣeṇa haviṣā devāḥ yajñam atanvata    vasantaḥ sya āsīt ājyam grīṣmaḥ idhmaḥ śarad haviḥ

original: saptāsyāsan paridhayas triḥ sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ /  devā yad yajñaṃ tanvānā abadhnan puruṣaṃ paśum //
analyzed: sapta asya āsan paridhayaḥ tris sapta samidhaḥ kṛtāḥ   devāḥ yat yajñam tanvānāḥ abadhnan puruṣam paśum

original: yajñena yajñam ayajanta devās tāni dharmāṇi prathamāny āsan /  te ha nākaṃ mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ //
analyzed: yajñena yajñam ayajanta devāḥ tāni dharmāṇi prathamāni āsan    te ha nākam mahimānaḥ sacanta yatra pūrve sādhyāḥ santi devāḥ

original: adbhyaḥ sambhṛtaḥ pṛthivyai rasāc ca viśvakarmaṇaḥ sam  avartatāgre /  tasya tvaṣṭā vidadhad rūpam eti tan martyasya devatvam ājānam agre //
analyzed: adbhyaḥ sambhṛtaḥ pṛthivyai rasāt ca viśva karmaṇaḥ sam avartata agre   tasya tvaṣṭā vidadhat rūpam eti tat martyasya deva tvam ājānam agre

original: vedāham etaṃ puruṣaṃ mahāntam ādityavarṇaṃ tamasaḥ parastāt /  tam eva viditvāti mṛtyum eti nānyaḥ panthā vidyate 'yanāya //
analyzed: veda aham etam puruṣam mahāntam āditya varṇam tamasaḥ parastāt   tam eva viditvā ati mṛtyum eti na anyaḥ panthāḥ vidyate yanāya

original: prajāpatiś carati garbhe antar ajāyamāno bahudhā vi jāyate /  tasya yoniṃ pari paśyanti dhīrās tasmin ha tasthur bhuvanāni viśvā //
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ carati garbhe antar a jāyamānaḥ bahudhā vi jāyate    tasya yonim pari paśyanti dhīrāḥ tasmin ha tasthuḥ bhuvanāni viśvā

original: yo devebhya ātapati yo devānāṃ purohitaḥ /  pūrvo yo devebhyo jāto namo rucāya brāhmaye //
analyzed: yaḥ devebhyaḥ ātapati yaḥ devānām purohitaḥ   pūrvaḥ yaḥ devebhyaḥ jātaḥ namaḥ rucāya brāhmaye

original: rucaṃ brāhmyaṃ janayanto devā agre tad abruvan /  yas tvaivaṃ brāhmaṇo vidyāt tasya devā asan vaśe //
analyzed: rucam brāhmyam janayantaḥ devāḥ agre tat abruvan    yaḥ tvā evam brāhmaṇaḥ vidyāt tasya devāḥ asan vaśe

original: śrīś ca te lakṣmīś ca patnyāv ahorātre pārśve nakṣatrāṇi rūpam  aśvinau vyāttām /  iṣṇann iṣāṇāmuṃ ma iṣāṇa sarvalokaṃ ma iṣāṇa //
analyzed: śrīḥ ca te lakṣmīḥ ca patnyau ahar rātre pārśve nakṣatrāṇi rūpam aśvinau vyāttām    iṣṇan iṣāṇa amum me iṣāṇa sarva lokam me iṣāṇa

original: tad evāgnis tad ādityas tad vāyus tad u candramāḥ /  tad eva śukraṃ tad brahma tā āpaḥ sa prajāpatiḥ //
analyzed: tat eva agniḥ tat ādityaḥ tat vāyuḥ tat u candramāḥ   tat eva śukram tat brahma tāḥ āpaḥ sa prajāpatiḥ

original: sarve nimeṣā jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣād adhi /  nainam ūrdhvaṃ na tiryañcaṃ na madhye pari jagrabhat //
analyzed: sarve nimeṣāḥ jajñire vidyutaḥ puruṣāt adhi   na enam ūrdhvam na tiryañcam na madhye pari jagrabhat

original: na tasya pratimā asti yasya nāma mahad yaśaḥ /  hiraṇyagarbha ity eṣaḥ /  mā mā him̐sīd ity eṣā /  yasmān na jāta ity eṣa //
analyzed: na tasya pratimā asti yasya nāma mahat yaśaḥ   hiraṇya garbhaḥ iti eṣaḥ   mā mā himsīt iti eṣā    yasmāt na jātaḥ iti eṣa

original: eṣo ha devaḥ pradiśo 'nu sarvāḥ pūrvo ha jātaḥ sa u garbhe antaḥ /  sa eva jātaḥ sa janiṣyamāṇaḥ pratyaṅ janās tiṣthati sarvatomukhaḥ //
analyzed: eṣaḥ ha devaḥ pradiśaḥ nu sarvāḥ pūrvaḥ ha jātaḥ saḥ u garbhe antar    saḥ eva jātaḥ sa janiṣyamāṇaḥ pratyaṅ janāḥ tiṣthati sarvatomukhaḥ

original: yasmāj jātaṃ na purā kiṃ canaiva ya ābabhūva bhuvanāni viśvā /  prajāpatiḥ prajayā sam̐rarāṇas trīṇi jyotīm̐ṣi sacate sa aiḍaśī //
analyzed: yasmāt jātam na purā kim cana eva yaḥ ābabhūva bhuvanāni viśvā    prajāpatiḥ prajayā samrarāṇaḥ trīṇi jyotīmṣi sacate saḥ aiḍaśī

original: yena dyaur ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā yena sva stabhitaṃ yena nākaḥ  /  yo antarikṣe rajaso vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yena dyauḥ ugrā pṛthivī ca dṛḍhā yena svar stabhitam yena nākaḥ     yaḥ antarikṣe rajasaḥ vimānaḥ kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: yaṃ krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhy aikṣetāṃ manasā rejamāne /  yatrādhi sūra udito vibhāti kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema //
analyzed: yam krandasī avasā tastabhāne abhī aikṣetām manasā rejamāne     yatra adhi sūraḥ uditaḥ vibhāti kasmai devāya haviṣā vidhema

original: āpo ha yad bṛhatīḥ /  yaś cid āpaḥ //
analyzed: āpaḥ ha yat bṛhatīḥ yaḥ cit āpaḥ

original: venas tat paśyan nihitaṃ guhā sad yatra viśvaṃ bhavaty ekanīḍam /  tasminn idam̐ saṃ ca vi caiti sarvam̐ sa otaḥ protaś ca vibhūḥ prajāsu //
analyzed: venaḥ tat paśyan nihitam guhā sat yatra viśvam bhavati eka nīḍam    tasmin idam sam ca vi ca eti sarvam saḥ otaḥ protaḥ ca vibhūḥ prajāsu

original: pra tad voced amṛtaṃ nu vidvān gandharvo dhāma vibhṛtaṃ guhā  sat /  trīṇi padāni nihitā guhāsya yas tāni veda sa pituḥ pitāsat //
analyzed: pra tat vocet amṛtam nu vidvān gandharvaḥ dhāma vibhṛtam guhā sat  / trīṇi padāni nihitā guhā asya yaḥ tāni veda sa pituḥ pitā asat

original: sa no bandhur janitā sa vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā /  yatra devā amṛtam ānaśānās tṛtīye dhāmann adhy airayanta //
analyzed: sa naḥ bandhuḥ janitā sa vidhātā dhāmāni veda bhuvanāni viśvā    yatra devāḥ amṛtam ānaśānāḥ tṛtīye dhāman adhi airayanta

original: parītya bhūtāni parītya lokān parītya sarvāḥ pradiśo diśaś ca /  upasthāya prathamajām ṛtasyātmanātmānam abhi saṃ viveśa //
analyzed: parītya bhūtāni parītya lokān parītya sarvāḥ pradiśaḥ diśaḥ ca     upasthāya prathama jām ṛtasya ātmanā ātmānam abhi sam viveśa

original: pari dyāvāpṛthivī sadya itvā pari lokān pari diśaḥ pari svaḥ /  ṛtasya tantuṃ vitataṃ vicṛtya tad apaśyat tad abhavat tad āsīt //
analyzed: pari dyāvāpṛthivī sadyas itvā pari lokān pari diśaḥ pari svar    ṛtasya tantum vitatam vicṛtya tat apaśyat tat abhavat tat āsīt

original: sadasas patim adbhutaṃ priyam indrasya kāmyam /  saniṃ medhām ayāsiṣam̐m svāhā //
analyzed: sadasaḥ patim adbhutam priyam indrasya kāmyam    sanim medhām ayāsiṣam svāhā

original: yāṃ medhāṃ devagaṇāḥ pitaraś copāsate /  tayā mām adya medhayāgne medhāvinaṃ kuru svāhā //
analyzed: yām medhām deva gaṇāḥ pitaraḥ ca upāsate    tayā mām adya medhayā agne medhāvinam kuru svāhā

original: medhāṃ me varuṇo dadātu medhām agniḥ prajāpatiḥ /  medhām indras ca vāyuś ca medhāṃ dhātā dadātu me svāhā //
analyzed: medhām me varuṇaḥ dadātu medhām agniḥ prajāpatiḥ   medhām indraḥ ca vāyuḥ ca medhām dhātā dadātu me svāhā

original: idaṃ me brahma ca kṣatraṃ cobhe śriyam aśnutām /  mayi devā dadhatu śriyam uttamāṃ tasyai te svāhā //
analyzed: idam me brahma ca kṣatram ca ubhe śriyam aśnutām    mayi devāḥ dadhatu śriyam uttamām tasyai te svāhā

original: asyājarāso damām aritrā arcaddhūmāso agnayaḥ pāvakāḥ /  śvitīcayaḥ śvātrāso bhuraṇyavo vanarṣado vāyavo na somāḥ //
analyzed: asya ajarāsaḥ damām aritrā arcat dhūmāsaḥ agnayaḥ pāvakāḥ śvitīcayaḥ śvātrāsaḥ bhuraṇyavaḥ vanarṣadaḥ vāyavaḥ na somāḥ

original: harayo dhumaketavo vātajūtā upa dyavi /  yatante vṛthag agnayaḥ //
analyzed: harayaḥ dhuma ketavaḥ vāta jūtāḥ upa dyavi    yatante vṛthak agnayaḥ

original: yajā no mitrāvaruṇā yajā devām̐ ṛtaṃ bṛhat /  agne yakṣi svaṃ damam //
analyzed: yaja naḥ mitrāvaruṇā yaja devām ṛtam bṛhat    agne yakṣi svam damam

original: yukṣvā hi devahūtamām̐ aśvām̐ agne rathīr iva /  ni hotā pūrvyaḥ sadaḥ //
analyzed: yukṣvā hi deva hūtamām aśvām agne rathīḥ iva    ni hotā pūrvyaḥ sadaḥ

original: dve virūpe carataḥ svarthe anyānyā vatsam upa dhāpayete /  harir anyasyāṃ bhavati svadhāvāñ chukro anyasyāṃ dadṛśe suvarcāḥ //
analyzed: dve virūpe carataḥ su arthe anyā anyā vatsam upa dhāpayete   hariḥ anyasyām bhavati svadhāvān śukraḥ anyasyām dadṛśe su varcāḥ

original: ayam iha prathamo dhāyi dhātṛbhir hotā yajiṣṭho adhvareṣv īḍyaḥ /  yam apnavāno bhṛgavo virurucur vaneṣu citraṃ vibhvaṃ viśe-viśe //
analyzed: ayam iha prathamaḥ dhāyi dhātṛbhiḥ hotā yajiṣṭhaḥ adhvareṣu īḍyaḥ   yam apnavānaḥ bhṛgavaḥ virurucuḥ vaneṣu citram vibhvam viśeviśe

original: trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇy agniṃ trim̐śac ca devā nava cāsaparyan /  aukṣan ghṛtair astṛṇan barhir asmā ād id dhotāraṃ ny asādayanta //
analyzed: trīṇi śatā trī sahasrāṇi agnim trimśat ca devāḥ nava ca asaparyan    aukṣan ghṛtaiḥ astṛṇan barhiḥ asmai āt id hotāram ni asādayanta

original: mūrdhānaṃ divo aratiṃ pṛthivyā vaiśvānaram ṛta ā jātam agnim /  kavim̐ samrājam atithiṃ janānām āsann ā pātraṃ janayanta devāḥ //
analyzed: mūrdhānam divaḥ aratim pṛthivyāḥ vaiśvānaram ṛte ā jātam agnim    kavim samrājam atithim janānām āsan ā pātram janayanta devāḥ

original: agnir vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanad draviṇasyur vipanyayā /  samiddhaḥ śukra āhutaḥ //
analyzed: agniḥ vṛtrāṇi jaṅghanat draviṇasyuḥ vipanyayā samiddhaḥ śukraḥ āhutaḥ

original: viśvebhiḥ somyaṃ madhv agna indreṇa vāyunā /  pibā mitrasya dhāmabhiḥ //
analyzed: viśvebhiḥ somyam madhu agne indreṇa vāyunā    pibā mitrasya dhāmabhiḥ

original: ā yad iṣe nṛpatiṃ teja ānaṭ śuci reto niṣiktaṃ dyaur abhīke /  agniḥ śardham anavadyaṃ yuvānam̐ svādhyaṃ janayat sūdayac ca //
analyzed: ā yat iṣe nṛpatim tejaḥ ānaṭ śuci retaḥ niṣiktam dyauḥ abhīke    agniḥ śardham anavadyam yuvānam svādhyam janayat sūdayat ca

original: agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāny uttamāni santu /  saṃ jāspatyam̐ suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā mahām̐si //
analyzed: agne śardha mahate saubhagāya tava dyumnāni uttamāni santu   sam jāspatyam suyamam ā kṛṇuṣva śatrūyatām abhi tiṣṭhā

original: tvām̐ hi mandratamam arkaśokair vavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣy agne /  indraṃ na tvā śavasā devatā vāyuṃ pṛṇanti rādhasā nṛtamāḥ //
analyzed: tvām hi mandratamam arka śokaiḥ vavṛmahe mahi naḥ śroṣi agne    indram na tvā śavasā devatā vāyum pṛṇanti rādhasā nṛtamāḥ

original: tve agne svāhuta priyāsaḥ santu sūrayaḥ /  yantāro ye maghavāno janānām ūrvān dayanta gonām //
analyzed: tve agne su āhuta priyāsaḥ santu sūrayaḥ   yantāraḥ ye maghavānaḥ janānām ūrvān dayanta gonām

original: śrudhi śrutkarṇa vahnibhir devair agne sayāvabhiḥ /  ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitro aryamā prātaryāvāṇo adhvaram //
analyzed: śrudhi śrut karṇa vahnibhiḥ devaiḥ agne sa yāvabhiḥ    ā sīdantu barhiṣi mitraḥ aryamā prātaryāvāṇaḥ adhvaram

original: viśveṣām aditir yajñiyānāṃ viśveṣām atithir mānuṣāṇām /  agnir devānām ava āvṛṇānaḥ sumṛḍīko bhavatu jātavedāḥ //
analyzed: viśveṣām aditiḥ yajñiyānām viśveṣām atithiḥ mānuṣāṇām    agniḥ devānām avaḥ āvṛṇānaḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ bhavatu jātavedāḥ

original: maho agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇy anāgā mitre varuṇe svastaye /  śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani tad devānām avo adyā vṛṇīmahe //
analyzed: mahaḥ agneḥ samidhānasya śarmaṇi anāgāḥ mitre varuṇe svastaye   śreṣṭhe syāma savituḥ savīmani tat devānām avaḥ adyā vṛṇīmahe

original: āpaś cit pipyu staryo na gāvo nakṣann ṛtaṃ jaritāras ta indra /  yāhi vāyur na niyuto no acchā tvam̐ hi dhībhir dayase vi vājān //
analyzed: āpaḥ cit pipyuḥ staryaḥ na gāvaḥ nakṣan ṛtam jaritāraḥ te indra    yāhi vāyuḥ na niyutaḥ naḥ acchā tvam hi dhībhiḥ dayase vi vājān

original: gāva upāvatāvataṃ mahī yajñasya rapsudā /  ubhā karṇā hiraṇyayā //
analyzed: gāvaḥ upāvata avatam mahī yajñasya rapsu dā    ubhā karṇā hiraṇyayā

original: yad adya sūra udite 'nāgā mitro aryamā /  suvāti savitā bhagaḥ //
analyzed: yat adya sūre udite nāgāḥ mitraḥ aryamā    suvāti savitā bhagaḥ

original: ā sute siñcata śriyam̐ rodasyor abhiśriyam /  rasā dadhīta vṛṣabham //
analyzed: ā sute siñcata śriyam rodasyoḥ abhiśriyam   rasā dadhīta vṛṣabham

original: ātiṣṭhantaṃ pari viśve abhūṣañ chriyo vasānaś carati svarociḥ /  mahat tad vṛṣṇo asurasya nāmā viśvarūpo amṛtāni tasthau //
analyzed: ātiṣṭhantam pari viśve abhūṣam chriyaḥ vasānaḥ carati sva rociḥ    mahat tat vṛṣṇaḥ asurasya nāma ā viśva rūpaḥ amṛtāni tasthau

original: pra vo mahe mandamānāyāndhaso 'rcā viśvānarāya viśvābhuve /  indrasya yasya sumakham̐ saho mahi śravo nṛmṇaṃ ca rodasī saparyataḥ //
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mandamānāya andhasaḥ rcā viśvānarāya viśvābhuve      indrasya yasya su makham sahaḥ mahi śravaḥ nṛmṇam ca rodasī saparyataḥ

original: bṛhann id idhma eṣāṃ bhūri śastaṃ pṛthuḥ svaruḥ /  yeṣām indro yuvā sakhā //
analyzed: bṛhan id idhmaḥ eṣām bhūri śastam pṛthuḥ svaruḥ    yeṣām indraḥ yuvā sakhā

original: indrehi matsy andhaso viśvebhiḥ somaparvabhiḥ /  mahām̐ abhiṣṭir ojasā //
analyzed: indra ihi matsi andhasaḥ viśvebhiḥ soma parvabhiḥ   mahām abhiṣṭiḥ ojasā

original: indro vṛtram avṛṇoc chardhanītiḥ pra māyinām aminād varpaṇītiḥ /  ahan vyam̐sam uśadhag vaneṣv āvir dhenā akṛṇod rāmyāṇām //
analyzed: indraḥ vṛtram avṛṇot śardha nītiḥ pra māyinām amināt varpaṇītiḥ    ahan vyamsam uśadhak vaneṣu āvis dhenāḥ akṛṇot rāmyāṇām

original: kutas tvam indra māhinaḥ sann eko yāsi satpate kiṃ ta itthā /  saṃ pṛcchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānair voces tan no harivo yat te asme //
analyzed: kutas tvam indra māhinaḥ san ekaḥ yāsi satpate kim te itthā sam pṛcchase samarāṇaḥ śubhānaiḥ voceḥ tat naḥ harivas yat te asme

original: mahām̐ indro ya ojasā /  kadā cana starīr asi /  kadā cana pra yucchasi //
analyzed: mahām indraḥ yaḥ ojasā    kadā cana starīḥ asi    kadā cana pra yucchasi

original: ā tat ta indrāyavaḥ panantābhi ya ūrvaṃ gomantaṃ titṛtsān /  sakṛtsvaṃ ye puruputrāṃ mahīm̐ sahasradhārāṃ bṛhatīṃ dudukṣan //
analyzed: ā tat te indra āyavaḥ pananta abhi ye ūrvam gomantam titṛtsān   sakṛtsvam ye puru putrām mahīm sahasra dhārām bṛhatīm dudukṣan

original: imāṃ te dhiyaṃ pra bhare maho mahīm asya stotre dhiṣaṇā yat ta  ānaje /  tam utsave ca prasave ca sāsahim indraṃ devāsaḥ śavasāmadann anu //
analyzed: imām te dhiyam pra bhare mahaḥ mahīm asya stotre dhiṣaṇā yat te ānaje    tam utsave ca prasave ca sāsahim indram devāsaḥ śavasā amadan anu

original: vibhrāḍ bṛhat pibatu somyaṃ madhv āyur dadhad yajñapatāv  avihrutam /  vātajūto yo abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣa purudhā vi rājati //
analyzed: vibhrāj bṛhat pibatu somyam madhu āyuḥ dadhat yajñapatau a vihrutam   vāta jūtaḥ yaḥ abhirakṣati tmanā prajāḥ pupoṣa purudhā vi rājati

original: ud u tyaṃ jātavedasaṃ devaṃ vahanti ketavaḥ /  dṛśe viśvāya sūryam̐ svāhā //
analyzed: ud u tyam jātavedasam devam vahanti ketavaḥ   dṛśe viśvāya sūryam svāhā

original: yenā pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantaṃ janām̐ anu /  tvaṃ varuṇa paśyasi //
analyzed: yena pāvaka cakṣasā bhuraṇyantam janām anu    tvam varuṇa paśyasi

original: daivyāv adhvaryū ā gatam̐ rathena sūryatvacā /  madhvā yajñam̐ sam añjāthe //
analyzed: daivyau adhvaryū ā gatam rathena sūrya tvacā    madhvā yajñam sam añjāthe

original: taṃ pratnathā /  ayaṃ venaḥ /  citram devānām //
analyzed: tam pratnathā   ayam venaḥ citram devānām
