original: ā na iḍābhir vidathe suśasti viśvānaraḥ savitā deva etu /  api yathā yuvāno matsathā no viśvaṃ jagad abhipitve manīṣā //
analyzed: ā naḥ iḍābhiḥ vidathe su śasti viśvānaraḥ savitā devaḥ etu    api yathā yuvānaḥ matsatha naḥ viśvam jagat abhipitve manīṣā

original: yad adya kac ca vṛtrahann udagā abhi sūrya /  sarvaṃ tad indra te vaśe //
analyzed: yat adya kad ca vṛtrahan udagāḥ abhi sūrya       sarvam tat indra te vaśe

original: taraṇir viśvadarśato jyotiṣkṛd asi sūrya /  viśvam ā bhāsi rocanam //
analyzed: taraṇiḥ viśva darśataḥ jyotiṣkṛt asi sūrya   viśvam ā bhāsi rocanam

original: tat sūryasya devatvaṃ tan mahitvaṃ madhyā kartor vitatam̐ saṃ  jabhāra /  yaded ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthād ād rātrī vāsas tanute simasmai //
analyzed: tat sūryasya deva tvam tat mahi tvam madhyā kartoḥ vitatam sam jabhāra    yadā id ayukta haritaḥ sadhasthāt āt rātrī vāsaḥ tanute simasmai

original: tan mitrasya varuṇasyābhicakṣe sūryo rūpaṃ kṛṇute dyor upasthe /  anantam anyad ruśad asya pājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyad dharitaḥ saṃ bharanti //
analyzed: tat mitrasya varuṇasya abhicakṣe sūryaḥ rūpam kṛṇute dyoḥ upasthe    anantam anyat ruśat asya pājaḥ kṛṣṇam anyat haritaḥ sam bharanti

original: baṇ mahām̐ asi sūrya baḍ āditya mahām̐ asi /  mahas te sato mahimā panasyate 'ddhā deva mahām̐ asi //
analyzed: baṭ mahām asi sūrya baṭ āditya mahām asi    mahaḥ te sataḥ mahimā panasyate ddhā deva mahām asi

original: baṭ sūrya śravasā mahām̐ asi satrā deva mahām̐ asi /  mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohito vibhu jyotir adābhyam //
analyzed: baṭ sūrya śravasā mahām asi satrā deva mahām asi  / mahnā devānām asuryaḥ purohitaḥ vibhu jyotiḥ adābhyam

original: śrāyanta iva sūryaṃ viśved indrasya bhakṣata /  vasūni jāte janamāna ojasā prati bhāgaṃ na dīdhima //
analyzed: śrāyantaḥ iva sūryam viśvā id indrasya bhakṣata    vasūni jāte janamāne ojasā prati bhāgam na dīdhima

original: adyā devā uditā sūryasya nir am̐hasaḥ pipṛtā nir avadyāt /  tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: adya devāḥ uditā sūryasya niḥ amhasaḥ pipṛta niḥ avadyāt     tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamāno niveśayann amṛtaṃ martyaṃ ca /  hiraṇyayena savitā rathenā devo yāti bhuvanāni paśyan //
analyzed: ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamānaḥ niveśayan amṛtam martyam ca  / hiraṇyayena savitā rathena ā devaḥ yāti bhuvanāni paśyan

original: pra vāvṛje suprayā barhir eṣām ā viśpatīva bīriṭa iyāte /  viśām aktor uṣasaḥ pūrvahūtau vāyuḥ pūṣā svastaye niyutvān //
analyzed: pra vāvṛje su prayāḥ barhiḥ eṣām ā viśpatī iva bīriṭe iyāte     viśām aktoḥ uṣasaḥ pūrva hūtau vāyuḥ pūṣā svastaye niyutvān

original: indravāyū bṛhaspatiṃ mitrāgniṃ pūṣaṇaṃ bhagam /  ādityān mārutaṃ gaṇam //
analyzed: indra vāyū bṛhaspatim mitra agnim pūṣaṇam bhagam ādityān mārutam gaṇam

original: varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvan mitro viśvābhir ūtibhiḥ /  karatāṃ naḥ surādhasaḥ //
analyzed: varuṇaḥ prāvitā bhuvat mitraḥ viśvābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ   karatām naḥ su rādhasaḥ

original: adhi na indreṣāṃ viṣṇo sajātyānām /  itā maruto aśvinā //
analyzed: adhi naḥ indra iṣām viṣṇo sajātyānām   ita marutaḥ aśvinā

original: taṃ pratnathā /  ayaṃ venaḥ /  ye devāsaḥ /  ā na iḍābhiḥ /  viśvebhiḥ somyaṃ madhu /  omāsaś carṣaṇīdhṛtaḥ //
analyzed: tam pratnathā    ayam venaḥ   ye devāsaḥ ā naḥ iḍābhiḥ viśvebhiḥ somyam madhu    omāsaḥ carṣaṇī dhṛtaḥ

original: agna indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ śardhaḥ pra yanta mārutota viṣṇo /  ubhā nāsatyā rudro adha gnāḥ pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvatī juṣanta //
analyzed: agne indra varuṇa mitra devāḥ śardhaḥ pra yanta māruta uta viṣṇo    ubhā nāsatyā rudraḥ adha gnāḥ pūṣā bhagaḥ sarasvatī juṣanta

original: indrāgnī mitrāvaruṇāditim̐ svaḥ pṛthivīṃ dyāṃ marutaḥ parvatām̐  apaḥ /  huve viṣṇuṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaspatiṃ bhagaṃ nu śam̐sam̐ savitāram ūtaye //
analyzed: indra agnī mitrāvaruṇā aditim svar pṛthivīm dyām marutaḥ parvatām apaḥ    huve viṣṇum pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaspatim bhagam nu śamsam savitāram ūtaye

original: asme rudrā mehanā parvatāso vṛtrahatye bharahūtau sajoṣāḥ /  yaḥ śam̐sate stuvate dhāyi pajra indrajyeṣṭhā asmām̐ avantu devāḥ //
analyzed: asme rudrāḥ mehanā parvatāsaḥ vṛtra hatye bhara hūtau sajoṣāḥ   yaḥ śamsate stuvate dhāyi pajraḥ indra jyeṣṭhāḥ asmām avantu devāḥ

original: arvāñco adyā bhavatā yajatrā ā vo hārdi bhayamāno vyayeyam /  trādhvaṃ no devā nijuro vṛkasya trādhvaṃ kartād avapado yajatrāḥ //
analyzed: arvāñcaḥ adya bhavata yajatrāḥ ā vaḥ hārdi bhayamānaḥ vyayeyam    trādhvam naḥ devāḥ nijuraḥ vṛkasya trādhvam kartāt avapadaḥ yajatrāḥ

original: viśve adya maruto viśva ūtī viśve bhavantv agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ /  viśve no devā avasā gamantu viśvam astu draviṇaṃ vājo asme //
analyzed: viśve adya marutaḥ viśve ūtī viśve bhavantu agnayaḥ samiddhāḥ   viśve naḥ devāḥ avasā gamantu viśvam astu draviṇam vājaḥ asme

original: viśve devāḥ śṛṇutemam̐ havaṃ me ye antarikṣe ya upa dyavi ṣṭha /  ye agnijihvā uta vā yajatrā āsadyāsmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam //
analyzed: viśve devāḥ śṛṇuta imam havam me ye antarikṣe yaḥ upa dyavi ṣṭha    ye agni jihvāḥ uta vā yajatrāḥ āsadya asmin barhiṣi mādayadhvam

original: devebhyo hi prathamaṃ yajñiyebhyo 'mṛtatvam̐ suvasi bhāgam uttaṃam /  ād id dāmānam̐ savitar vy `ūrṇuṣe 'nūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ //
analyzed: devebhyaḥ hi prathamam yajñiyebhyaḥ mṛta tvam suvasi bhāgam uttaṃam    āt id dāmānam savitar vi ūrṇuṣe nūcīnā jīvitā mānuṣebhyaḥ

original: pra vāyum acchā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhadrayiṃ viśvavāram̐ rathaprām /  dyutadyāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavim iyakṣasi prayajyo //
analyzed: pra vāyum acchā bṛhatī manīṣā bṛhat rayim viśva vāram ratha prām    dyutat yāmā niyutaḥ patyamānaḥ kaviḥ kavim iyakṣasi prayajyo

original: indravāyū ime sutā upa prayobhir āgatam /  +indavo vām uśanti hi //
analyzed: indra vāyū ime sutāḥ upa prayobhiḥ āgatam   indavaḥ vām uśanti hi

original: mitram̐ huve pūtadakṣaṃ varuṇaṃ ca riśādasam /  dhiyaṃ ghṛtācīm̐ sādhantā //
analyzed: mitram huve pūta dakṣam varuṇam ca riśādasam     dhiyam ghṛtācīm sādhantā

original: dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutā nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ /  ā yātam̐ rudravartanī //
analyzed: dasrā yuvākavaḥ sutāḥ nāsatyā vṛktabarhiṣaḥ   ā yātam rudravartanī

original: taṃ pratnathā /  ayaṃ venaḥ //
analyzed: tam pratnathā ayam venaḥ

original: vidad yadī saramā rugṇam adrer mahi pāthaḥ pūrvyam̐ sadhryak kaḥ /  agraṃ nayat supady akṣarāṇām acchā ravaṃ prathamā jānatī gāt //
analyzed: vidat yadī saramā rugṇam adreḥ mahi pāthaḥ pūrvyam sadhryak kaḥ   agram nayat su padī akṣarāṇām acchā ravam prathamā jānatī gāt

original: nahi spaśam avidann anyam asmād vaiśvānarāt puraetāram agneḥ /  em enam avṛdhann amṛtā amartyaṃ vaiśvānaraṃ kṣaitrajityāya devāḥ //
analyzed: nahi spaśam avidan anyam asmāt vaiśvānarāt puraetāram agneḥ    ā īm enam avṛdhan amṛtāḥ amartyam vaiśvānaram kṣaitrajityāya devāḥ

original: ugrā vighaninā mṛdha indrāgnī havāmahe /  tā no mṛḍāta īdṛśe //
analyzed: ugrā vighaninā mṛdhaḥ indra agnī havāmahe   tā naḥ mṛḍātaḥ īdṛśe

original: upāsmai gāyatā naraḥ pavamānāyendave /  abhi devām̐ iyakṣate //
analyzed: upa asmai gāyata naraḥ pavamānāya indave    abhi devām iyakṣate

original: ye tvāhihatye maghavann avardhan ye śāmbare harivo ye gaviṣṭau /  ye tvā nūnam anumadanti viprāḥ pibendra somam̐ sagaṇo marudbhiḥ //
analyzed: ye tvā ahi hatye maghavan avardhan ye śāmbare harivas ye gaviṣṭau    ye tvā nūnam anumadanti viprāḥ piba indra somam sa gaṇaḥ marudbhiḥ

original: janiṣṭhā ugraḥ sahase turāya mandra ojiṣṭho bahulābhimānaḥ /  avardhann indraṃ marutaś cid atra mātā yad vīraṃ dadhanad dhaniṣṭhā //
analyzed: janiṣṭhāḥ ugraḥ sahase turāya mandraḥ ojiṣṭhaḥ bahula abhimānaḥ    avardhan indram marutaḥ cit atra mātā yat vīram dadhanat dhaniṣṭhā

original: ā tū na indra vṛtrahann asmākam ardham ā gahi /  mahān mahībhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: ā tu naḥ indra vṛtrahan asmākam ardham ā gahi   / mahān mahībhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: tvam indra pratūrtiṣv abhi viśvā asi spṛdhaḥ /  aśastihā janitā viśvatūr asi tvaṃ tūrya taruṣyataḥ //
analyzed: tvam indra pratūrtiṣu abhi viśvāḥ asi spṛdhaḥ   aśasti hā janitā viśvatūr asi tvam tūrya taruṣyataḥ

original: anu te śuṣmaṃ turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśuṃ na mātarā /  viśvās te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtraṃ yad indra tūrvasi //
analyzed: anu te śuṣmam turayantam īyatuḥ kṣoṇī śiśum na mātarā    viśvāḥ te spṛdhaḥ śnathayanta manyave vṛtram yat indra tūrvasi

original: yajño devānāṃ praty eti sumnam ādityāso bhavatā mṛḍayantaḥ /  ā vo 'rvācī sumatir vavṛtyād am̐hoś cid yā varivovittarāsat //
analyzed: yajñaḥ devānām prati eti sumnam ādityāsaḥ bhavata mṛḍayantaḥ   ā vaḥ rvācī sumatiḥ vavṛtyāt amhoḥ cit yā varivaḥ vittarā asat

original: adabdhebhiḥ savitaḥ pāyubhiṣ ṭvam̐ śivebhir adya pari pāhi no gayam /  hiraṇyajihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣā mākir no aghaśam̐sa īśata //
analyzed: adabdhebhiḥ savitar pāyubhiḥ tvam śivebhiḥ adya pari pāhi naḥ gayam   hiraṇya jihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣā mākir naḥ agha śamsaḥ īśata

original: pra vīrayā śucayo dadrire vām adhvaryubhir madhumantaḥ sutāsaḥ /  vaha vāyo niyuto yāhy acchā pibā sutasyāndhaso madāya //
analyzed: pra vīrayā śucayaḥ dadrire vām adhvaryubhiḥ madhumantaḥ sutāsaḥ   vaha vāyo niyutaḥ yāhi acchā piba sutasya andhasaḥ madāya

original: gāva upāvatāvataṃ mahī yajñasya rapsudā /  ubhā karṇā hiraṇyayā //
analyzed: gāvaḥ upāvata avatam mahī yajñasya rapsu dā    ubhā karṇā hiraṇyayā

original: kāvyayor ājāneṣu kratvā dakṣasya duroṇe /  riśādasā sadhastha ā //
analyzed: kāvyayoḥ ājāneṣu kratvā dakṣasya duroṇe    riśādasā sadhasthe ā

original: daivyāv adhvaryū ā gatam̐ rathena sūryatvacā /  madhvā yajñam̐ sam añjāthe //
analyzed: daivyau adhvaryū ā gatam rathena sūrya tvacā    madhvā yajñam sam añjāthe

original: taṃ pratnathā /  ayaṃ venaḥ //
analyzed: tam pratnathā ayam venaḥ

original: tiraścīno vitato raśmir eṣām adhaḥ svid āsī3d upari svid āsī3t /  retodhā āsan mahimāna āsant svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt //
analyzed: tiraścīnaḥ vitataḥ raśmiḥ eṣām adhas svid upari svid     retaḥ dhāḥ āsan mahimānaḥ āsan svadhā avastāt prayatiḥ parastāt

original: ā rodasī apṛṇad ā svar mahaj jātaṃ yad enam apaso adhārayan /  so adhvarāya pari ṇīyate kavir atyo na vājasātaye canohitaḥ //
analyzed: ā rodasī apṛṇat ā svar mahat jātam yat enam apasaḥ adhārayan    saḥ adhvarāya pari ṇīyate kaviḥ atyaḥ na vājasātaye canohitaḥ

original: ukthebhir vṛtrahantamā yā mandānā cid ā girā /  āṅgūṣair āvivāsataḥ //
analyzed: ukthebhiḥ vṛtra hantamā yā mandānā cit ā girā    āṅgūṣaiḥ āvivāsataḥ

original: upa naḥ sūnavo giraḥ śṛṇvantv amṛtasya ye /  sumṛḍīkā bhavantu naḥ //
analyzed: upa naḥ sūnavaḥ giraḥ śṛṇvantu amṛtasya ye     su mṛḍīkāḥ bhavantu naḥ

original: brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śam̐ sutāsaḥ śuṣma iyarti prabhṛto me adriḥ /  ā śāsate prati haryanty ukthemā harī vahatas tā no accha //
analyzed: brahmāṇi me matayaḥ śam sutāsaḥ śuṣmaḥ iyarti prabhṛtaḥ me adriḥ   ā śāsate prati haryanti ukthā imā harī vahataḥ tā naḥ accha

original: anuttam ā te maghavan nakir nu na tvāvām̐ asti devatā vidānaḥ /  na jāyamāno naśate na jāto yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhi pravṛddha //
analyzed: anuttam ā te maghavan nakir nu na asti devatā vidānaḥ    na jāyamānaḥ naśate na jātaḥ yāni kariṣyā kṛṇuhi pravṛddha

original: tad id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭhaṃ yato jajña ugras tveṣanṛmṇaḥ /  sadyo jajñāno ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yaṃ viśve madanty ūmāḥ //
analyzed: tat id āsa bhuvaneṣu jyeṣṭham yatas jajñe ugraḥ tveṣa nṛmṇaḥ    sadyas jajñānaḥ ni riṇāti śatrūn anu yam viśve madanti ūmāḥ

original: imā u tvā purūvaso giro vardhantu yā mama /  pāvakavarṇāḥ śucayo vipaścito 'bhi stomair anūṣata //
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā purūvaso giraḥ vardhantu yāḥ mama   / pāvaka varṇāḥ śucayaḥ vipaścitaḥ bhi stomaiḥ anūṣata

original: yasyāyaṃ viśva āryo dāsaḥ śevadhipā ariḥ /  tiraś cid arye ruśame parīravi tubhyet so ajyate rayiḥ //
analyzed: yasya ayam viśvaḥ āryaḥ dāsaḥ śevadhi pāḥ ariḥ tiras cit arye ruśame tubhya id saḥ ajyate rayiḥ

original: ayam̐ sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudra iva paprathe /  satyaḥ so asya mahimā gṛṇe śavo yajñeṣu viprarājye //
analyzed: ayam sahasram ṛṣibhiḥ sahaskṛtaḥ samudraḥ iva paprathe     satyaḥ saḥ asya mahimā gṛṇe śavaḥ yajñeṣu vipra rājye

original: adabdhebhiḥ savitaḥ pāyubhiṣ ṭvam̐ śivebhir adya pari pāhi no gayam /  hiraṇyajihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣā mākir no aghaśam̐sa īśata //
analyzed: adabdhebhiḥ savitar pāyubhiḥ tvam śivebhiḥ adya pari pāhi naḥ gayam   hiraṇya jihvaḥ suvitāya navyase rakṣā mākir naḥ agha śamsaḥ īśata

original: ā no yajñaṃ divispṛśaṃ vāyo yāhi sumanmabhiḥ /  antaḥ pavitra upari śrīṇāno 'yam̐ śukro ayāmi te //
analyzed: ā naḥ yajñam divispṛśam vāyo yāhi su manmabhiḥ   antar pavitre upari śrīṇānaḥ yam śukraḥ ayāmi te

original: indravāyū susaṃdṛśā suhaveha havāmahe /  yathā naḥ sarva ij jano 'namīvaḥ saṃgame sumanā asat //
analyzed: indra vāyū su saṃdṛśā su havā iha havāmahe    yathā naḥ sarvaḥ id janaḥ namīvaḥ saṃgame su manāḥ asat

original: ṛdhag itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye /  yo nūnaṃ mitrāvaruṇāv abhiṣṭaya ācakre havyadātaye //
analyzed: ṛdhak itthā sa martyaḥ śaśame devatātaye    yaḥ nūnam mitrāvaruṇau abhiṣṭaye ācakre havya dātaye

original: ā yātam upa bhūṣataṃ madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā /  dugdhaṃ payo vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā no mardhiṣṭam ā gatam //
analyzed: ā yātam upa bhūṣatam madhvaḥ pibatam aśvinā    dugdham payaḥ vṛṣaṇā jenyāvasū mā naḥ mardhiṣṭam ā gatam

original: praitu brahmaṇas patiḥ pra devy etu sūnṛtā /  acchā vīraṃ naryaṃ paṅktirādhasaṃ devā yajñaṃ nayantu naḥ //
analyzed: praitu brahmaṇaḥ patiḥ pra devī etu sūnṛtā   acchā vīram naryam paṅkti rādhasam devāḥ yajñam nayantu naḥ

original: candramā apsv antar ā suparṇo dhāvate divi /  rayiṃ piśaṃgaṃ bahulaṃ puruspṛham̐ harir eti kanikradat //
analyzed: candramāḥ apsu antar ā suparṇaḥ dhāvate divi    rayim piśaṃgam bahulam puruspṛham hariḥ eti kanikradat

original: devaṃ-devaṃ vo 'vase devaṃ-devam abhiṣṭaye /  devaṃ-devam̐ huvema vājasātaye gṛṇanto devyā dhiyā //
analyzed: devaṃdevam vaḥ vase devaṃdevam abhiṣṭaye devaṃdevam huvema vājasātaye gṛṇantaḥ devyā dhiyā

original: divi pṛṣṭo arocatāgnir vaiśvānaro bṛhan /  kṣmayā vṛdhāna ojasā canohito jyotiṣā bādhate tamaḥ //
analyzed: divi pṛṣṭaḥ arocata agniḥ vaiśvānaraḥ bṛhan   kṣmayā vṛdhānaḥ ojasā canohitaḥ jyotiṣā bādhate tamaḥ

original: indrāgnī apād iyaṃ pūrvāgāt padvatībhyaḥ /  hitvī śiro jihvayā vāvadac carat trim̐śat padā ny akramīt //
analyzed: indra agnī apāt iyam pūrvā āgāt padvatībhyaḥ    hitvī śiraḥ jihvayā vāvadat carat trimśat padā ni akramīt

original: devāso hi ṣmā manave samanyavo viśve sākam̐ sarātayaḥ /  te no adya te aparaṃ tuce tu no bhavantu varivovidaḥ //
analyzed: devāsaḥ hi sma manave samanyavaḥ viśve sākam sa rātayaḥ   te naḥ adya te aparam tuce tu naḥ bhavantu varivaḥ vidaḥ

original: apādhamad abhiśastīr aśastihāthendro dyumny ābhavat /  devās ta indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhadbhāno marudgaṇa //
analyzed: apādhamat abhiśastīḥ aśasti hā atha indraḥ dyumnī ābhavat    devāḥ te indra sakhyāya yemire bṛhat bhāno marut gaṇa

original: pra va indrāya bṛhate maruto brahmārcata /  vṛtram̐ hanati vṛtrahā śatakratur vajreṇa śataparvaṇā //
analyzed: pra vaḥ indrāya bṛhate marutaḥ brahma arcata    vṛtram hanati vṛtrahā śatakratuḥ vajreṇa śata parvaṇā

original: asyed indro vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyam̐ śavo made sutasya viṣṇavi /  adyā tam asya mahimānam āyavo 'nu ṣṭuvanti pūrvathā //
analyzed: asya id indraḥ vāvṛdhe vṛṣṇyam śavaḥ made sutasya viṣṇavi    adyā tam asya mahimānam āyavaḥ nu stuvanti pūrvathā

original: imā u tvā /  yasyāyam /  ayam̐ sahasram /  ūrdhva ū ṣu ṇaḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ u tvā  yasya ayam  ayam sahasram   ūrdhvaḥ u su naḥ

original: yaj jāgrato dūram udaiti daivaṃ tad u suptasya tathaivaiti /  dūraṃgamaṃ jyotiṣāṃ jyotir ekaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu //
analyzed: yat jāgrataḥ dūram udaiti daivam tat u suptasya tathā eva eti   / dūraṃgamam jyotiṣām jyotiḥ ekam tat me manaḥ śiva saṃkalpam astu

original: yena karmāṇy apaso manīṣiṇo yajñe kṛṇvanti vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ /  yad apūrvaṃ yakṣam antaḥ prajānāṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu //
analyzed: yena karmāṇi apasaḥ manīṣiṇaḥ yajñe kṛṇvanti vidatheṣu dhīrāḥ   yat apūrvam yakṣam antar prajānām tat me manaḥ śiva saṃkalpam astu

original: yat prajñānam uta ceto dhṛtiś ca yaj jyotir antar amṛtaṃ  prajāsu /  yasmān na ṛte kiṃ cana karma kriyate tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu //
analyzed: yat prajñānam uta cetaḥ dhṛtiḥ ca yat jyotiḥ antar amṛtam prajāsu    yasmāt na ṛte kim cana karma kriyate tat me manaḥ śiva saṃkalpam astu

original: yenedaṃ bhūtaṃ bhuvanaṃ bhaviṣyat parigṛhītam amṛtena sarvam /  yena yajñas tāyate saptahotā tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu //
analyzed: yena idam bhūtam bhuvanam bhaviṣyat parigṛhītam amṛtena sarvam    yena yajñaḥ tāyate saptahotā tat me manaḥ śiva saṃkalpam astu

original: yasminn ṛcaḥ sāma yajūm̐ṣi yasmin pratiṣṭhitā rathanābhāv ivārāḥ  /  yasmim̐ś cittam̐ sarvam otaṃ prajānaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu //
analyzed: yasmin ṛcaḥ sāma yajūmṣi yasmin pratiṣṭhitāḥ ratha nābhau iva arāḥ     yasmin cittam sarvam otam prajānam tat me manaḥ śiva saṃkalpam astu

original: suṣārathir aśvān iva yan manuṣyān nenīyate 'bhīśubhir vājina iva /  hṛtpratiṣṭhaṃ yad ajiraṃ javiṣṭhaṃ tan me manaḥ śivasaṃkalpam astu //
analyzed: suṣārathiḥ aśvān iva yat manuṣyān nenīyate bhīśubhiḥ vājinaḥ iva  / hṛd pratiṣṭham yat ajiram javiṣṭham tat me manaḥ śiva saṃkalpam astu

original: pituṃ nu stoṣaṃ maho dharmāṇaṃ taviṣīm /  yasya trito vy ojasā vṛtraṃ viparvam ardayat //
analyzed: pitum nu stoṣam mahaḥ dharmāṇam taviṣīm    yasya tritaḥ vi ojasā vṛtram viparvam ardayat

original: anv id anumate tvaṃ manyāsai śaṃ ca nas kṛdhi /  kratve dakṣāya no hinu pra ṇa āyūm̐ṣi tāriṣaḥ //
analyzed: anu id anumate tvam manyāsai śam ca naḥ kṛdhi   kratve dakṣāya naḥ hinu pra naḥ āyūmṣi tāriṣaḥ

original: anu no 'dyānumatir yajñaṃ deveṣu manyatām /  agniś ca havyavāhano bhavataṃ dāśuṣe mayaḥ //
analyzed: anu naḥ dyānumatiḥ yajñam deveṣu manyatām   agniḥ ca havya vāhanaḥ bhavatam dāśuṣe mayaḥ

original: sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā /  juṣasva havyam āhutaṃ prajāṃ devi didiḍḍhi naḥ //
analyzed: sinīvāli pṛthuṣṭuke yā devānām asi svasā   juṣasva havyam āhutam prajām devi didiḍḍhi naḥ

original: pañca nadyaḥ sarasvatīm api yanti sasrotasaḥ /  sarasvatī tu pañcadhā so deśe 'bhavat sarit //
analyzed: pañca nadyaḥ sarasvatīm api yanti sasrotasaḥ   sarasvatī tu pañcadhā sā u deśe bhavat sarit

original: tvam agne prathamo aṅgirā ṛṣir devo devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā /  tava vrate kavayo vidmanāpaso 'jāyanta maruto bhrājadṛṣṭayaḥ //
analyzed: tvam agne prathamaḥ aṅgirāḥ ṛṣiḥ devaḥ devānām abhavaḥ śivaḥ sakhā    tava vrate kavayaḥ vidmana apasaḥ jāyanta marutaḥ bhrājat ṛṣṭayaḥ

original: tvaṃ no agne tave deva pāyubhir maghono rakṣa tanvaś ca vandya /  trātā tokasya tanaye gavām asy animeṣam̐ rakṣaṇas tava vrate //
analyzed: tvam naḥ agne tave deva pāyubhiḥ maghonaḥ rakṣa tanvaḥ ca vandya    trātā tokasya tanaye gavām asi animeṣam rakṣaṇaḥ tava vrate

original: uttānāyām ava bharā cikitvānt sadyaḥ pravītā vṛṣaṇaṃ jajāna /  aruṣastūpo ruśad asya pāja iḍāyās putro vayune 'janiṣṭa //
analyzed: uttānāyām ava bhara cikitvān sadyas pravītā vṛṣaṇam jajāna    aruṣa stūpaḥ ruśat asya pājaḥ iḍāyāḥ putraḥ vayune janiṣṭa

original: iḍāyās tvā pade vayaṃ nābhā pṛthivyā adhi /  jātavedo ni dhīmahy agne havyāya voḍhave //
analyzed: iḍāyāḥ tvā pade vayam nābhā pṛthivyāḥ adhi   / ni dhīmahi agne havyāya voḍhave

original: pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣam āṅgūṣaṃ girvaṇase aṅgirasvat /  suvṛktibhi stuvata ṛgmiyāyārcāmārkaṃ nare viśrutāya //
analyzed: pra manmahe śavasānāya śūṣam āṅgūṣam girvaṇase aṅgirasvat      suvṛktibhiḥ stuvate ṛgmiyāya arcāma arkam nare viśrutāya

original: pra vo mahe mahi namo bharadhvam āṅgūṣyam̐ śavasānāya sāma /  yenā naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ padajñā arcanto aṅgiraso gā avindan //
analyzed: pra vaḥ mahe mahi namaḥ bharadhvam āṅgūṣyam śavasānāya sāma    yena naḥ pūrve pitaraḥ pada jñāḥ arcantaḥ aṅgirasaḥ gāḥ avindan

original: icchanti tvā somyāsaḥ sakhāyaḥ sunvanti somaṃ dadhati prayām̐si /  titikṣante abhiśastiṃ janānām indra tvad ā kaś cana hi praketaḥ //
analyzed: icchanti tvā somyāsaḥ sakhāyaḥ sunvanti somam dadhati prayāmsi    titikṣante abhiśastim janānām indra tvat ā kaḥ cana hi praketaḥ

original: na te dūre paramā cid rajām̐sy asyā tu pra yāhi harivo haribhyām /  sthirāya vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtemā yuktā grāvāṇaḥ samidhāne agnau //
analyzed: na te dūre paramā cit rajāmsi asyā tu pra yāhi harivas haribhyām     sthirāya vṛṣṇe savanā kṛtā imā yuktāḥ grāvāṇaḥ samidhāne agnau

original: aṣāḍhaṃ yutsu pṛtanāsu paprim̐ svarṣām apsāṃ vṛjanasya gopām /  bhareṣujām̐ sukṣitim̐ suśravasaṃ jayantaṃ tvām anu madema soma //
analyzed: aṣāḍham yutsu pṛtanāsu paprim svarṣām ap sām vṛjanasya gopām    bhareṣujām su kṣitim suśravasam jayantam tvām anu madema soma

original: somo dhenum̐ somo arvantam āśum̐ somo vīraṃ karmaṇyaṃ dadāti /  sādanyaṃ vidathyam̐ sabheyaṃ pitṛśravaṇaṃ yo dadāśad asmai //
analyzed: somaḥ dhenum somaḥ arvantam āśum somaḥ vīram karmaṇyam dadāti  / sādanyam vidathyam sabheyam pitṛ śravaṇam yaḥ dadāśat asmai

original: tvam imā oṣadhīḥ soma viśvās tvam apo ajanayas tvaṃ gāḥ /  tvam ā tatanthorv antarikṣaṃ tvaṃ jyotiṣā vi tamo vavartha //
analyzed: tvam imāḥ oṣadhīḥ soma viśvāḥ tvam apaḥ ajanayaḥ tvam gāḥ   tvam ā tatantha uru antarikṣam tvam jyotiṣā vi tamaḥ vavartha

original: devena no manasā deva soma rāyo bhāgam̐ sahasāvann abhi yudhya /  mā tvā tanad īśiṣe vīryasyobhayebhyaḥ pra cikitsā gaviṣṭau //
analyzed: devena naḥ manasā deva soma rāyaḥ bhāgam sahasāvan abhi yudhya   mā tvā tanat īśiṣe vīryasya ubhayebhyaḥ pra cikitsa gaviṣṭau

original: aṣṭau vy akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyās trī dhanva yojanā sapta  sindhūn /  hiraṇyākṣaḥ savitā deva āgād dadhad ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi //
analyzed: aṣṭau vi akhyat kakubhaḥ pṛthivyāḥ trī dhanva yojanā sapta sindhūn    hiraṇya akṣaḥ savitā devaḥ āgāt dadhat ratnā dāśuṣe vāryāṇi

original: hiraṇyapāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇir ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate /  apāmīvāṃ bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti //
analyzed: hiraṇya pāṇiḥ savitā vicarṣaṇiḥ ubhe dyāvāpṛthivī antar īyate   apa amīvām bādhate veti sūryam abhi kṛṣṇena rajasā dyām ṛṇoti

original: hiraṇyahasto asuraḥ sunīthaḥ sumṛḍīkaḥ svavā yātv arvāṅ /  apasedhan rakṣaso yātudhānān asthād devaḥ pratidoṣaṃ gṛṇānaḥ //
analyzed: hiraṇya hastaḥ asuraḥ su nīthaḥ su mṛḍīkaḥ svavā yātu arvāṅ    apasedhan rakṣasaḥ yātudhānān asthāt devaḥ pratidoṣam gṛṇānaḥ

original: ye te panthāḥ savitaḥ pūrvyāso 'reṇavaḥ sukṛtā antarikṣe /  tebhir no adya pathibhiḥ sugebhī rakṣā ca no adhi ca brūhi deva //
analyzed: ye te panthāḥ savitar pūrvyāsaḥ reṇavaḥ su kṛtāḥ antarikṣe    tebhiḥ naḥ adya pathibhiḥ su gebhiḥ rakṣā ca naḥ adhi ca brūhi deva

original: ubhā pibatam aśvinobhā naḥ śarma yacchatam /  avidriyābhir ūtibhiḥ //
analyzed: ubhā pibatam aśvinā ubhā naḥ śarma yacchatam avidriyābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ

original: apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asme kṛtaṃ no dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām /  adyūtye 'vase ni hvaye vāṃ vṛdhe ca no bhavataṃ vājasātau //
analyzed: apnasvatīm aśvinā vācam asme kṛtam naḥ dasrā vṛṣaṇā manīṣām    a dyūtye vase ni hvaye vām vṛdhe ca naḥ bhavatam vājasātau

original: dyubhir aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān ariṣṭebhir aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ /  tan no mitro varuṇo māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ //
analyzed: dyubhiḥ aktubhiḥ pari pātam asmān ariṣṭebhiḥ aśvinā saubhagebhiḥ   tat naḥ mitraḥ varuṇaḥ māmahantām aditiḥ sindhuḥ pṛthivī uta dyauḥ

original: ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamāno niveśayann amṛtaṃ martyaṃ ca /  hiraṇyayena savitā rathenā devo yāti bhuvanāni paśyan //
analyzed: ā kṛṣṇena rajasā vartamānaḥ niveśayan amṛtam martyam ca  / hiraṇyayena savitā rathena ā devaḥ yāti bhuvanāni paśyan

original: ā rātri pārthivam̐ rajaḥ pitur aprāyi dhāmabhiḥ /  divaḥ sadām̐si bṛhatī vi tiṣṭhasa ā tveṣaṃ vartate tamaḥ //
analyzed: ā rātri pārthivam rajaḥ pituḥ aprāyi dhāmabhiḥ    divaḥ sadāmsi bṛhatī vi tiṣṭhase ā tveṣam vartate tamaḥ

original: uṣas tac citram ā bharāsmabhyaṃ vājinīvati /  yena tokaṃ ca tanayaṃ ca dhāmahe //
analyzed: uṣaḥ tat citram ā bhara asmabhyam vājinīvati   yena tokam ca tanayam ca dhāmahe

original: prātar agniṃ prātar indram̐ havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar  aśvinā /  prātar bhagaṃ pūṣaṇaṃ brahmaṇaspatiṃ prātaḥ somam uta rudram̐ huvema //
analyzed: prātar agnim prātar indram havāmahe prātar mitrāvaruṇā prātar aśvinā  / prātar bhagam pūṣaṇam brahmaṇaspatim prātar somam uta rudram huvema

original: prātarjitaṃ bhagam ugram̐ huvema vayaṃ putram aditer yo vidhartā /  ādhraś cid yaṃ manyamānas turaś cid rājā cid yaṃ bhagaṃ bhakṣīty āha //
analyzed: prātar jitam bhagam ugram huvema vayam putram aditeḥ yaḥ vidhartā    ādhraḥ cit yam manyamānaḥ turaḥ cit rājā cit yam bhagam bhakṣi iti āha

original: bhaga praṇetar bhaga satyarādho bhagemāṃ dhiyam ud avā dadan naḥ /  bhaga pra ṇo janaya gobhir aśvair bhaga pra nṛbhir nṛvantaḥ syāma //
analyzed: bhaga praṇetar bhaga satya rādhaḥ bhaga imām dhiyam ud ava dadan naḥ    bhaga pra naḥ janaya gobhiḥ aśvaiḥ bhaga pra nṛbhiḥ nṛvantaḥ syāma

original: utedānīṃ bhagavantaḥ syāmota prapitva uta madhye ahnām /  utoditā maghavan sūryasya vayaṃ devānām̐ sumatau syāma //
analyzed: uta idānīm bhagavantaḥ syāma uta prapitve uta madhye ahnām    uta uditā maghavan sūryasya vayam devānām sumatau syāma

original: bhaga eva bhagavām̐ astu devās tena vayaṃ bhagavantaḥ syāma /  taṃ tvā bhaga sarva ij johavīti sa no bhaga puraetā bhaveha //
analyzed: bhagaḥ eva bhagavām astu devāḥ tena vayam bhagavantaḥ syāma    tam tvā bhaga sarvaḥ id johavīti sa naḥ bhaga puraetā bhava iha

original: sam adhvarāyoṣaso namanta dadhikrāveva śucaye padāya /  arvācīnaṃ vasuvidaṃ bhagaṃ no ratham ivāśvā vājina ā vahantu //
analyzed: sam adhvarāya uṣasaḥ namanta dadhikrāvā iva śucaye padāya    arvācīnam vasu vidam bhagam naḥ ratham iva aśvāḥ vājinaḥ ā vahantu

original: aśvāvatīr gomatīr na uṣāso vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ /  ghṛtaṃ duhānā viśvataḥ prapītā yūyaṃ pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ //
analyzed: aśvāvatīḥ gomatīḥ naḥ uṣāsaḥ vīravatīḥ sadam ucchantu bhadrāḥ   ghṛtam duhānāḥ viśvatas prapītāḥ yūyam pāta svastibhiḥ sadā naḥ

original: pūṣan tava vrate vayaṃ na riṣyema kadā cana /  stotāras ta iha smasi //
analyzed: pūṣan tava vrate vayam na riṣyema kadā cana    stotāraḥ te iha smasi

original: pathas-pathaḥ paripatiṃ vacasyā kāmena kṛto abhy ānaḍ arkam /  sa no rāsac churudhaś candrāgrā dhiyaṃ-dhiyam̐ sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā //
analyzed: pathaspathaḥ paripatim vacasyā kāmena kṛtaḥ abhī ānaṭ arkam    sa naḥ rāsat śurudhaḥ candra agrāḥ dhiyam dhiyam sīṣadhāti pra pūṣā

original: trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇur gopā adābhyaḥ /  ato dharmāṇi dhārayan //
analyzed: trīṇi padā vi cakrame viṣṇuḥ gopāḥ adābhyaḥ   atas dharmāṇi dhārayan

original: tad viprāso vipanyavo jāgṛvām̐saḥ sam indhate /  viṣṇor yat paramaṃ padam //
analyzed: tat viprāsaḥ vipanyavaḥ jāgṛvāmsaḥ sam indhate      viṣṇoḥ yat paramam padam

original: ghṛtavatī bhuvanānām abhiśriyorvī pṛthvī madhudughe supeśasā /  dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajare bhūriretasā //
analyzed: ghṛtavatī bhuvanānām abhiśriyā urvī pṛthvī madhu dughe supeśasā    dyāvāpṛthivī varuṇasya dharmaṇā viṣkabhite ajare bhūri retasā

original: ye naḥ sapatnā apa te bhavantv indrāgnibhyām ava bādhāmahe tān /  vasavo rudrā ādityā uparispṛśaṃ mograṃ cettāram adhirājam akran //
analyzed: ye naḥ sapatnāḥ apa te bhavantu indra agnibhyām ava bādhāmahe tān vasavaḥ rudrāḥ ādityāḥ uparispṛśam mā ugram cettāram adhirājam akran

original: ā nāsatyā tribhir ekādaśair iha devebhir yātaṃ madhupeyam aśvinā /  prāyus tāriṣṭaṃ nī rapām̐si mṛkṣatam̐ sedhataṃ dveṣo bhavatam̐ sacābhuvā  //
analyzed: ā nāsatyā tribhiḥ ekādaśaiḥ iha devebhiḥ yātam madhu peyam aśvinā    pra āyuḥ tāriṣṭam niḥ rapāmsi mṛkṣatam sedhatam dveṣaḥ bhavatam sacābhuvā  /

original: eṣa va stomo maruta iyaṃ gīr māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ /  eṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayāṃ vidyāmeṣaṃ vṛjanaṃ jīradānum //
analyzed: eṣa vaḥ stomaḥ marutaḥ iyam gīḥ māndāryasya mānyasya kāroḥ    ā iṣā yāsīṣṭa tanve vayām vidyāma iṣam vṛjanam jīra dānum

original: sahastomāḥ sahacchandasa āvṛtaḥ sahapramā ṛṣayaḥ sapta daivyāḥ /  pūrveṣāṃ panthām anudṛśya dhīrā anvālebhire rathyo na raśmīn //
analyzed: saha stomāḥ saha chandasaḥ āvṛtaḥ saha pramāḥ ṛṣayaḥ sapta daivyāḥ pūrveṣām panthām anudṛśya dhīrāḥ anvālebhire rathyaḥ na raśmīn

original: āyuṣyaṃ varcasyam̐ rāyaspoṣam audbhidam /  idam̐ hiraṇyaṃ varcasvaj jaitrāyā viśatād u mām //
analyzed: āyuṣyam varcasyam rāyaspoṣam audbhidam   idam hiraṇyam varcasvat jaitrāyāḥ viśatāt u mām

original: na tad rakṣām̐si na piśācās taranti devānām ojaḥ prathamajam̐ hy  etat /  yo bibharti dākṣāyaṇam̐ hiraṇyam̐ sa deveṣu kṛṇute dīrgham āyuḥ sa  manuṣyeṣu kṛṇute dīrgham āyuḥ //
analyzed: na tat rakṣāmsi na piśācāḥ taranti devānām ojaḥ prathama jam hi etat    yaḥ bibharti dākṣāyaṇam hiraṇyam sa deveṣu kṛṇute dīrgham āyuḥ sa manuṣyeṣu kṛṇute dīrgham āyuḥ

original: yad ābadhnan dākṣāyaṇā hiraṇyam̐ śatānīkāya sumanasyamānāḥ /  tan ma ā badhnāmi śataśāradāyāyuṣmān jaradaṣṭir yathāsam //
analyzed: yat ābadhnan dākṣāyaṇāḥ hiraṇyam śatānīkāya sumanasyamānāḥ   tat me ā badhnāmi śata śāradāya āyuṣmān jaradaṣṭiḥ yathā āsam

original: uta no 'hir budhnyaḥ śṛṇotv aja ekapāt pṛthivī samudraḥ /  viśve devā ṛtāvṛdho huvānā stutā mantrāḥ kaviśastā avantu //
analyzed: uta naḥ hiḥ budhnyaḥ śṛṇotu ajaḥ eka pād pṛthivī samudraḥ    viśve devāḥ ṛtāvṛdhaḥ huvānāḥ stutāḥ mantrāḥ kavi śastāḥ avantu

original: imā gira ādityebhyo ghṛtasnūḥ sanād rājabhyo juhvā juhomi /  śṛṇotu mitro aryamā bhago nas tuvijāto varuṇo dakṣo am̐śaḥ //
analyzed: imāḥ giraḥ ādityebhyaḥ ghṛtasnūḥ sanāt rājabhyaḥ juhvā juhomi    śṛṇotu mitraḥ aryamā bhagaḥ naḥ tuvi jātaḥ varuṇaḥ dakṣaḥ amśaḥ

original: sapta ṛṣayaḥ pratihitāḥ śarīre sapta rakṣanti sadam apramādam /  saptāpaḥ svapato lokam īyus tatra jāgṛto asvapnajau satrasadau ca  devau //
analyzed: sapta ṛṣayaḥ pratihitāḥ śarīre sapta rakṣanti sadam apramādam    sapta apaḥ svapataḥ lokam īyuḥ tatra jāgṛtaḥ a svapna jau satra sadau ca devau

original: ut tiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate devayantas tvemahe /  upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānava indra prāśūr bhavā sacā //
analyzed: ud tiṣṭha brahmaṇaspate devayantaḥ tvā īmahe    upa pra yantu marutaḥ sudānavaḥ indra prāśūḥ bhava sacā

original: pra nūnaṃ brahmaṇaspatir mantraṃ vadaty ukthyam /  yasminn indro varuṇo mitro aryamā devā okām̐si cakrire //
analyzed: pra nūnam brahmaṇaspatiḥ mantram vadati ukthyam   yasmin indraḥ varuṇaḥ mitraḥ aryamā devāḥ okāmsi cakrire

original: brahmaṇaspate tvam asya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayaṃ ca jinva /  viśvaṃ tad bhadraṃ yad avanti devā bṛhad vadema vidathe suvīrāḥ //
analyzed: brahmaṇaspate tvam asya yantā sūktasya bodhi tanayam ca jinva        tat bhadram yat avanti devāḥ bṛhat vadema vidathe su vīrāḥ

original: ya imā viśvā /  viśvakarmā /  yo naḥ pitā /  annapate 'nnasya no dehi //
analyzed: yaḥ imā viśvā   viśva karmā   yaḥ naḥ pitā   anna pate nnasya naḥ dehi

original: apeto yantu paṇayo 'sumnā devapīyavaḥ /  asya lokaḥ sutāvataḥ //
analyzed: apa itas yantu paṇayaḥ sumnā deva pīyavaḥ   asya lokaḥ sutāvataḥ

original: dyubhir ahobhir aktubhir vyaktaṃ yamo dadātv avasānam asmai //
analyzed: dyubhiḥ ahobhiḥ aktubhiḥ vyaktam yamaḥ dadātu avasānam asmai

original: savitā te śarīrebhyaḥ pṛthivyāṃ lokam icchatu /  tasmia yujyantām usriyāḥ //
analyzed: savitā te śarīrebhyaḥ pṛthivyām lokam icchatu tasmia yujyantām usriyāḥ

original: vāyuḥ punātu /  savitā punātu /  agner bhrājasā /  sūryasya varcasā /  vi mucyantām usriyāḥ //
analyzed: vāyuḥ punātu savitā punātu   agneḥ bhrājasā   sūryasya varcasā   vi mucyantām usriyāḥ

original: aśvatthe vo niṣadanaṃ parṇe vo vasatiṣ kṛtā /  gobhāja it kilāsatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam //
analyzed: aśvatthe vaḥ niṣadanam parṇe vaḥ vasatiḥ kṛtā   go bhājaḥ id kila asatha yat sanavatha pūruṣam

original: savitā te śarīrāṇi mātur upastha ā vapatu /  tasmai pṛthivi śaṃ bhava //
analyzed: savitā te śarīrāṇi mātuḥ upasthe ā vapatu   tasmai pṛthivi śam bhava

original: prajāpatau tvā devatāyām upodake loke ni dadhāmy asau /  apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: prajāpatau tvā devatāyām upodake loke ni dadhāmi asau apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: paraṃ mṛtyo anu parehi panthāṃ yas te anya itaro devayānāt /  cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajām̐ rīriṣo mota vīrān //
analyzed: param mṛtyo anu parehi panthām yaḥ te anyaḥ itaraḥ deva yānāt    cakṣuṣmate śṛṇvate te bravīmi mā naḥ prajām rīriṣaḥ mā uta vīrān

original: śaṃ vātaḥ śam̐ hi te ghṛṇiḥ śaṃ te bhavantv iṣṭakāḥ /  śaṃ te bhavantv agnayaḥ pārthivāso mā tvābhi śūśucan //
analyzed: śam vātaḥ śam hi te ghṛṇiḥ śam te bhavantu iṣṭakāḥ   śam te bhavantu agnayaḥ pārthivāsaḥ mā tvā abhi śūśucan

original: kalpantāṃ te diśas tubhyam āpaḥ śivatamās tubhyaṃ bhavantu  sindhavaḥ /  antarikṣam̐ śivaṃ tubhyaṃ kalpantāṃ te diśaḥ sarvāḥ //
analyzed: kalpantām te diśaḥ tubhyam āpaḥ śivatamāḥ tubhyam bhavantu sindhavaḥ    antarikṣam śivam tubhyam kalpantām te diśaḥ sarvāḥ

original: aśmanvatī rīyate sam̐ rabhadhvam ut tiṣṭhata pra taratā sakhāyaḥ /  atra jahīmo 'śivā ye asañchivān vayam uttaremābhi vājān //
analyzed: aśmanvatī rīyate sam rabhadhvam ud tiṣṭhata pra tarata sakhāyaḥ    atra jahīmaḥ śivāḥ ye asan śivān vayam uttarema abhi vājān

original: apāgham apa kilviṣam apa kṛtyām apo rapaḥ /  apāmārga tvam asmad apa duḥṣvapnyam̐ suva //
analyzed: apa agham apa kilviṣam apa kṛtyām apa u rapaḥ apa amārga tvam asmat apa duḥṣvapnyam suva

original: sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu durmitriyās tasmai santu yo  'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ //
analyzed: su mitriyāḥ naḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ santu durmitriyāḥ tasmai santu yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ

original: anaḍvāham ā rabhāmahe saurabheyam̐ svastaye /  sa na indra iva devebhyo vahniḥ saṃtaraṇo bhava //
analyzed: anaḍvāham ā rabhāmahe saurabheyam svastaye    sa naḥ indraḥ iva devebhyaḥ vahniḥ saṃtaraṇaḥ bhava

original: ud vayaṃ tamasas pari svaḥ paśyanta uttaram /  devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam //
analyzed: ud vayam tamasaḥ pari svar paśyantaḥ uttaram    devam devatrā sūryam aganma jyotiḥ uttamam

original: imaṃ jīvebhyaḥ paridhiṃ dadhāmi maiṣāṃ nu gād aparo artham etam /  śataṃ jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīr antar mṛtyuṃ dadhatāṃ parvatena //
analyzed: imam jīvebhyaḥ paridhim dadhāmi mā eṣām nu gāt aparaḥ artham etam    śatam jīvantu śaradaḥ purūcīḥ antar mṛtyum dadhatām parvatena

original: agna āyūm̐ṣi pavasva ā suvorjam iṣaṃ ca naḥ /  āre bādhasva ducchunām //
analyzed: agne āyūmṣi pavasva ā suva ūrjam iṣam ca naḥ        bādhasva ducchunām

original: āyuṣmān agne haviṣā vṛdhāno ghṛtaprsatīko ghṛtayonir edhi /  ghṛtaṃ pītvā madhu cāru gavyaṃ piteva putram abhi rakṣatād imānt  svāhā //
analyzed: āyuṣmān agne haviṣā vṛdhānaḥ ghṛta prsatīkaḥ ghṛta yoniḥ edhi  / ghṛtam pītvā madhu cāru gavyam pitā iva putram abhi rakṣatāt imān svāhā

original: parīme gām aneṣata pary agnim ahṛṣata /  deveṣv akrata śravaḥ ka imām̐ ā dadharṣati //
analyzed: pari ime gām aneṣata pari agnim ahṛṣata     deveṣu akrata śravaḥ kaḥ imām ā dadharṣati

original: kravyādam agniṃ pra hiṇomi dūraṃ yamarājyaṃ gacchatu ripravāhaḥ /  ihaivāyam itaro jātavedā devebhyo havyaṃ vahatu prajānan //
analyzed: kravya adam agnim pra hiṇomi dūram yama rājyam gacchatu ripra vāhaḥ    iha eva ayam itaraḥ jātavedāḥ devebhyaḥ havyam vahatu prajānan

original: vaha vapāṃ jātavedaḥ pitṛbhyo yatrainān vettha nihitān parāke /  medasaḥ kulyā upa tānt sravantu satyā eṣām āśiṣaḥ saṃ namantām̐ svāhā  //
analyzed: vaha vapām jātavedaḥ pitṛbhyaḥ yatra enān vettha nihitān parāke    medasaḥ kulyāḥ upa tān sravantu satyāḥ eṣām āśiṣaḥ sam namantām svāhā

original: syonā pṛthivi no bhavānṛkṣarā niveśanī /  yacchā naḥ śarma saprathāḥ //
analyzed: syonā pṛthivi naḥ bhava anṛkṣarā niveśanī    yaccha naḥ śarma saprathāḥ

original: apa naḥ śośucad agham //
analyzed: apa naḥ śośucat agham

original: asmāt tvam adhi jāto 'si tvad ayaṃ jāyatāṃ punaḥ /  asau svargāya lokāya svāhā //
analyzed: asmāt tvam adhi jātaḥ u si tvat ayam jāyatām punar asau svargāya lokāya svāhā

original: ṛcaṃ vācaṃ pra padye mano yajuḥ pra padye sāma prāṇaṃ pra padye  cakṣuḥ śrotraṃ pra padye /  vāg ojaḥ sahaujo mayi prāṇāpānau //
analyzed: ṛcam vācam pra padye manaḥ yajuḥ pra padye sāma prāṇam pra padye cakṣuḥ śrotram pra padye    vāc ojaḥ saha ojaḥ mayi prāṇa apānau

original: yan me chidraṃ cakṣuṣo hṛdayasya manaso vātitṛṇaṃ bṛhaspatir  me tad dadhātu /  śaṃ no bhavatu bhuvanasya yas patiḥ //
analyzed: yat me chidram cakṣuṣaḥ hṛdayasya manasaḥ vā atitṛṇam bṛhaspatiḥ me tat dadhātu    śam naḥ bhavatu bhuvanasya yaḥ patiḥ

original: bhūr bhuvaḥ svaḥ /  tat savitur vareṇyaṃ bhargo devasya dhīmahi /  dhiyo yo naḥ pracodayat //
analyzed: bhūḥ bhuvaḥ svar   tat savituḥ vareṇyam bhargaḥ devasya dhīmahi   dhiyaḥ yaḥ naḥ pracodayat

original: kayā naś citra ā bhuvad ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā /  kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā //
analyzed: kayā naḥ citraḥ ā bhuvat ūtī sadāvṛdhaḥ sakhā   kayā śaciṣṭhayā vṛtā

original: kas tvā satyo madānāṃ mam̐hiṣṭho matsad andhasaḥ /  dṛḍhā cid āruje vasu //
analyzed: kaḥ tvā satyaḥ madānām mamhiṣṭhaḥ matsat andhasaḥ    dṛḍhā cit āruje vasu

original: abhī ṣu ṇaḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām /  śataṃ bhavāsy ūtaye //
analyzed: abhi su naḥ sakhīnām avitā jaritṝṇām    śatam bhavāsi ūtaye

original: kayā tvam na ūtyābhi pra mandase vṛṣan /  kayā stotṛbhya ā bhara //
analyzed: kayā tvam naḥ ūtyā abhi pra mandase vṛṣan   kayā stotṛbhyaḥ ā bhara

original: indro viśvasya rājati /  śaṃ no astu dvipade śaṃ catuṣpade //
analyzed: indraḥ viśvasya rājati   śam naḥ astu dvipade śam catuṣpade

original: śaṃ no mitram̐ śaṃ varuṇaḥ śaṃ no bhavatv aryamā /  śaṃ na indro bṛhaspatiḥ śaṃ no viṣṇur urukramaḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ mitram śam varuṇaḥ śam naḥ bhavatu aryamā   śam naḥ indraḥ bṛhaspatiḥ śam naḥ viṣṇuḥ uru kramaḥ

original: śaṃ no vātaḥ pavatām̐ śaṃ nas tapatu sūryaḥ /  śaṃ naḥ kanikradad devaḥ parjanyo abhi varṣatu //
analyzed: śam naḥ vātaḥ pavatām śam naḥ tapatu sūryaḥ   śam naḥ kanikradat devaḥ parjanyaḥ abhi varṣatu

original: ahāni śaṃ bhavantu naḥ śam̐ rātrīḥ prati dhīyatām /  śaṃ na indrāgnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śaṃ na indrāvaruṇā rātahavyā /  śaṃ na indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau śam indrāsomā suvitāya śaṃ yoḥ //
analyzed: ahāni śam bhavantu naḥ śam rātrīḥ prati dhīyatām   śam naḥ indra agnī bhavatām avobhiḥ śam naḥ indrāvaruṇā rāta havyā   śam naḥ indrāpūṣaṇā vājasātau śam indrāsomā suvitāya śam yoḥ

original: śaṃ no devīr abhiṣṭaya āpo bhavantu pītaye /  śaṃ yor abhi sravantu naḥ //
analyzed: śam naḥ devīḥ abhiṣṭaye āpaḥ bhavantu pītaye   śam yos abhi sravantu naḥ

original: syonā pṛthivi no bhavānṛkṣarā niveśanī /  yacchā naḥ śarma saprathāḥ //
analyzed: syonā pṛthivi naḥ bhava anṛkṣarā niveśanī    yaccha naḥ śarma saprathāḥ

original: āpo hi ṣṭhā mayobhuvas tā na ūrje dadhātana /  mahe raṇāya cakṣase //
analyzed: āpaḥ hi stha mayobhuvaḥ tāḥ naḥ ūrje dadhātana mahe raṇāya cakṣase

original: yo vaḥ śivatamo rasas tasya bhājayateha naḥ /  uśatīr iva mātaraḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ vaḥ śivatamaḥ rasaḥ tasya bhājayata iha naḥ    uśatīḥ iva mātaraḥ

original: tasmā araṃ gamāma vo yasya kṣayāya jinvatha /  āpo janayathā ca naḥ //
analyzed: tasmai aram gamāma vaḥ yasya kṣayāya jinvatha    āpaḥ janayatha ca naḥ

original: dyauḥ śāntir antarikṣam̐ śāntiḥ pṛthivī śāntir āpaḥ śāntir  oṣadhayaḥ śāntiḥ /  vanaspatayaḥ śāntir viśve devāḥ śāntir brahma śāntiḥ sarvam̐ śāntiḥ  śāntir eva śāntiḥ sā mā śāntir edhi //
analyzed: dyauḥ śāntiḥ antarikṣam śāntiḥ pṛthivī śāntiḥ āpaḥ śāntiḥ oṣadhayaḥ śāntiḥ   vanaspatayaḥ śāntiḥ viśve devāḥ śāntiḥ brahma śāntiḥ sarvam śāntiḥ śāntiḥ eva śāntiḥ sā mā śāntiḥ edhi

original: dṛte dṛm̐ha mā mitrasya mā cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi bhūtāni sam īkṣantām  /  mitrasyāhaṃ cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi bhūtāni samīkṣe /  mitrasya cakṣuṣā sam īkṣāmahe //
analyzed: dṛte dṛmha mā mitrasya mā cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi bhūtāni sam īkṣantām      mitrasya aham cakṣuṣā sarvāṇi bhūtāni samīkṣe    mitrasya cakṣuṣā sam īkṣāmahe

original: dṛte dṛm̐ha mā /  jyok te saṃdṛśi jīvyāsaṃ jyok te saṃdṛśi jīvyāsam //
analyzed: dṛte dṛmha mā   jyok te saṃdṛśi jīvyāsam jyok te saṃdṛśi jīvyāsam

original: namas te harase śociṣe namas te astv arciṣe /  anyām̐s te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvako asmabhyam̐ śivo bhava //
analyzed: namaḥ te harase śociṣe namaḥ te astu arciṣe   anyān te asmat tapantu hetayaḥ pāvakaḥ asmabhyam śivaḥ bhava

original: namas te astu vidyute namas te stanayitnave /  namas te bhagavann astu yataḥ svaḥ samīhase //
analyzed: namaḥ te astu vidyute namaḥ te stanayitnave   namaḥ te bhagavan astu yatas svar samīhase

original: yato-yataḥ samīhase tato no abhayaṃ kuru /  śaṃ naḥ kuru prajābhyo 'bhayaṃ naḥ paśubhyaḥ //
analyzed: yatas yatas samīhase tatas naḥ abhayam kuru   śam naḥ kuru prajābhyaḥ bhayam naḥ paśubhyaḥ

original: sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu +durmitriyās tasmai santu yo  'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ //
analyzed: su mitriyāḥ naḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ santu durmitriyāḥ tasmai santu yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ

original: tac cakṣur devahitaṃ purastāc chukram uc carat /  paśyema śaradaḥ śataṃ jīvema śaradaḥ śatam̐ śṛṇuyāma śaradaḥ śataṃ pra  bravāma śaradaḥ śatam adīnāḥ syāma śaradaḥ śataṃ bhūyaś ca śaradaḥ śatāt  //
analyzed: tat cakṣuḥ deva hitam purastāt śukram ud carat  / paśyema śaradaḥ śatam jīvema śaradaḥ śatam śṛṇuyāma śaradaḥ śatam pra  bravāma śaradaḥ śatam a dīnāḥ syāma śaradaḥ śatam bhūyaḥ ca śaradaḥ śatāt  /

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām /  ā dade nārir asi //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām    ā dade nāriḥ asi

original: yuñjate mana uta yuñjate dhiyo viprā viprasya bṛhato vipaścitaḥ /  vi hotrā dadhe vayunāvid eka in mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ svāhā //
analyzed: yuñjate manaḥ uta yuñjate dhiyaḥ viprāḥ viprasya bṛhataḥ vipaścitaḥ    vi hotrā dadhe vayunā vid ekaḥ id mahī devasya savituḥ pariṣṭutiḥ svāhā

original: devī dyāvāpṛthivī makhasya vm adya śiro rādhyāsaṃ devayajane  pṛthivyāḥ /  makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe //
analyzed: devī dyāvāpṛthivī makhasya vm adya śiraḥ rādhyāsam devayajane pṛthivyāḥ   makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe

original: devyo vamryo bhūtasya prathamajā makhasya vo 'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ  devayajane pṛthivyāḥ /  makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe //
analyzed: devyaḥ vamryaḥ bhūtasya prathama jāḥ makhasya vaḥ dya śiraḥ rādhyāsam devayajane pṛthivyāḥ    makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe

original: iyaty agre āsīn makhasya te 'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ devayajane  pṛthivyāḥ /  makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe //
analyzed: iyatī agre āsīt makhasya te dya śiraḥ rādhyāsam devayajane pṛthivyāḥ   makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe

original: indrasyauja stha makhasya vo 'dya śiro rādhyāsaṃ devayajane  pṛthivyāḥ /  makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe  makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe //
analyzed: indrasya ojaḥ stha makhasya vaḥ dya śiraḥ rādhyāsam devayajane pṛthivyāḥ   makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe

analyzed: makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe

original: ṛjave tvā /  sādhave tvā /  sukṣityai tvā /  makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe  makhāya tvā makhasya tvā śīrṣṇe //

original: yamāya tvā /  makhāya tvā /  sūryasya tvā tapase /  devas tvā savitā madhvānaktu /  pṛthivyāḥ sam̐spṛśas pāhi /  arcir asi śocir asi tapo 'si //
analyzed: yamāya tvā   makhāya tvā   sūryasya tvā tapase    devaḥ tvā savitā madhvā anaktu   pṛthivyāḥ samspṛśaḥ pāhi   arciḥ asi śociḥ asi tapaḥ si

original: anādhṛṣṭā purastād agner ādhipatya āyur me dāḥ /  putravato dakṣiṇata indrasyādhipatye prajāṃ me dāḥ /  suṣadā paścād devasya savitur ādhipatye cakṣur me dāḥ /  āsrutir uttarato dhātur ādhipatye rāyaspoṣaṃ me dāḥ /  vidhṛtir upariṣṭād bṛhaspater ādhipatye ojo me dāḥ /  viśvābhyo mā nāṣṭrābhyas pāhi /  manor aśvāsi //
analyzed: anādhṛṣṭā purastāt agneḥ ādhipatye āyuḥ me dāḥ   putravataḥ dakṣiṇatas indrasya ādhipatye prajām me dāḥ   suṣadā paścāt devasya savituḥ ādhipatye cakṣuḥ me dāḥ   āsrutiḥ uttaratas dhātuḥ ādhipatye rāyaspoṣam me dāḥ    vidhṛtiḥ upariṣṭāt bṛhaspateḥ ādhipatye ojaḥ me dāḥ    viśvābhyaḥ mā nāṣṭrābhyaḥ pāhi    manoḥ aśvā asi

original: svāhā marudbhiḥ pari śrīyasva /  divaḥ sam̐spṛśas pāhi /  madhu madhu madhu //
analyzed: svāhā marudbhiḥ pari śrīyasva   divaḥ samspṛśaḥ pāhi   madhu madhu madhu

original: g devānāṃ pitā matīnāṃ patiḥ prajānām /  saṃ devo devena savitrā gata sam̐ sūryeṇa rocate //
analyzed: g devānām pitā matīnām patiḥ prajānām    sam devaḥ devena savitrā gata sam sūryeṇa rocate

original: sam agnir agninā gata saṃ daivena savitrā sam̐ sūryeṇārociṣṭa /  svāhā sam agnis tapasā gata saṃ daivyena savitrā sam̐ sūryeṇārūrucata //
analyzed: sam agniḥ agninā gata sam daivena savitrā sam sūryeṇa arociṣṭa svāhā sam agniḥ tapasā gata sam daivyena savitrā sam sūryeṇa arūrucata

original: dhartā divo vi bhāti tapasas pṛthivyāṃ dhartā devo devānām  amartyas tapojāḥ /  vācam asme ni yaccha devāyuvam //
analyzed: dhartā divaḥ vi bhāti tapasaḥ pṛthivyām dhartā devaḥ devānām amartyaḥ tapaḥ jāḥ    vācam asme ni yaccha devāyuvam

original: apaśyaṃ gopām anipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiś carantam /  sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīr vasāna ā varīvartti bhuvaneṣv antaḥ //
analyzed: apaśyam gopām a nipadyamānam ā ca parā ca pathibhiḥ carantam     sa sadhrīcīḥ sa viṣūcīḥ vasānaḥ ā varīvarti bhuvaneṣu antar

original: viśvāsāṃ bhuvāṃ pate viśvasya manasas pate viśvasya vacasas pate  sarvasya vacasas pate /  devaśrut tvaṃ deva gharma devo devān pāhi /  atra prāvīr anu vāṃ devavītaye /  madhu mādhvībhyāṃ madhu mādhūcībhyām //
analyzed: viśvāsām bhuvām pate viśvasya manasaḥ pate viśvasya vacasaḥ pate sarvasya vacasaḥ pate

original: hṛde tvā manase tvā dive tvā sūryāya tvā /  ūrdhvo adhvaraṃ divi deveṣu dhehi //
analyzed: hṛde tvā manase tvā dive tvā sūryāya tvā        adhvaram divi deveṣu dhehi

original: pitā no 'si pitā no bodhi namas te astu mā mā him̐sīḥ /  tvaṣṭṛmantas tvā sapema putrān paśūn mayi dhehi prajām asmāsu dhehy  ariṣṭāham̐ sahapatyā bhūyāsam //
analyzed: pitā naḥ si pitā naḥ bodhi namaḥ te astu mā mā himsīḥ   tvaṣṭṛmantaḥ tvā sapema putrān paśūn mayi dhehi prajām asmāsu dhehi  ariṣṭā aham sahapatyā bhūyāsam

original: ahaḥ ketunā juṣatām̐ sujyotir jyotiṣā svāhā /  rātriḥ ketunā juṣatām̐ sujyotir jyotiṣā svāhā //
analyzed: ahar ketunā juṣatām su jyotiḥ jyotiṣā svāhā   rātriḥ ketunā juṣatām su jyotiḥ jyotiṣā svāhā

original: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave 'śvinor bāhubhyāṃ pūṣṇo hastābhyām /  ā dade 'dityai rāsnāsi //
analyzed: devasya tvā savituḥ prasave śvinoḥ bāhubhyām pūṣṇaḥ hastābhyām    ā dade dityai rāsnā asi

original: iḍa ehi /  adita ehi /  sarasvatty ehi /  asāv ehi /  asāv ehi /  asāv ehi //
analyzed: iḍe ehi adite ehi sarasvatti ehi   asau ehi asau ehi asau ehi

original: adityai rāsnāsīndrāṇyā uṣṇīṣaḥ /  pūṣāsi /  gharmāya dīṣva //
analyzed: adityai rāsnā asi indrāṇyai uṣṇīṣaḥ pūṣā asi   / gharmāya dīṣva

analyzed: aśvibhyām pinvasva sarasvat pinvasva   indrāya pinvasva   svāhā indravat    svāhā indravat

original: yas te stanaḥ śaśayo yo mayobhūr yo ratnadhā vasuvid yaḥ sudatraḥ /  yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvat tam iha dhātave 'kaḥ //
analyzed: yaḥ te stanaḥ śaśayaḥ yaḥ mayobhūḥ yaḥ ratna dhāḥ vasu vid yaḥ su datraḥ    yena viśvā puṣyasi vāryāṇi sarasvat tam iha dhātave kaḥ

original: urv antarikṣam anv emi //
analyzed: uru antarikṣam anu emi

original: gāyatraṃ chando si /  traiṣṭubhaṃ chando si /  dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ tvā pari gṛhṇāmi /  antarikṣeṇopa yacchāmi /  indrāśvinā /  madhunaḥ sāraghasya gharmaṃ pāta vasavo yajata vāṭ /  svāhā sūryasya raśmaye vṛṣṭivanaye //
analyzed: gāyatram chandaḥ si   traiṣṭubham chandaḥ si    dyāvāpṛthivībhyām tvā pari gṛhṇāmi    antarikṣeṇa upa yacchāmi   indra aśvinā   madhunaḥ sāraghasya gharmam pāta vasavaḥ yajata vāṭ svāhā sūryasya raśmaye vṛṣṭi vanaye

original: samudrāya tvā vātāya svāhā /  sarirāya tvā vātāya svāhā /  anādhṛṣyāya tvā vātāya svāhā /  apratidhṛṣyāya tvā vātāya svāhā /  avasyave tvā vātāya svāhā /  aśimidāya tvā vātāya svāhā //
analyzed: samudrāya tvā vātāya svāhā   sarirāya tvā vātāya svāhā    anādhṛṣyāya tvā vātāya svāhā

original: indrāya tvā vasumate rudravate svāhā /  indrāya tvādityavate svāhā /  indrāya tvābhimātighne svāhā /  savitre tva ṛbhumate vibhumate vājavate svāhā /  bṛhaspataye tvā viśvadevyāvate svāhā //
analyzed: indrāya tvā vasumate rudravate svāhā   indrāya tvā ādityavate svāhā    indrāya tvā abhimāti ghne svāhā   savitre tvā ṛbhumate vibhumate vājavate svāhā    bṛhaspataye tvā viśvadevyāvate svāhā

original: yamāya tvāṅgirasvate pitṛmate svāhā /  svāhā gharmāya /  svāhā gharmaḥ pitre //
analyzed: yamāya tvā aṅgirasvate pitṛmate svāhā svāhā gharmāya svāhā gharmaḥ pitre

original: viśvā āśā dakṣiṇasad viśvān devān ayāḍ iha /  svāhākṛtasya gharmasya madhoḥ pibatam aśvinā //
analyzed: viśvāḥ āśāḥ dakṣiṇa sad viśvān devān ayāṭ iha    svāhākṛtasya gharmasya madhoḥ pibatam aśvinā

original: divi dhā imaṃ yajñam imam yajñaṃ divi dhāḥ /  svāhāgnaye yajñiyāya śaṃ yajurbhyaḥ //
analyzed: divi dhāḥ imam yajñam imam yajñam divi dhāḥ    svāhā agnaye yajñiyāya śam yajurbhyaḥ

original: aśvinā gharmaṃ pātam̐ hārdvānam ahar divābhir ūtibhiḥ /  tantrāyiṇo namo dyāvāpṛthivībhyām //
analyzed: aśvinā gharmam pātam hārdvānam ahar divābhiḥ ūtibhiḥ tantrāyiṇaḥ namaḥ dyāvāpṛthivībhyām

original: apātām aśvinā gharmam anu dyāvāpṛthivī amam̐sātām /  ihaiva rātayaḥ santu //
analyzed: apātām aśvinā gharmam anu dyāvāpṛthivī amamsātām    iha eva rātayaḥ santu

original: iṣe pinvasva /  ūrje pinvasva /  brahmaṇe pinvasva /  kṣatrāya pinvasva /  dyāvāpṛthivībhyāṃ pinvasva /  dharmāsi sudharma /  ameny asme nṛmṇāni dhāraya brahma dhāraya kṣatram dhāraya viśaṃ dhāraya //
analyzed: iṣe pinvasva   ūrje pinvasva brahmaṇe pinvasva   kṣatrāya pinvasva   dyāvāpṛthivībhyām pinvasva   dharma asi su dharma   ameni asme nṛmṇāni dhāraya brahma dhāraya kṣatram dhāraya viśam dhāraya

original: svāhā pūṣṇe śarase /  svāhā grāvabhyaḥ /  svāhā pratiravebhyaḥ /  svāhā pitṛbhya ūrdhvabarhirbhyo gharmapāvabhyaḥ /  svāhā dyāvāpṛthivībhyām /  svāhā viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ //
analyzed: svāhā pūṣṇe śarase   svāhā grāvabhyaḥ svāhā pratiravebhyaḥ svāhā pitṛbhyaḥ ūrdhva barhirbhyaḥ gharma pāvabhyaḥ svāhā dyāvāpṛthivībhyām svāhā viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ

original: svāhā rudrāya rudrahūtaye /  svāhā saṃ jyotiṣā jyotiḥ /  ahaḥ ketunā juṣatām̐ sujyotir jyotiṣā svāhā /  rātriḥ ketunā juṣatām̐ sujyotir jyotiṣā svāhā /  madhu hutam indratame agnāv aśyāma te deva gharma namas te astu mā mā  him̐sīḥ //
analyzed: svāhā rudrāya rudra hūtaye svāhā sam jyotiṣā jyotiḥ    ahar ketunā juṣatām su jyotiḥ jyotiṣā svāhā    rātriḥ ketunā juṣatām su jyotiḥ jyotiṣā svāhā    madhu hutam indratame agnau aśyāma te deva gharma namaḥ te astu mā mā himsīḥ

original: abh`īmaṃ mahimā divaṃ vipro babhūva saprathāḥ /  uta śravasā pṛthivīm̐ sam̐ sīdasva mahām̐ asi rocasva devavītamaḥ //
analyzed: abhi imam mahimā divam vipraḥ babhūva saprathāḥ      uta śravasā pṛthivīm sam sīdasva mahām asi rocasva deva vītamaḥ

original: yā te gharma divyā śug yā gāyatryām̐ havirdhāne /  sā ta ā pyāyatāṃ ni ṣṭyāyatāṃ tasyai te svāhā //
analyzed: yā te gharma divyā śuc yā gāyatryām havirdhāne     sā te ā pyāyatām ni styāyatām tasyai te svāhā

original: yā te gharmāntarikṣe śug yā triṣṭubhy āgnīdhre /  sā ta ā pyāyatāṃ ni ṣṭyāyatāṃ tasyai te svāhā //
analyzed: yā te gharma antarikṣe śuc yā triṣṭubhi āgnīdhre    sā te ā pyāyatām ni styāyatām tasyai te svāhā

original: yā te gharma pṛthivyām̐ śug yā jagatyām̐ sadasyā /  sā ta ā pyāyatāṃ ni ṣṭyāyatāṃ tasyai te svāhā //
analyzed: yā te gharma pṛthivyām śuc yā jagatyām sadasyā    sā te ā pyāyatām ni styāyatām tasyai te svāhā

original: kṣatrasya tvā paraspāya brahmaṇas tanvaṃ pāhi /  viśas tvā dharmaṇā vayam anu krāmāma suvitāya navyase //
analyzed: kṣatrasya tvā paraspāya brahmaṇaḥ tanvam pāhi    viśaḥ tvā dharmaṇā vayam anu krāmāma suvitāya navyase

original: catuḥsraktir nābhir ṛtasya saprathāḥ sa no viśvāyuḥ saprathāḥ sa  naḥ sarvāyuḥ saprathāḥ /  apa dveṣo apa hvaro 'nyavratasya saścima //
analyzed: catur sraktiḥ nābhiḥ ṛtasya saprathāḥ sa naḥ viśva āyuḥ saprathāḥ sa naḥ sarva āyuḥ saprathāḥ    apa dveṣaḥ apa hvaraḥ nyavratasya saścima

original: gharmaitat te purīṣaṃ tena vardhasva cā ca pyāyasva /  vardhiṣīmahi ca vayam ā ca pyāsiṣīmahi //
analyzed: gharma etat te purīṣam tena vardhasva ca ā ca pyāyasva   vardhiṣīmahi ca vayam ā ca pyāsiṣīmahi

original: acikradad vṛṣā harir mahān mitro na darśataḥ /  sam̐ sūryeṇa didyutad udadhir nidhiḥ //
analyzed: acikradat vṛṣā hariḥ mahān mitraḥ na darśataḥ   sam sūryeṇa didyutat udadhiḥ nidhiḥ

original: sumitriyā na āpa oṣadhayaḥ santu +durmitriyās tasmai santu yo  'smān dveṣṭi yaṃ ca vayaṃ dviṣmaḥ //
analyzed: su mitriyāḥ naḥ āpaḥ oṣadhayaḥ santu durmitriyāḥ tasmai santu yaḥ smān dveṣṭi yam ca vayam dviṣmaḥ

original: ud vayaṃ tamasas pari svaḥ paśyanta uttaram /  devaṃ devatrā sūryam aganma jyotir uttamam //
analyzed: ud vayam tamasaḥ pari svar paśyantaḥ uttaram    devam devatrā sūryam aganma jyotiḥ uttamam

original: edho 'sy edhiṣīmahi /  samid asi tejo 'si tejo mayi dhehi //
analyzed: edhaḥ si edhiṣīmahi samidh asi tejaḥ si tejaḥ mayi dhehi

original: yāvato dyāvāpṛthivī yāvac ca sapta sindhavo vitasthire /  tavantam indra te graham ūrjā gṛhṇāmy akṣitaṃ mayi gṛhṇāmy akṣitam //
analyzed: yāvataḥ dyāvāpṛthivī yāvat ca sapta sindhavaḥ vitasthire    tavantam indra te graham ūrjā gṛhṇāmi akṣitam mayi gṛhṇāmi akṣitam

original: mayi tyad indriyaṃ bṛhan mayi dakṣo mayi kratuḥ /  gharmas triśug vi rājati virājā jyotiṣā saha brahmaṇā tejasā saha //
analyzed: mayi tyad indriyam bṛhat mayi dakṣaḥ mayi kratuḥ   gharmaḥ tri śuc vi rājati virājā jyotiṣā saha brahmaṇā tejasā saha

original: payaso reta ābhṛtaṃ tasya doham aśīmahy uttarām-uttarām̐ samām /  tviṣaḥ saṃvṛk kratve dakṣasya te suṣuvāṇasya te suṣumṇāgnihutaḥ /  indrapītasya prajāpatibhakṣitasya madhumata upahūta upahūtasya  bhakṣayāmi //
analyzed: payasaḥ retaḥ ābhṛtam tasya doham aśīmahi uttarām uttarām samām   tviṣaḥ saṃvṛj kratve dakṣasya te suṣuvāṇasya te suṣumṇā agni hutaḥ    indra pītasya prajāpati bhakṣitasya madhumataḥ upahūtaḥ upahūtasya bhakṣayāmi

original: svāhāprāṇebhyaḥ sādhipatikebhyaḥ /  pṛthivyai svāhā /  agnaye svāhā /  antarikṣe svāhā /  vāyave svāhā /  dive svāhā /  sūryāya svāhā //
analyzed: svāhā prāṇebhyaḥ sa ādhipatikebhyaḥ pṛthivyai svāhā  agnaye svāhā  antarikṣe svāhā vāyave svāhā  dive svāhā  sūryāya svāhā

original: digbhyaḥ svāhā /  candrāya svāhā /  nakṣatrebhyaḥ svāhā /  adbhyaḥ svāhā /  varuṇāya svāhā /  nābhyai svāhā /  pūtāya svāhā //
analyzed: digbhyaḥ svāhā candrāya svāhā nakṣatrebhyaḥ svāhā adbhyaḥ svāhā varuṇāya svāhā nābhyai svāhā   pūtāya svāhā

original: vāce svāhā /  prāṇāya svāhā /  prāṇāya svāhā /  cakṣuṣe svāhā /  cakṣuṣe svāhā /  śrotrāya svāhā /  śrotrāya svāhā //
analyzed: vāce svāhā  prāṇāya svāhā  prāṇāya svāhā  cakṣuṣe svāhā cakṣuṣe svāhā  śrotrāya svāhā  śrotrāya svāhā

original: manasaḥ kāmam ākūtiṃ vācaḥ satyam aśīya /  paśūnām̐ rūpam annasya raso yaśaḥ śrīḥ śrayatāṃ mayi svāhā //
analyzed: manasaḥ kāmam ākūtim vācaḥ satyam aśīya paśūnām rūpam annasya rasaḥ yaśaḥ śrīḥ śrayatām mayi svāhā

original: prajāpatiḥ saṃbhriyamāṇaḥ samrāṭ saṃbhṛto vaiśvadevaḥ sam̐sanno  gharmaḥ pravṛktas teja udyata āśvinaḥ payasyānīyamāne pauṣṇo viṣpandamāne  mārutaḥ klathan /  maitraḥ śarasi saṃtāyyamāne vāyavyo hriyamāṇa āgneyo hūyamāno vāg ghutaḥ  //
analyzed: prajāpatiḥ saṃbhriyamāṇaḥ samrāj saṃbhṛtaḥ vaiśvadevaḥ samsannaḥ gharmaḥ pravṛktaḥ tejaḥ udyataḥ āśvinaḥ payasi ānīyamāne pauṣṇaḥ viṣpandamāne mārutaḥ maitraḥ śarasi saṃtāyyamāne vāyavyaḥ hriyamāṇaḥ āgneyaḥ hūyamānaḥ vāc ghutaḥ  /

original: savitā prathame 'hann agnir dvitīye vāyus tṛtīya ādityaś  caturthe candramāḥ pañcama ṛtuḥ ṣaṣṭhe marutaḥ saptame bṛhaspatir  aṣṭame /  mitro navame varuṇo daśama indra ekādaśe viśve devā dvādaśe //
analyzed: savitā prathame han agniḥ dvitīye vāyuḥ tṛtīye ādityaḥ caturthe candramāḥ pañcame ṛtuḥ ṣaṣṭhe marutaḥ saptame bṛhaspatiḥ aṣṭame    mitraḥ navame varuṇaḥ daśame indraḥ ekādaśe viśve devāḥ dvādaśe

original: ugraś ca bhīmaś ca dhvāntaś ca dhuniś ca /  sāsahvām̐ś cābhiyugvā ca vikṣipaḥ svāhā //
analyzed: ugraḥ ca bhīmaḥ ca dhvāntaḥ ca dhuniḥ ca    ca abhiyugvā ca vikṣipaḥ svāhā

original: agnim̐ hṛdayenāśanim̐ hṛdayāgreṇa paśupatiṃ kṛtsnahṛdayena  bhavaṃ yaknā /  śarvaṃ matasnābhyām īśānaṃ manyunā mahādevam antaḥparśavyenograṃ devaṃ  vaniṣṭhunā vasiṣṭhahanuḥ śiṅgīni kośyābhyām //
analyzed: agnim hṛdayena aśanim hṛdaya agreṇa paśupatim kṛtsna hṛdayena bhavam yaknā  / śarvam matasnābhyām īśānam manyunā mahādevam antar parśavyena ugram devam vaniṣṭhunā vasiṣṭha hanuḥ śiṅgīni kośyābhyām

original: ugraṃ lohitena mitram̐ sauvratyena rudraṃ daurvratyenendraṃ  prakrīḍena maruto balena sādhyān pramudā /  bhavasya kaṇṭham̐ rudrasyāntaḥpārśvyaṃ mahādevasya yakṛc charvasya  vaniṣṭhuḥ paśupateḥ purītat //
analyzed: ugram lohitena mitram sauvratyena rudram daurvratyena indram prakrīḍena marutaḥ balena sādhyān pramudā  / bhavasya kaṇṭham rudrasya antaḥpārśvyam mahādevasya yakṛt śarvasya vaniṣṭhuḥ paśupateḥ purītat

original: lomabhyaḥ svāhā lomabhyaḥ svāhā tvace svāhā tvace svāhā  lohitāya svāhā lohitāya svāhā medobhyaḥ svāhā medobhyaḥ svāhā /  mām̐sebhyaḥ svāhā mām̐sebhyaḥ svāhā snāvabhyaḥ svāhā snāvabhyaḥ  svāhāsthabhyaḥ svāhāsthabhyaḥ svāhā majjabhyaḥ svāhā majjabhyaḥ svāhā  /  retase svāhā pāyave svāhā //
analyzed: lomabhyaḥ svāhā lomabhyaḥ svāhā tvace svāhā tvace svāhā lohitāya svāhā lohitāya svāhā medobhyaḥ svāhā medobhyaḥ svāhā    māmsebhyaḥ svāhā māmsebhyaḥ svāhā snāvabhyaḥ svāhā snāvabhyaḥ svāhā asthabhyaḥ svāhā asthabhyaḥ svāhā majjabhyaḥ svāhā majjabhyaḥ svāhā  / retase svāhā pāyave svāhā

original: āyāsāya svāhā prāyāsāya svāhā saṃyāsāya svāhā viyāsāya  svāhodyāsāya svāhā /  śuce svāhā śocate svāhā śocamānāya svāhā śokāya svāhā //
analyzed: āyāsāya svāhā prāyāsāya svāhā saṃyāsāya svāhā viyāsāya svāhā udyāsāya svāhā    śuce svāhā śocate svāhā śocamānāya svāhā śokāya svāhā

original: tapase svāhā tapyate svāhā tapyamānāya svāhā taptāya svāhā  gharmāya svāhā /  niṣkṛtyai svāhā prāyaścittyai svāhābheṣajāya svāhā //
analyzed: tapase svāhā tapyate svāhā tapyamānāya svāhā taptāya svāhā gharmāya svāhā    niṣkṛtyai svāhā prāyaścittyai svāhā abheṣajāya svāhā

original: yamāya svāhāntakāya svāhā mṛtyave svāhā brahmaṇe svāhā  brahmahatyāyai svāhā viśvebhyo devebhyaḥ svāhā dyāvāpṛthivībhyām̐  svāhā //
analyzed: yamāya svāhā antakāya svāhā mṛtyave svāhā brahmaṇe svāhā brahmahatyāyai svāhā viśvebhyaḥ devebhyaḥ svāhā dyāvāpṛthivībhyām svāhā

original: īśā vāsyam idam̐ sarvaṃ yat kiṃ ca jagatyāṃ jagat /  tena tyaktena bhuñjīthā mā gṛdhaḥ kasya svid dhanam //
analyzed: īśā vā asyam idam sarvam yat kim ca jagatyām jagat    tena tyaktena bhuñjīthāḥ mā gṛdhaḥ kasya svid dhanam

original: kurvann eveha karmāṇi jijīviṣec chatam̐ samāḥ /  evaṃ tvayi nānyatheto 'sti na karma lipyate nare //
analyzed: kurvan evā iha karmāṇi jijīviṣet śatam samāḥ    evam tvayi na anyathā itas sti na karma lipyate nare

original: asuryā nāma te lokā andhena tamasāvṛtāḥ /  tām̐s te pretyāpi gacchanti ye ke cātmahano janāḥ //
analyzed: asuryāḥ nāma te lokāḥ andhena tamasā āvṛtāḥ   tām te pretya api gacchanti ye ke ca ātma hanaḥ janāḥ

original: anejad ekaṃ manaso javīyo nainad devā āpnuvan pūrvam arśat /  tad dhāvato 'nyān aty eti tiṣṭhat tasminn apo mātariśvā dadhāti //
analyzed: anejat ekam manasaḥ javīyaḥ na enat devāḥ āpnuvan pūrvam arśat     tat dhāvataḥ nyān ati eti tiṣṭhat tasmin apaḥ mātariśvā dadhāti

original: tad ejati tan naijati tad dūre tad v antike /  tad antar asya sarvasya tad u saravasyāsya bāhyataḥ //
analyzed: tat ejati tat na ejati tat dūre tat u antike    tat antar asya sarvasya tat u sa ravasya asya bāhyatas

original: yas tu sarvāṇi bhūtāny ātmann evānupaśyati /  sarvabhūteṣu cātmānaṃ tato na vi cikitsati //
analyzed: yaḥ tu sarvāṇi bhūtāni ātman eva anupaśyati    sarva bhūteṣu ca ātmānam tatas na vi cikitsati

original: yasmint sarvāṇi bhūtāny ātmaivābhūd vijānataḥ /  tatra ko mohaḥ kaḥ śoka ekatvam anupaśyataḥ //
analyzed: yasmin sarvāṇi bhūtāni ātmā eva abhūt vijānataḥ    tatra kaḥ mohaḥ kaḥ śokaḥ eka tvam anupaśyataḥ

original: sa pary agāc chukram akāyam avraṇam asnāviram̐ śuddham apāpaviddham /  kavir manīṣī paribhūḥ svayaṃbhūr yāthātathyato 'rthān vy adadhāc  chāśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ  //
analyzed: sa pari agāt śukram akāyam avraṇam a snāviram śuddham a pāpa viddham    kaviḥ manīṣī paribhūḥ svayaṃbhūḥ yāthātathyataḥ rthān vi adadhāt śāśvatībhyaḥ samābhyaḥ

original: andhaṃ tamaḥ pra viśanti ye 'saṃbhūtim upāsate /  tato bhūya iva te tamo ya u saṃbhūtyām̐ ratāḥ //
analyzed: andham tamaḥ pra viśanti ye saṃbhūtim upāsate   tatas bhūyaḥ iva te tamaḥ ye u saṃbhūtyām ratāḥ

original: anyad evāhuḥ saṃbhavād anyad āhur śaṃbhavāt /  iti śuśruma dhīrāṇāṃ ye nas tad vicacakṣire //
analyzed: anyat eva āhuḥ saṃbhavāt anyat āhuḥ śaṃbhavāt      iti śuśruma dhīrāṇām ye naḥ tat vicacakṣire

original: saṃbhūtiṃ ca vināśaṃ ca yas tad vedobhayam̐ saha /  vināśena mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā saṃbhūtyāmṛtam aśnute //
analyzed: saṃbhūtim ca vināśam ca yaḥ tat veda ubhayam saha    vināśena mṛtyum tīrtvā saṃbhūtyā amṛtam aśnute

original: andhaṃ tamaḥ pra viśanti ye 'vidyām upāsate /  tato bhūya iva te tamo ya u vidyāyām̐ ratāḥ //
analyzed: andham tamaḥ pra viśanti ye vidyām upāsate   tatas bhūyas iva te tamaḥ ye u vidyāyām ratāḥ

original: anyad evāhur vidyāyā anyad āhur avidyāyāḥ /  iti śuśruma dhīrāṇāṃ ye nas tad vicacakṣire //
analyzed: anyat eva āhuḥ vidyāyāḥ anyat āhuḥ avidyāyāḥ    iti śuśruma dhīrāṇām ye naḥ tat vicacakṣire

original: vidyāṃ cāvidyāṃ ca yas tad vedobhayam̐ saha /  avidyayā mṛtyuṃ tīrtvā vidyayāmṛtam aśnute //
analyzed: vidyām ca avidyām ca yaḥ tat veda ubhayam saha avidyayā mṛtyum tīrtvā vidyayā amṛtam aśnute

original: vāyur anilam amṛtam athedaṃ bhasmāntam̐ śarīram /  o3m krato smara klibe smara kṛtam̐ smara //
analyzed: vāyuḥ anilam amṛtam atha idam bhasma antam śarīram    krato smara klibe smara kṛtam smara

original: agne naya supathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān /  yuyodhy asmaj juhurāṇam eno bhuyiṣṭhāṃ te namaktiṃ vidhema //
analyzed: agne naya su pathā rāye asmān viśvāni deva vayunāni vidvān   yuyodhi asmat juhurāṇam enaḥ bhuyiṣṭhām te namaktim vidhema

original: hiraṇmayena pātreṇa satyasyāpihitaṃ mukham /  yo 'sāv āditye puruṣaḥ so 'sāv aham //
analyzed: hiraṇmayena pātreṇa satyasya apihitam mukham   yaḥ sau āditye puruṣaḥ saḥ sau aham

original: o3m khaṃ brahma //
analyzed: kham brahma
